## Source Text: unaltered below
##

MAT 1:1 Kitabu ka ukoo wang'wa Yesu Kilisto ng'wana wang'wa Daudi, ng'wana wang'wa Ibrahimu.
MAT 1:2 Ibrahimu ae tata wang'wa Isaka, nu Isaka tata wang'wa Yakobo, nu Yakobo tata wang'wa Yuda nialuna akwe.
MAT 1:3 U Yuda ae tata wang'wa Peresi nu Sera kung'wa Tamari, Peresi tata wang'wa Hezeroni, nu Hezeroni tata wang'wa Ramu.
MAT 1:4 U Ramu ae tata wang'wa Aminadabu, Aminadabu tata wang'wa Nashoni, nu Nashoni tata wang'wa Salimoni.
MAT 1:5 Salimoni ae tata wang'wa Boazi kung'wa Rahabu, u Boazi tata wang'wa Obedi kung'wa Ruthi, u Obedi tata wang'wa Yese,
MAT 1:6 u Yese ae tata wang'wa mtemi Daudi, u Daudi ae tata wang'wa Sulemani kumu sungu wang'wa Uria.
MAT 1:7 Sulemani ae tata wang'wa Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu tata wang'wa Abiya, Abiya tata wang'wa Asa.
MAT 1:8 Asa ae tata wang'wa Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati tata wang'wa Yoramu, nu Yoramu tata wang'wa Uzia.
MAT 1:9 Uzia ae tata wang'wa Yothamu, u Yothamu ae tata wang'wa Ahazi, u Ahazi tata wang'wa Hezekia.
MAT 1:10 Hezekia ae tata wang'wa Manase, u Manase tata wang'wa Amoni nu Amoni tata wang'wa Yosia.
MAT 1:11 U Yosia ae tata wang'wa Yekonia nialuna akwe naiahoilwe kulongola ku Babeli.
MAT 1:12 Nai aholwa kulongola ku Babeli, Yekonia ae tata wang'wa Shetieli, u Shetieli ai sekulu wakwe nu Zerubabeli.
MAT 1:13 Zerubabeli ai tata wang'wa Abiudi, Abiudi tata wang'wa Eliakimu, nu Eliakimu tata wang'wa Azori.
MAT 1:14 Azori ai tata wang'wa Zadoki, nu Zadoki tata wang'wa Akimu, nu Akimu tata wang'wa Eliudi.
MAT 1:15 Eliudi ae tata wang'wa Elieza, Elieza tata wang'wa Matani nu Matani tata wang'wa Yakobo.
MAT 1:16 U Yakobo ai tata wang'wa Yusufu mugoha wang'wa Mariamu, kukeela ng'wenso u Yesu akatugwa, naewitangilwe Kilisto.
MAT 1:17 Wileli wehi puma u Ibrahimu nu Daudi ae wileli wikumi na inne, kupuma u Daudi nukunolwa kulongola ku Babeli ae wileli wi kumi na inne, nu kumakuholwa kulongola ku Babeli kupika kung'wa Yesu ae wileli ikumi na inne.
MAT 1:18 Kutugwa kung'wa Yesu Kilisto aeitwile ite, Mariamu, auligigwe nu Yusufu, akaze akile kutankanya, akigeeleka ukete nda ang'wau ng'welu.
MAT 1:19 Umugoha wakwe u Yusufu, ae muntu wa tai, singa akalowa kumuhumya uminyala u Mariamu. Akahia amuleke kenkunku.
MAT 1:20 Naukusiga ulukani nulanso, umalaika wang'wa Itunda akamizeela kukeela ndoti. Akalunga, “Yusufu ng'wana wang'wa Daudi, leka kugopa kumuhola u Mariamu anga msungu wako, nsoko inda nutite upatile kungulu ya ng'waung'welu.
MAT 1:21 Ukitunguila ng'wana mgoha ni lina lakwe ukumitanga Yesu, kunsoko ukuaguna antu ni milandu ao.
MAT 1:22 Aya ihi aigelekile kukondanilya iko naikiligitigwe ni Tunda kukeela anyakidagu, akalunga.
MAT 1:23 Gozi umunanso ukuhola nda nukitunguela ng'wana mugoha, ilina lakwe ukitangwa Immanueli, nsoko akwe “Itunda palung'wi nu sese.”
MAT 1:24 Yusufu akauka kupuma mutulo akituma anga naulagiigwe nu malaika akamuhola akatula msungu wakwe.
MAT 1:25 Palung'wi nayo nanso singa aeihugee, singa akatugwa ung'wana akamitanga lina lakwe Yesu.
MAT 2:1 Nae watugwa u Yesu mkisale ka Bethelehemu a Uyahudi mumahiku ang'wa mutemi Herode, eantu nia manyi kupuma kilya na kuli ikapika ku Yerusalemu ikalunga.
MAT 2:2 Ukolipi uyu nutugilwe umutemi wa Ayahudi? Aza kuina nzota akwe kukilya nusese kapika kumukulya.
MAT 2:3 Matungo nu Herode aewija inkani izi akaambwa masigo makulu, i Yerusalemu ihi palung'wi nung'wenso.
MAT 2:4 Herode akailingiila iakulu ihi nawa neetunza inkani ya antu, akaakolya, “u Kilisto ukutugwa pee?”
MAT 2:5 Akamuila, “ukutugwa ku Bethelehemu a Uyahudi, kunsoko uu aeyandikilwe nianyakidagu,
MAT 2:6 Nue Bethelehemu, ihi ang'wa Yuda, singa wimunino muatongeeli ang'wa Yuda, kunsoko kupuma kitalako uzile mkulu nuziadima iantu ane Israeli.”
MAT 2:7 Herode akaitanga iamanyi ankani kenkunku akaakolya ite matungo kelukulu inzota ai ezigela.
MAT 2:8 Akaatuma alongole ku Bethelehemu, akalunga, longoli kiisa uende mumuetume ung'wana nutugilwe. Matungo angamamuona, ulete inkani nunene nihuma kuza kumukulya.”
MAT 2:9 Nai amija umtemi, ikalongoleka numuhinzo wao, ni nzota iyo naeamiine kukilya ikaatongeela ikimika migulya apo nung'wana utugiwe.
MAT 2:10 Nai amiona inzota ikalowa ikulu.
MAT 2:11 Ikingila mnyumba ikamuona ung'wana nutugilwe nu Mariamu unyinya wakwe. Ikamiloelya nukumukulya. Ikatungula imaintu nimaza naiatite ikamupa.
MAT 2:12 Itunda akaahugulya kukeela ndoti kusuka kung'wa Herode, kululo, ikahega kusuka kihe ao kukeela nzila ngiza.
MAT 2:13 Nai akondya kuhega, malaika akamuzeela Yusufu kukeela ndoti akalunga, “Uka, muhole ung'wana nu nyinya wakwe mumankeele ku Misri. Musige kuko mpaka ninzemuila kunsoko u Herode wenda ukumupenza amubulage.
MAT 2:14 Utiku wuwo u Yusufu akauka akamuhola ung'wana nu nyinya wakwe ikamankiila ku Misri.
MAT 2:15 Akikie kuko mpaka u Herode ikasha. Iko naikilingiligwe numunyakidagu, “Kupuma ku Misri numitangile ung'waane.”
MAT 2:16 Kululo u Herode, akalunga kina iantu awa niahugu antendela ubi, akalaka. Akalagiilya kubulagwa ehi iang'enya niagoha ku Bethelehemu niatite miaka ibiile ni pihe apang'wanso kunsoko aiwakondya kulinga kukeela antu ao niamanyi ankani.
MAT 2:17 Ingi nailakondigwa ulukani naeluligitigwe kukeela mnyakidagu Yeremia,
MAT 2:18 Luli lukigela ku Ramah, kilelo nikinyauwai kikulu, u Raheli akazealila iana akwe, hangi akahita kupumbuligwa, kunsoko ikutile singaaziziona hangi.”
MAT 2:19 U Herode naiwasha, umalaika akamuhanga u Yusufu kukeela ndoti kuko ku Misri akalunga,
MAT 2:20 “Uka muhole ung'wana nunyinya wakwe, mlongole mihe a Israeli kunsoko awa naienda upenza upanga wa ng'wana akuza.”
MAT 2:21 U Yusufu akauka akamuhola ung'wana nu nyinya wakwe, ikolongola mihe a Israeli.
MAT 2:22 Ingi gwa nae wija kina Arikelau ae mutemi Yuda pang'wa tata wakwe u Herode. Akogopa kulongola kung'wanso. Matungo ni Tunda nae wamuhugula kukeela mundoti, akahega akalongola mukisali ka Galilaya.
MAT 2:23 Hangi akalongola kikie mukisali nikitangwa Nazareti. Ike aekekondaniye iko naikiligitigwe kukeela nzila aanyakedagu, kina ukitangwa Mnazareti.
MAT 3:1 I mahiku ayo u Yohana Mbatizaji auzile akazetanantya ulukani mumbuga ang'wa Yuda akazelunga,
MAT 3:2 Leki imilandu kunsoko utemi wa kigulu ukole pakupe.”
MAT 3:3 Kunsoko yuyu nauligitigwe numunyakidagu u Isaya ikalunga, “Luli la muntu nukitanga mumbuga, leki uza inzila ya Mkulu, gooli kisa imapanda akwe.”
MAT 3:4 U Yohana autugae mauli angamia hangi akitunga numusipi wa ndili mkileno kakwe indya yakwe ai ngaga nu uki wa mihaka.
MAT 3:5 Hangi Yerusalemu, Yuda ihi, nikisali kihi nikepilimiye umongo wa Yorodani ikalongola kitalakwe.
MAT 3:6 Aizabadisigwa mumongo wa Yorodani nukila itunu imilandu ao.
MAT 3:7 Sunga akatyatwa unuduu wa mafarisayo ni masadukayo kuza kubadisigwa, akaeela, unye wileli wa nzoka nikete sumu nyenyu numuhuguye kuutiga uubi nupembilye?
MAT 3:8 Tugi imaintu nahegekile mumilandu, namuloeye Itunda.
MAT 3:9 Leki kusige nukikolya kung'wanyu kutite u Ibrahimu anga tata witu, inge kumuila Itunda uhumile kumuukilya u Ibrahimu iana kupumila mumagwe aya.
MAT 3:10 Ihengo aikwa mumuli wa muti, kulule umuti nishawipeza indya ninza witeng'wa nukugung'wa mumoto.
MAT 3:11 Kumubadiza kunzila amazi, nukumuhugilya muhueli. Kululo uyu nupembilye ukete ingulu kukila unene, hangi kuleng'wa lukulu kukenka ilatu yakwe. Nuanso ukuabadisa kukeela ng'waung'welu nu moto.
MAT 3:12 Ipetelo nilakupelela ingano likole mumikono akwe, kilingila iyo ninza misalanka. Kululo gwa iyo nikite ipuko ikusonswa umoto uo nishawilima.
MAT 3:13 Sunga u Yesu akaza kupembelya kugalilaya akapika mumongo wa Yorodani akabadisigwa nu Yohana.
MAT 3:14 Yohana akahia amugilye akalunga, unene ntakile mbadisigwe nuewe, nikawaza kitalane?
MAT 3:15 U Yesu akasusha akalunga, “Gomba itule uu itungile. Kunsoko yatula kukondanilye itai ehi.” Sunga u Yohana akamugombya.
MAT 3:16 Naiwamala kubadisigwa, u Yesu akapuma mumazi, Ilunde likaluguka kitalakwe. Akamuona ng'waung'welu wang'wi Tunda akazesima anga inkunda nukukilaja migulya akwe.
MAT 3:17 Goza, luli ailupumie kilunde lukalunga, “Uyu ng'waane mlowa. ni ndoeigwe nangulu nung'wenso.”
MAT 4:1 Sunga u Yesu akatongeelwa nung'waung'welu akapika mumbuga ahume kugeng'wa nu mulugu.
MAT 4:2 Pang'wanso ae wiimile kulya indya mahiku makumi anne utiku nu ng'ung'wi sunga akahungwa nzala.
MAT 4:3 Mugemi akaza akamuila, “Angwe tai weng'wana wang'wi Tunda maile imagwe aya atule ndya.”
MAT 4:4 U Yesu akasukeelya akamuila, “Yandikilwe, u muntu singa uhumile kikie ni ndya du, uhumilye kikie nalukani nulupumie mumolomo wang'wi Tunda.”
MAT 4:5 Sunga umulugu akamutwala mukisali nikiza nukumuika pigulya a nyumba ang'wa Itunda.
MAT 4:6 Akamuila, “ang'wi wing'wana wang'wi Tunda, puta pihi nsoko yaandikilye, ukuaila iamalaika akwe akuuke uleke kugwa, hangi akuuhumbula na mikono ao. Sunga shukukumpa umagulu wako pigwe.”
MAT 4:7 U Yesu akaaila, “Hangi yandikilwe, leka kumgema Itunda wako.
MAT 4:8 Sunga umulugu akamuhola akamutwala migulya akamulagiila utemi wihi nugole akwe nuaunkumbigulu.
MAT 4:9 Akamuila, Kupa aya ihi agunihuele nukunkulya.”
MAT 4:10 Sunga u Yesu akamuila hega apaite uwe mulugu, kunsoko yandikilwe, mkulye Itunda wako, hange umitumile imilimo ung'wenso du.
MAT 4:11 Sunga umulugu akamuleka, iamalaika akaza akituma imilimo akwe.
MAT 4:12 Matungo u Yesu naiwija kina u Yohana waambwa, akahega akalongola ku Galilaya.
MAT 4:13 Akahega ku Nazareti akenda akatula kikie Kaperanaumu, nikole mpelompelo aluzila Galilaya, mumimbe ni hii ang'wa Zabuloni nu Naftali.
MAT 4:14 Iye aigeelekile kukondanilya iko naikiligiligwe nu munyakidagu u Isaya.
MAT 4:15 Kululo ihi ang'wa Zabuloni nihi ang'wa Naftali kulonga kuluzi, itumbi la Yorodani, Galilaya aanyakilungu!
MAT 4:16 Antu nikie mukiti auona uwelu nukulu, nao naikie mumululewa ushi, migulya ao alikilwa nung'waung'welu.”
MAT 4:17 Pumeela matungo yayo u Yesu akandya kutanantya ulukani akazelunga leki imilandu kunsoko utemi wa kigulu wahugeela.”
MAT 4:18 Naugenda mumpelompelo a luzi la Galilaya, akaaona anyandugu abiili, Simoni naiwitangwa Petro, nu Andrea muluna wakwe, ikazetega muluzi kunsoko aiavui a samaki.
MAT 4:19 U Yesu akaaila, nzii ntyati, kumupa uhumi mukivua iantu.
MAT 4:20 Sunga ikaleka inyavu ikamutyata.
MAT 4:21 U Yesu naikile ulongolekile numuhinzo akaaona anyandugu abiili hangi, Yakobo ng'wana wang'wa Zebedayo, nu Yohana muluna wakwe. Aaze akoli mibina palung'wi nu Zebedayo utata wao akaze tumainyavu yao akaitanga,
MAT 4:22 Shanga ekisinsela ikalileka ibine nu tata ao ikamutyata.
MAT 4:23 U Yesu akagendeela i Galilaya ihi, akaze amanyisa mumapolyo ao, akazetanantya ulukani la utemi wa kigulu, hangi niantu akaza komya indwala.
MAT 4:24 Inkani yakwe ikenela Isiria ihi, niantu ikaaleta ihi iantu awa niilwala indwala ni makendi, niatile iamintunga, niagwa nkolo nawa niatite igandi. U Yesu akaakomya.
MAT 4:25 Iumbi ikulu la antu likamtyata kupumiila ku Galilaya nuku Dekapoli, Yerusalemu nuku Uyahudi nukupuma kitumbi la Yorodani.
MAT 5:1 U Yesu naewaliona iumbi, akahega akalongola Mulugulu, naewikie pihi, iamanyisigwa akwe akaza kitalakwe.
MAT 5:2 Akaligitya nukuamanyisa, akalunga,
MAT 5:3 “Bahu awa nia kia amunkolo kunsoko utemi wa kigulu wao.
MAT 5:4 Bahu niakite ikinyauwai, azizapumbuligwa.
MAT 5:5 Bahu awa niapolo, kunsoko azizamisala ihi.
MAT 5:6 Bahu awa niakite inzala ni nyota atai kunsoko azizalisigwa ikute.
MAT 5:7 Bahu awania hegelya imilanda nienso aziza hegeligwa.
MAT 5:8 Bahu awa niankolo nza azemuona Itunda.
MAT 5:9 Bahu awa niakaminkanya, nsoko nianso azezitangwa ana ang'wi Tunda.
MAT 5:10 Bahu awa neitumigwa usese kunsoko atai, nsoko utemi wa kigulu wao.
MAT 5:11 Bahu unye niantu akumutukila nukumitumya ubi, nukumligitya ubi nuteele kunsoko ane.
MAT 5:12 Lowi nukulumbiilya kunsoko ikipegwa kanyu kikulu kigulu. Kunsoko inge uu aiaitumilya ubi ianyakidagu nia kali.
MAT 5:13 Unye mi munyu wa unkumbigulu umunyu iga ulimilye umulyo wake, ukutula ne munyu hange? Singa ukutula uza kukintu nikingiza inge ukugung'wa kunzi nukupambatwa nimigulu aantu.
MAT 5:14 Unye miwelu wa unkumbigulu. Ihi nizengilwe mulugulu nishalipihile.
MAT 5:15 Iantu singa akakilya ulumule nukuluika pihi a nkapu, akumiika migulya, ikualika ihi niakoli munyumba.
MAT 5:16 Leka uwelu wanyu welye kuntongeela aantu kunsoko aione intendo yanyu ninza hangi amukulye utata wanyu nuakigulu.
MAT 5:17 Leki kusigiili kina ainzile gazanja uzipiili nia anyakidagu. Singa zegazanja zilekondanilya.
MAT 5:18 Kutai kumuila unkumbigulu nihi ihi ukile hangi kutile uzipiilya hata nung'wi, mpaka nuzetula wakondigwa.
MAT 5:19 Kululo wihi nuibananga ilagiilyo ninino nilamalagiilyo aya nukuamanyisa kituma niangiza uu ukitangwa munino muutemi wa kigulu. Inge gwa wihi nuiambile nukuimanyisa ukitangwa muutemi wa kigulu.
MAT 5:20 Kunsoko numuie itai anyu igehite kumikelinkela itai a mafarisayo, shanga mukingile mtemi wa kigulu.
MAT 5:21 Amigulu ikali ailambuwe kina leka, “kubulaga” numubulagi wihi ukole mubii wa ulamulya.
MAT 5:22 Hangi kumuila wihi ni shumuloilwe muluna akwe ukutula ukole mubii wa ulamulwa. Hangi muntu wihi nukumuila umunyandugu wakwe kina shufaile! ukutula mubii wianza. Nuyu wihi nuilunga uwe wimupungu, ukutula mubii wa moto wamu jehanamu.
MAT 5:23 Ang'wi ukupumya isongeelyo kuntongeela ikumbikilo, kunu aza mileile numunyandugu shamiungamie,
MAT 5:24 Lileke isongeelyo pa ntongeela pi kumbikilo, uambi nzila ende miungamile hanza numunyandugu wako, usuke uzupumye gwa isongeelyo.
MAT 5:25 Kayi igombi numilei wako munzila nimukili mulongoe kianza, hakamuhite kigombya umilei wako uhumile akuleke mumikono angwa mlamuli hangi ugung'we kukitungo.
MAT 5:26 Tai numuie shangaukulekelwa mpaka mulipe impia nimudaigwe.
MAT 5:27 Migule iligitigwe kina leka, “Kugoolya.”
MAT 5:28 Numuie kina wihi nukumugoza umusungu nukumulowa wagoolya munkolo akwe.
MAT 5:29 Ang'wi iliho lako nila mukono wako nua kigoha lenda kutwala muibe, liheje uligume kule nuewe, ikatula bahu muili unino ugung'we unukulu uguneke kugung'wa ku jehanamu.
MAT 5:30 Ang'we umukono wa kigoha inda nsoko akukumpa uteme ugume kuli, sunga umuili nungiza uleke kugung'wa ku jehanamu.
MAT 5:31 Itambuwe kina wihi nukumuzunsa umusungu wakwe ampe ikilingisilyo kutai na ulamulwa.
MAT 5:32 Une numuie wihi nukumleka umusungu wakwe nsoko a ugoolya, ukutula wituma usambo. Hangi wihi nukumuhugela anga wapegwa ulamulwa wa tai ukutula wituma usambo.
MAT 5:33 Hangi migule aitambuue kuantu ao niakali, leki kutambuli uteele, kululo twali itai anyu kumukulu.
MAT 5:34 Une numuie, leki kutambula hata niniino, ang'wi kigulu, nsoko kung'wanso kung'witunda.
MAT 5:35 Ang'wi mihi, nsoko wieka ituntu lakupambatilya impambatilyo yakwe ang'wi Yerusalemu, nsoko ingi kisali ni kamutemi numukulu.
MAT 5:36 Leka kulapa nitwe lako, kunsoko shukulipeula isingi ling'we litule lyelu ang'wi ilwaalu.
MAT 5:37 Ingi gwa inkani yanyu, tai, tai, singau, singa u, kunsoko ayo nakangeelya ipuma kumulugu.
MAT 5:38 Migule iligitigwe kina, liho na liho ni lino na lino.
MAT 5:39 Une numuie leki inkungumi nu muntu nu mubii, anga wakukua ikunda nilamkono wa kigoha mupiuele nilulya.
MAT 5:40 Ang'wi wihi nuloilwe kulongola nuewe kianza anga wakuhegelya inkanzu ako, muleke ni joho lao.
MAT 5:41 Nuyu wihi nukuonyeelya kulongola muhinzo ung'we, longola nung'wenso mihinzo ibiili.
MAT 5:42 Wihi nukulompa mpe, hangi uleke kumuhita uyu nutakile umukopise.
MAT 5:43 Migule iligitigwe mlowe umunyakisali wako, na umuhukilwe umubi wako.
MAT 5:44 Kululo numuie, alowi iabi anyu, alompeeli awa nimutasha.
MAT 5:45 Ingi gwa mutule miano wang'wa tata wanyu nuakigulu, kunsoko wialikila ilyoa iabi niaza. Hangi wikuisa imbula kuabi niaza.
MAT 5:46 Anga mualowe ao nizamualoilwe nye, mipata kintu kii? Aiahoela mpia shaituma ne itii?
MAT 5:47 Anga mulamushe ianyandugu anyu du mipata ntuni kua uya? Ianyakilungu shaituma ne uu?
MAT 5:48 Kululo ihumikile mutule mia tai, anga utata wanyu nuakigulu nukoli mutai.
MAT 6:1 Tula miho uleke kituma intendo niyatai kuntongeela aantu nukielya kitalao, nsoko shukupata ukembetwa kupuma kung'wa tata nukole kigulu.
MAT 6:2 Kululo nukupumya leka kukua impembe nukikulya anga ao niielya niakoli mumatekeelo numuisali, nsoko iantu aakulye, tai numuie asingiilya uziza wao.
MAT 6:3 Uwe nukupuma, umukono wako nuakikema uleke kulinga iko nikekitung'wa numukono nua kigoha.
MAT 6:4 Ingi gwa ikintu kako kipumigwe kwa kinkunku. Pang'wanso utata ako nuiona unkunku ako ukuupa imaintu ako.
MAT 6:5 Hangi nukulompa, uleke kutula anga ao niielya, kunsoko ilowa kimika nukulompa mumatekeelo numumpelo ya isali, nsoko agozwe niantu. Tai numuie akondilye kupegwa ipegwa yao.
MAT 6:6 Kululo gwa, angawahia kulompa ingile munyumba lugaila umulango ulompe kung'wa Tata ako nukole kunkunku. Pang'wanso utata ako nuiona unkunku ukuupa ikipegwa kako.
MAT 6:7 Nukulompa leka kusukila sukiila inkani ningila insoko anga anyakilungu niituma, isiga kina akigigwa kunsoko amakani du niakumaligitya.
MAT 6:8 Kululo, uleke kutula anga nianso, kunsoko utata ao aiwalinga kina atakile ntuni nianso akazi akili kanu kulompa.
MAT 6:9 Ingi lompa iti: Tata witu nukoli kilunde lina lako likuligwe.
MAT 6:10 Utemi wako uze, ulowa wako witume mihi anga nuituma kilunde.
MAT 6:11 Ukupe indya yitu nia leliye.
MAT 6:12 Ukulekele imilandu anga usese nikialekela awa naiakukosee.
MAT 6:13 Uleke kuutwala muma geng'wa, ukupugamule numulugu.
MAT 6:14 Anga itule mukualekela iantu imilandu ao, nunyenye utata anyu nuakigulu nung'wenso ukumulekela.
MAT 6:15 Ang'wi shamukualekela imilandu ao ka nu tata anyu shukumulekela imilandu anyu.
MAT 6:16 Matungo ihi nakiima leka kigeeleke anga ao niilya, akunye imakelu ao anwe kina iimile kuntongeela aantu. Tai kuila asingiilya ipegwa yao.
MAT 6:17 Kululo uewe niwiimile, paka imakuta itwe lako, hangi woje usu ako.
MAT 6:18 Ingi shaikigeeleka kuntongeela aantu kina wiimile, ikutula kung'wa Tata ako nuakinkunku. Nu tata ako nuiona unkunku ukuupa ikipegwa kako.
MAT 6:19 Leka kiekilya ikiuto kako munu mihi akoli agazanji, nii ii niibunanga nukia.
MAT 6:20 Iekelya ikiuto kako kigulu, kung'wanso kulile anga agazanji, hangi tile anga ii niakubunanga nukia.
MAT 6:21 Kunsoko kuna kiuto kako kikoli, kuko ni nkolo ako izize ikoli.
MAT 6:22 I liho lumuli la muili. Kululo ang'wi iliho lako ipanga, muili wihi ukizuligwa welu.
MAT 6:23 Anga itule iliho lako ibe, umuili wako wihi ukizula kiti nikibe. Anga itule uwelu nuukole mitalako wa ki ti nangulu, ikiti kikutula kikulu nangulu.
MAT 6:24 Kutile ata nung'wi nuhumila kuitumila akulu abili, kunsoko ukumuhukilwa ung'wi nukumlowa numungiza, hangi ukipumya kumukulya ung'wi, nukuhita kumukulya umuya. Sha mukumtumi kila Itunda ni nsao.
MAT 6:25 Kululo kuila, heja uoa wako, kina ukulya ntuni, ang'wi ukung'wa ntuni, ang'wi umuili ako, ukutugala ntuni. Aya hii singa akilingie indya, nu muili ukilinkie utugali?
MAT 6:26 Goza inyunyi nikoli migulya. Shaitemela, shaikungula hangi shayilingila nukuika misalanga, utata anyu nua kigulu wilesa, unye sha miazane kukila nianso?
MAT 6:27 Nyenyu nuhumile kiongeela ala uluhiku nulung'wi munu mihi upanga wakwe?
MAT 6:28 Niki nimukula nuwoa nuakutugala? Si sigiila maua nitula mumagunda nitulakula, shituma anga milimo, hangi shanga akitugalya.
MAT 6:29 Nkili kumuila kina ata Sulemani mugole wakwe wihi shautugawi ana nanso.
MAT 6:30 Ng'wi Itunda wiimatugalya imatutu na mumigunda nikie luhiku lung'wi numudau agung'we mumoto, aunye mkulaigaligwa uu, nimutite uhuili unino?
MAT 6:31 Kululo leki kutula nuwoa, kina kuulya ntuni? Angwe kutendwa ule? angwe kutugala ntuni?
MAT 6:32 Kunsoko ianya kilungu akuduma yayo, nu Tata nyu nuakigulu uineu kina mtakile yayo.
MAT 6:33 Ingi gwa hanza upenzi utemi wakwe ni tai akwe nayi hii mukupegwa kitalakwe.
MAT 6:34 Kululo leka kutula ninkiki nsoko amudau, aya namudau akizipiilya imenso. Kila uluhiku lutete ninkani yakwe.
MAT 7:1 Leka kuakenkya ulamulwa, nuewe uzuleke kukenkigwa ulamulwa.
MAT 7:2 Ulamulwa nuapeza, nue uziza lamuilwa. Ningele nuiapimila nuewe uziza pimilwa yiyo yiyo.
MAT 7:3 Kuniki nukugoza ikipande kamuti nikikoli muliho la mnyandugu ako, kunu shuine ikipande kigogo nikikoli muliho lako?
MAT 7:4 Uhumile ule kulunga kumunyandugu ako, kilaja nukuhegelye igogo nikikoli muliho lako, kunu uewe igogo likoli muliho lako?
MAT 7:5 Wimieli uewe; hangi heja igogo nilikoli muliho lako, hangi pang'wanso ukuhuma kuona iza nukuheja igogo la miti nilikoli muliho la munyandugu ako.
MAT 7:6 Leka kuipa mbwa iko nikigila imilandu, hangi leka kuigumila ingulima insailo kuutongeela ao. Uhumile kuigazanja nukuipambata namigulu, hangi akupilukila nukutamulanga inino inino.
MAT 7:7 Lompa, nuewe ukupegwa, duma nuewe ukulija, pindula nuewe ukuluguilwa.
MAT 7:8 Wihi nuilompa wisingiilya, nuyu wihi nuiduma wilija, nu muntu wihi nuipindula wiluguilwa.
MAT 7:9 Ang'wi ukoli muntu kitalanyu, ung'wana agalompe indya ukumpa igwe?
MAT 7:10 Angwe ukumulompa nsamaki, nungwenso amupe nzoka?
MAT 7:11 Ang'wi unye nimiabe mumanyile kuapa iana anyu ipegwa niza, au Tata nukuli kigulu singaukuapa nangulu imaintu nimaza ao nimulompa?
MAT 7:12 Kululo gwa, ayo nuilowa kitumilwa niako, nuewe uitumile iako uu. Kunsoko nuanso uzipilya numunyakidagu.
MAT 7:13 Ingili kukiila ikihepeelo nikipinyi. Kunsoko ikihepeelo nikigali ni nzila ningali ihongile kuubi hangi antu idu ikiila inzila nanso.
MAT 7:14 Ikihepeelo nikipinyi, ikihepeelo nikipinyi ingi nzila nilongoe kuupanga hangi akehu niahumile kumiona.
MAT 7:15 Ihambe nianyakidagu niautelee, azile aze atugae ndili ya nkolo, nianso mbugi ni ntaki.
MAT 7:16 Kuntendo yao mukualinga. Iantu ahumile na kukungula indya mumija, ang'wi itini mumibaruti.
MAT 7:17 Kululo umuti nuuza wituga indya ninziza, nu muti nuubi wituga ndya nimbi.
MAT 7:18 Umuti nuuza shanga uhumile kutuga indya nimbi. Nu muti nuubi shaukutuga indya ninza.
MAT 7:19 Muti wihi nishaukutuga indya ninza ukuteng'wa nukugung'wa mumoto.
MAT 7:20 Kululo ukualinga kukiila ntendo yao.
MAT 7:21 Singa ihi nimbila, mukulu mukulu, akingila mutemi wa kilunde, aoiti du niituma ulowa wang'wa Tata nana nuakigulu.
MAT 7:22 Antu idu azimbila uluhiku nulanso, mukumukulu kua lina lako, shaikuhegelye iamintunga kua lina lako, hangi kukiila lina lako shaikitumile ne nimakulu?
MAT 7:23 Pang'wanso ziza aila kimazali, shanumulingile unyenye! Hegi kitalane, unye nimituma nimabi!
MAT 7:24 Kululo wihi niwija inkani yane nukuityata ukimpyana numuntu numuhugu nauzengile inyumba akwe migulya nigwe.
MAT 7:25 Mbula ikakua, imazi akizula, nung'wega ukiza ukamikua inyumba pihi, kunsoko aizengilwe migulya migwe.
MAT 7:26 Uyu niwija ulukani lane, ahite kulukela, ikimpyanigwa numuntu numupungu nuzengele inyumba mihanga hanga.
MAT 7:27 Mbula ikaza, mazi akaza, nung'wega ukaza ukamikua ikagwa, nungwi wake ukatula ukulu.
MAT 7:28 Ikapika matungo u Yesu naiwakondya kuligitya inkani nianso, umilundo ukakuilwa numanyisi wakwe.
MAT 7:29 Kululo aiwiamanyisa anga muntu nukite uhumi, hangi singa anga aandiki ao.
MAT 8:1 Matungo u Yesu naukusima pihi kupuma mulugulu, milundo ukulu ukamutyata.
MAT 8:2 Goza, umunyambili akaza kuntongeela akwe, akalunga “Mukulu, ang'wi wihambile, uhumile kunzipya ntule nimuza.
MAT 8:3 U Yesu akagoola umkono akwe nukumuamba, akalunga, “Nihambile utule wing'welu.” Matungo yayo akazipigwa imbili ikahila.
MAT 8:4 U Yesu akamuila, “Goza uleke kumuila muntu wihi. Ambi nzila ako, hangi ulongole uewe ende umulagile umdimi, upumye nisongeelyo numusa au iagiiye, kunsoko awikengi wako.”
MAT 8:5 Matungo u Yesu akapika Kapernaumu, munyangulu ung'wi akaza kitalakwe akamuuliza,
MAT 8:6 akalunga, “Mukulu, umitumi ane ulae munyumba ukete ulwae wigandi hangi umuili utete uwai wakogopa.”
MAT 8:7 U Yesu akamuila, nzile nukumukamya.”
MAT 8:8 Umunyangulu akasukiilya hangi akamuila, “Mukulu unene niantuni ni mpaka nize ningile munyumba ako. Tambula ulukani du numitumi ane ukukomigwa.
MAT 8:9 Kunsoko une nimuntu ninkite uhumi ntete anino ane anyangulu, akanunge kung'wa uyu “Longola” wilongola nukumuya, nzuu nung'wenso wiiza, nukumitumi wane. Itume iti, nung'wenso ukituma uu.
MAT 8:10 Matungo u Yesu naiwija aya, akakuilwa, akaila ao naiamutyatile, tai namuita nkili kuona umuntu nukite uhuili anga uyu mihi iyi na Israeli.
MAT 8:11 Idu azile akupuma kilya ning'weli, akikie palung'wi nu Abrahamu, Isaka nu Yakobo muutemi wa kigulu.
MAT 8:12 Ingigwa iana autemi akugung'wa mukiti nikakunzi, pang'wanso izitula kililo kakasia namino.”
MAT 8:13 U Yesu akamuila umunyangulu, “Longola! Anga nauhuie, na itule anga uu kitalako, nu mitumi akagunika itungo lilo.
MAT 8:14 Matungo nu Yesu aupikile munyumba ang'wa Petro, akamuona umukwingwa ang'wa Petro nuakisungu ulae akazimulwae ndwala.
MAT 8:15 U Yesu akamuamba umukono wake, nindyala ikahega, sunga akauka akatula muailya.
MAT 8:16 Naipikile impindi antu idu ikamuletela u Yesu antu idu naikaiwe niamintunga. Akaazunsa iamintunawa naialwae akaakomya.
MAT 8:17 Kunsoko iyiye aakondigwe kuligitigwa nunabii Isaya, “Ung'wanso aukenkile ulwae witu hangi aukenkile upungukilwa witu.”
MAT 8:18 Sunga u Yesu naiwaliana iumbi nailimupilimile, akaalagila ende nkigi ngiza na luzi la Galilaya.
MAT 8:19 Sunga muika nkani ung'wi akaza kitalakwe akamuila, “Mumanyisi, kunuhongee.”
MAT 8:20 U Yesu akamuila, “Amulula atite imakombo, ni nyunyi niamigulya itite iuye, ung'wana wang'wa Adamu mugila uhongo wakulalisha itwe.”
MAT 8:21 Mumanyisigwa ung'wi akamuila, “Mkulu, ngombye hanza nongole nende muika ibaba ane ukule.”
MAT 8:22 Sunga u Yesu akamuila, “Ntyate, hange uwaleke iashi aike iashi ao.”
MAT 8:23 U Yesu naiwingie mibini, iamanyisigwa akwe ikamutyata mibini.
MAT 8:24 Goza uluzi ukatula nimaingo makulu, ibini lika kunikilwa ni mazi, imatungo nanso u Yesu au iae.
MAT 8:25 Amanyisigwa akaza kitalakwe akamupitya akalunga, “Tata kugune usese kakasha!”
MAT 8:26 U Yesu akaaila kuniki nimukogopa, unye nimutite uhuili unino? Itungo inino akauka akaupalya ung'wega nu luzi. Sunga ung'wega ukakilaga.
MAT 8:27 Itunja ikakuilwa ikalunga, uyu muntu kii, uluzi niamintunga akumukulya?”
MAT 8:28 Matungo nu Yesu nauzile kunkika kihi na Magadala, itunja abiili naizaingiwe niamintunga ikatankanya nung'wenso akaze apumie muibiila akazenyomana ikulu, kutile muntu amihizazo nauhumila inzila nanso.
MAT 8:29 Akitunta ikalunga, kukete ntuni kitalako, uwe ng'wang'wi Tunda? Waza kuunyoma umatungo itu akili kupika?
MAT 8:30 Ilundo ikulu nila ngulima ailikudima, singa aikuli napo naiakoli,
MAT 8:31 amitunga azetukana kung'wa Yesu, akazilunga, ang'we ukuzunsa kupume, kutwale milundo la ngulima.”
MAT 8:32 U Yesu akaila, “Longoli!” Iamintunga ikamanka ikalongola mungulima. Ilundo lihi likasima kupuma mulugulu, kuhonga muluzi, yihi ikashila mumazi.
MAT 8:33 Eitunja nakuidima ingulima ikamanka. Naialongola mukisali ikaligitya ihi ayo napumie kuitunja ao naingigwe niamintunga.
MAT 8:34 Kisali kihi kikaza kulankanya nu Yesu. Naiamuona, ikamupepelya alege mukisali kao.
MAT 9:1 U Yesu akingila mibini, akaputa akapika kukisali naiaikile.
MAT 9:2 Goza ikamuletela muntu naimulwae gandi akazilae migodoro. Naiwauona uhuili wao, u Yesu akamuila umuntu naimulwae wigandi, ng'waane tula nuulowa, imalandu ako walekelwa.”
MAT 9:3 Iamanyisi ankani ikandya kitambulya enso na enso, umuntu uyu ukumela.
MAT 9:4 U Yesu akalinga imasigo ao akalunga, Niki nimukusiga imabi munkolo yanyu?
MAT 9:5 Nikiuli nikipepela kulunga, milandu ako alekelwa, ang'wi kulunga, imike igende?
MAT 9:6 Kululo gwa mlinge kina ung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukite uhumi nukulekela iamilandu...” amaligitilye kung'wa uyu naimulwae wigandi, imike uhole igodoro lako, hangi ulongole kitalako.”
MAT 9:7 Sunga umuntu nuanso akimika akalongola kitalakwe.
MAT 9:8 Umilundo naiwaona aya, ikaambwa ikuilwa nukumulumbilya itunda nua pee uhumi nuanso.
MAT 9:9 U Yesu naukeile pang'wanso akamuona muntu naiwitangwa Mathayo, naiwikie palung'wi niahoela mpia. Nung'wenso akamuela “Tyate” nung'wenso akamutyata.
MAT 9:10 U Yesu awikie munyumba ahume kulya indya, akaza ahoela mpia idu, niantu nianyamilandu ikalya palung'wi niamanyisigwa ang'wa Yesu.
MAT 9:11 Ingi iamanya nkani naiaona nanso, ikaaila iamanyisigwa, “Kuniki umumanyisi wanyu, niki nukulya indya niahoela mpia palung'wi niamilandu?
MAT 9:12 U Yesu naiwija nanso, akalunga, “Iantu niapanga shamlakile umuganga awa nialwae wawo amuloilwe umuganga.
MAT 9:13 Ingi gwa longoli mendo mimanyise itai akwe ntuni, ndoilwe ngulu kupuma kumukola singa masongeelyo” kunsoko ainzile, singa ainzile kuanyatai kila itunu, kunsoko aanyumilandu.
MAT 9:14 Sunga iamanyisigwa ang'wa Yohana akaza kitalakwe akalunga, kuniki usese niamanya nkani nikiima, aiamanyisigwa niki nishaima?
MAT 9:15 U Yesu akaila, iatindikilya awinga ahumile nekutula nikinyauwai matungo numunyawinga ukutala palung'wi nienso? Ingi mahiku apembilya umunyawinga nuziholya kupuma kitalao, pang'wanso azizima.
MAT 9:16 Kutile umuntu nuikuila ikilaka ka ng'wenda nuupa mung'wenda nuakali, ikilaka kikutotoka kupuma mung'wenda nuutamukwa ukutula ukulu.
MAT 9:17 Kutile iantu niika umunyo nuupya mkiseme nikamuvinyo nikale, ang'wi akituma, ngozi itachanika, numuvinyo ukuhega, nindili ikugazika. Badala akwe wiikwe umuvinyo nuupya nindili nimpya hangi akutula maza.
MAT 9:18 Matungo nu Yesu akuila inkani izi, goza akaza muntu kuntongeela akwe akatugama, akalunga, “Munanso wane matungo makupi ukule, ingi nzuu gwa uikile migulya imikono ako nung'wenso ukukomya.
MAT 9:19 Ingi gwa u Yesu akimika, hangi akamutyata palung'wi niamanyisigwa akwe.
MAT 9:20 Goza umusungu naiwipuma isakami matungo amiaka ikimi ling'wi nibiili, akaza pakupe nu Yesu akamuamba mipindo lakwe nilijoho.
MAT 9:21 Kunsoko aulungile, “Anga niliambe ijoho lakwe, une kukomya.”
MAT 9:22 U Yesu akapiluka akamugoza, “Munanso, ipe umoyo, uhuili wako wakuguna, Ni matungo yayo yayo umusungu akagunika akapela kupuma isakami.
MAT 9:23 U Yesu akapika munyumba amuntu ung'wi mkulu, akaona iakua mpembe numilundo wantu ukazogolya.
MAT 9:24 U Yesu akalunga, hega apo, kunsoko umunanso shukule ingi ulaeu. Nianso ikatula heka.
MAT 9:25 Iantu nianso naiapumigwa kunzi, akingila munyumba akamuamba umunanso kumukono akauka.
MAT 9:26 Inkani izi ikasambaila ikisali kihi.
MAT 9:27 U Yesu naukoli mumuhinzo itunja abiili aboku ikamutyata. Ikalongoleka kitunta, akazilunga, kulumba, ukugune imilandu, ng'wa Daudi.
MAT 9:28 Matungo u Yesu naiwapika munyumba iapoku nianso ikaza kitalakwe. U Yesu akaila, muhuie ne kina nkite uhumi nua kituma? Nienso ikamuila, Ee kuhuie Mkulu.”
MAT 9:29 U Yesu akaamba imiho ao akalunga, itule uu kitalanyu, anga uhuili wanyu nuile.
MAT 9:30 Ni miho ikaona, u Yesu akalagiilya akalunga, gozi muntu wihi aleke kumanya aya namupumie unyenye.
MAT 9:31 Ingi gwa iantu awa niabili ikalongola kutanantya inkani izi nia ukuilwa ikisali kihi.
MAT 9:32 Itunja abiili aakugenda azeahongile yao, muntu ung'wi kimume aukete amintunga akatwalwa kung'wa Yesu.
MAT 9:33 Niamintunga naiamuteela, ukimume nuanso akandya kuligitya. Umilundo ukaambwa ikuilwa ukalunga. Ulukani ulu izalukili kigele mihi iyi na Israeli.
MAT 9:34 Ingi gwa iamanya nkani akazilunga kuakulu amintunga, ukuazunsa iamintunga.”
MAT 9:35 U Yesu akalongola muisali yihi. Akatula manyisa mumatekeelo, akazitanantya lukani la utemi wa kigulu, nuhumi nuakuguna indwala yihi.
MAT 9:36 Naiwaona umilundo, akauhumila kinyauwai, kunsoko aiagili nukubunika inkolo, aiatuile anga inkolo ningila umudimi.
MAT 9:37 U Yesu akaila iamanyisigwa akwe, indya ipie idu, itumi akenu.
MAT 9:38 Kululo gwa kayi kulompi kumukulu nua indya izi niipie, ahume kutuma uhumi nia indya yakwe.
MAT 10:1 U Yesu akaitanga iamanyisigwa akwe ikumi na abili akaapa uhumi wa kuzunsa amintunga niabi, kuakenela nukuheja indwala yihi.
MAT 10:2 Mina aitumi ikumi naabili sayala ng'wandyo, Simeoni (naiwitangwa Petro), nu Andrea muluna akwe, Yakobo ng'wa Zebedayo, nu Yohana muluna akwe.
MAT 10:3 Filipo, nu Bartimayo, Thomaso nu Matayo muhoela mpia, Yakobo ng'wa Alfayo, nu Tadeo.
MAT 10:4 Simeoni mkananayo, nu Yuda Iskariote, naumuhitile u Yesu.
MAT 10:5 Awa ikumi na abili u Yesu akaatuma, akaatuma akaalagiila akalunga “Muleke kulongola uko nikie ianyakilungu, hangi muleke kingila mu isali ya Samaria.
MAT 10:6 Ingi gwa mulongole munkolo nailimie mito lang'wa Israeli.
MAT 10:7 Nuko nimulongoe, muzitanantya nukulunga, utemi akigulu wahugela.”
MAT 10:8 Aguni ialwoe, aushi uashi, anoni ianyambili azunsi iamintunga. Musingiyeu nunyenye pamiu.
MAT 10:9 Muleke kukenka isao, mumbugulu yanyu.
MAT 10:10 Leka kuhola imbugulu mumuhenzo anyu, ang'we wakukaila, ilatu ang'wi mulanga, kunsoko umitumi uloiwe ndya yakwe.
MAT 10:11 Kisali kihi nimukingile, mdume umuntu nimuhumile kikie, sunga nimuzizahega.
MAT 10:12 Nimukingila pang'wanso lamushi, ang'we inonee pang'wanso, upolo wanyu usige hapo,
MAT 10:13 ang'wi inyumba shinonee, muhege nuupolo wanyu.
MAT 10:14 Nao nishaakumusingilya mukulegeelya inkani yanyu, matungo nimukuhega munyumba ang'wi mukisali nikanso, kununti ulunkundi nula migula nyu kuko.
MAT 10:15 Tai numuie, izitula iza iisali ya sodoma ni Gomola imahiku naulamatwa kukila ikisali nikanso.
MAT 10:16 Tuli miho, kumutuma anga nkolo midale la mbugi, kululo mulule miahugu anga inzoka hangi miapolo anga inzia.
MAT 10:17 Mutule miho niantu, akumutwala mumaanza, hangi akumukua mumatekeelo.
MAT 10:18 Hangi mukuletwa kuntongeela akulu nukuatemi kunsoko ane, anga wihenge wao nukuanya kilungu.
MAT 10:19 Anga makatungigwa, leki kutuli nuwoa kuuligitya ntuni, kunsoko iko nikakuligityakuupegwa imatungo yayo.
MAT 10:20 Kululo singa nyenye mukuligitya, ng'waung'we wang'wa Tata anyu ukuligitya.
MAT 10:21 Uzimuluta umuluna akwe nukumubulaga, nu Tata kung'wa akwe. Ni ana kulemanya nia leli, mukuatwala munsha.
MAT 10:22 Antu ihi akumuhukilwa kunsoko a lina lane, hangi wihi nukugimya sunga impelo ukugunika.
MAT 10:23 Matungo nimukagigwa mukisali iki, mankiili mukisali nikityatie, kutai kumuila, singa mukutula menda muisali yihi nia Israeli azizakili kusuka ung'wana wang'wa Adamu.
MAT 10:24 Umumanyisigwa singa mukulu kukila umumanyisi wakwe, ang'we umutugwa azukoli migulya amukulu akwe.
MAT 10:25 Umumanyisigwa ukutule anga mumanyisi wake, numutugwa kutula anga mukulu wakwe. Ang'wi akumitanga umukola nyumba Beelzebuli, aigwa singa akilinkie ao niakoli munyumba akwe!
MAT 10:26 Kululo leki kuogopi, kunsoko kutile ulukani nishaliziza kunukulwa, hangi kutile nulipihile nishalumanyikile.
MAT 10:27 Iki nikumuila mukiti, mukiligitye muwelu, niki numukigulu kuauza muakutwe anyu, mukitanantye muzemkole migulya na nyumba.
MAT 10:28 Leki kuogopi ao nibulaga umuili inkolo amileke mpanga, ingigwa ogopi uyu nukubulaga umuili ninkolo amutwale kuulungu.
MAT 10:29 Ia kasuku abiili shaiguligwa nee na mpia ninino? Kululo gwa kutile nuhumile kugwa pihi utata wanyu ahite kulinga.
MAT 10:30 Ingi gwa nimasingi a matwe anyu aaligwa.
MAT 10:31 Leki kutuli nuwoa kunsoko musanigwe kukila iakasuku nidu.
MAT 10:32 Kululo gwa uyu nukungomba ntongeele aantu nunene nzinzamugomba pantongeela ang'wa tata ane nukuli kuilunde.
MAT 10:33 Uyu nukunihita paantu nunene nzemuhita pang'wa Tata witu nuakingulu.
MAT 10:34 Leki kulungi aindetile ulowa mihi, unene aindetile mbita.
MAT 10:35 Ainzile kumuika muntu ikue nu Tata wakwe, umunanso nu nyinya, umukwinu nyinyi akwe.
MAT 10:36 Ianyaulugu amuntu akutula wawania nia mitalakwe.
MAT 10:37 Uyu numuloilwe utata ang'wi uia akwe kukila ne nuanso shutakiwe nuyu numuloilwe umuhumba ang'wi munanso kukila une nuanso shutakiwe.
MAT 10:38 Uyu nisinga ukukenka ikota la upanga nukuntyata shukuona utemi wa kigulu.
MAT 10:39 Uyu nuiduma upanga wa mihi ukulimilye, kululo uyu nuilimilya uupanga kunsoko ane wipantika.
MAT 10:40 Uyu nukumusingilya wansingiilya nene, nuyu nukunsingiilya unene wamusingiilya uyu nauntumile unene.
MAT 10:41 Nuyu nukumusingiilya uyu nua tai kunsoko muntu wa tai ukupegwa uuza wa muntu nua tai.
MAT 10:42 Wihi nukumupa ung'wi wa anino awa, ikikombe kakung'wela imazi nimaliuku, kunsoko nuanso mumanyisigwa, tai kumuila, nuanso shukuulya kunzila yihi uuza wakwe.”
MAT 11:1 U Yesu naiwakondya kualagiila iamanyisigwa akwe ikumi naabili akahega akalongola kumanyisa nukutanantya muisali yao.
MAT 11:2 Nu Yohana akazukoli kukitungo naiwija intendo yang'wa Kilisto, aulaagilyo ulukani kukiila amanyisigwa akwe,
MAT 11:3 hangi ikamukolya, “Uwe yuyu ne nupembilye, ang'wi mungiza nikumulindie?”
MAT 11:4 U Yesu akalunga, longoli mumuile u Yohana ayo nimumaine nayo nimuwigule.
MAT 11:5 Iantu niapoku akuona, akitele akugenda, anyambili akogigwa, agulu akija, niakule akuukigwa kutula apanga hangi, niantu niakite insula akutanantiligwa ulukani nuluza.
MAT 11:6 Hangi akembetwe uyu nunihuie unene.
MAT 11:7 Itungo naiahega iantu awa, u Yesu akandya kuligitya numilundo kunsoko ang'wa Yohana, aimendile ona ntuni mumbuga- muntu nutugae mienda nimiza? Ang'wi ifa nilikuhingisigwa nung'wega?
MAT 11:8 Ite ntuni naimendile ona-muntu nautugae imyanda nimiza? Ingi tai ao niitugala imyenda nimiza ikue munyumba ya temi.
MAT 11:9 Ite amulongoe kugoza ntuni-Munyakidagu? Ee, humuila. Hangi ukilinkie umunyakidagu.
MAT 11:10 Uyu yuyo nailindiwe, Goza, kumulagiilya umumboi wane kuntongeela auso wako, uyu nukunonelya inzila pantongeela ako.
MAT 11:11 Une kumuila itai, awa nialugilwe niasungu kutile numukulu kukila u Yohana Mbatizaji, kululo uyu nimunino ukutula mukulu muutemi wa kigulu kukila nuanso.
MAT 11:12 Puma imahiku ang'wa Yohana Mbatizaji sunga nitungile, utemi wa kigulu wa ngulu, niantu nia ngulu ihola kua ngulu.
MAT 11:13 Kunsoko ianyakidagu niaziipilya ankani niazitambula kupika kung'wa Yohana.
MAT 11:14 Ang'wi wihambile gomba uyu Eliya, naulindiwe.
MAT 11:15 Nukite iakutwe akija ukija.
MAT 11:16 Nuipyane nintuni uwileli uwu? Ingi pyani ang'enya niakiginsa kiguilyo la maintu, niike nukiitanga,
MAT 11:17 nu kuligitya akumukuila ikali shamakiginsa, aikuhongeelya shamukalila.
MAT 11:18 Kunsoko u Yohana nauzile singa akalya umukate, singa akang'wa umuvinyo, ukamuila ukete amintunga.
MAT 11:19 Ung'wana wang'wa Adamu auzile kulya nukung'wa ikalunga, goza ingi mulii hangi mugala ntuli, muhumba muya wa ahoela mpia na niakite imilandu, ingi uhugu nintendo yigeeleka niakue.”
MAT 11:20 U Yesu akandya kuikenela isali izo ni ntendo yaukuilwa naiyitumilwe, kunsoko akili kuleka imilandu (kila itunu).
MAT 11:21 Ukia ako, Kolazini, ukia ako Bethsaida! Angi intendo ninkulu aizeyatendekile Tiro ni Sidoni, aya naitumilwe apa, azize alekile imilandu kali kutugala imagunila nukipaka imau.
MAT 11:22 Izetula ugimya i Tiro ni Sidoni imahiku naulamulwa kukila kilalao.
MAT 11:23 Uewe Kapernaumu, usigile uzeukigwa mpaka kigulu? Ata uzesimigwa mpaka kuulungu. Anga ize intendo ninkulu aizeyilumilwe ku Sodoma, anga naiyitendekile kitalako, aizeikole sunga ni lelo.
MAT 11:24 Ingi izetula bahu ihi a Sodoma kimika uluhiko la ulamulwa kukila uewe.
MAT 11:25 Imatungo nanso u Yesu akalunga nakulumbilya uwe Tata, Mukulu wa kilunde ni ihi, kunsoko aupihile inkani awa nia hugu nawa niamahala, uka kunukula kuantu nishaaine anga kintu anga ang'enya nianino.
MAT 11:26 Tata kunsoko aikuloeye uu mumiho ako.
MAT 11:27 Maintu ihi mambigwe nene kupuma kung'wa Tata. Hangi kutile numulingile ung'wana ingi. U tata du. Hangi kutile numulingile utata ingi ung'wana, nuyu wihi nung'wana ukite insula akukunukuilwa.
MAT 11:28 Nzi kitalane mihi nimulemeigwe nimiligo nimilito, une nze musupya.
MAT 11:29 Tugali uhuili ane, mimanyise kitalane, kunsoko unene ingi nimuntu wa ukenge nuupolo wa nkolo hangi mkupantika uusupilyo wa nkolo yanyu.
MAT 11:30 Kunsoko nakitalane maza ni miligo ane mipepele.
MAT 12:1 Matungo nanso ailuhiku la Sabato u Yesu akakiila mumigunda. Ia manyisigwa akwe aiatite nzala akandya kubunanga uilo nukulya.
MAT 12:2 Iafarisayo naiaona nanso ikamuila u Yesu goza iamanyisigwa ako akituma imilimo iyi nisinga itung'wa uluhiku nula Sabato.”
MAT 12:3 U Yesu akaaila magemile ni kuona, u Daudi naiwitumile, matungo naukete inzala, palung'wi niantu naine.
MAT 12:4 Naiwingie munyumba ang'wi Tunda nukulya, imikate iyo nisinga augombigwe palung'wi niantu naine. Kulya nanso aiagombigwe kulya iakuhani du?
MAT 12:5 Iza mukili ne kuona muuziipilya wa nkani uluhiku la Sabato, iadimi mitekeelo ituma ubi, musabato, kululo shaiiailigwa kina itumile ubi?
MAT 12:6 Kululo kulunga kitalanyu kina uyu nu mukulu kukila itekeelo ukoli hapa.
MAT 12:7 Angamuze uulingile iko nikukiligitya kintuni, ndoilwe ulekelwa singa isongeelyo. Singa aimuzeakenkya iantu ulamulwa,
MAT 12:8 Kunsoko ung'wana wang'wa Adamu yuyo Mukulu wa Sabato.”
MAT 12:9 Sunga u Yesu akahega pang'wanso akalongola mitekeelo lao.
MAT 12:10 Goza aukoli muntu amulwae wigandi la mukono, ia Farisayo ikamukolya u Yesu ikalunga. Iza tai ne kuaguna iantu uluhiku la Sabato? Kunsoko ahume kumsemela nukituma imilandu.
MAT 12:11 U Yesu akaila nyenyu kitalanyu nuhumile kuhita kumipumya mikombo inko nigwie uluhiku la Sabato.
MAT 12:12 Nikiule nikiza nikikilinkie, kukila inkolo! kululo igombigwe kituma nimaza uluhiku la Sabato.
MAT 12:13 Sunga u Yesu akamuila umuntu nuanso, goola umukono nuanso, akaugoola ukakomya anga uuya.
MAT 12:14 Kululo ia Farisayo ikapuma kunzi ahume kunonya nzila ya kumulimansilya, akenda kunzi akatula duma nzila akumubulaga ule.
MAT 12:15 U Yesu naiwalinga ili akahega pang'wanso. Antu idu ikamutyata, hangi akaaguna idu.
MAT 12:16 Akaaligiilya kina singa ntakile manyike kuantu nia ngiza.
MAT 12:17 Kina ikondaniligwe itai iyo nailigitigwe nu munyakidagu u Isaya akalunga,
MAT 12:18 Goza umitumi wane nainumuholanilye, mlowa wane kukiila ng'wenso. Inkolo ane iloeigwe kuika inkolo ane kitalakwe, hangi ukutanantya ulamulwa kuantu ihi mihi.
MAT 12:19 Shukusiga hangi singa ukupumya ululi lakwe, hangi tile umuntu nukija ululi lakwe munzila.
MAT 12:20 Shukubunanga ulumuli, shukulimisa ulutambi nuipumya ilyuki sunga nuzeleta ulamulwa uhume.
MAT 12:21 Nao nishaizaahuie azetula agimya kukiila lina lakwe.
MAT 12:22 Aukole muntu ai mupoku kuna aze kimume, aiwingiwe nu mintunga akatwala pantongeela ang'wa Yesu. Akamuguna, sunga umuntu nuanso akaligitya nukuona.
MAT 12:23 Umilundo wihi ukakuilwa, nukulunga, “Ihumikile umuntu yu ng'wana wang'wa Daudi?”
MAT 12:24 Ingi gwa ia Farisayo naiija uukuilwa uwu, akalunga uyu shukenda azunsa iamintunga na ngulu yakwe, weenda azunsa kukiila mkulu wa amintunga.
MAT 12:25 U Yesu akalinga imasigo ao akaaila utemi nuutemanukile, wigazika, ni kisali ang'wi nyumba nitemanukile singa imika.
MAT 12:26 Ang'wi umubi ukumuheja umubi, ingi ukigilya ung'wenso munkolo akwe.
MAT 12:27 Ukimika ule utemi wakwe? Ang'wi nizunsa iamintunga kungulu ya mkulu wa amintunga, aiantu anyu iazunsa kungulu yang'wa nyenyu? Kunsoko aili azetula alamuli anyu.
MAT 12:28 Ang'wi kuzunsa iamintunga kungulu yang'wa ng'waung'welu wang'wi Tunda, ingi gwa utemi wang'wi Tunda wazaa kitalanyu.
MAT 12:29 U muntu uhumile ule kingila mito la munyangulu nukia, ahite kumtunga hanza umunyangulu? Pang'wanso ukuhuma kia gwa imiantu nakule mung'wanso.
MAT 12:30 Uyu nisingaiza kigombiliye singaizukoli palung'wi nunene, nuyu nishawilingiila palung'wi nunene wisambailya.
MAT 12:31 Kululo kulunga iti kitalanyu, milandu nuimeli iantu azizalekilwa imilandu, ingi gwa kumumela ung'waung'welu shuzizalekelwa imilandu.
MAT 12:32 Muntu wihi nuipiula ukani la ng'wana wang'wa Adamu, wilekilwa imilandu ingi gwa uyu nuipiula inkani ya ng'waung'welu nuanso shawilekelwa imilandu, muunkumbigulu uwu nuo nuuzile.
MAT 12:33 Ang'wi unonye umuti kutula uza nindya yakwe nza, ang'wi uugazanje umuti nuludya lakwe, kunsoko umuti wimanyika kulu dya lakwe.
MAT 12:34 Unye wileli wa nzoka miabi, muhumile uli kuligitya inkani ninza? Kunsoko ikimilo kimaligitya ayo nakoli munkolo.
MAT 12:35 Umuntu numuza nikiuto nikiza nikankolo akwe kipumya nimaza, numuntu numubi mukiuto nikibi nikankolo akwe, kipumya nikibi.
MAT 12:36 Kumuila kina uluhiku la ulamulwa iantu azepumya intendo yao izo naiituma nisingaaiza nziza.
MAT 12:37 Kua nkani yako uzeailigwa tai, hangi kuankani yako uzepegwa ulamulwa wako.”
MAT 12:38 Iaika nkani ni Mafarisayo, akamuila u Yesu akalunga “Mumanyisi azakuloilwe kuona kilingasilyo kitalako”
MAT 12:39 Ingi gwa u Yesu akasusha akaila, “Wileli nuabi nuausambo kikuduma kilingasiilyo. Kutile ikilingasiilyo nikikupumigwa kitalao, ingi kiki naikipumiigwe nu munyakidagu u Yona.
MAT 12:40 Anga umunyakidagu u Yona naukole munda ansamaki mahiku atatu utiku nu mung'wi. Kuiti uu ung'wana wang'wa Adamu uzize ukole mukati ihi mahiku atatu mung'wi nuutiku.
MAT 12:41 Antu a Ninawi akimika pantongeela aulamulwa palung'wi nu wileli wa antu awa apegwe ulamulwa wao. Kunsoko aialekile imilandu pautananti wang'wa Yona. Goza ukole muntu mukulu kukila u Yona apa.
MAT 12:42 Musungu wa mutemi nuakutakama ukuuka muulamulwa palung'wi niantu awileli uwu, nukukipa ulamulwa. Auzile kupuma mumpele ihi kuza kija uhugu wang'wa Selemani, hangi goza ukole muntu mukulu kukila Selemani ukoli apa.
MAT 12:43 Matungo numintunga numubi nuimlekela umuntu, wikiila pana kutile imazi, wizeduma kusupya shawipaona.
MAT 12:44 Sunga wilunga kusuka munyumba ane nazampumie, nusukile wihanga inyumba akondaniligwa kupyagulwa.
MAT 12:45 Sunga wilongola kuityata nkolo ngiza mpungate nimbi kukila nuanso, yize yikie yihi apo. Hangi witula mubi kukukila nuang'wandyo. Ite uu uzetula muwileli uwu nubi.
MAT 12:46 Matungo u Yesu naukuligitya numilundo, goza, unyinya nianyandugu akwe akimika kunzi, akazeduma kuligitya nung'wenso.
MAT 12:47 Muntu ung'wi akamuila, uyiaaka nialuna ake imikile kunzi, akaduma kuligitya nuewe.”
MAT 12:48 U Yesu akamuila umuntu nuanso uiane nyenyu? Nialuna ane anyenyu?
MAT 12:49 Akagoda umukono wakwe kuamanyisigwa akwe akalunga, goza awa ingi lane nianya ndugu ane!
MAT 12:50 Kunsoko wihi nuituma ulowa wang'wa Tata ane nuakigulu, nuanso yuyo munyandugu ane ng'waitu nu iane.”
MAT 13:1 Uluhiku nulanso u Yesu akahega kitalakwe akikie pampelo a luzi.
MAT 13:2 Milundo ukulu ukilingiila kuligitya nung'wenso, akingila mibini akikie, milundo wihi ukimika pa mpelo a luzi.
MAT 13:3 Sunga u Yesu akaligitya kwa mpyani, Goza, mutemeli aiwendile temela.
MAT 13:4 Naukutemela imbeu ing'wi ikagwa mumpelo mpelo anzila inyunyi ikahoela.
MAT 13:5 Ning'wi ikagwa migwe, singaikapata imahalu. Ikakaya kuheluka kunsoko mahalu aimakehu.
MAT 13:6 Ingigwa ilyoa nailatoroka ikasonswa nsoko aingila nga mili hangi ikuma.
MAT 13:7 Imbeu ing'wi ikagwa mumija. Imiti nikite imiija ikalipa migula ikatunyiilya.
MAT 13:8 Mbeu ing'wi ikagwa mumahalu ni maza, ikatuga mbeu, ning'wi ikakila igana ling'wi, ning'wi makumi mutandatu, ning'wi makumi atatu.
MAT 13:9 Nukete iakutwi ije.
MAT 13:10 Iamanyisigwa akwe akaza akamukolya niki nukendaligitya kukiila mpyani?
MAT 13:11 U Yesu akasukiilya akaila, lumbi nimpewe kulinga inkunku wa kigulu ianyu singa apewe.
MAT 13:12 Kululo uyu nutite ukangeeligwa hangi uyu numugila ukuhegeligwa kaniki nazutite.
MAT 13:13 Ingi kuligitya nienso kua mpyani ingi nsoko akuona, aleke kuona itai, ataizeazija aleke kija nukulinga.
MAT 13:14 Uunyakidagu wang'wa Isaya wakondanila kitalao, nuuliye kija mukija singamkulinga kugoza mukugoza shamukuona.
MAT 13:15 Inkolo ya antu awa ikoli mukiti, ikakukija, imiho ao akunikiwe, aleke kuona na miho ao, nukija kua kutwe ao, nukulinga kwa nkolo yao, kululo anga aiampilukile hangi anzeaguna.”
MAT 13:16 Kululo gwa imiho anyu akembetilwe, nsoko akuona, niakutwe anyu akija.
MAT 13:17 Tai kumuila, anyakidagu idu niaantu niatai akete insula akuona inkani izi nimukuiona, shaikahuma kuona, ailoilwe kija aya nimendija shaikija.
MAT 13:18 Ingi tegeeli impyani amutemeli.
MAT 13:19 Uyu nuija ulukani nulautemi wa kigulu ahite kulinga, hapo umubi wiza hola iko nikitemiwe munkolo akwe. Iye yiyi mbeu nitemewe munzila.
MAT 13:20 Uyu nutemewe migwe yuyu nuikaya kija nukusingiilya kua ulowa.
MAT 13:21 Iza akili mugila anga mili, wigimya matungo makehu. Anga hangwe ni nkani ni nkaku wikaya kugwa.
MAT 13:22 Uyu nautemewe mumiti na mija yuyu nuwija ulukani, kunu akazutyatile makani umunkumbigulu akalutunyiilya ulukani lang'wi Tunda lakahita kuluga indya ninza.
MAT 13:23 Nautemewe mumahalu nimaza, yuyu nuija ulukani nukulija, nukululinga. Uyu yuyu nuituga indya, nukulongoleka kutuga kukila igana ling'wi ning'wi makumi atatu.”
MAT 13:24 U Yesu akaapa mpyani ngiza. Akalunga, utemi wa kigulu wimpyanigwe numuntu nautemee imbeu mumugunda wakwe.
MAT 13:25 Iantu naiatindila umulugu akaza akatemela iapungu pakati a ngano sunga akalongola yakwe.
MAT 13:26 Ingano nakonda kupuma nukupumya indya yakwe, nia pungu akigela hangi.
MAT 13:27 Itumi amumugunda akaza akamukolya shautemee ne imbeu ni nza mumugunda wako? Latula ule gwa likite apungu?
MAT 13:28 Akaila mulugu witumile iti. Eitumi ikamuila iti gwa utakila kende kumipe?
MAT 13:29 Umukola mugunda angalunge, aa imatungo nimukipa iapungu mukipa palung'wi ni ngano.
MAT 13:30 Maleki akule palung'wi sunga imatungo akuogola kuligitya kuagoli ipi iapungu mutunge mapanzi mapunzi mumasonse ingano milingiile misalanka lane.”
MAT 13:31 Hangi u Yesu akaapumilya mpyani ngiza akalunga, utemi wa kigulu wimpyani ni mbeu a haladali iyi nu muntu auhoile akatemela mumugunda wakwe.
MAT 13:32 Imbeu iyi tai niino kukila mbeu yihi ninino. Kululo ilungile ikulu kukila indya yihi niambustani, ukutula mti, kina ni nyuni iziza tula zenga niitie mumatambi akwe.”
MAT 13:33 Akaaila mpyani ngiza hangi, “Utemi wa kigulu anga igai naihoilwe numusungu nukuhalinkanya ininoinino itatu nia utu mpaka witikiilye.
MAT 13:34 Aya hii u Yesu akauila umilundo kukiila mpyani, inkani yihi aiwiiligitya kukiila mpyani.
MAT 13:35 Iki aitule kina iko naikakondigwe kuligitigwa kukiila anyakidagu kihuma kipika apo naulungile kulugula ikimilo kane kwa mpyani, kuligitya ihi ayo napikilwe kupuma ung'wando wa unkumbigulu.”
MAT 13:36 Sunga u Yesu akauleka umilundo akalongola kitalakwe. Iamanyisigwa akue akamutyata akalunga, kutemanuilye impyani iyi naapungu mumugunda.”
MAT 13:37 U Yesu akasisha akalunga, Nuitemela imbeu ninza ingi ng'wana wang'wa Adamu.
MAT 13:38 Umugunda unkumbigulu, ni mbeu ninza awa ana autemi. Iapungu ana ang'wa uyo numubi, nimbeu izi nuitemee mulugu.
MAT 13:39 Nuogoli mpelu aunkumbigulu niaogoli ia malaika.
MAT 13:40 Anga iapungu niilingiilwa nukusonswa umoto. Iti uu izitula mpelu aunkumbigulu.
MAT 13:41 Ung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukualagiilya iamalaika akwe, hangi ukilingiila kupuma muutemi wakwe ni nkani yihi nailetekeye imilandu nawa ihi niituma uubi.
MAT 13:42 Akuaguma ihi milungu la moto, kung'wanso kizeze kikoli kililo nikakusia na mino.
MAT 13:43 Pang'wanso iantu niatai azizemili ginta anga ilyoa muutemi wang'wa tata wao. Uyu nukete iakutwe nije.
MAT 13:44 Uutemi wa kigulu wa hanga anga ikiuto nikipihilwe mumugunda. Umuntu akaona akakipiha mulumbili wakwe akalongola kugulya ihi nautite akaugule umugunda.
MAT 13:45 Hangi uutemi wa kigulu wihanga anga umuntu numusuluja nuipenza insao.
MAT 13:46 Matungo naiwamiona insao, akalongola akagulya ihi nautite, akamigula.
MAT 13:47 Uutemi wa kigulu wili anga inyavu nikoli muluzi, ni liingiila kila ikintu.
MAT 13:48 Naizula inyavu ikamuluta kumpelo. Sunga akikie pihi akiliingila imaintu nimaza muiseme, nishanganzinza ikagungwa kuli.
MAT 13:49 Izizatula iti kumpolo ihi, aziza kumutemanula muantu niabi, kupuma muantu nia tai.
MAT 13:50 Nukuaguma milungu la moto, kung'wanso izize ukoli uhungeelya wa kusiana mino.
MAT 13:51 Malinga ne aya ihi? Iamanyisigwa ikalunga “Kalinga.”
MAT 13:52 Sunga u Yesu akaila, muika nkani wihi nuatula mumanyisigwa wa utemi wimpyani numukolo nyumba nuipumya ikiuto kwakwe nikamaintu ni nimapya naya nakali.
MAT 13:53 Ikatula u Yesu naiwakondya kupumya impyani yihi, akahega kung'wanso.
MAT 13:54 Sunga u Yesu akapika mukisali kakwe, akutula amanyisa iantu mumatekeelo, ingi gwa ikakuilwa ikalunga, umuntu yu auhoe pi u hugu wuu nukuilwa uwu?
MAT 13:55 Umuntu singa ng'wana wang'wa mutamula mbao? U Mariamu singa nyinya? Nianyandugu singa Yakobo, Yusufu, Simoni nu Yuda?
MAT 13:56 Nialuna akwe kuwatite apa pitaitu? Umuntu uyu umahoeepi aya hii?
MAT 13:57 Akaatasha sunga u Yesu akaila, umunyakidagu shanga wiulya ikulyo kuleka kitalao nukihi nao.
MAT 13:58 Singa akahuma kituma ukuuilwa nuidu kunsoko aiagila anga uhuili nung'wenso.
MAT 14:1 Kumatungo nanso Herode akija ulukumo lang'wa Yesu.
MAT 14:2 Akaila eitumi akwe, “Uyu yuyu Yohana uhimbukile kupuma kuashi. Kululo ingulu izi ikole kitalakwe.”
MAT 14:3 Kunsoko u Herode amuambile Yohana akamtunga akamuguma kukitungo nsoko ang'wa Herodia, musungu wang'wa Filipo nuluna wakwe.
MAT 14:4 Kunsoko Yohana, amuie sunga tai nuanso kumuhola atule musungu wake.
MAT 14:5 Herode auze mubulaga akogopa antu kunsoko aumuine Yohana kina munyakidagu.
MAT 14:6 Ingi gwa uluhiku lakutugwa Herode nailapika umunanso wa Herodia aiwiginsile muantu akamuloilya i Herode.
MAT 14:7 Akapumya ilago akamuila ukumupa kihi nukulilompa kung'wakwe.
MAT 14:8 Naiwasigigwa nunyinya, akalunga kulompa itwe lang'wa Yohana mbatizaji.”
MAT 14:9 Umtemi akatula nimasiko makulu na malompi ang'wa munanso, nsoko ilago lakwe la aantu naiakoli palung'wi pandya, akaila leki itulike uu.
MAT 14:10 Akaaligity u Yohana aletwe kupuma kukitungo
MAT 14:11 itwe lakwe likaletwa mukiseme umunanso akatwala kung'wa nyinya.
MAT 14:12 Sunga amanyisigwa akwe akaza akauhola umuimba akautulila naamala akenda akamuila u Yesu.
MAT 14:13 U Yesu naiwija nanso akalongola kuna antu kutili. Ni lundo la antu nailija likamutyata na migulu kukisali naukoli.
MAT 14:14 Sunga u Yesu akaza akauona ulundo ukulu. Akahumila kinyauwai akakomya indwala naiyiaja.
MAT 14:15 Naapika impindi iamanyisigwa akaza akalunga, iyi mbuga, uluhiku iahila. Asambailye aantu ende musali yao ende agule indya kunsoko ao.
MAT 14:16 U Yesu akaaila, “agila anga nsula akuhega api indya alye”
MAT 14:17 Akamuila ingi kukite mikate itaano ni nsamaki ibiili du.
MAT 14:18 U Yesu akalunga, “Mileti kitalane.”
MAT 14:19 Sunga u Yesu akaupa ilago umilundo pihi mumala. Akahola mikate itaano ni nsamaki ibiili akagoza kigulu, akakembeta, akaige imikate akaapa iamanyisigwa. Iamanyisigwa akaugalanya umilundo.
MAT 14:20 Akalya ihi akikuta sunga ikahoela indya yihi ikizulya imbugulu ikumi na ibiili.
MAT 14:21 Ao naialia asigiiwe kuhugela magana nzogu ataano iasungu nia ng'enya ikutile mialo nilanso.
MAT 14:22 Itungo akaapi ilago iamanyisigwa ingile mibini, matungo nanso akilaga nimilundo.
MAT 14:23 Naiilaga numilundo, akalongola mulugulu kulompa akaziwing'wene. Ai matungo ampindi akaziukoli wing'wene.
MAT 14:24 Ingi gwa ibini alikoli pakati aluzi likazikenkwa ni maingo kunsoko ung'wega aiukulu.
MAT 14:25 Matungo nautiku wa kupitilya kane u Yesu akaahugeela, akaze igenda mumazi.
MAT 14:26 Iamanyisigwa akwe naamuona ugenda mumazi. Ikogopa ikalunga, uyu mintunga ikazogolya kunsoko awoa.
MAT 14:27 U Yesu akaaila tuli nu moyo leki kogopi ingi nene.”
MAT 14:28 Petro akasusha akalunga, Mukulu ang'wi wewe mpi lago ngendi mumazi nze kitalako.
MAT 14:29 U Yesu akalunga, “Nzuu” Kululo u Petro akahega mibini akagenda mumazi akalongola kuna Yesu aukoli.
MAT 14:30 U Petro naiwaona imaingo, akogopa, akatula nyeheela mumazi, akitanga akalunga, Mukulu ngune!”
MAT 14:31 Itungo u Yesu akagoola umukono akamuhumbula u Petro akamuula, iwe nukite uhuili unino, niki nazawogopile?
MAT 14:32 Kululo u Yesu nu Petro naingila mibini ung'wega ukahila.
MAT 14:33 Iamanyisigwa naiakoli mibini ikamukulya u Yesu akilanga, “Tai uewe wi ng'wana wang'wi Tunda.”
MAT 14:34 Naikondya kuputa uluzi. Akapika mihi na Genesareti.
MAT 14:35 Iantu naiakondya kumumanya u Yesu akatwala inkani muisali, ikaaleta ihi nailwae.
MAT 14:36 Akaminena ahume kuomba inguo akue, ihi naiambile inguo ikagunwa.
MAT 15:1 Ingi Mafarisayo niaka nkani akiza kung'wa Yesu kupuma ku Yerusalemu ikalunga,
MAT 15:2 Ku niki iamanyisigwa niakugazanja imalago anyampala? Kunsoko shaikalala imikona nikulya indya.
MAT 15:3 U Yesu akasusha akaaila, “Au nye kuniki nimukugazanja uzipiilya nuamkulu kunsoko amalagiilyo anyu?
MAT 15:4 Kunsoko Itunda auliye, mkulye itata ako nuia ako; uyu nuiligitya ubii kung'wa tata akwe nuia kwe, tai ikusha.
MAT 15:5 Ingi gwa unye mihunga wihi nuimuila utata akwe nuia akwe wihi uailigwa nauzepata kupuma kung'wane ingi likutula isongeelyo kupuma kung'wi Tunda.
MAT 15:6 Umuntu nuanso mugila anga nsoko nakumukulya utata akwe. Kuiti malupugamukila ulukani lang'wi Tunda kunsoko amalagiilyo anyu.
MAT 15:7 Unye ni mielya, ikutula iza anga u Isaya nauine kitalanyu akalunga.
MAT 15:8 Antu awaiti indankula unene na milomo ao, ingi inkolo yao ikoli kuli nu nene.
MAT 15:9 Akunkulya nakanda, kunsoko akinda manyisigwa malagiilyo aantu.”
MAT 15:10 Akaitanga umilundo nuantu akauila.” tegeeli hangi mulinge,
MAT 15:11 iki nukingila mumulomo wa muntu singa iza kibi, iko nikipuma mumulomo kiko kintwala nikatula nimubi.”
MAT 15:12 Ingi iamanyisigwa ikamuhanga u Yesu ikamuila, uinene Mafarisayo naiiguli ulukani ulo abipiwe?
MAT 15:13 U Yesu akaila, muti wihi nu tata wane nuakigulu nishauutemee ukipwa.
MAT 15:14 Aleki ing'wene, nianso atongeeli apoku, ang'wi umuntu numupoku ukumutongeela umuya, ihi abiili akugwila mikombo.
MAT 15:15 U Petro akasusha, akamuila u Yesu kuile impyani iyi ilungila ntuni kung'witu.
MAT 15:16 U Yesu akasusha, akaaila, nunyenye mukili ne kulinga?
MAT 15:17 Unye shamuinene kina iki nikilongola mumulomo kukiila munda kenda niwa?
MAT 15:18 Ingi gwa maintu ihi nipuma mumulomo ipembelya munkolo, yaya umushapula umuntu.
MAT 15:19 Kululo gwa munkolo mumo ipuma masigo ni mabi, ubulagi, ugoolya, usambo, wii, ntambu au teele niituki.
MAT 15:20 Aya yaya umupeza umuntu uubi. Ingi gwa kulya nisinga ukalae imikono singa ukutwalwa muubi.”
MAT 15:21 Sunga u Yesu akikoma akahega akalongola muisali ya Tiro ni Sidoni.
MAT 15:22 Akaza musungu Mkanani kupuma kuko, akitunta akalunga, “Nihumile kinyauwai. Mkulu ng'wana wang'wa Daudi, umunanso ane ukagigwa niamintunga.”
MAT 15:23 U Yesu singa akasusha anga lukani. Iamanyisigwa akwe akaza akamupepelya akazilunga. Muheje mutwale uko nsoko ukuzogoelya.”
MAT 15:24 U Yesu akaila akalunga, singa aintumi kunkolo izi nikole aintumilwe kunkolo nilimiie munyumba ang'wa Israeli.”
MAT 15:25 Ingi akaza kuntongeela akatuna, akalunga mukulu nzailye.
MAT 15:26 Akasusha, akalunga singa iziza kuhola indya yang'wenya nukuigumila mbwa.”
MAT 15:27 Akalunga ee mukulu, ingi ala mbwa ninino iliza indya nigwie mituntu ia mukulu ao.
MAT 15:28 Sunga u Yesu akasusha akazilunga, musungu uhuili wako ukulu, utulike uu anganuloilwe, numunanso akwe aiwagunika imatungo yayo.
MAT 15:29 U Yesu akahega pang'wanso akalongola pakupe nuluzi nula Galilaya. Sunga akalongola mulugulu akikie kuko.
MAT 15:30 Milundo ukulu ukaza kitalakwe, ukamletela akitele, apoku, akimumi, alema nia uya idu, naialwae, ikaika mumigulu ang'wa Yesu akaaguna.
MAT 15:31 Umilundo ukakaulwa, ukimumi kuligitya akilema kutula apanga, akitela kugenda niapoku akazeona. Ikamulumbiilya Itunda wa Israeli.
MAT 15:32 U Yesu akaitanga iamanyisigwa akwe akalunga, nauhumila kinyauwai umilundo, kunsoko enda kine nene mahiku ataatu akili kulya kintu kihi. Singa kualanga ende kitalao singa aze alie. Aleki kugwa nanzala munzila.”
MAT 15:33 Iamanyisigwa akwe akamuila, pi nikuhumile kupantika indya niakulya mumbuga kikute umilundo uwu nukulu iti?
MAT 15:34 U Yesu akaila mkite mikate inga? Akalonga mupungate, ni nsamaki ibiili ninino nkehu.
MAT 15:35 U Yesu akapumya ilago umilundo wikie pihi.
MAT 15:36 Akahola mikate mupungate ni nsamaki akakembeta, akamiega akaapa iamanyisigwa. Iamanyisigwa ikaupa umilundo.
MAT 15:37 Antu ihi ikalya akikuta akilingiila imaminyanguilwa andya akizulya mbugulu mupungati.
MAT 15:38 Ihi naialia ai itunja magana anzogu anne iasungu nia ng'enya aikutile.
MAT 15:39 Sunga u Yesu akaulaga umilundo ukalongola yao, nuanso akingila mibini akalongola ku Magadani.
MAT 16:1 Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo ikamuhanga ukamugema u Yesu alagiile ikilingasiilyo nikakupuma kilunde.
MAT 16:2 Kululo u Yesu akasusha akaaila, ang'wi impindi mukulunga singa iziza, kunsoko likoli ilunde ikauku.
MAT 16:3 Ni kidaudau mukulunga ung'wega ileliye shanga uziza, migulya imalunde makauku du, kugoza ilingasilyo niamatungo shamumanyile.
MAT 16:4 Wileli nuubi hangi nika ugoolya kikuduma kilingasiilyo, kutili kilingasilyo kihi nikikupegwa, iko iti du ni kang'wa Yona. Sunga u Yesu akaaleka akalongola.
MAT 16:5 I a manyingwa akiza inkigi akaabiia, akatula iwa shangaahoile imikate.
MAT 16:6 U Yesu akaaila, tuli miho nuteele wa Mafarisayo nia Masadukayo.”
MAT 16:7 Iamanyisigwa akatulikolyo ienso nukulunga. Kunsoko shaaza kuhoile imikate.
MAT 16:8 U Yesu alilinga nilanso akaaila, unye nimukite uhuili nunino, niki nimasigo nukikolya unyenye, nukuhunga kina kunsoko shaaza muhoile imikate?
MAT 16:9 Shamulingile ne hangi shamukimbukile imikate iyo mintaano kuantumagana anzogu muntaano, ni mbugulu inga naimuhoee?
MAT 16:10 Ang'wi mikate mupungate kuantu magana anzogu anne, ni mbugulu inga naimuhoile?
MAT 16:11 Yatulika uli kina shamulingile kina singa aikuligitya nunye kunsoko amikate? Igozi nuteele wa Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo.
MAT 16:12 Sunga ikalinga kina singa aukuaila ikie miho nimikate iyi nauteele, kina ihambe nuuteele wa Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo.
MAT 16:13 Matungo u Yesu naiwapika ku Kaisaria iyi na Filipi, akakolya lamanyisigwa akwe akazelunga antu akulunga ung'wana muntu iza nyenyu?
MAT 16:14 Ikalunga, niang'wi ilunga uyu Yohana Mbatizaji, niang'wi Eliya, niangiza Yeremia, niang'wi ang'wi anyakidagu.
MAT 16:15 Akaila unye milunga une ninyenyu?
MAT 16:16 Simoni Petro akasusha, akalunga, “Ue ingi wi Kilisto ng'wana wang'wi Tunda numupanga.”
MAT 16:17 U Yesu akasusha akamuila, Bahu uewe Simoni Bar Yona. Kunsoko isakami numuili shangaikakulagiilaili. Ingi utata ne du nuakigulu.
MAT 16:18 Nene kuila uewe Petro numigulya nigwe iliite ukulizenga itekeelo lane. Ni moma nakuulungu shakulilemya.
MAT 16:19 Kuupa iifungulo ya utemi wa kigulu, kihi nukukilugaila munkumbigulu, kikutula kalugailwa kigulu, hangi kihi iko nukukiluguila munkubigulu kikuluguilwa nukigulu.”
MAT 16:20 Sunga u Yesu akaapa ilago iamanyisigwa aleke kumuila muntu wihi kina ng'wenso ai Kilisto.
MAT 16:21 Sunga imatungo yayo u Yesu akandya kuaila iamanyisigwa kina itulikile alongole ku Yerusalemu, winzagigwa ni nkani yidu, mumikono aanyampala nia kulu amakuhani niaika nkani, kubulagwa nukuuka uluhiku lakatatu.
MAT 16:22 Sunga Petro akamuhola kumpelo akamkenela, akalunga, ulukani ulu lutule kule nuewe, “Mukulu ili lileke kupumila kitalako.
MAT 16:23 Ingi gwa u Yesu akapiluka akamuila Petro, “Suka kitalane mulugu uewe weenda ngilya kitalane, kunsoko shangaukee ulukani lang'wi Tunda, endu kee zizi niantu du.”
MAT 16:24 Sunga u Yesu akaila iamanyisigwa akwe ang'wi muntu wihi nuloilwe kuntyata iime ihi namunkumbigulu, ahole uhuili wakwe, sunga antyate.
MAT 16:25 Uyu nuloilwe kuuguna upanga wa mihi ukulimilya, nuyu wihi kumalimilya kunsoko ane ukamaguna.
MAT 16:26 Ukupata nsao ki umuntu aga amipate ihi hi kunu alimilye upanga wake? Kintu kii nukuila nuupanga wakwe?
MAT 16:27 Kululo ung'wana wang'wa Adamu uzile nuukulu wang'wa Tata akwe nia malaika akwe, ng'wenso uze apa ikinyamulimo iantu kukiila witumi wao.
MAT 16:28 Tai kumuila akoli apa ianyu niimikile singaaziza mionza insha sunga azizamuona ung'wa wang'wa Adamu nuzile muutemi wakwe.
MAT 17:1 Mahiku mutandatu u Yesu akahola palung'wi nung'wenso Prtro nu Yakobo, nu Yohana muluna wakwe, hangi akahola akaatwala migulya mlugulu nululepu.
MAT 17:2 Au kaiwe pa ntongeela ao, uso wakwe ukamiliginta anga ilyoa, nu nguo yakwe ikigela ikazemiliginta anga uwelu.
MAT 17:3 Pang'wanso ikapumila Musa nu Eliya akazeligitya nung'wenso.
MAT 17:4 U Petro akasusha akamuila u Yesu, Mukulu, ukutula iza ne usese kutula ang'we uloilwe kuizenga itali itatumking'wi kang'wa kako, king'wi kunsoko ang'wa Musa ni king'wi kunsoko ang'wa Eliya.”
MAT 17:5 Itungo naakuligitya ilunde lyelu likaguma mululi, likapumula luli milunde lukazelunga, “Uyu ingi ng'wana mulowa nindoigwe, mtegeeli.”
MAT 17:6 Iamanyisigwa akwe naiija nanso, akagwa undala pihi akogopa.
MAT 17:7 Sunga u Yesu akaza akaamba, akalunga, uki hangi leki kogopi.
MAT 17:8 Nienso ikahumbula imiho ao migulya singa ikamuona anga muntu, ikamuona u Yesu du.
MAT 17:9 Naikusima mulugulu u Yesu akaapa ilagilo, akalunga, “Muleki kupumya ukunukuilwa sunga nu ng'wana wang'wa Adamu nuzeuka kupuma kuashi.”
MAT 17:10 Iamanyisigwa akwe akamukolya kuniki iakilisi akulunga u Eliya akutongela kiza atule wang'wandyo?
MAT 17:11 U Yesu akasusha akalunga, u Eliya uzile itai hangi ukususha inkani yihi.
MAT 17:12 Kululo numuie unye, u Eliya wahumile kiza, shaikamumanya, ikamulendeela inkani nialoilwe enso. Ni ite ung'wana wang'wa Adamu uzizagigwa mumikono ao.
MAT 17:13 Sunga iamanyisigwa akwe ikalinga kina aukuligitya nkani ya Yohana Mbatizaji.
MAT 17:14 Naapika mumilundo wa antu, muntu ung'wi akamuhanga, akatugama pantongeela akwe akamuila,
MAT 17:15 “Mukulu muhumile kinyauwai ung'waane, kunsoko izutite lyagu la kugwa nkolo, wiza aze gwa mumyongo nu mumazi.
MAT 17:16 Ai numuletile kuamanyisigwa ako singa ikamuguna.
MAT 17:17 U Yesu akasukiilya, akalunga, “Unye wileli nishauhuie hangi nikigazikile kikie nunye sunga nali?” Muleti apa ninkoli.
MAT 17:18 U Yesu akamupatya, nu mintunga akahega. Umuhumba akagunika imatungo yao.
MAT 17:19 Sunga iamanyisigwa ikamuhanga u Yesu kinkunku ikamukolya, kuniki kahita kuhuma kumuzunsa umintunga?
MAT 17:20 Yesu akaaila kunsoko auhuili wanyu unino, tai numuie ang'wi mukutula nuhuili unino anga uluseke nula mbeu a haraali, muhumile kuila ulugulu hega apa ulongole uko, nuenso ukuhama kutili kintu kihi nikikulemeka kung'wanyu.
MAT 17:21 Ingi gwa impyani iyi naa mintunga shehuma kuhega, ihega kukiila malompi nukiima. (shayigee muilingasilyo ninza nia kali).
MAT 17:22 Matungo naiakili akoli ku Galilaya u Yesu akaaila iamanyisigwa akwe, ung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukutula mumikono aantu.
MAT 17:23 Hangi akumubulaga nu luhiku lakatatu ukuuka, iamanyisigwa ikahungwa kinyauwai.
MAT 17:24 Naiapika ku Kapernaumu antu ahoela mpia nusu shekeli akamuhanga u Petro nukulunga, umumanyisi anyu wilipa ne inusu shekeli?
MAT 17:25 Akalunga ee, u Petro nai wingila munyumba akwe, u Yesu akaligitya nu Petro akalunga, ukusiga ntuni Simoni? Iatemi amihi ihoela impia, angwi kung'wa nyeni? Ang'wi kuantu nizaa temile kupuma kuageni?
MAT 17:26 Nu Petro nauliye, kupuma kuageni u Yesu akamuila kululo awa niakoli muutemi ahegigwe mulipi.
MAT 17:27 Kululo kuleke kuitumya iahoela mpia, itume milandu, longola muluzi goma indoano, na umihole insamaki iyo na ng'wandyo, naiwalugula umulomo wakwe, ukuhanga mumo impia ing'wi. Imihole uape iahoela mpia kunsoko ane nuewe.
MAT 18:1 Matungo yayoyayo iamanyisigwa akaza kung'wa Yesu akamuila, Nyenyu numukulu muutemi akigulu?
MAT 18:2 Yesu akamitanga umung'enya numunino, akamuika pakati ao.
MAT 18:3 Akahinga, tai numuie, iga muhite kila itunu nukutula anga ang'enya nianino singamuzizahuma kingila ku utemi wa kigulu.
MAT 18:4 Kululo uyu nuituna anga ng'wana numunino, Umuntu nuanso mukulu kutemi nuakigulu.
MAT 18:5 Nuyu wihi nuimu singiilya unge'wana numunino unsingiilyenene.
MAT 18:6 Kululo wihi nukuhuma kukinyila kuantuawa nianino nizaahui kumuleka Itunda. Ikutula iza umuntu nuanso atungiligwe igwe la kusela munkingo agumilwe mulunzi nululundu.
MAT 18:7 Isatiko lanyu anyaunkumbingula kunsoko a nkani ya unkunyili, kunsoko aya aiwi azizaimatungo. Ingi gwa isaliko lakwe umuntu uyu nuziziza kumatungo ayo, naziziza kunsoko ane.
MAT 18:8 Ang'wi umukono wako numugulu weenda kukinyila, Uteme uugume kuli nu ewe, hangi ikutula iza kitalako kingila kuupanga uzewimugila umukono ang'wi wimlema, kukila kungungwa kumoto uzazitite umikono nimigulu ihi.
MAT 18:9 Ang'wi iliho liko likutosha lipe uligume kuli nuewewe, ukutula iza uewe kingila ni liho lingwi kukola kwingila ni miho abiilikunu endu soswe moto.
MAT 18:10 Gozi mleke kumudalaha ung'wi wa anino awa. kunsoko kumuila kina kilunde akale amalaika ao mahiku ihi azeaulindie uunso wang'wa Tata ane nua kigulu.
MAT 18:11 
MAT 18:12 Mukusiga ntuni? iga itule umuntu utite nkolo igana ling'wi ilimile ing'wi singi ukualeka ne ao ni makumi kenda mulugulu nukulongola kumupenza uyo nung'wi?
MAT 18:13 Anga amuhole, tai kumuila, ukulumbilya kukila ao ni makumi kenda na kenda ni singa aialimie.
MAT 18:14 Ingi iti singa ulowa wang'wa Tata anyu nuakigulu kina ung'wi waanino awa kulimansila.
MAT 18:15 Ang'wi ng'waanyu wakulea, longola ende umuhugulye uewe nu ng'wenso anga akije waina munyandugu ako.
MAT 18:16 Anga wahita kuulegeelya, muhole muntu ng'wi ang'wi abiili palung'wi nue, kunsoko imilomo naantu abiili ang'wi atatu ihumile kukondanilya ulukani luzipe.
MAT 18:17 Anga wihita kumutegeelya liile itekeelo ulukani ulu, angawahila hangi kulilegeelya itekeelo, nuanso waina munya kilungu rumuhoela mpia.
MAT 18:18 Tai numuile kilu nimukukilungaila mihi nu kilunde kikulugailwa hangi kilu nimukukilugula mihi nukigulu kikuhugulwa.
MAT 18:19 Hangi numuie kina antu abiili miumbi lanyu anga igombye lukani lihi mihi nialulompila nulanso utata ane nuakigulu ukituma.
MAT 18:20 Kunsoko abiili ang'wi atatu nikie palung'wi kukiila lina lane, nunene nkoli palung'wi nienso.
MAT 18:21 Hangi u Petro akaza akamuila u Yesu, ''mukulu, umunyanduguani antashe kanga nune numulekee, ata mupangati?
MAT 18:22 U Yesu akamuila, singakuila ang'wi mupugati, Ingi ata iti imakumi mupungati na mupungati.
MAT 18:23 Kunsoko nanso utemi wa kigulu wilika nuulemi uo nautakile kunonelya ialo la mutugwa wakwe.
MAT 18:24 Naiwandya kunonelya ialo, umutugwe akwe ung'wi anudaiye makumi anzagu ikumi.
MAT 18:25 Kunsoko aimugila anga nzila akulipa, unugole akwe akalagiilya aguligwe umusungu akwe, palung'wi niana akwe ni kintu kihi nautile uulipe wifung'we.
MAT 18:26 Umutugwa akagwa, akatugama pa ntongeela akwe, akalunga mukulu utule nuugimya palung'wi nune hangi kuulipa kila ikintu.
MAT 18:27 Umugole wang'wa mutugwa nuanso akahungwa kinyauwai akalekanuka nayo ihi naumudaiye.
MAT 18:28 Ingigwa umutugwa naiwalekelwa numugole, akalongola akamuamba muntungwi akamgoga kunsoka amudailye dinari igana ling'wi, akamuila ndipe iko ninukudaiye.
MAT 18:29 Umutugwa uyu naudaigwe akamuila nindiile kuupa udu aya nundailye.
MAT 18:30 Umuntu gwa uyu nuang'wandyo akahita, sunga akalongola akamutunga kukitungo, anga wazawamailya iko numudaiye amutunguile.
MAT 18:31 Latugwa niangiza naiaona nikanso makipumie, Ikahung'wa kinyauwai kikulu, akaza ikamuila umugole ao kihi iko naikine kung'wanso.
MAT 18:32 Ingi gwa umgole uyo nua mutugwa akamitango akamuila ue mutugwa numbi, nakalekela uewe ideni lake lili kunsoko aumpepeye.
MAT 18:33 Uewe gwa? singa au humile na kutula ni kinyauwai kumutugwa miako? Anga une nainukumie ikinyauwai.
MAT 18:34 Umugole akwe ataka akamutwala kuantu niaja iantu, akatula gigwa sunga ruzemaila ilipo naudaigwe.
MAT 18:35 Iti ingi uu uTata ane nuakigulu uzimu tendeela, ang'wi ung'wianyu shuzemulekela imilandu umulana akwe kupuma munkolo yanyu.
MAT 19:1 U Yesu naiwakondya kuligitya inkani izi, akahega ku Galilaya, hangi akalongola mumpolempole a Yudea kuntongeela amongo wa Jordani.
MAT 19:2 Mihundo ukulu wa antu ukamutyata, ukapantika uguniki kuko.
MAT 19:3 Mafarisayo akamuhanga u Yesu, akamugema, akamuila, Ikutula taine umuntu kumuleka umusungu akwe kunsoko ihi?
MAT 19:4 U Yesu asusha akalunga, ''shamusomile ne kina uyu nauauimbile ung'wandyo, auaumbile mitinja nu musungu?
MAT 19:5 Hangi akalunga, kunsoko iye umitunja ukumuleka utata akwe nu iakwe nukutula palung'wi numusungu akwe nianso abiili akatula muili ung'wi.
MAT 19:6 Kuluko singa abiili hangi, aina muili ung'wi ingi gwa iko naukikamantilye Itunda, kutile muntu wihi nukukikamantula.
MAT 19:7 Ikamuiila niki gwa umusa aupamilye ilago li tutu nulakumuleka?
MAT 19:8 Akaaila kunsoko aukaku wa nkolo yanyu, umusa akaagombya kualike iasungu ao ingigwa kupuma ng'wandyo singa aiza uu.
MAT 19:9 Numuie kina wihi nukumuleka umusungu akwe angwe singa nsoko augoolya nukutina musungu mungiza, ukutula wagoolya, numitunja nukumutina umu sungu naulekilwe la ukutula wagoolya.
MAT 19:10 Amwanyisigwa akamuila u Yesu ang'wi uu yili umugoha nu musungu singa iziza kutina.
MAT 19:11 U Yesu akaila ingi singa kila munti uhumile kusingiilya umanyisi uwu ingi aoiti dunia gombigwe kusingiilya.
MAT 19:12 Kululo gwa akoli iantu naiaimilwe uhumi wa kituma ikimuili, kupuma niang'wi aiaimilwe uhumi nuanso niantu, niang'wi aimpya nilye age kunsoko itume lukani la kigulu, nuhumile kusingiilya umanyisigwa ausingiilye.
MAT 19:13 Sunga akatwaila ang'enya anino alume kuaikilya imikono ao nu kulompa iamanyisigwa akwe ikamupatya.
MAT 19:14 U Yesu akaila, ''agombi'' iangenya nianino, laki kuagili kuza kitalame, kunsoko uetemi wa kigulu ingi wa antu anga wawa.
MAT 19:15 Nung'wenso akaika imikono akwe migulya ao, sunga akahega pang'wanso.
MAT 19:16 Muntu ung'wi akaza kung'wa Yesu akalunga, ''mumanyisi, kintuni nikiza nini humile kituma sunga mpanlike utemi nuakali nakali.
MAT 19:17 U Yesu akamuila, kuniki nukunkolya ikintu kinikiza? Ukoli ung'wi du numuza, ang'wi uloilwe kupantika uupanga ambiila uunonelya wa ng'wi Tunda.
MAT 19:18 Umuntu nuanso akamukolya, unonelya kii? u Yesu akalunga, leka kubalaga, leka kugoolya, leka kia, leka kuligitya uleele.
MAT 19:19 Akulye utata ako nuiako, hangi mulowe umanyakisali anga uewe nizawiloilwe.
MAT 19:20 Umuntu nuanso akamuila, aya ihi nimakondaniye. Nikiule ni mpee.
MAT 19:21 U Yesu akamuila ang'wi uloilwe kukondanila, longola ende ugulye ihi uape iahimbe ukutula ni kiuto kihunde, sunga nzuu untyate.
MAT 19:22 Umuhumba yu naiwija ayo nu Yesu naukumuila akahenga akazesiga masigo idu, kunsoko aiwilingie nsao yidu.
MAT 19:23 U Yesu akaila iamanyisigwa akwe; '' Tai numuiie ikaku umugole kingila muutemi wa kigulu.
MAT 19:24 Hangi numuie ingi ipepeele ingami kukiila mibolomyo la sindano, kukila umugole kingila mutemi wa kigulu.
MAT 19:25 Iamanyisigwa naiija nanso, ikakuilwa nangulu nukulunga, ''Nyenyu gwa nuzegunika?
MAT 19:26 U Yesu akaagoza akalunga, kuantu shalihumikile, kung'wi Tunda ihi nanso ahumile.
MAT 19:27 Sunga u Petro akamusukiilya akamuila, Goza, kaleka ihi kakatyata uewe, kintu ki nikupantika kitalako?
MAT 19:28 Yesu akaila, ''Tai numuie, uyu nuantyatile unene muileli nupya mumatungo na ng'wana wang'wa Adamu, nuzizikie pakatikati pi tundu la ukulu wa mukola, nunye muzizikie migulya amatundu ikumi na abiili na ukulu kumapa ulamulwa makabila ikumi na abiili na Israel.
MAT 19:29 Sunga ung'wi anyu naulekile ito lakwe, aluna niagoha, nawa niasungu, Tata, ia, ana ang'wi mugunda kunsoko a lina lane, ukusingiilya kukila igana, nu kusala uutemi nuakali nakali.
MAT 19:30 Idu awa niang'wandyo itungili, azetula anyuma, nawa nianyuma azizatula angwandyo.
MAT 20:1 Kumdogoilyo utemi nuakilunde ukimpyananu muntu nukete umugunda, nai wiandiie ukedaudau nsoko akuaika anyamilimo mumugunda wakwe nuamizabibu.
MAT 20:2 Nae igombya neanyamilemo dinalu ing'wi kumung'wi, wikaayuma ende kumugunda nua mezabibu.
MAT 20:3 Nai akeile masaa ataatu wikenda hange uu wikaaona itumi angiza aeimekule akeeze agila anga mulemo pake awiza kisoko.
MAT 20:4 Wikaaila, ''Nunyenye gwa, longoli mumugunda nuamuzabibu, hange kehi nemutakile kumupa Uuu ekalongola kitumia umulemo.
MAT 20:5 Wikalongola hange naakela masaa mutandatu muma saa nemutandatu, wikituma uulukulu.
MAT 20:6 Nkua yedu hange naepikile saa ikumi neleng'wi akenda nukuahanga eantu neangiza imekile akeze angila anga mulemo. Wikaaila, ''kuneke mumehile apa nuagile anga mulemo wehi kuluhiku lehi?
MAT 20:7 Ika muila kunsoko kutile umuntu wehi nukupee umulemo. Wika aila nunyenye gaa lungoli mumugunda nua mezabibu.
MAT 20:8 Imatungo ampinde napikile, umuhola mugunda nua mezabibu wikamuila umemeeli wakwe, ''Itange eitumi wape ekinyamulimo, kandiilya nua musho sunga nua nguandyo.
MAT 20:9 Nae ekiza awa nae aikilwe saa kumi ne ng'wi, kelaung'wi ausengiiye dinali.
MAT 20:10 Nae ekiza eitumi ang'wandyo, aeasigike kena akupegwa kukele, kuite ekasingiilyegua kela ung'wi dinali ing'wi kela umuntu.
MAT 20:11 Nae ikasingiilya dunyamulimo kao, ikamisusumelya umukola mugunda.
MAT 20:12 Ikalunga, ''Ee eitumi neampelo aeitumiile isaa Ing'wi udu muitumi mulemo kuite waempyania nusese use kukenkile imeligo kuluhuku lelinukupya mpasui.
MAT 20:13 Kuite umuhola nuugunda wihesusha nukulunga kung'wi wao, muhumbe miane, singa nutumile anga ubii.
MAT 20:14 Itee? singa aelugombilyene nunene kudinali eng'wi?
MAT 20:15 Itee singa taine leung'wane kutuma anga nendilwe ninsao yane? Ang'wi iliho lako ibe nsoho une nemuza?
MAT 20:16 Unu nua mwisho ukutula wang'wendyo nuyu nua ng'wandyo ukutula wa mwisho.
MAT 20:17 U Yesu nauhunankila kena kuyelusalemu awahoile iamanyisigwa akwe ikumi nuubiili kumpelo, numunzila wikaaila.
MAT 20:18 Gozi kuunaikela kuyelusalemu, nu Ng'wana wang'wa Adamu uhukwa mumikono aakulu aakuhani neaandeki. Akumulamuila ensha.
MAT 20:19 Hange akamupunya kuantu ne amahi nsoko kumumela, kumukua nukumutumbeka. Kuite uluhiku laka taatu ukuiuka.
MAT 20:20 Hange uia nua ng'wana wang'wa Zebedayo ae uzile kung'wa Yesu niana akwe. Wikatungama ntongeela akwe nukulompa kentu kupuma kung'waakwe.
MAT 20:21 U Yesu wika nuila, ''utakile ntuni? Wikamuiila, ''Lunga kena iana ane neabiiliikie, ung'wi kumohono wako nua hegoha hange ung'wi kumokono wako nua kekema nuuitemi wako''
MAT 20:22 Kuite u Yesu wihasusha nululunga, ''singauine eke nukulompa. Itee? Uhumilene kung'wela ekekole nekung'wela? ekamuila''Kuuhuma''
MAT 20:23 Aaaila, ekehole kane mukuhingwela. Kuite kikie umukono wane nua kulela numokono wane nuakekema singa anga nene kumupa, kuite kuawa neanoneeigwe nutata wane''.
MAT 20:24 Eamanyisigwa neangeza ikuminaeigule uu, iha ambwa ukea nea luna ao neabiili.
MAT 20:25 Kuite u Yesu wikaitanga ung'wenso nukuaile, ''Muleugile kena eahumu nea mihe amuduile, nea hulu ao ituma uuhumi kitalao.
MAT 20:26 Kuite ileke kutula uu kitulanyu kuleka ite, wehi nakulowa kutula mukulu nulalanyu kusinjawatule mutumi wanyu.
MAT 20:27 Nunyu nukulula wang'wendyo kusinja watu mitumi wanyu.
MAT 20:28 Anga uu ung'wana nuang'wa Adamu singa ae uzitumilwa inge kituma, nukupunya uupanga wakwe kutule ukomoli waantu duu.''
MAT 20:29 Imatungo naeapumile kuyeliko, iimbe ikulu lekamityata.
MAT 20:30 Hange ika aona apoku abiili ikie mumpelompelo anzila. Naeigule kena Uyesu ukukela, ekitanta mduli ekalunga, ''Mukulu, Ng'wana wang'wa Daudi ukugeze.''
MAT 20:31 Kuite iumbe likaakenda nukuaila kulagi. Ata uu, neanso ekahulya unduli kukile nukulunga '' Mukulu Ng'wana wang'wa Daudi kugoze.''
MAT 20:32 Hange u Yesu wikenuka wikailanga nukuaholya mutakile numulendele ulee?
MAT 20:33 Ikamuila, ''Mukulku kena emiho itu apelye.
MAT 20:34 Inge u Yesu wikalutwe nuukea, wika maambaemiho ao, inge uu ekasingiilya uhumi wakuona hange ikanityata.
MAT 21:1 U Yesu neamanyisigwa akwa ekapika pakupi ne Yelusalemu hange ekalongola sunga kuBethfage, kulugulu nuka mezeituni, hange u Yesu wihaatuma iamanyisigwa abiili.
MAT 21:2 Wikaaila, longoli kukesale nekakunlongeela, sunga mukumiona ndogwe etungilwe palungwanso, nung'wa ndogwa palung'wi nuyo. Itungueli nukuileta kung'waane.
MAT 21:3 Anga muntu wihi wamuila kehi kua nelanso, mukulunga, 'Mukulu uitakile,' numuntu nuanso ukukaya kumugimbwa mize palung'wi nizo.
MAT 21:4 Ikani nelanso inge ilo naelekeiye kuanyahedagu kusinja ligeelekele. Wikaaila.
MAT 21:5 Aeli iana akisungu akasayuni, egoza, umutimi wako upembilye kung'waanyu, mupolo hange unaulie mundogwe, nung'wa ndogwe mugoha, ng'wa ndogwe mudabu.
MAT 21:6 Hange iamanyisigwa ekalongola ekituma anga u Yesu naualagiiye.
MAT 21:7 Ikamualeta undogwe nu ng'waa ndogwe, nukueka iang'wenda migulyaao, nu Yesu wikikie nung'wanso.
MAT 21:8 Iidu mumilundo ekaila iangwenda ao munzila niauye ehatema imatambi kupuma mumahota nukaile munzila.
MAT 21:9 Iumbi naelemutongee u Yesu nawa naiamulyatile iha hulya mduli, nukulunga, ''Hosana kung'wana wang'wa Daudi! Ukembelilwe uzile kulima lamukulu; Hosana migulwa kukila.
MAT 21:10 U Yesu paekapika kuYelusalemu, kesale kehi kekitumba nukulunga, ''Uyu nyenyu?
MAT 21:11 Iumbe lekalunga, ''Uyu Yesu munyakidagu, kupuma kunazaleti akuGalilaya.
MAT 21:12 Hange u Yesu wekingela mitekeelo ( ang'wi Tunda. Akaazunsa ehi hunzi naiakugulya nukugula mitekeelo. Wekapeula ga numeza neyaantu nae akukaila impia ne maintu naagulya nkume.
MAT 21:13 Wikaaila, ''Iandekile, ''Ito lane lekutula ito nelakulompela, kuite unyenye mametenda ikulungu laii.
MAT 21:14 Hange iapulu nea kilele ika miziila mitekeelo, nung'wenso wikaakomya.
MAT 21:15 Kuite kumatungo eakulu amakuhani neaandeki naiaine imakula naumiyumi, hange naeigule iang'enya ahuzugalya mitekeelo nukulunga, ''Hosana ng'wana wang'wa Daudi, ''ihaambwa makuo.
