MAT 21:16 Ikamuila, ''Wigulene nehe kulambulwa neantu awa? U Yesu wikaaila, ''Ee! kuite muikele kusoma, kupuma mumelomo ang'enya neadabu neakankamukete likimo lupikile.
MAT 21:17 Hange u Yesu wikaaleka nuikulongola kunzi nakisale mu Bethania nukulala kuko.
MAT 21:18 Ikedaudau nausukile mukesali, aeukete nzala.
MAT 21:19 Wikaleona ikota mumpelompelo anzila. Wikalehanga, kuite shanga wikalya angakentu, mung'wanso inge ematutu du. Akauele, Itule tile inkali kung'waako lukulu hange. ''Hange itungu lelo imtini wekuma
MAT 21:20 Amanyisigwa akwe naiaine, ikakulwa nukulunga, yatuleka ule umtini wuma nkua eng'wi?
MAT 21:21 U Yesu wikasusha nukulunga, ''Tai kumuila, ang'wi mihutula nuuhueli muleke kuailya, shanga mukituma eke nekitumilwe kumtini udu, kuite mukuuila ate ulugulu, uholwe ugung'we mubahali, yukutula.
MAT 21:22 Kehi nemukulompa kusola, kunu eze muhuie mukusengiilya.
MAT 21:23 U Yesu naupikile mutekeelo, akulu amakuhane anyampala antu ekamuhanga imalungo naukumanyisa nukukolya, kuuhumi ke ukituma imakani aya? Hange nyenyu nukupee uhumi uwu?
MAT 21:24 U Yesu wihasusha nukuaila, nunene hange kumukolya ikolyo nen'wi. Ang'wi mukumbila, nunene uu kumuila kuuhumi ke nekituma imakani aya.
MAT 21:25 Ubadisigwa nuang'wa Yohana aeupumile pee, kulumdane ang'wi kuantu? Ikiholya ienso, akalunga, anga kulunge, aeupumile kilunde ukuuila, nehe mukahita kuhuila?
MAT 21:26 Kuite anga kulunge, aeupumile kuantu, ''kogopile imaumbie, kunsoko ehi aine uYohana kena munyakedagu.''
MAT 21:27 Hange ekasusha kung'wa Yesu nukulunga, ''Shakuine'' Nung'wenso wikaaila gwa, ''Nunene singa kumuila kuushumi he kituma emakani aya.
MAT 21:28 Kuite mukusinga ntuni? Umuntu nukete iama abiili Wikenda kung'wi nukumuila, Ng'waane, longola witume umulemo mumugunda nuamezabebu.
MAT 21:29 Lelo, ''Ung'wana wikasusha nukulunga, shaninzuu, kuite panyambele wikakaila imasigo akwe nukulongola.
MAT 21:30 Nu muntu nuanso wikalongola kung'wana nuanso akasusha nukulunga ninzuu, Mukulu, huite shanga wekenda.
MAT 21:31 Nuule kuawa neabiili nuilumile anga nuTata wakwe nauloilwe? Ikalunga, ''Ng'wana nuangwandyo'' U Yesu wikaaila, ''Itai kumuila, iamanangwa neakosi ahingela muutemi wang'wi Tunda kuleka hanza unyenye hingela.
MAT 21:32 Kundogoilyo u Yohana auzile kitalanyu kunzila nenguloku, kuite singa meka muhuela, mutungo ia manangwa nea kosi akamuhuela. Nu nyenye naimuine nelanso lekole, shanga mekaungana nsoko mieka mumuluile.
MAT 21:33 Tegeeli ikilingasiilo nekiuya, aukule muntu, umuntu aukele ieneo ikulu nelihi. Auteme imizabibu, unkakitiila, wikazipya nihiseme nekakukamula imagai, akazenga numuhala nualindi nukuliliha kuagaza zabibu. Hange wekenda kehengiza.
MAT 21:34 Imatungu amaogola amizabibu naeuhugee, wikaatuma atuungwa ang'wi, Umuya ekamubulega, nu muya ung'wi ikamukua namagwe.
MAT 21:35 Kuite awe neelima izabibu ikazihola eihimi akwe, ihamuhua ung'wi, Umuiye eka mubalaga, nu muya ung'wi ikamukua namagwe.
MAT 21:36 Kumkua nengiza, umugole wikaatuma atungwi angiza, eeelu kukila awa neangwandyo, huite awa neelima akaaleda hange wudu.
MAT 21:37 Nai akahila nanso umuhulu nuanso akamutuma latalao uug'waalawe nukulunga, ahumukulyaumngwane.
MAT 21:38 Kuite awa neelma emezabibu naeamwine umuhumba nuanso, Akiela, Uyu musali, Nzii, kumbulage nukuhola uusali.
MAT 21:39 Uu ekamuhola, ekamugume kunzi na mugunda nua mizabibu nukumubulaga.
MAT 21:40 Itee umukola mugunda nua mizabibu nuzile, utenda uli ialemi amezabibu?
MAT 21:41 Ikamuila, ''Ukuabipya iantu nuanso abi kunzila aulaki kukila, ne hange ukusalisha umugunda nua mizabibu kulumiangeza, iantu neahuli pa kunzila amezabibu neakahonda''.
MAT 21:42 U Yesu wikaaila '' Shamusomilene numaandeko,' Igwe nealatulile iaashi naina igwa ikulu nelaukundeki, Ile lepumile kumukulu, hange ukuleta ikuilwa kumiho iluu?
MAT 21:43 Uu kumuila, Utemi wang'wi Tunda ukuholwa kupuma kitalanyu nukupegwa ihe nekee inkali yalawe.
MAT 21:44 Wehi nuekagwa nugwe nelanso ukubungwa ninoo. Kuite kuehi nelelumugwila, lekumusia.
MAT 21:45 Ikulu amakuhani nea mafalisayo naeakija ilingasilyo yakwe, ikaona kena akulambulwa enso.
MAT 21:46 Kuite kela naealoilwe kugoola mikono migulya lakwe, akagopa umilundo, kunsoko iantu aeamugozile anga munyakidagu.
MAT 22:1 U Yesu autambue neenso mulengasiilyo nukulunga.
MAT 22:2 '''Utemi wa kilunde wumpyani numutemi naoneneeye wiloelinua winga wang'waakwe.
MAT 22:3 Wikaatuma eitumi akwe husila awa neaalehikweize muwiloeli nua winga, huite sengaikapika.
MAT 22:4 Umutemi wikaatuma hange eitumi angizawikalunga. ''Aeli ehe neanilwe, Gozi, nanonelyaindya. Nakwa neamudama neaginu asinzwaa, ne makani ehi ahondilile, Nzii hiloelye muwinga''.
MAT 22:5 Kuite iantu awa singaai akee lukulu uamwi wakwe. Neang'wi ikalongola kumigunda ao, nawa niangiza ikalongola mumaanza ao nabiashala.
MAT 22:6 Niangiza ikaaja eitumi amukulu nukuabulaga.
MAT 22:7 Kuite umutemi wikataka. Wikatuma ikua mbiteakwe akabulangwa eabulagi nukulimansiilya ikisalekao kumoto.
MAT 22:8 Hange wikaaila eitumi akwe, ''Uwinga ukondile, kuite ianwi shangaaza.
MAT 22:9 Kuitelongoli muninsambwa nzile nemehulu, muane iantu needu anga uu neukuhuma aze muwiloeli nua winga.''
MAT 22:10 Eitumi akena munzila ninkulu nukuakalibisha iantu ehi nae aine, aza kuabi, Uu itando nila winga ieizula iageni.
MAT 22:11 Kuite umutemi nae wingie nukuagoza iaiziila, wikamuona muntu ung'wi akeze mugila ung'wenda nua winga.
MAT 22:12 Umutemi akamukolya, Muhumba miane, azaupikile ule apakunu umugila ung'we nua winga? Numuntu nuanso shanga wikasushaketi.
MAT 22:13 Uu gwa umutemi akaaila eitumi akwe, Mutungi umuintu uyu imekono nemegulu mugumi kunzi kuhiti, kung'wanso nuuhole uleli nukusia muno.
MAT 22:14 Kunsoko antu edu itangilwe, kuite awa niasaguwe ashenyu.
MAT 22:15 Uu iatalisayu ikahega nukuzipeilya amurambe uyehu munkani yakwe ung'wenso.
MAT 22:16 Uuikaatuma iamanyisigwa ao palung'wi Helode Hange ikamuila uYesu, ''Mumanyisi, kulengile kenauewe wimuntu watai, hange kena ukumanyisa ita ang'wi Tunda etai shanga ukee mkani ningiza hange umugila anga ukweli nua antu.
MAT 22:17 Kuite kuile, usegile ntuni? Itee? taine kilago kapunya ehodi nshenyu ang'wi alii?
MAT 22:18 U Yesu aulengile uubi wao wikalunga, Kuneki nemungema unye nemiamasue?
MAT 22:19 Ndangiili empia netumeka mukodi.''Uu ikamutetela edinali.
MAT 22:20 U Yesu akakolya ''Ikelu ne lina ele lang'wi nyanyu?
MAT 22:21 Ikasusha,''Yang'wa kaisari.'' Uu Yesu akabila,''Mupiukaisari nakwe nang'wi Tunda mupi Itunda.''
MAT 22:22 Naeigule ile ikakuilwa. Hange ikamuleka nukulongola yao.
MAT 22:23 Iluhiku nulanso ang'wi ao amasadukayo akiza kung'wa Yesu, awa neelunga kutile anga uiukiwaashi. Ekamukulya,
MAT 22:24 akalunga,''Mumanyisi, Umusa aulugile, Angeze umuntu ukule singa utugile ung'wana, umuluna ukumusala umusungu nuanso nukumuligelya ung'wana nsoko amuluna wakwe.
MAT 22:25 Aeahote atuna mupungate. Nua ng'wandyo autenile wikasha shuutungile ung'wana. Aka mutekela umulune umusungu.
MAT 22:26 Hange umulune wakwe wikalenda uu, hange nuyu nuaka taatu, yekatenda uu sunga yuyu nua mupungate.
MAT 22:27 Nae ituma ite ehi, numusungu nuanso wikasha.
MAT 22:28 Inge muuiuki umusungu nuanso ukutula wang'wanyenyu mualuna neanso nemupungate? kunsoko ehi ae amutenile.''
MAT 22:29 Kuite u Yesu ausuhilye nukulunga, Mukakoseela, Kunsoko shamumanyile Imaandeko sunga ningulu niang'wi Tunda.
MAT 22:30 Kunsoko muuniuhi, iantu shaitena ang'wi hulenwa, kuleka ite iantu etula anga iamakika hilunde.
MAT 22:31 Kuite uiuki waashi mukele musomene niTunda auketambue kitalanyu, nukulunga.
MAT 22:32 Unene ni Tunda nuang'wa Iblahimu, Itunda wang'wa Isaki, ni Tunda nuang'waYakobo? Itunda singa Itundawaashi, inge Itunda nua panga.''
MAT 22:33 Imatungo umulundo nuahija ile, ikakuilwa umanyisi wakwe.
MAT 22:34 Kuite emafalisayo niakija kena Uyesu wakilaja ea masadukayo, ekiiligeila ienso palug'wi.
MAT 22:35 Ung'wiao, akeze munyilago, wika mukolya ikolyokumugema.
MAT 22:36 Mumanyisi, ilago neleuke ni kulu kukele imalago ehi.
MAT 22:37 U Yesu akasusha,''kusinja umulowe umukulu kunholo ako ehi, nemahala ako ehi.
MAT 22:38 Ili lilo ilagilyo ikulu hangi nilang'wandyo.
MAT 22:39 Hange na akabiili impyani ni yiyo. Kusinja kumulowa u munya kisali anga nuiloilwe u ewe.
MAT 22:40 Imalago ehi neanya kidagu imeiwe nemalago yaya nabiili.
MAT 22:41 Ne mafalisayo naekili ilingile paluug'wi, U Yesu akaakulya ikolyo.
MAT 22:42 Akalunga,''Itee? Musegile ntuni kung'wa Kristo? Nuanso ng'wa nyenyu? Neenso ekasusha,'' Ng'wana wang'wa Daudi.
MAT 22:43 U Yesu wikaasukeelya.''Kuuhuni kea udaudi ike ni nkolo ukumitanga mukulu, nukulunga.
MAT 22:44 Mukulu auumuie Umukulu wane,'' Ikieumohono wanenuakegohe, sunga nekuatenda ialugu aho aikwepihe amegulu aho?''
MAT 22:45 Ang'wi Udaudi ukumitanga ukristo,''Mukulu''Ukutulang'waakwe ule?
MAT 22:46 Kutile nae usuhilye ulukani hanga, hange hutile naugemile kumukolya imakolyo nendu kupuma uluhiku lulo nukulongoleka.
MAT 23:1 Kuleka ite auligilye ne antu neamanyisigwa ahwe,
MAT 23:2 ''Iaandeki neamafalisayo ikaie ituntu lang'wa Musa.
MAT 23:3 Kehi neakumuila kituma, itumi kunu mezeagoza. Kuita muteke kituma intendo yao, kunsoko neanso elunga imakani neshaituma.
MAT 23:4 Itai etunga meligo melito neanso hange mekaku humehenha, hange eahensha iantu mumeenga ao. Kuite neanso shaehugeela ata ninino kukenha.
MAT 23:5 Inlendo yao yehi, ituma nsoko agozwe neantu. Kunsoko neanso igalipya imasandeko ao nukongeelya ukuulu nua upendi wang'wenda ao.
MAT 23:6 Neanso ilowa kikie muianza yakikulya muumalagone mumatuntu akakulya mukate amumasinagogi,
MAT 23:7 nuhulamushigwa kukulyo nkani yakusoko, nukulang'wa, ''Amanyisi'' ne antu.
MAT 23:8 Kuite unye singainonee kitangwa''Miamanyisi'' Kunsoko muukete umumanyisi ung'wi, hange unye meehi mekiluna.
MAT 23:9 Muleke kuuitanga muntu wehi apa mihe kena Tata wanyu, kunsoko mukete Tata wang'wi alua, nung'wenso ukole hilunde.
MAT 23:10 Hange muleke kitangwa ''amanyisi'' kunsoko mukete umumanyisi ung'wi duu, inge Kristo.
MAT 23:11 Inge numukulu mulalanyu ukutala mutumi wanyu.
MAT 23:12 Wehi nukihumbula ukusimigwa, hange wehi nukisimya ukuhumbulwa.
MAT 23:13 Kuite ukea wanyu aandeki nea mafalisayo, ateele! mukua lugaile iantu utemi nuakilunde. Nunyenyeshamuhumile kingela, shamuagombilye neakingela hutende ite.
MAT 23:14 
MAT 23:15 Ukae wanyu aandeki neafalisayo, ateele! Mukuputa itumbe labahali nukumutenda umuntu ung'wi wahuele kuaya nemukumanyisa. hangi nuekatenda anga unyenye, mukumulenda kabiili muntu nue [kumoto] jehanamu anga uu uuyenye nemile.
MAT 23:16 Ukae wanyu atongeeli nea poku, unye nemilunga, wehi nuelapa kitekeelo, singa kentu. Kuite nuelapa kilapo la zahabu ni lekeelo, ukulungwa nekelapokakwe.
MAT 23:17 Unye apoku meapungu, nekeule nekekulu kukelakeuya, zahabune angwi itekeelo neliikilwe wakufu nezahabu kung'wi Tunda?
MAT 23:18 Hange, wehi nukulapa kuzahabu, singa kentu. Inge nukulapa kisongelyo nelekole mung'waakwe, utungilwa nuulapi wakwe.
MAT 23:19 Unye antu nemeapoku, nekeule nekekulu kukele ikiunya isongeelyona ang'wi adhabu neekwa wakufu imasongeilyo nepumigwa kung'wi Tunda?
MAT 23:20 Kuite, nuanso nuelopa kuzahabu wilapa kunelanso nukumaintu ehe nahole kung'wa akwe.
MAT 23:21 Nung'wenso nuelapa mitekeelo, wilapa kunelanso kung'wenso nuekili akwe.
MAT 23:22 Nung'wenso nuelapa kiluunde, wilapa pituntu la utemi ne lang'wi Tunda nukung'wenso nuikie mung'wanso.
MAT 23:23 Ukae wanyu, aandeki neafalisayo, ateele! kunsoko mukupunya ezaka kubizali, mnaanaa nechicha, kuita mukuleka imakani nemalito milego -tai ukende, nuuhueli. Kuite aya yemunonee kutula mutumile, hange singa kumaleka nemangiza muhile kumitumela.
MAT 23:24 Unye atongeeli nemeapoku, nemukusuza umududu numuniino kuite mukuimela ingamia!
MAT 23:25 Ukae wanyu, andeki neafalisayo, miateele! Kunsoko mukoja ikole kunzi ne sahani kuhunzi, kuite kunzi izue uubi hange kulile anga upolo.
MAT 23:26 Unye aaafalisa nemiapoku, oji hanza ikole mukati ne mukati a sahani, nsoko inkika na kunzi etule nza nenyenso gaa.
MAT 23:27 Ukae wanyi, aandeke neafalisayo, meateele! kunsoko mukimpyana niibeela napakilwe ukenke, kunzi igela maza, kuite mukati izue imakupa naashi hange kela kentu neke bii.
MAT 23:28 Uulukuli, nunye kunzi migee kena miaza ntongeele aantu, kuite kunzi mizue uteele nuubi.
MAT 23:29 Ukae wanyu, aandeki neafalisayo, meateele! kunsoko mukuzenga iibiila na anyakidagu nukupambe iibiila yao awa nea tai.
MAT 23:30 Unye milunga, anga aekikie mumahiku a tata itu, shanga aezekipalung'wi nao kuhunula usakami nuanya kidagu.
MAT 23:31 Kuite mukihenga unyenye kena unye miana ao awa nae abulagile ianyakidagu.
MAT 23:32 Hange unyenye mukupikeelya kizulya pang'wanso niinonee umulandu nua Tata anyu.
MAT 23:33 Unye nzoka, akete vipilibao, muuekile ule uulamuli nuakujehanamu?
MAT 23:34 Kuite, goza, kuatuma kitalanyu ianyakidagu, antuneakuligwa, neaandeki, Ang'wi ao mukuabulaga nukuaja. Ang'wiao mukuakua mumasinagogi anyu nukuazunsa nukupuma makesale king'wi sunga numuya.
MAT 23:35 Upumeli kena kung'wa anyu ukupumela usakami wehi nua tai nauhunuwe mihe, kaziilya isakamiang'wa Habili nua tai sunga isakani niya Zakalia ung'waa Balaki, nae mumubulabile patakatifu nepa kezindaalo.
MAT 23:36 Tai, kumuila, imakani aya ehi akuupata uwileli uwu.
MAT 23:37 Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, uewe nukeze abulaga ianyakidagu nukuakua namagwe awa neatumilwe kung'wa ako! Nkua inga kumilingeela iang'enya ako palung'wi anga enkuku nilingeela iana akwe mumanana akwe, kuite singa wikagomba!
MAT 23:38 Goza ito lako lasaga nuula.
MAT 23:39 Nunee kuila, kandeelya, itungo lele nukulongoleka singa umona, sunga nuekalunga, “Ukembetilwe nuanso nuzile kulina nela Mukulu.”
MAT 24:1 U Yesu akapuma mitekeelo akalongola kwea. Iamanyisigwa akwe ikamuhanga nukumulagiila imajengo amatekeelo.
MAT 24:2 Kuite akasusha nukuaila, “Itee, shamuine ne imakani aya ehi? Itai kumuila, kutile igwe nelekusaga migulya alulya nesha nukuhambulwa.”
MAT 24:3 Hange pawikikie mulugulu nula Mizeituni, iamanyisigwa akwe ekamuhanga akeze ipihie nukulunga, “Kuite imakani aya akupumela nale? Kentu ke nekikutula kelingasiilyo kakuza kung'waako ne mpelo aunkumbigulu?
MAT 24:4 U Yesu akasusha nukuaila, “Tuli nuugozi kena aleke umuntu kuakongela.
MAT 24:5 Kunsoko edu azile kulina lane. Akulunga, “Unene inge nene ne Kilisto, hange akuakonga edu.
MAT 24:6 Muukija mbita ni mpola nia mbita. Gozi muleke kutula nuwoa, kunsoko imakani akupumela, kuite empelo ika ikeli.
MAT 24:7 Kunsoko ihe ikauka kihe nzuya, nuutemi kuutemi uuya. Yukutula nenzala nematetemeko amahimuianza niakuli kuli.
MAT 24:8 Kuite imakani aya ehi ng'wandyo udu wauai nuakutuga.
MAT 24:9 Uu akumupumya kunsoko magigwe nukubulagwa. Mukubipilwa ne mahi ehi nsoko alina lane.
MAT 24:10 Uu edu akukumpa nukilekeelya nukibepilwe unyenye kua nyenye.
MAT 24:11 Anyakidagu edu akupumela nukuakongela edu.
MAT 24:12 Kunsoko uubi ukongeeleka, ulowa nuantu du ukupola.
MAT 24:13 Kuite uyu nukigigimiilya sunga empelo, ukuguneka.
MAT 24:14 Izi inkani nenziza nia utemi yukutanatigwa unkumbigulu wehi kutula wihengi kumahi ehi. Uu empelo ekapika.
MAT 24:15 Kuite nemekaona uwibulugi nuubi, naeletambuwa numunya kedagu u Danieli lemekile pakianza neketakatifu (nukusoma nualinge),
MAT 24:16 uu awa neakole ku Yuda amankiile mumalugulu.
MAT 24:17 Nuyu nuakole migulya mumalo waleke kusima pihe kuhola kentu keke kupuma munyumba akwe,
MAT 24:18 nuyu nuakole kumugunda aleke kusuka kuhola ung'wenda wakwe.
MAT 24:19 Kuite ukia wao neakete ung'wana nawe neakonsha mumahiku nanso!
MAT 24:20 Lompi kena kumanka kung'waanyu ileke kutula matungo ampepo, ang'wi luhiku nula kusupya.
MAT 24:21 Kunso ikalukole lwago lukulu, neze lukile lupumile kupuma kuumbwa uukumbigulu sunga nitungo gaa, singalezezigela hange.
MAT 24:22 Anga imahiku nanso anga ae akugempigwe, kutile naeweze guneka. Kuite nsoko aasagulwa, imahiku nanso akukugempigwa.
MAT 24:23 Hange angeze muntu wehi ukumuila, “Goza, Kilisto ukole papa! Ang'wi, Ukilisto ukole uko muleke kuhuila inkani nianso.
MAT 24:24 Kunsoko i Makilisto nauteele neanya kidagu auteele azile nukigeelya makula makulu naukuelwi, kunsoko akukongela, ang'wi yukuwezekana ata iasagulwa.
MAT 24:25 Gozi, namuhugula nakele kupumela.
MAT 24:26 Kuite, anga amuila, “Ukilisto ukole kumbuga, muleke kenda kung'wanso kumbuga. Ang'wi, “Gozi, ukole munyumba muleke kuhuela inkani nianso.
MAT 24:27 Anga uu nulumelika kupuma kilya nukumelika kung'weli, uu yeekatula keza kung'wana nuang'wa Adamu.
MAT 24:28 Pehi nuukole umuimba, kung'wanso kuko indeeyilingeela.
MAT 24:29 Kuite matungo makupe kukela yekatula nulwago lukulu imahiku nanso, Ilya lukuikilwa kiti, ung'weli shaukupumya uwelu wakwe, inzota yukugwa kupuma kilunde, ningulu yakilunde yukuhingieka.
MAT 24:30 Uu ekelingasiilyo ka ng'wana wang'wa Adamu ekigela migulya, ni ntambu yehi ni amihe yako hongelya. Akumuona ung'wana nuang'wa Adamu upembilye mumalunde amigulya kungulu nuukulu nukulu.
MAT 24:31 Ukuatuma iamalaika akwe kululi nulukulu alalumbeta, neensa akuulingiila palung'wi iasagulwa akwe kupuma nande ine nia mihe, kupuma mpelo ung'wini lunde sunga neye nengiza.
MAT 24:32 Imanyisi isomo kupuma mumtini. Anga itambee liketegela nukupumya imatutu, malenga kena iketiku kahugeela.
MAT 24:33 Uu gwa, anga maona imakani aya ehi, mulenge kena wahugeela, pakupi pamulango.
MAT 24:34 Itai kumuila, uwitugi uwu shaukukila, sunga imakani aya igele.
MAT 24:35 Ilunde nihi yukukela, kuite inkani yane shayukukila kwee.
MAT 24:36 Kuile kuluhiku nulanso nesasa kutile umuntu nuine, ata umalaika nua kilunde, ang'wi ung'wana, inge u Tata ung'wana wang'wenso udu.
MAT 24:37 Anga uu naeyeli mumatungo ang'wa Nuhu, uu yukutula keza kung'wana wang'wa Adamu.
MAT 24:38 Kunsoko mumahiku nanso imazi naeakeli kigela iantu ae akulya nukung'wa, akutina nukutinwa kupika uluhiku lulo nu Nuhu aewingile musafina,
MAT 24:39 hange shanga aealingile kentu kehi sunga emazi nai ahangile nukuchola ehi uu yukutula heza kung'wana wang'wa Adamu.
MAT 24:40 Uu antu abiile ika akole kumugunda, ung'wi ukuholwa, ung'wi ukulekwa kunyuma.
MAT 24:41 Asungu abiili ikaa eze sia palung'wi, ung'wi ukuholwa, ung'wi ukusaga.
MAT 24:42 Kuite, tuli meahugu nsoko shamuine luhiku ke nuzile u Mukulu wanyu.
MAT 24:43 Kuite mulenge kena, angeze umukulu nuito angize azuine itungo ke nuzile umuhembi, azuzekesha shanga azuzee leka ito lakwe kubunangwa.
MAT 24:44 Kuite, inonee gwa mutule mukondile, kunsoko ung'wana wang'wa Adamu uzile itungo nesungamuine.
MAT 24:45 Ite nyenyu numulindie, mutugwa nukele imakala, umukulu wakwe umupee uuhumi kuawa neakole nuto lakwe, nsoko waape indya kumatungo nanonee?
MAT 24:46 Ukembetilwe umitumi nuanso, u Mukulu wakwe ukumuhanga ukitume uu imatungo nuzile.
MAT 24:47 Itai kumuila kena umukulu ukumuika mukela kentu nekakwe.
MAT 24:48 Kuite umutugwa ang'wi mubii ukulunga munkolo akwe, “Mukulu wane watinia,”
MAT 24:49 wandye kuakua eitumi akwe, hange wang'we nukulya palung'wi nuhugala.
MAT 24:50 U Mukulu nua mutugwa nuanso uzile uluhiku numugila ata isigo, numitungu nushuine.
MAT 24:51 U Mukulu wakwe ukumutema ipande ibiili nukumuika mulyoma ling'wi anga asambo, kung'wanso ikole kulila nukusia emino.
MAT 25:1 Uu utemi wakilunde ukipyanigwa neawali nikuminaahole intala yao ekalongola kumupokela ubwana nuawinga.
MAT 25:2 Antaano ao ae apungu nawa neangiza ataano aeaelewa.
MAT 25:3 Eanawali neapungu ekahola intala yao, shanga ekahola emakuta.
MAT 25:4 Hange aenawali awa neaelewa ekahola iseme yao nemakuta palungwi ni ntala yao.
MAT 25:5 Imatungo yayo Ubwana nuawinga naushelewe kupika, ehi akahung'wa tolo ekalala.
MAT 25:6 Lakini utiku wakatekate akakakuta ngwano,''Goza, ubwana nuawinga! Pumi kunzi mumusingeelye.
MAT 25:7 Uu neenso enawali ehi akauka ekakakelya intala yao.
MAT 25:8 Awa neapunga ekaaela awa neelewa, 'Mukongelye esehemu amakuta anyu kunsoko intala yitu yukulima.'
MAT 25:9 Lakini awa neaelewa ekaasukilya ekaaela, 'Kunsoko shanga akutosilye unyenye nusese, kuite longoli kwa awaneegulya miguelye ekeasi kanyu nekemutosilye.
MAT 25:10 Imatungo naalongoe neanso kugula, Ubwana wawinga wekapika, ne matungo naakole tayali aeendile nang'wenso kushelehe awinga, numulango wikalugailwa.
MAT 25:11 Baadae enawali neangiza naapikile ekalunga, ''Bwana, bwana, kulungwile.''
MAT 25:12 Lakini akaasukelya nukulunga,'Etai kumuela, shanga numumanyile.
MAT 25:13 Kuite gozi, kunsoko shangamuihe ematungo luhiku ang'wi saa.
MAT 25:14 Kuite sawa numuntu nautakile kusafili kulongola ihe ngeza aeutangile eatugwa akwe nukuapa ugole wakwe.
MAT 25:15 Ung'wiao wekamupa talanta itaano, uyu numungiza wekamupa ibeele, nuyuite wekamupa eng'wi. Kela ung'wiao aupokee kiasi kulengana nuuwezo wakwe, numuntu nuanso weka safili kulongola yakwe.
MAT 25:16 Mapema uyu naupokee entalanta niitano wikalogola wekaelya, nukutugisa talanta itaano hange.
MAT 25:17 Uu uu nuyu naeupokee italanta nibeele, aeutugizilye ni nzuya ibeele.
MAT 25:18 Lakini umutugwa naeupokee talanta eng'wi, wikalongola yakwe wikahemba ishimu pihe, ite wikamepiha empia ang'wa bwana akwe.
MAT 25:19 Na baada matungo malepu, Ubwana watungwa neanso wekasuka nukuzepelya emaesabu neenso.
MAT 25:20 Umutugwa nuanso nausengeeye italanta niitano auzile wikaleta ningeeza itaano. wikalunga, Bwana, azumpee talanta iitano. Goza napata efaeda atalanta ngiza itaano.
MAT 25:21 Ubwana akwe wikamuila,'' Hongera, mutugwa numuza nuuhueli! Umuhueli kuintu niino. Kuupa emadalaka migulya kuintu niidu. Ingele muiloelyi wang'wa Bwana ako.
MAT 25:22 Umutugwa nausengeye italanta niibeele wekeza nukulunga, Bwana, aumpee talanta ibeele. Goza napata faeda atalanta geza ibeele.
MAT 25:23 Ubwana akwe wekamuela,''Hongeeli mutugwa numuza nuuhueli kumaintu nemakehu. Kuupa emadalaka migulya kumaintu needu. Ingile wiloelye mung'wa Bwana ako.''
MAT 25:24 Baadae umutugwa naupokee etalanta neng'we aewezie wekalunga,''Bwana, nengile kina uewe umuntu mutaki wevuna pang'wanso neshanga uhusekile.
MAT 25:25 Unene nekogopa, nekenda yane nekapiha etalanta akopihe. Goza, ukete hapa nekako.''
MAT 25:26 Lakini ubwana wikamusukilya wekalunga. 'Uewe umutugwa mubee, aulengile kina nekala pang'wanso neshanga ntemee nukuvuna pang'wanso neshanganihusekile.
MAT 25:27 Kuite aeizepie kuapa empia ane entu abenki, nematungo naensukile kung'wane aezemesengelya nane palung'wi nefaeda.
MAT 25:28 Apa muhegelyi etalanta nanso mumupe utugwa nukete talanta nikumi.
MAT 25:29 Kila umuntu nukete nekakwe, okongeligwa ikulu ata ukuzidisheligwa. Lakini kwa uyu nemugila ekentu, ga nekenukete ukuhegeligwa.
MAT 25:30 Mugumi kunzi kukiti umutugwa nuanso neshanga ufaile hange ikutula kelelo nukukelya emino!
MAT 25:31 Ematungo ung'wa Adamu nuekeza nuutukufu wakwe, naealaeka ehi palung'wi nung'wenso, Uu ukikie migulya ituntu lakwe nuutukufu.
MAT 25:32 Indugu yehi ikilingeela ntongeela akwe, nung'wenso ukuabagala eantu. Anga umudemi nuebagula inkolo nimbuli.
MAT 25:33 Ukuieka inkolo mukono wakwe nuwakigoha, ite ukiekaimbuli mokono wankege.
MAT 25:34 Ite umufalme ukuaela awa nea mukono wakegoha, Nzii, nemukembetilwe nu Tata anyi, usali ufalme nauandalewe kunsoko anyu kupuma ukuekwa emesingi au nkumbigulu.
MAT 25:35 Hange aenkete nzala mekampa indya; Ae nemugeni mukankalibisha.
MAT 25:36 Ae nkole kepwe, mekantugala eang'wenda; Ae numulwae mekantunza; Ae nkole muketungo mukangoza!
MAT 25:37 Uu awa neatai akumusukelya nukumuela, Bwana, Nale aekukuine ukete nzala kekakulesa? Ang'wi ukete nyota kekakupe maze? Hange nale nae kukuine umugeni kekaku kalibisha? Ag'wi ukete nyota kekakupa emaze?
MAT 25:38 Ang'wi nale naekukuine umugeni nakekakukalibesha? Hange umugila anga lang, wenda kekakutugala eang'wenda?
MAT 25:39 Ang'wi nale naeumulwae, ang'wi ukole muketungo kekeza kuugoza?
MAT 25:40 Na umufalme ukuasukelya, etai kumuela, naemutendile apaite kung'wi anyandugu ane neanino, aemuntendee nene!
MAT 25:41 Kuite ukuaela awa neakole umukono wakwe nuankege; Hegi kitalane unye nemukete emasatiko, Longoli kumoto nua kulenakale naeuandalewe kunsoko ang'wa shetani neamalaeka akwe;
MAT 25:42 Kunsoko aenkete nzala shanga mekakumpa indya; Ae nkete nyota shanga kekakupa emaze;
MAT 25:43 Ae nemugeni shanga mekankalibisha; Ae nkolekepwe shanga mekampa eang'wenda; Ae nemulwae ae ntungilwe kuite shanga mekangoza.
MAT 25:44 Au nawa neanso aku musukelwa nukulunga, Bwana nale naekukuine ukete nzala ang'wi nyota, ang'wi umugeni, ang'wi ukepwe ang'wi umulwae, ang'wiutungilwe, shanga kekakuhudumela?
MAT 25:45 Ite ukuasukelya nukulunga,''Etai kumuela, eke neshanga aemuatendee awa neanino, shangaae muntendee anga nene.
MAT 25:46 Awaite inzu kuazabu akale nakale kuite awa neatai upanga wakale na kale.''
MAT 26:1 Imatungo u Yesu naumaile kutambula inkani yehi niyanso, akaaela eamanyisigwa akwe,
MAT 26:2 “Mulengile kina baada amahiku abeele kuutula nesikukuu, nung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukupumigwa kuite wasulubiwe.”
MAT 26:3 Baadaye eakulu amakuhani neanyampala neantu aeatankanile palung'wi pakate pamakao ang'wa kuhani numukulu, naewitangwa Kayafa.
MAT 26:4 Kwa palung'wi ekupanga enjama akumuamba u Yesu kwa unkunku nukumubulaga.
MAT 26:5 Kunsoko aalungile, “Ileke kutula matungo asikukuu, kuite ilekekuleta eghasia pakatekate aantu.”
MAT 26:6 Imatungo u Yesu naukole ku Bethania munyumba ang'wa Simoni umukoma,
MAT 26:7 naukole ukionyesha pameza, musungu ung'wi aewezile kitalakwe aukenkile mukebe nuwa alabasta naekete imakukuta naake ethama nkulu, na aeumahunuie migulya mitwe lakwe.
MAT 26:8 Lakini eamanyisigwa akwe naaine ikani eleite, aabepewa nukulunga, “Kunsokoke easala eyeite?
MAT 26:9 Ayaite ahumekile aguligwe kukeasi kekolo nukupegwa eaula.”
MAT 26:10 Lakini u Yesu kunsoko aaulengile eleite, wekaaela. “Kuneke mukumusumbula umusungu uyuite? Witumile kentu kezakung'wane.
MAT 26:11 Eaula mukete mahiku ehi, lakini shangamukutula mukole nunene mahiku ehi.
MAT 26:12 Kunsoko nauhunue imakuta mitwe lane aya migulya wa mwele wane, aewitumile ite kunsoko ukuekwa kung'wane.
MAT 26:13 Kutai kumuela, pehi ulukani ulu nulekatambulwa pakate aunkumbigulu wehi, eketendo nukitumile umusungu uyuite, hange kekutambulwa kunsoko akumbukumbu.”
MAT 26:14 Kuite ung'wiao nua awa nekumi nambele, naewitangwa Yuda Iskariote, akenda kwa akulu amakuhani,
MAT 26:15 nukulunga “Mukumpa ntuni anganumusaliti?” Akamupimela u Yuda ipande thelathini niyampia.
MAT 26:16 Hange imatungo yayo wekaduma enafasi akumusaliti.
MAT 26:17 Hata uluhiku lang'wando nuamekate neshanga eekewe igae, eamanyisigwa akwe aeendile kung'wa Yesu nukulunga, Pe nutakile kukuandaelye ulye indya ya Pasaka?”
MAT 26:18 Wekaaela, Longoli kumujini kumuntu fulani namueli, Ung'walimu ukulunga, “Ematungo ane ahumbeela kumetimelya epasaka palung'wi neamanyisigwa ane, pakate panyumbako.”
MAT 26:19 Emanyisigwa akituma anga u Yesu naualageye, na andae indya ya Pasaka.
MAT 26:20 Naeipikile mpende, aewikie kulya indya palung'wi neamanyigwa kumi nambeele.
MAT 26:21 Naakulya indya, wikalunga, “Etai kumuela ung'wi anyu ukunisaliti.”
MAT 26:22 Ekapyenenkela kule, kila ung'wiao akandya kumukolya, “Ite shanganene Mukulu?”
MAT 26:23 Akaasukilya, “Uyu nukutala umukono wakwe palung'wi nunene mukate mibakuli yuyo ukunisaliti.
MAT 26:24 Ung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukuhega, anga naeyandekilwe. Lakini isateko lakwe umuntu nuekamusaliti ung'wana wang'wa Adamu! Azetula tazu kumuntu nuanso angae waleke kutugwa.”
MAT 26:25 U Yuda, nae uzemusaliti wikalunga, ite nene Labi? U Yesu wekamuila, “Ukutambula ulukani nulanso uewe.”
MAT 26:26 Naatuile ukulya indya, u Yesu wikauhola umukate, akaukembeta, nukuega. Wikaapa eamanyisigwa akwe nukulunga, “Holi, mulye. Uwu wuwu mweele waane.”
MAT 26:27 Wekahola ekekombe nukukembeta, akaapa nukulunga, “Wing'wi mehi kuekeite.
MAT 26:28 Kunsoko uyu sakami wane nuilago lane, nekuhunulwa kwa ehi kumusamaha waanyamendu.
MAT 26:29 Lakini kumuela, shangakung'wa hange inkali yamezabibu uwaie, hadi uluhiku ulo nenzeng'wa nepya palung'wi nunyenye pakate autemi wang'wa Tata ane.”
MAT 26:30 Nakondilye kemba uwembo, ekapuma ekalongola kumulema wa Mizeituni.
MAT 26:31 Hange u Yesu wikaaela, “Utiku wuwu mehi mukukumpa kunso ane, kunsoko yandekilwe, kumukua umudemi wikundi lankolo ninyenso ikusambaela.
MAT 26:32 Lakini baada akuiuka kung'wane, kumutongela kulongola ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:33 Lakini u Petelo wikamuila, “Hata anga ehi akuhite kunsoko amakani nakuhanga, nakuupata, unene shanga kuhita.
MAT 26:34 U Yesu wikamusukelya, “Etai kuela, utiku wuwu kabla ujogoo wakunkule, ukunihita nkua itaatu.”
MAT 26:35 U Petelo wikamuela, “hata kina impasile kusha nuewe, singa kuuhita.” Neamanyisigwa neangeza ehi ekalunga uu, uu.
MAT 26:36 Baadaye u Yesu wikalongola neenso pang'wenso niitangwa Gethsemane nawikaaela eamanyisigwa akwe, “Ikie hapa ematungo neninzu uko kulompa.”
MAT 26:37 Akamuhola u Petelo neana abeele neang'wa Zebedayo na wikandya kupyenenkela nukusononeka.
MAT 26:38 Hange wikaaela, “Enkolone ekete kenyauwai kekulu kule ata ekeasi kakusha. Sagi hapa mukeshe palung'wi nunene.”
MAT 26:39 Wekalongola kuntongela inino, wikagwa kifudifudi, nukulompa. Wikalunga, “Tata ane, peza iwezekanile, ekekombe ekeite kenkwepe. Iteke kutula anga nentakile unene, hange kina nutakile uewe.”
MAT 26:40 Akaahanga eamanyisigwa wekaahanga alala tulo, kunso emiho aemalito.
MAT 26:41 Keshi nukulompa kunso mulekekingila mumagemo. Inkolo akole radhi, lakini umweele udhaifu.
MAT 26:42 Akalongola yakwe nkua akabeele nukulompa, akalunga, “Tata ane kina ulukani ulu shangaiwezekanile kulekwepa lazima nukeng'we ekekombe ekeite, emapenzi ako atimele.”
MAT 26:43 Wekasuka hange wikahanga alala tulo, kunsoko emiho ao ae malito.
MAT 26:44 Kuite wikaaleka hange wekalongola yakwe. Akalompa enkua akatuatu inkani zizo zizo.
MAT 26:45 Baadaye u Yesu wekaahanga eamanyisigwa akwe nukuaela, “Kele mukie ne nukusupya? Gozi ematungo ahumbeela, nung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukusalitiwa mumekono aanyamelandu.
MAT 26:46 Uki kuhege. Gozi uyuite nung'wenso nukunsaliti wahugela.”
MAT 26:47 Ematungo naukele ukuligitya, u Yuda ung'wi wa awa nenkumi na mbeele, akapika. Lulili lukulu lukapika palung'wi nung'wenso anga lepumele kwa akulu amakuhani neanyampala neantu. Ae azile nimpanga niidunkuli.
MAT 26:48 Hange umuntu naeudee kumusaliti u Yesu auapee eshala, akalunga, “Uyu nenekamulungela, ng'wenso muambi.”
MAT 26:49 Imatungo yayo wekiza kung'wa Yesu nukulunga, “Na wikamulungela.
MAT 26:50 U Yesu wikamuila, “Muhumba meane itume ele nelekutile uu akeza, nukumugoolela emekono u Yesu, nukumuamba.
MAT 26:51 Goza, muntu ung'wi naukole palung'wi nu Yesu, wikagoola umukono wakwe, wikahopola upanga wakwe, na wikamukua umitumi wang'wa kuhani numukulu, nukumuamba ukutwe wakwe.
MAT 26:52 Uu Yesu wikamuila, susha upanga wako pana aza uhoe, kunsoko ehi neetumila upanga akuangamizigwa kwa upanga.
MAT 26:53 Ite mulungile shanganihumilene kumitanga u Tata ane, nung'wenso ukuntumela emajeshi zaidi akumi na mbeele na amalaeka?
MAT 26:54 Lakini ite emaandiko awazekanile kutimeligwa, kuite uu ipasilwe kupumila?
MAT 26:55 Imatungo yayo u Yesu wikauela umilundo, “Ite mezile nemapanga neidunkuli kumamba kina uyu nuehegelanya? Kila imahiku aenikie mihekalu nukumumanyisa nashangaemumambile!
MAT 26:56 Lakini ayaite ehe itumilwe ite emaandiko anyakedagu atimile. “Uu emanyisigwa akwe ekamuleka nukumanka.
MAT 26:57 Awa naamuambile u Yesu akamutala kung'wa Kayafa, u Kuhani nu mukulu pang'wanso eaandeki neanyampala aeilingie palung'wi.
MAT 26:58 Kuite u Petelo aiumutyatile kunyuma kukuli kupikila mu itando nilang'wa Kuhani u Mukulu. Ai wingie mukate nukikie palung'wi nienso wihenga mukikapumila.
MAT 26:59 Kuite eakulu amakuhani nebalaza lehi aeakuduma ushahidi wauteele dhidi ang'wa Yesu kunsoko ahume kumubulaga.
MAT 26:60 Kuite apumie amashaidi eedu, lakini shanga ekalija anga lukani lehi. Lakini baadaye eamashahidi abeele ekapumila pantongela.
MAT 26:61 nu kulunga, “Umuntu uyu aulungile, “Mbezile kuunanga ihekalu lang'wi Tunda nukulezenga kwa mahiku atatu.”
MAT 26:62 Ukuhani numukulu akimeka wikamukolya, “Shanga uhumilene kusukilya?
MAT 26:63 Lakini u Yesu aewikie ukilagilye ihetwe. Ukuhani numukulu wikamuela, “Anga Itunda nuikie kuamulu ukuele, kang'wi uwe wi Kilisto ng'wana wa Itunda.
MAT 26:64 U Yesu wikamusukilya, “Uwe utambue ulukani nulanso. Lakini kuela kupuma itungele nukendelea ukumuona ung'wana wang'wa Adamu wikie umukono wakulela nuukete ingulu na wikeza na malunde kigulu.”
MAT 26:65 Uu gwa u Kuhani nu Mukulu wekatamulanga eng'wenda akwe nukulunga, “Wakufulu! Ite, kutakile hange ushahidi wantuni? Goza, uu wimeka ukukufulu.
MAT 26:66 Ite mukusega ntuni? Ekamusukilya nukulunga, “Ugombigwe washe.”
MAT 26:67 Hange ekamutye emate muusu nukumukua enkunde, nukumukua emakopi kumekono ao,
MAT 26:68 nukulunga, “Wewe uewe Kilisto. Nyenyu nukukuile?
MAT 26:69 Ematungo nanso u Petelo aewikie kunzi pakate aukumbi numitumi nuakesungu wikamuhenga nukulunga, Newe ga aeukole palung'wi nu Yesu wa Galilaya.”
MAT 26:70 Lakini wekahita ntongeele ao ehi, wikalunga, singa nengile ekeite nemukutambula.”
MAT 26:71 Nae ulongoe kunzi amulango, umitumi mungiza nuakesungu wakamuona nukumuela naakole pang'wanso, “Umuntu uyu aliakoli nu Yesu wa Nazareti.”
MAT 26:72 Wikahita hange kwakulapa, “Unene shanga numumanyile umuntu uyuite.”
MAT 26:73 Ematungo makupe baadaye, awa naeimekile pakupe, ekameendela u Petelo nukulunga, “Kutai nuewe ga wiang'weao, kunsoko ata lafudhi ako ekuonyesha.”
MAT 26:74 Uu wikanza kuapa emasateko, “Unene shanga numumanyile umuntu uyuite” kuite ujogoo wekakunkula.
MAT 26:75 U Petelo wekakumbuka inkani nauewe nu Yesu, “Kabla ujogoo wekakunkula wakunihita nkua itatu.”
MAT 27:1 Ematungo ekedaudau naapikile, eakulu ehi neamakuhani neanyampala aantu aalie njama dhidi ang'wa Yesu ahume kumubulaga.
MAT 27:2 Aamutungile, aeamutongee, ekamupisha kung'wa Liwali Pilato.
MAT 27:3 Hange ematungo ang'wa Yuda, naeumusalitile, auinekina u Yesu wahukumilwa wikaambwa masego wekasusha epande thelathini niya mpia kwa akulu neamakuhani neanyampala.
MAT 27:4 Wikalunga, “Nituma melandu kumesaliti usakami nengila anga mulandu.” Lakini ekamusukelya, “Akuhusile ntuni? Magoze nanso uewe.”
MAT 27:5 Hange wikaguma pihe ipande nianso nesalani niya mpia mihekalu, wekahega yakwe wekigoga ung'wenso.
MAT 27:6 Umukulu wa Makuhani wekaihola ipande niyanso neampia nukulunga, “Singa inonene kuieka impia iziite muhazina, kunsoko agalama asakami.”
MAT 27:7 Ekikolya kwa palung'wi empia ekutumeka kuguila umugunda nelamufinyanzi nelakiieka eageni.
MAT 27:8 Kunsoko eyeite umugunda nuanso ukitangwa, “Mugunda wa sakami” ata elelo yeye.
MAT 27:9 Hange ulukani naelutambuwe numunyakedagu u Yeremia lekatimila, kulunga, “Aeatumie ipande salasini niya mpia, egalama naepangilwe neantu a Israeli kunsoko akwe,
MAT 27:10 na ae ametumie kumugunda wamufinyanzi, kina Mukulu naeundagie.”
MAT 27:11 Imatungo yayo u Yesu wekimika ntongeela ang'wa liwali nuliwali wakamukolya, “Ite uewe umutawala wa Ayahudine? U Yesu wikamusukelya, “Wewe ulungile ite.”
MAT 27:12 Lakini ematungo nae usemewe neakulu amakahani neanyampala, shanga aeusukeye lehi.
MAT 27:13 Hange u Pilato wekamuila, “Shangawigule anga mashitaka ehi kung'wako?”
MAT 27:14 Lakini singa aeumusukeye ata ulukani nulung'wi, kuite uliwali wakizula uwoa.
MAT 27:15 Kumatungo na sikukuu ae desituli aa liwali kumutungula umutungwa ung'wi nusaguwe numilundo.
MAT 27:16 Ematungo nanso aeakete mutungwa ung'wi sugu elina lakwe Balaba.
MAT 27:17 Kuite imatungo naeatuile kilundela palung'wi, u Pilato wekaakolya, “Nyenyu nemutakile kumutungule kunso anyu?” Balaba ang'wi Yesu nukitangwa Kilisto?”
MAT 27:18 Kunsoko aeuine kina amuamba kunsoko amubepewe.
MAT 27:19 Imatungo naeakoli ikie mituntu la ulamuli, umusungu wakamutumela lukani nukulunga, “Lekakituma lukani lehi kumuntu uyuite numugila anga ubee, kuite nsumbukile ikulu eleleye mundoti kunsoko akwe.”
MAT 27:20 Uu eakulu amakuhani neanyampala aashawishilye emakutano amulompe u Balaba, nu Yesu abulagwe.
MAT 27:21 U Liwali aiuwakoiye, “Nu uli kati a abiili muloilwe unene numulekele kitalanyu?” Ailigitilye “Balaba.”
MAT 27:22 U Pilato wikaaela, “Numutendele ntuni u Yesu nukitangwa Kilisto?” Ehi ekasukelya “Msulibishe.”
MAT 27:23 Nung'wenso wikalunga, “Kuneke ikosake nuitumile? Lakini aeazidilye kukulya induli yao migulya ikulu, “Musulubishe.”
MAT 27:24 Kuite imatungo u Pilato auine shangauwezilye kituma lukani lehi, lakini badalakwe efujo ekanza, wikahola emaze wekakaala emekono akwe ntongeela amilundo, nukulunga, “Unene numugila anga ubee kusakami wa muntu uyuite numugila ubee. Magozi ayaite unyenye.”
MAT 27:25 Antu ehi ekalunga, “Usakami akwe watule migulya itu neana itu.”
MAT 27:26 Hange wikamutungwila u Balaba kung'wao, lakini aeumukuile emesheleti u Yesu wekamukabidhi kung'wao alongole amusulubishe.
MAT 27:27 Hange easkale ang'wa liwali akamuhola u Yesu mpaka Praitorio numilundo nuamaskali ehi ekilundeela.
MAT 27:28 Akamutugula eang'wenda akwe nukumutugala ung'wenda nualangi nkuuku.
MAT 27:29 Hange akazepya etaji amija nukumueka migulya itwe lakwe, na amuekeye mwanzi kumukono wakwe nuakegoha. Aeakuieli imalu ao pihe ntongela akwe nukumuhonda ekalunga, “Salamu, Mutemi wa a Yahudi?”
MAT 27:30 Na amutyie emate, na aeahoile umuanzi ekamukua kitwe.
MAT 27:31 Ematungo naeakumugema, ukumutugula ung'wenda nuanso ekamutugala eang'wenda akwe, ekamulongolya kenda kumusulubisha.
MAT 27:32 Naapumile kunzi, ekamuona muntu aeupumie ku Krene elina lakwe Simeoni, hange amulazimishilye kenda nenso kuite aukenke umusalaba wakwe.
MAT 27:33 Naeapikile pang'wanso niitangwa Goligota, endogoelyo akwe ieneo li fuvu litwe.”
MAT 27:34 Amupee esiki nehangigwe nenyongo wang'we. Lakini naeumionzile, shanga wikaweza kumeng'wa.
MAT 27:35 Imatungo naamusulubishilye, ae agalanile e ang'wenda akwe kwa kuikuela kula.
MAT 27:36 Na aeikie kwa kumugoza.
MAT 27:37 Migulya mitwe lakwe aaekile mashitaka akwe ekasomeka, “Uyuite Yesu, mutemi a Wayahudi.”
MAT 27:38 Ee nyang'anyi abeele ekasulubiwa palung'we nung'wenso, ung'wi mukono wakulela ung'wi mukono wankege.
MAT 27:39 Awa naakeile ekamutanela, ekaze hingisa ematwe ao,
MAT 27:40 nukulunga, “Uewe wewe nautakile kulizepya ihekalu nukulezenga kwa nsiku itatu, iokoe uewe! Angiza wang'wa Itunda, sima pihe uhege pa msalaba!”
MAT 27:41 Kumatungo ehali yeyo yeyo ekulu a makuhani aeakumukashifu, palung'wi neaandeki neanyampala, nukulunga,
MAT 27:42 “Aeuaokoe neangiza, lakini shangauwezilye kiokoa ung'wenso. Nuanso Mutemi wa Ayahudi. Nuasime pihe kupuma mumusalaba, kunso aulungile, unene neng'wa Itunda kuite kumuhuela.
MAT 27:43 Aeumuhue Itunda. Leki Tunda wamuokoe angeza utakile kunsoko aeulungile, “Unene neng'wana wang'wa Itunda.”
MAT 27:44 Nawoite enyanyanyi namusulubishilye palung'wi nung'wenso ga atambue makani akumudhihaki.
MAT 27:45 Imatungo yayo nasaa sita ikatula kiti mihe ehi mpaka esaa tisa.
MAT 27:46 Naepikile esaa tisa, u Yesu wikalela kusauti nenkulu, “Eloi, Eloi, Lama thabakithani?” wikamaanisha “Itunda ane, Itunda ane, mbona wandeka?”
MAT 27:47 Ematungo nanso ang'we ao aeimekile pang'wanso aigulye, ekalunga, Ukumitanga Eliya.”
MAT 27:48 Akamanka ung'wi kuhola sifongo nukizulya ekinywaji nekelulu, ekameeka migulya mumute ekamupa wang'we.
MAT 27:49 Nao nasagile ekalunga, “Muleki wing'wene, leki kuone kina u Eliya weze muguna.”
MAT 27:50 U Yesu wikalela hange kwa luli nulukulu wekameheja enkolo akwe.
MAT 27:51 Goza, Ipazia li itekeelo ailitamukile nkika ibeele kupumila migulya kupikiila pihi. Ni ihi ikakagaka ni matalagwe ikatamuka ipande.
MAT 27:52 Emakabuli akaluguka nemeele atakatifu edu nualae utulo akioka.
MAT 27:53 Ekapuma mumakabuli baada aa uiuki wakwe, ekingila mumuji nuutakatifu ekigeeleka edu.
MAT 27:54 Uakida nuanso nawa naamugozee u Yesu ekaona itetemeko nemakani naakupumela, ekisula uwoa kule nukulunga, “Etai uyu aeng'wana wang'wi Tunda.” Ekagoza kupuma kule.
MAT 27:55 Aasungu edu amutyatile u Yesu kupuma ku Galilaya ahume kumuhudumela akoeakole pang'wanso ekagozeela kupuma kule.
MAT 27:56 Mukatekate ao aeukole u Mariamu Magdalena, Mariamu mama akwe Yakobo nu Joseph, nu mama waana ang'wa Zebedayo.
MAT 27:57 Naepikile mpende awezile muntu mugole kupuma Arimathaya, nae witangwa Yusufu, kuite nuyu nuanso aemumanyisigwa wang'wa Yesu.
MAT 27:58 Aewendile kung'wa Pilato wekalompa umeele wang'wa Yesu. Kuite u Pilato wekalagelya apegwe.
MAT 27:59 U Yusufu wekauhola umweele akautunga ung'wenda numuza,
MAT 27:60 wekaulalesha mikabuli nipya naeulezepilye wekalechonga mumwamba.
MAT 27:61 U Mariamu Magdalena nu Mariamu numungiza akole hapo aeikie kugozela ikabuli.
MAT 27:62 Uluhiku nautyatie kina uluhiku nula maandalio, e akulu amakuhani ne Mafarisayo aeilingee palung'wi kung'wa Pilato.
MAT 27:63 Ekamuela, “Mukulu kukembukile kina imatungo nuanso numudanganyifu naeukele ukole mupanga, aulungile, Baada amahiku atatu ukiioka hange.
MAT 27:64 Kululo lagilya kina ikabuli lelindwe salama mpaka uluhiku lakatatu. Kuite, eamanyisigwa akwe awezilye kezakumia nukulunga kuantu, “Wioka kupuma mwaashi. Nuudanganyifu wamwisho ukutula ubee kukela naakwanza.
MAT 27:65 U Pilato wekaaela, “Holi ealinzi. Longoli mitume muhali ausalama pamuwezeye.”
MAT 27:66 Kuite akalongola nukituma pikabuli kutula usalama ukole, igwe lekagongwa umuhuli nukueka ealinzi.
MAT 28:1 Baadaye empende uluhiku la Sabato, elyoa naelakapuma kuhumbela luhiku lang'wandyo nulijuma, Mariamu Magdalena, nu Mariamu numungeza azele kulegoza ikabuli.
MAT 28:2 Goza aelekole itetemeko ikulu, kunsoko umalaeka wang'wa Mukulu ausimile wekalepingilitya igwe, hange wekikaela.
MAT 28:3 Esula akwe ae ehanganga umeme, neang'wenda akwe ae elu anga etheluji.
MAT 28:4 Ealinzi neanso ekizula uwoa ekatu anga eashi.
MAT 28:5 Umalaeka nuanso wekaalengasa easungu neanso wekalunga,'' lekikogopi kondogoelye mine kina mukumuduma Yesu, nausubiwe.
MAT 28:6 Ukutile apaite, Lakini wioka anga naeumuie. Pembyi muone Ubwana pana aulae.
MAT 28:7 Longoli halaka muaele emanyisigwa akwe, wiuka kupuma mwashi, goza wamutongeela ku Galilaya. Kung'wanso kukomukumuona. Gozi unene namuela.''
MAT 28:8 Easungu neanso ekahega pang'wanso pikabuli halaka ekaze akete uwoa ao niloeligwi ikulu, hange ekamanka kuaela eamanyisigwa akwe.
MAT 28:9 Goza U Yesu wikatankana neenso nukulunga,''Salamu,'' Easunguneanso aeazile ekaamba emegulu akwe, hage ekamukulya.
MAT 28:10 Ite U Yesu wekaaela,'' lekikogopi, Longoli muaele eanya ndugu akwe atongele Kugalilaya. Kung'wanso akumona.''
MAT 28:11 Ematungo nanso easungu naalongoe, goza baadhi aalinzekenda kumujini nukuaela aekulu amkuhani emakani ehinaapumie.
MAT 28:12 Emakuhani naatankanile neanyampala kikoelya emakani nanso palug'wi neenso, Aeapumilye keasi kekulu nekampia kwa alinzi neanso.
MAT 28:13 Ekaaela,'' Aeli neangiza ite, Eamanyisigwa ang'wa Yesu aeazile utiku ekia umweele wang'wa Yesu imatungo usese azakulae.
MAT 28:14 Hange etaalifa eye angemupikile uliwali, usese kuumushawishi nukumuhegelya unyenye emashaka ehi.''
MAT 28:15 Kuite easkali neanso ekaihola impia ninyanso nukituma anga naalagewe. Impola izi ikenela kule kwa ayahundi nayatuile uu mpaka elelo.
MAT 28:16 Lakini ametume neanso kumi na moja ekalongola ku Galilaya, kumulema nuanso naualagie.
MAT 28:17 Neenso namuine, ekamukulya, lakini baadhi ao ekakisha.
MAT 28:18 U Yesu wekeza kung'waao wekaaela wekalunga,'' Mpewe uhumi wehi muunkumbigulu nukilunde.
MAT 28:19 Kuite longoli muaifanye indugu yehi itule amanyisigwa ane. Abadisi kulina lang'wa Tata. nele nela ng'wana nu ng'wa ung'welu.
MAT 28:20 Amanyisi kumaamba emakani ehi naenumuie, Goza unenkole palung'wi nunyenye mahiku ehi. mpaka empelo aunkumbigulu.
MAR 1:1 Uwu ingi ng'wandyo nua nkani ninza niang'wa Yesu Kristo, Ng'wana wang'wa Itunda.
MAR 1:2 Anga ni ikilisigwe nu munyakidagu uIsaya, “Gozeela, kumulagiilya u mutung'wa nuane ntongeela ako, ung'wi nuikazipiilya i nzila niako.
MAR 1:3 Luli nula muntu nuitangaa mihaka, “Mikondeelyi i nzila a Mukulu; Igooli i nzila niakwe.”
MAR 1:4 uYohana ai uzile, wazoja mihaka nu kutanantya wogigwa nua kila itunu ku ulekelwa nua milandu.
MAR 1:5 Ihi ihi a ku Yudea ni antu ihi nia ku Yerusalemu ai alongoe kitalakwe. Ai atulaa akogigwa nu ng'wenso mu mongo nua Yordani, aze ila itunu ku milandu ao.
MAR 1:6 uYohana ai watulaa utugae ng'wenda nua mauli a ngamia nu mukoha nua ndili mu kilino nikakwe, hangi ai watulaa ukulya ngaga nu uki nua mihaka.
MAR 1:7 Ai utanantilye nu kuligitya, “Ukoli ung'wi upembilye ze yakilaa unene munya ngulu ikolo kukila unene, hangi nimugila u unoneli ga nu kutuna pihi nu kutungula i mikoha a ilatu niakwe.
MAR 1:8 Unene ai numogilye ku mazi, kuiti nuanso ukumoja unyenye ku Ng'wau Ng'welu.”
MAR 1:9 Ai ipumie mu mahiku nanso kina uYesu ai uzile kupuma ku Nazareti a ku Galilaya, hangi ai wogigwe nu Yohana mu mongo nua Yordani.
MAR 1:10 Itungo uYesu nai uhumbukile kupuma mu mazi, ai wihengile ilunde ligalanukile ng'walyi nu Ng'wau Ng'welu ukusima pihi migulya akwe anga i nkunda.
MAR 1:11 Nu luli ai lupumiie milunde, “ Uewe ingi Ng'wana nuane mulowa, Ndoeigwe nangaluu nu ewe.”
MAR 1:12 Uugwa nkua ing'wi u Ng'wau Ng'welu akamusinja kulongola mihaka.
MAR 1:13 Ai ukoli mihaka mahiku makumi anne, wazegeng'wa nu Mulugu, Ai watulaa palung'wi ni ikali nia mihaka, nia malaika ai amuaiiye.
MAR 1:14 Itungili ze yakilaa uYohana kuambwa, uYesu ai uzile ku Galilaya wazetanantya inkani ninza niang'wa Itunda,
MAR 1:15 wazeligitya, “Itungo lakondaniila, nu utemi nuang'wa Itunda wahumbeela. Ili itunu nu kuhuiila mu nkani ninza.”
MAR 1:16 Hangi wazekila mu mpelo a luzi nula Galilaya, ai umihengile uSimioni nu Andrea muluna wang'wa Simioni azegumila i nyavu niao mu luzi, kunsoko ai atulaa avua nsamaki.
MAR 1:17 uYesu ai uatambuie, “Pembyi, ntyati, hangi kumuzipya avua antu.”
MAR 1:18 Ni nkua ing'wi ai alekile i nyavu hangi akamutyata.
MAR 1:19 Itungo uYesu naiwagenda kahelu iniino, ai umihengile uYakobo ng'wana wang'wa Zebedayo nu Yohana muluna nuakwe; ai atulaa mi ilinga akuzipya nyavu.
MAR 1:20 Katungo akaitanga ni enso ai amulekile u tata nuao uZebedayo mukati ilinga ni anyamulimo nia kugulwa, akamutyata.
MAR 1:21 Nai akapika ku Kapernaumu, luhiku nula kusupya, uYesu ai wingie mi itekeelo nu kumanyisa.
MAR 1:22 Aka ukuilwa u umanyisa nuakwe. ku iti ai watulaa ukuamanyisa anga muntu naiza ukete uhumi hangi shanga anga amanyi.
MAR 1:23 Itungo lilo liilo ai ukoli nu muntu mi itekeelo nilao nai ukete nu hing'wi, hangi ai uzogooye,
MAR 1:24 wazeligitya, “Kukete ntuni nika kituma nu ewe, Yesu nua ku Nazereti? Uzile ku ulimilya? Nukulingile wi nyenyu. U ewe ingi Ng'welu wing'wene nuang'wa Itunda!”
MAR 1:25 uYesu ai umukenee u hing'wi nu kuligitya, “Kilaga hangi upume mukati akwe!”
MAR 1:26 Nu hing'wi ai umugwisilye pihi hangi akapuma kitalakwe itungo wazelila ku luli nula migulya.
MAR 1:27 Ni antu ihi ai akuiwe, iti gwa akikolya kila ung'wi, “iki ingi ntuni? Umanyisa ugeni ukete uhumi? Ga nukulagiilya ia hing'wi nienso aku mukulya!”
MAR 1:28 Nu lukani kutula ng'wenso nkua ing'wi lukasapatila kila kianza mukati a mukoa wihi nua Galilaya
MAR 1:29 Hangi nkua ing'wi ze yakilaa kupuma kunzi itekeelo, ai ingi mi ito nilang'wa Simioni nu Andrea aze akoli nu Yakobo nu Yohana.
MAR 1:30 Itungili mukwingwa nuang'wa Simioni ai watula ulae mulwae, ni nkua ing'wi ai amutambuie uYesu inkani niakwe.
MAR 1:31 Iti gwa ai uzile, ai umuambile ku mukono, nu kumunyansula migulya; ulwae ukahega kitalakwe, hangi wakandya ku a aiilya.
MAR 1:32 Mpindi nanso itungo ilyoa lakondya kulimila, ai amuletee kitalakwe ihi nai atulaa alwae, ang'wi nai akete i ahing'wi.
MAR 1:33 Kisali kihi ai kilingiie palung'wi pa mulango.
MAR 1:34 Ai uagunile idu nai atulaa alwae a kila ulwae nu kupumya ahing'wi idu, ila shanga ai ulekee hing'wi kuligitya ku nsoko ai amulingile.
MAR 1:35 Ai u ukile dau maniabwa, itungo nai ikili kiti; ai uhegile nu kulongola nkika a kinkunku nu kulompa kuko.
MAR 1:36 uSimioni ni ihi nai atulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso ai amudumile.
MAR 1:37 Ai amuligilye hangi akamutambuila, “Kila ung'wi uku uduma”
MAR 1:38 Ai uatambuie, “Kwini kianza kingiiza, kunzi mu isali ni ipilimikiiye, iti nihume kutanantya nuko ga. Yiyo nsoko aza nzile apa.”
MAR 1:39 Ai ulongoe waze ukiie i Galilaya ihi, waze tanantya mu matekeelo ao nu kuapatya ia hing'wi.
MAR 1:40 Munya mbili ung'wi ai uzile kitalakwe. Ai watulaa ukumusinja; ai utugamile nu kumutambuila, “Anga ize uloilwe, uhumile kunzipya ntule ni muza.”
MAR 1:41 Waze usuntilwe ni kinya uwai, uYesu ai ugooe u mukono nuakwe nu kumuamba, akamuila, “Ndoilwe, Utule u muza.”
MAR 1:42 Itungo ling'wi i mbili ikamupuma, hangi ai uzipigwe kutula muza.
MAR 1:43 uYesu akamukania itaki nu kumuila walongole itungo ling'wi.
MAR 1:44 Ai umutambuie, “Kendegeela shanga uligitilye lukani ku wihi, kuiti longola, wiambye kung'wa kuhani, hangi upumye isongelyo ku nsoko a weligwa naiza uMusa ai ulagiiye, anga ukuiili kitalao.”
MAR 1:45 Kuiti ai ulongoe nu kandya kumutambula kila ung'wi nu kenelya u lukani ikilo ga nu Yesu shanga ai uhumile hangi kingila mu kisali ku ulyuuku. Iti gwa ai wikiie kianza nika kinkunku ni antu ai azile kitalakwe kupuma kila nkika.
MAR 2:1 Nai usukile ku Kapernaumu ze yakilaa mahiku masheenyu, ai ikumukile kina ai ukoli mi ito.
MAR 2:2 Antu idu nangaluu ai atulaa ilundiie pang'wanso hangi shanga ai limoli i lyoma hangi, ga nilo nila pa mulango, nu Yesu ai uligitilye lukan kitalao.
MAR 2:3 Uugwa ang'wi a antu ai azile kitalakwe nai amuletile muntu nai watulaa ukule igandi; antu anne ai atulaa amukenkile.
MAR 2:4 Itungo nai alemilwe kumuhumbeela kunsoko a iubi nila antu, ai agumue migulya a kianza pang'wanso nai ukoli. Hangi nai atula akondyaa kutobola ibolomyo, ai asimilye u ulili naiza u muntu nai ukule igandi ai watulaa ulae.
MAR 2:5 Nai wihengile u uhuiili nuao, uYesu ai umutambuie u muntu nai ukule igandi, “ng'waane, i milandu ako alekelwa.”
MAR 2:6 Kuiti ang'wi ao a amanyi awo nai akoli ikie pang'wanso ai ikoiye mu nkolo niao.
MAR 2:7 “Uhumile uli u muntu uyu kuligiya iti? Uku kuna! Nyenyu nuihuma kulekela i milandu kwaala Itunda wing'wene duu?”
MAR 2:8 Itngo uYesu nai ulingile mu nkolo akwe nai atulaa akusiga mukati ao akola. Ai ua tambuie, “Ku niki mukusiga iti mu nkolo nianyu?
MAR 2:9 Ni liuli ni ipepeele ikilo kuligitya ku muntu nu kule igandi, 'Milandu ako alekelwaa' ang'wi kuligitya 'imike, hola u ulili nuako, hangi uende?'
MAR 2:10 Kuiti iti alije kulinga kutula u Ng'wana nuang'wa Adamu ukete u humi nua kulekela i milandu mi ihi, ai umutambuie uyo nai ukule igandi.
MAR 2:11 “Nukutambuie u ewe, nyansuka, hola u mukeka nuako, hangi ulongole kito nilako.”
MAR 2:12 Ai wimikile hangi nkua ing'wi akahola u mukeka nuakwe, hangi ai ulongoe kunzi a numba ntongeela a kila muntu, iti ihi ai akuiwe hangi akaminkiilya Itunda ikulyo, hangi akaligitya “Nangaluu, kukili kaya kihenga ikani anga ili.”
MAR 2:13 Ai ulongoe hangi mpelo a luzi, ni iumbi lihi nila antu ai azile kitalakwe, hangi waka amanyisa.
MAR 2:14 Nai watula ukukila ai umihengile uLawi ng'wana wang'wa Alfayo wikie mu nkika a kuhanguilya i kodi hangi akamuila, “Ntyate.” Ai wimikile nu kumutyata.
MAR 2:15 Hangi itungo uYesu nai watulaa ukulya indya mu nyumba ang'wa Lawi, ahangulya kodi idu ni antu niakete i milandu ai atulaa akulya nu Yesu ni amanyisigwa akwe, ku nsoko ai atulaa idu ni enso ai amutyatile.
MAR 2:16 Itungo i amanyi, naza atulaa Afarisayo, nai akihenga kina uYesu ukulya ni antu anya milandu ni ahangulya kodi, ai a atambuie i amanyisigwa akwe, “Ku niki ukulya ni ahangulya kodi ni anya milandu?”
MAR 2:17 Itungo uYesu nai wakija iti ai uatambuie, “Antu niakete u upanga mu muili shanga amutakile u mukiliki; Ingi antu nia lwae ing'wene wawo amutakile. Shanga ai nzile kuitanga i antu niakete itai ane, kuiti antu ni akete i milandu.”
MAR 2:18 Amanyisigwa ang'wa Yohana ni Afarisayo ai atulaa akudilya kulya. Hangi ang'wi a antu ai azile kitalakwe nu kumuila, “Ku niki i aanyisigwa ang'wa Yohana ni Afarisayo idila kulya, kuiti i amanyisigwa ako shanga akudila kulya?
MAR 2:19 uYesu ai uatambuie, “Itii niamoli mu winga ahumile kudila kulya itungo u mukulu nua winga waze utuile ukoli palung'wi ni enso? ku lihi u mukulu nua winga anga watule ukoli palung'wi ni enso shanga ahumile kudila kulya.”
MAR 2:20 Kuiti mahiku apembilye itungo u mukulu nua winga nuika hegigwa kitalao, nu mu mahiku nanso ni enso akudilya kulya.
MAR 2:21 Kutili u muntu nuihilita i kilaka ni kigeni nika ng'wenda mu ng'wenda nui taho, anga itule i kilaka kikutaluka kupuma mu nilanso, ni kigeni kitaluka kupuma mi itaho, hangi ikutula nu utamukwaa ubibi.
MAR 2:22 Kutili muntu wihi nuikitila i magai ni maza mu ntunda ni nkakilu, anga itule iti imagai akubadula i ntunda hangi yahi ibiili magai ni itunda ikulimila. Badala akwe, ika imagai ni maziza mu ntunda ni nziza.
MAR 2:23 Mu luhiku nula kusupya uYesu ai ukiile mu migunda ing'wi, ni amanyisigwa akwe akandya kuhola imatita ang'wi a ngano.
MAR 2:24 Ni Afarisayo akamuila, “Goza, ku niki akituma i kintu naiza ingi nsuta ni ilagiilyo mu luhiku nula kusupya?”
MAR 2:25 Ai uatambuie, “Shanga ai musomile iko nai witumile uDaudi nai watula mu u ula nua nzala—Ng'wenso palung'wi ni antu nai akoli palung'wi nu ng'wenso?
MAR 2:26 Iti nai ulongoe mu ito nilang'wa Itunda itungo nilang'wa Abiathari nai watulaa kuhani nu mukulu nu kulya u mukate nai uikilwe ntongeela—naza ituile nsuta a malagiilyo ku muntu wihi kulya kwaala akuhani— hangi ai uinkiiye ga ni ang'wi a awo nai atulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso
MAR 2:27 uYesu ai uligitilye, U luhiku nula kusupya ai litumilwe ku nsoko a ana adamu, shanga ng'wana adamu ku nsoko a luhiku nula kusupya.
MAR 2:28 Ku lulo, u Ng'wana nuang'wa Adamu ingi mukulu, ga kuluhiku nula kusupya.
MAR 3:1 Ni hangi ai wingie mukati itekeelo nu mung'wanso ai umoli muntu ukete mukono ukule igandi.
MAR 3:2 Ang'wi a antu ai atulaa akumutyatiila ku ukupi kihenga kina anga ize ukuguna luhiku nula kusupya iti kina amusemele.
MAR 3:3 uYesu ai umutambuie u muntu nu kete u mukono ukule igandi. “Humbuka wimike pakati i umbi ili.”
MAR 3:4 Uugwa aka atambuila i antu. “Itii ingi taine kituma mulimo nu uza luhiku nula kusupya ang'wi kituma ni shanga tai ane; Kunguna likalo ang'wi kubulaga?” Kuiti akasaga ihi twi.
MAR 3:5 Aka agozeela ku ikuo, waze uhukilye ku nsoko a ukaku nua nkolo niao, hangi akamutambuila u muntu uyo, “Goola u mukono nuako.” akaugoola nu Yesu akamuguna u mkono nuakwe.
MAR 3:6 Afarisayo akalongola kunzi hangi itungo akazipya isui palung'wi ni Aherode ku ng'waakwe iti kumubulaga.
MAR 3:7 Uugwa uYesu, palung'wi ni amanyisigwa akwe, ai alongoe mu luzi, ni i umbi ikulu nila antu ai limutyatile ize lipembeeye ku Galilaya nu ku Uyahudi
MAR 3:8 nu kupuma ku Yerusalemu nu kupuma ku Idumaya ntongeela a Yorodani ni kisali nika Tiro ni Sidoni, i umbi ikulu, nai likija kila i kintu nai watulaa ukituma, akapembya kitalakwe.
MAR 3:9 Hangi ai uatambuie i amanyisigwa akwe kuzipiilya u mulinga nu uniino ku nsoko akwe ku nsoko a iumbi, iti kina aleke kumutunyiilya.
MAR 3:10 Ku nsoko ai ugunile idu, iti kila u muntu nai watulaa nu lwago ai watulaa ni nsula a kumupikiila iti wamuambe.
MAR 3:11 Pihi i ahing'wi nai amuine, ai agwie pihi ntongeela akwe nu kulila, nu kuligitya, “U ewe ingi wi Ng'wana wang'wa Itunda.”
MAR 3:12 Ai ualagiiye ku kukomangiila aleke kituma wakumuke.
MAR 3:13 Ai ulongoe migulya a lugulu, nu kuitanga nai ualoilwe, hangi akalongola kitalakwe.
MAR 3:14 Aka aholania ikumi na abiili (nai uitangile itumi), iti kina atule palung'wi nu ng'wenso hangi wahume kualagiilya kutanantya,
MAR 3:15 nu kutula nu uhumi nua kupumya i ahing'wi.
MAR 3:16 Hangi aka aholania ikumi na abiili; Simioni nai uminkiiye ilina nila Petro,
MAR 3:17 Yakobo ng'wana wang'wa Zebedayo, nu Yohana muluna nuakwe u Yakobo, nai winkiigwe i lina nila Bonagesi, awo ingi, ana nia mulilo,
MAR 3:18 nu Andrea, Filipo, Bartholomayo, Mathayo, Tomaso, Yakobo ng'wana wang'wa Alfayo, Thadayo, Simioni Mukananayo,
MAR 3:19 nu Yuda Iskariote, naiza uku mugumaniilya.
MAR 3:20 Uugwa ai ulongoe ki ito, ni umbi nila antu akapembya palung'wi hangi, aleng'we ga nu kulya ga nu mukate.
MAR 3:21 Familia akwe nai akija u lukani nulanso, akalongola kumuamba, kuiti akaligitya, “Waputwa ni mahala.”
MAR 3:22 Amanyi nai azile kupuma ku Yerusalemu ai aligitilye, “Uhalinkaniwe nu Beelzebuli,” nu “Ku mukulu nua a hing'wi ukupumya i a hing'wi.”
MAR 3:23 uYesu ai uitangile kitalakwe nu kuligitya ni enso ku mpyani, “Kinya uli uMulugu wahume kumupumya uMulugu?
MAR 3:24 Anga ize utemi ukugalanuka ukola, utemi nuanso shanga uhumile kimika.
MAR 3:25 Anga ize ito likugalanuka ikola, ito nilanso shanga lihumile kimika.
MAR 3:26 Anga ize uMulugu ukunyansuka nsuta akwe mukola nu kugalanuka, hangi ukutula wapika mpelo akwe.
MAR 3:27 Kuiti kutili ga nung'wi nuhumile kingila mukati ito nila muntu ni munya ngulu nu kia i intu niakwe bila kumutunga u munyangulu hanza, hangi uugwa kilingiila ni kimoli mi ito.
MAR 3:28 Tai kumutambuila, milandu ihi nia ana a antu ikulekelwa, palung'wi nu ukuni naza akutambula,
MAR 3:29 kuiti wihi nuika mukuna u Ng'wau Ng'welu shanga ukulekelwa lukulu, ila ukete ugazi nua mulandu nua kali na kali.”
MAR 3:30 uYesu ai ulitambue ili ku nsoko ai atulaa akuligitya, “Ukete hing'wi.”
MAR 3:31 Uugwa u nyinya nuakwe ni aluna akwe ai apembilye nu kimika kunzi. Akamulagiilya muntu, kumitanga.
MAR 3:32 Ni iumbi nila antu nai latulaa likie pakupi nu ng'wenso akamutambuila, “u ia ako ni aluna ako akoli kunzi, hangi akuuduma u ewe.”
MAR 3:33 Ai uasukiiye, “Ingi nyenyu u ia ane ni aluna ane?”
MAR 3:34 Ai uagozee nai atulaa ikie amupilimikiiye, nu kuligitya, “Goza, awa ingi a ia ane ni aluna ane!
MAR 3:35 Wihi nuitumaa u ulowa nuang'wa Itunda, muntu nuanso ingi muluna ane, hangi ng'waitu, hangi ia ane.”
MAR 4:1 Hangi ai wandilye kumanyisa mu mpelompelo a luzi. Ni iumbi ikulu likilundiila likamupilimikiilya, akingila mukati i ilinga mu luzi, nu kikie. Iumbi lihi nai likoli mu mpelo a luzi mu nshemba.
MAR 4:2 Hangi aka amanyisa makani idu ku mpyani, hangi akaligitya kitalao ku umanyisa nuakwe.
MAR 4:3 Tegeelyi, mutemeli ai ulongoe kutemela.
MAR 4:4 Nai wakatula ukutemela, ing'wi nia mbeu ai igwie mu nzila, ni nyunyi ikapembya ikailya.
MAR 4:5 Mbeu i nzuya ai igwie mu matalagwe, naiza kutili ni mahalu idu. Itungo ikanyala, ku nsoko ai ngila anga mahalu nakondaniie.
MAR 4:6 Kuiti i lyoa nai litolokile, ai inyaile, ku nsoko ai ngila anga mili, ikuma.
MAR 4:7 Mbeu inzuya ai igwie pakati a mija. iMija ikakula nu kuitunyiilya, hangi shanga ikapa inkali yihi.
MAR 4:8 Mbeu i nzuya ai igwie mu mahalu ni maza hangi ai ipee i nkali itungo nai yukukula nu kungeeleka, inzuya ai ipee nkua makumi ataatu ikilo, ni nzuya makumi mutandaatu, ni nzuya igana.”
MAR 4:9 Hangi wakaligitya, “Wihi nukete i akutwi ni akija, nu ije!”
MAR 4:10 uYesu nai wakatula wing'wene, awo nai akoli pakupi nu ng'wenso nawo ni ikumi na abiili ai amukoiye kutula i mpyani.
MAR 4:11 Akaligitya kitalao, “Kitalanyu minkiigwe kinkunku nika utemi nuang'wa Itunda. Kuiti ku niakoli kunzi kila i kintu ingi mpyani,
MAR 4:12 iti anga agoze, uu igoza, kuiti shanga ihenga, hangi ku lulo niakija uu ijaa, kuiti shanga ilinga, anga ize shanga uu aza azee mupiluka Itunda ai uzee alekela.”
MAR 4:13 Hangi akaligiya kitalao, “Itii shanga mulingile i mpyani iyi? Mukuhuma uli kulinga i mpyani ni ingiiza?
MAR 4:14 Mutemeli ai utemee lukani.
MAR 4:15 Ing'wi ingi awo nai agwie mu mpelo a anzila, kianza u lukani naza lutemewe. Hangi nai igulye, itungo u Mulugu akapembya nu kuluhola u lukani naiza lutemewe mukati ao.
MAR 4:16 Hani ang'wi ao ingi awo nai atemewe migulya amatalagwe, naza, nai igulye u lukani, ku ukau akulusingiilya ku ulowa.
MAR 4:17 Hnagi agila imili ihi mukati ao, kuiti igimya ku itungo ikupi. Halafu lwago nu wagigwa ni ipembilye ku nsoko a lukani, itungo ikumpyaa.
MAR 4:18 Hangi ang'wi ingi awo nai atemewe mu mija. Akulija u lukani.
MAR 4:19 Kuiti unyong'wa nu ihi. ukongelwa nua nsao, ni nsula a makani mangiiza, wi ingiila nu kulutunyiilya u lukani, nu kuleng'wa kupaa inkali.
MAR 4:20 Uugwa akoli awo naza atemewe mu mahalu ni maza. Akulija u lukani nu kulusingiilya nu kupa i nkali; ang'wi makumi ataatu, hangi ang'wi makumi mutandatu, hangi ang'wi igana ling'wi.”
MAR 4:21 uYesu aka atambuila, “Itii iiza wileta u lumuli mukati ito nu kuluika pihi a nkapu, ang'wi pihi a ulili? Wiluletaa mukati nu kuluika migulya a ishupaka.
MAR 4:22 Ku nsoko kutili kihi nikipihile naiza shanga kiku kumuka, hangi kutili i kinkunku naiza shanga kikuikwa kihenga.
MAR 4:23 Anga ize ukoli nukete i akutwi a kija, nu ije!”
MAR 4:24 Aka atambuila, “Tuli miakendegeeli ku iko ni mukukija, ku nsoko u ugemeelya ni mukugemeelya, kiko ni mukagemeeligwa, hangi kikongeligwa kitalanyu.
MAR 4:25 Ku nsoko nuanso nukete, ukinkiiligwa ikilo, hangi uyo nimugila, kupuma kitalakwe ikuholwa ga nizo nuikete.”
MAR 4:26 Hangi akaligitya, “Utemi nuang'wa Itunda wimpyanigwe nu muntu nai utemee i mbeu mu mahalu.
MAR 4:27 Nai wakalala u utiku nu kuuka i kidaudau, ni mbeu ikaheluka nu kukula, Ga ni uu shanga ulingile nai ipumie.
MAR 4:28 Ihi ipumyaa i mbeu nkola; hanza matutu, alafu ulua, alafu mbeu niakagupaa.
MAR 4:29 Hangi itungo imbeu ni ikatula ailyaa itungo witwalaa uzolo, ku nsoko i maogola apikiila.”
MAR 4:30 Hangi akaligitya, “kuimpyanie u utemi nuang'wa itunda ni kintu kii, ang'wi kutumile mpyani kii ku uganula?
MAR 4:31 Ingi anga i mbeu a haradali, naiza ai itemewe ingi niino nangaluu kukila i mbeu yihi mihi.
MAR 4:32 Ga, ni itungo naza itemewe, ikukula nu kutula nkulu ikilo nila mimea ihi mu shuli, hangi izipyaa ntaambi nkulu, ga ni nyunyi nia kilunde ihumaa kuzipya iuyi niao mu mululi nuakwe.”
MAR 4:33 Ku mpyani idu ai umanyisilye hangi ai uligitilye u lukani kitalao, ku upikiilo nai uhumile kulinga,
MAR 4:34 hangi shanga ai uligitilye ni enso bila mpyani. Kuiti itungo nai wakatula wing'wene duu, aka aganuila kila i kintu i amanyisigwa akwe.
MAR 4:35 Mu luhiku nulanso, itungo nila mpindi nai lipikiie, akaligitya kitalao, “Kweni i nkika a kabiili.”
MAR 4:36 Iti gwa akalileka i umbi, akamuhola uYesu, itungo nilanso yakondaa ai watula mukati ilinga. Malinga mauya ai atulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso.
MAR 4:37 Nu ng'wega utaki nua kimpupu ni maingu ai atulaa akingila mukati a mulinga nu mulinga ai wakondyaa kutula wizula.
MAR 4:38 Kuiti uYesu mukola ai ukoli mu shetri, ulae mu muto. Akamutambuila, azeligitya, “Ng'walimu, shanga ulingile kina usese kuusha?”
MAR 4:39 Hangi akauka, akaukenela u ng'wega nu kuluila u luzi, “Itule ihi twii, ulyuuku.” Ung'wega ukapela, hangi ai ituile nu ulyuuku ukulu.
MAR 4:40 Hangi akaligitya kitalao, “Ku niki mukitumba? Itii mukili miagila u uhuiili?”
MAR 4:41 Akizuilwa nu woa ukulu mukati ao hangi akitambulya enso ku enso, “Uyu ingi nyenyu hangi, ku nsoko ga nu ng'wega nu luzi ikumugombya.”
MAR 5:1 Nai akapembya kupikiila nkika ingiiza a luzi, mu mukoa nua Gerasi.
MAR 5:2 Hangi kupumpugila itungo uYesu naiwatulaa ukupuma kunzi ilinga, muntu nukete u hing'wi ai uzile kitalakwe kupuma mu ibiila.
MAR 5:3 Muntu uyu ai wikiie mu ibiila. Kutili nai uhumile kumugilya ikilo, kutili ga nu ku minyororo.
MAR 5:4 Ai watulaa utungilwe matungo iduu ku mpingu ni minyororo. Kutili ga nu ng'wi nai ukete i ngulu nia kumukilya.
MAR 5:5 Utiku nu mung'wi waze ukoli mu ibiila nu mu malugulu, ai wilila nu kitemanga u ng'wenso mukola ku magwe ni migi.
MAR 5:6 Nai wakamihenga uYesu ku kaheelu, akamankiila kung'wakwe nu kutuna ntongeela akwe.
MAR 5:7 Ai uleile ku luli lukulu, “Uloilwe nukutendele ntuni, Yesu ng'wana wang'wa Itunda nukoli migulya nangaluu? Ku usinja kung'wa Itunda mukola, leka kunaja.
MAR 5:8 Ku nsoko ai watulaa wamuila, “Mupume u muntu uyu, u ewe hing'wi.”
MAR 5:9 Nu ng'wenso ai umukoiye, “Lina nilako ingi nyenyu?” Nuanso akamusuliilya, “Lina nilane ingi Legion, ku nsoko kukoli kidu.”
MAR 5:10 Ai umusingilye hangi ni hangi waleke kuatwala kunzi a mukoa.
MAR 5:11 Itungili idale ikulu nila ngulima ai likoli likuding'wa migulya a lugulu,
MAR 5:12 ni enso ai amusingilye, azeligitya, “Kulagiilye ku ngulima; kingile mu kati yao.”
MAR 5:13 Iti gwa ai uagombilye; ia hing'wi ai amupumile nu kingila mukati a ngulima, ni nyenso ai imankile pihi a lugulu kupikiila mu luzi, hangi kupikiila ngulima magana a nzogu a biili ikalimilila mu luzi.
MAR 5:14 Hangi awo nai atulaa akudima i ngulima ai amankile nu kupumya u lukani nula iko nai kipumie mu kisali nu mi ihi. Uugwa antu idu ai apumile kulongola kihenga nai kipumie.
MAR 5:15 Uugwa ai apembilye kung'wa Yesu hangi ai amihengile u muntu nai wahalinkaniwe nu hing'wi nai ukete idale —wikie pihi, utugawe, hangi aze ukoli mu mahala akwe akondaniie, ni enso ai itumbile.
MAR 5:16 Awo nai atulaa ihengile nai kipumie ku muntu nai watulaa uhalinkaniwe nu hing'wi ai a atambuie nai kipumie kitalakwe ga ni kutula i ngulima.
MAR 5:17 Ni enso akandya kumusinja wahege mu mukoa nuao.
MAR 5:18 Hangi nai wakatula ukingila mukati i linga, muntu nai watulaa uhalinkaniwe nia hing'wi ai umusingilye kina alongole palung'wi nu ng'wenso.
MAR 5:19 Kuiti shanga ai umugombilye, kuiti ai umutambuie, “Longola ki ito nilako nu ku antu niako, hangi uatambuile aza ukutendee Mukulu, nu ukende naza ukinkiiye.”
MAR 5:20 Uugwa ai ulongoe nu kandya kutanantya i makani makulu naiza uYesu witumile kitalakwe mu Dekapoli, ni kila ung'wi ai ukuiwe.
MAR 5:21 Hangi itungo nai wakaputa hangi nkika i ngiiza, mukati ilinga, iumbi ikulu likilingiila kumupilimikiilya, nai ukoli mpelo a luzi.
MAR 5:22 Hangi ung'wi nu a lukolongo ni i tekeelo, nai witangwaa Yairo, ai uzile, hangi nai umuhengile, ai ugwie mu migulu akwe.
MAR 5:23 Akamusija ikilo ni ikilo, wazeligitya, “Munaanso nu ane nu muniino wahumbeela kusha. Ku usinja, pembya nu kuika i mikono ako migulya akwe iti kina wahume kulija upanga nu kikie.”
MAR 5:24 Iti gwa ai ulongoe palung'wi nu ng'wenso. ni i umbi ikulu ai limutyatile ni enso ai akumunyempa pakupi aze amupilimikiiye.
MAR 5:25 Ai ukoli nu musungu naiza i sakami akwe ai atulaa ipumaa ku myaka ikumi na ibiili.
MAR 5:26 Ai wagilee nia kukonda pihi a akiliki idu hangi ai watumie kila i kintu nai watuile ni kenso. Ga ni iti shanga akagunika ku kintu kihi. kuiti badala akwe akakilinkiila kutula ni hali mbibi.
MAR 5:27 Ai wigulye i nkani kutula uYesu. Iti gwa ai upembilye ku nyuma akwe itungo nai watulaa ukugenda mukati i umbi, nu ng'wenso ai utenilye u ng'wenda nuakwe.
MAR 5:28 Ku nsoko ai uligitilye, “Anga niatenie i ang'wenda ni akwe udu, nikatula ni mupanga.”
MAR 5:29 Nai utenilye, kupung'wa i sakami ikapela, hangi ai wigulye mu muili nuakwe kina ai wagunwaa kupuma mu lwago nulakwe
MAR 5:30 Hangi kupumpugiilya uYesu akalinga mukati akwe mukola kina ngulu imupumile. Hangi ai upilukile kunu nu kunu mi iumbi nila antu nu kukolya, “Ingi nyenyu nutenilye u ng'wenda nuane?”
MAR 5:31 Amanyisigwa akwe ai amutambuie, “Ukihenga i umbii ili likutunyiiye likupilimikiiye, nu ewe ukuligitya, 'Ingi nyenyu nu ntenilye?'”
MAR 5:32 Kuiti uYesu ai ugozile kunu nu kunu kihenga naiza watulaa witumile ili.
MAR 5:33 Musungu, waze ulingile nai kipumie kitalakwe, ai witumbile nu kukagata. Ai upembilye hangi ai ugwie pihi ntongeela akwe nu kumuila i tai ihi.
MAR 5:34 Ai uligitilye kitalakwe, “Munanso, uhuiili nuako wakuzipya utule u mupanga. Longola ku ulyuuku hangi ugunwe kupuma mu ulwae nuako.”
MAR 5:35 Nai watulaa ukuligitya, ang'wi a antu ai apembilye kupuma kung'a lukolongo nua itekeelo, azeligitya, “U munanso nuako wakuza. Ku niki kulongoleka kumunyoma u ng'walimu?”
MAR 5:36 Kuiti uYesu nai wakija naza akukiligiya, ai umutambuie u lukolongo nu itekeelo, Leka kitumba. Huiila udu.”
MAR 5:37 Shanga ai umugombilye wihi kitongelya nu ng'wenso kwaala uPetro, Yakobo, nu Yohana muluna nuakwe uYakobo.
MAR 5:38 Ai apembilye mi ito nilang'wa lukolongo nui itekeelo nu ng'wenso ai wihengile unyong'wa, kulila kidu nu kuhongeelya.
MAR 5:39 Nai wakingila mi ito, ai uatambuie, “ Ku niki mukusiga ikulu hangi ku niki mukulila? uMung'yinya akili kusha ila ulae.”
MAR 5:40 Ai amuhekile, kuiti nuanso, ai uapumilye ihi kunzi, ai umuhoile utata nua ng'wana nu nyinya ni awo nai atulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso, hangi ai wingie mukati nai umoli u ng'wana.
MAR 5:41 Ai u uhoile u mukono nua ng'wana hangi ai umutambuie, “Talitha koum,” naiza ingi kuligitya, “Munanso muniino, ku utambuila, uka.”
MAR 5:42 Kupumpugiilya u ng'wana ai u ukile nu kugenda. (ku nsoko ai watulaa ni ilika nila myaka ikumi na ibiili). Hangi kupumpugiilya ai a ambilwe nu ukuilwa ukulu.
MAR 5:43 Ai ulagiiye ku ngulu kina kutili wihi utakiwe kulinga kutula ili. Hangi ai uatambuie aminkiilye u munanso nuanso indya.
MAR 6:1 Hangi akahega pang'wanso nu kulongola mu kisali kao, ni amanyisiga akwe akamutyata.
MAR 6:2 Luhiku nula kusupya nai likapika. ai wandilye kumanyisa mu Itekeelo. Antu idu ai amigulye hangi akakuilwa. Akaligitya, Uligilye pii u umanyisa uwu?” Ingi upolo kii uwu nuinkiigwe?” Ukituma uli u ukuilwa uwu ku mikono akwe?”
MAR 6:3 “Itii uyu shanga yuyo u mulanda mabada, ng'wana wang'wa Mariamu hangi muluna nuao ia Yakobo, Yose, Yuda nu Simioni? Itii i aluna akwe nia kisugu shanga ikie papa paapa palung'wi nu sese?” Hangi shanga ikaloeligwa nu Yesu.
MAR 6:4 uYesu aka atambuila, “U munyakidagu shanga wiulyaa ikulyo, kwaala mu kisali nikakwe ni mukati a aluna akwe nia mi ito nilakwe.”
MAR 6:5 Shanga ai uhumile kituma u ukuilwa pang'wanso, iti ai uaikiiye mikono alwae asheenyu aka aguna.
MAR 6:6 Ai ukuiwe nangaluu ku nsoko a kuhita kuhuiila kitalao. Uugwa ai uigendee i ijiji nia kisali waze manyisa.
MAR 6:7 Ai uitangile awo i amanyisigwa ikumi na abiili akandya kualagiilya abiili a biili. Ai uinkiiye uhumi migulya a ahing'wi
MAR 6:8 nu kualagiilya aleke kuhola kihi nialongoe kwaala mulanga udu. Aleke kuhola u mukate ang'wi mbogoshi, ang'wi mpia mu kilino;
MAR 6:9 Kuiti atugale i latu, hangi shanga a mujulungu a biili.
MAR 6:10 Hangi aka atamuila, “ Ito lihi ni mukingila, ikii papo kupikiila ni mikahega.
MAR 6:11 Ni kisali kihi nishanga kikumusingiilya ang'wi kumutegeelya, hegi kitalao, kununti u lunkundi nula migulu anyu, itule ukuiili kitalao.”
MAR 6:12 Ni enso akalongola azetanantya antu ile itunu nu kuleka i milandu ao.
MAR 6:13 Ai a anuzunsilye i ahing'wi idu, hangi ai apuguhie i makuta i alwae hangi akagunwa.
MAR 6:14 uMutemi Herode nai wakija nanso, ku nsoko i lina nilang'wa Yesu ai latulaa lakumuka nangaluu. Ang'wi ai aligitilye, uYohana ni moganyi wiuka hangi ku nsoko nanso, iyi ngulu a ukuilwa ikituma u mulimo mukati akwe.”
MAR 6:15 Ang'wi ao akaligitya, “Uyu ingi Eliya,” Ikili i auya akaligitya, “Uyu ingi munyakidagu, anga ung'wi nua awo anyakidagu nia kali.”
MAR 6:16 Kuiti uHerode nai wakija aya akaligitya, “uYohana, nai numudumue itwe wiukigwa.”
MAR 6:17 Ndogoelyo uHerode mukola ai ulagiiye uYohana waambwe nu kutungwa mu kadulumu ku nsoko ang'wa Herodia (musungu nua muluna nuakwe uFilipo) ku nsoko nuanso ai watulaa wamutenaa.
MAR 6:18 Ku ndogoelyo uYohana ai umutambuie uHerode, “Shanga tai ako kumutina u musungu nuang'wa heu nuako.”
MAR 6:19 Kuiti uHerode ai wandilye kumubipilwa hangi ai watulaa uloilwe kumubulaga, kuiti shanga wikahuma,
MAR 6:20 ndogoelyo u Herode aizaa umitumbile uYohana; ai ulingile kina ingi munya tai ane muntu ni ng'welu, hangi ai umulekile iziza. Hangi nai ulongolekile kumutegeelya akahusha nangaluu, kuiti ai wiloile kumutegeelya.
MAR 6:21 Nai lipikile ga ni itungo niligombekile anga itule lahumbeela u luhiku nula kutugwa uHerode aka azipiililya i aopisa akwe isiku kuu, nia mboi, nia lukolongo nia ku Galilaya.
MAR 6:22 Uugwa u munaano nuang'wa Herodia akingila kiginsa ntongeela ao, akamuloeelya uHerode ni aziila nai ikie itungo nila ndya nia mpindi. Uugwa u mutemi akamuila umu nanso, “Nompe kihi nukiloilwe nu nene nikaki nkiilya.'
MAR 6:23 Akamulapila nu kuligitya, kihi nui kanompa, nika kinkiilya, ga ni ikinda nila utemi nuane.”
MAR 6:24 Akapuma kunzi akamukolya u nyinya nuakwe, “Nompe ntuni?” Akaligitya, “Itwe lang'wa Yohana nuojaa.”
MAR 6:25 Ni itungo ling'wi akingila ku mutemi akandya kuligitya, “Ndoilwe uninkiilye mukati a sahani, itwe nilang'wa Yohana Nuojaa.”
MAR 6:26 uMutemi akahusha nangaluu, kuiti ku nsoko a ilapo nilakwe hangi ku nsoko a aziila, shanga ai uhumile kumuhitilya ilompi nilakwe.
MAR 6:27 Iti gwa, umutemi akalagiilya i a asikali pakati a asunja akwe nu kualagiilya kulongola kuleta itwe lang'wa Yohana. uMusunja ai ulongoe kumutema itwe waze ukoli mu kitungo.
MAR 6:28 Akaleta itwe nilakwe mu sahani nu kuminkiilya u munanso, nu munanso akaminkiilya u nyinya nuakwe.
MAR 6:29 Hangi i amanyisigwa akwe nai akija nanso, ai alongoe ku uhola u muili nuakwe akalongola ku uika mu kibiila.
MAR 6:30 Ni itumi, ai ilundiie palung'wi ntongeela ang'wa Yesu, akamuganuila ihi nai itumile hangi nai amanyisilye.
MAR 6:31 Nu ng'wenso aka atambuila, Pembyi akola i kianza nika kinkunku hangi kusupye ku itungo.” Antu idu ai atulaa akupembya nu kuhega, shanga ai aligilye ga nilyoma nila kulya.
MAR 6:32 Iti gwa akanankila i mashua akalongola kianza nika kinkunku i ng'wene duu.
MAR 6:33 Kuiti ai uihengile ni akuhega hangi idu aka alinga, ku palung'wi ai amankile ku migulu kupuma mu isali yihi, ni enso akapika ze ikili ni anso.
MAR 6:34 Nai apilkile ku nkilimbwaa, ai wihengile i umbi ikulu hangi aka a aisiilya, ku nsoko ai atulaa anga i nkolo ni ngila anga mudimi. Hangi akandya kuamanyisa makani idu.
MAR 6:35 Itungo ai lilongolekile nangaluu, amanyisigwa akamuziila akamutambuila, “Apa ingi kianza nika kinkunku ni itungo lalongolekaa.
MAR 6:36 Ualage alongole mu isali nia kisali ni ijiji iti ende iguilye indya.”
MAR 6:37 Kuiti aka asukiilya akaligitya, “Api nyenye indya.” Aka atambuila, “Kuhumile kulongola nu kugula i mikate nikete i nsailo a dinari magana abiili nu kuinkiilya alye?”
MAR 6:38 Aka atambuila, “Mukete mikate inga? Longoli mugoze.” nai aligilye akamutambuila, “Mikate itaano ni nsamaki ibiili.'
MAR 6:39 Aka alagiilya i antu ikie mu madale migulya a mafwa ni matotu. Aka ikalinsha mu madale; madale a magana ni ku makumi ataano.
MAR 6:41 Uugwa akahola i mikate itaano ni nsamaki ibiili, nu kugoza kilunde, akamikendepa uugwa aka inkiilya i amanyisigwa aike ntongeela a iumbi. Hangi uugwa ai ugalanilye i nsamaki ibiili ku antu ihi.
MAR 6:42 Ai alie ihi kupikiila akakondaniila.
MAR 6:43 Ai ilingiie i mapuli a mikate nai isigile. Yikizula nkapu ikumi na ibiili, ga ni mapuli a nsamaki.
MAR 6:44 Hangi ai atulaa agoha magana a nzogu ataano nai alie i mikate.
MAR 6:45 Itungo aka atambuila anankile mu mashua alongole nkuka i ngiiza, kupikiila ku Bethsaida, itungo Nuanso waze alaga anyianza.
MAR 6:46 Nai akatula akondyaa kuhega, akalongola mu lugulu kulompa.
MAR 6:47 Nai ikatula mpindi, ni mashua ao itungo ni lanso ize ikoli pakati a luzi, nu ng'wenso ai ukoli wing'wene duu mihi ni nyumu.
MAR 6:48 Hangi ai uihengile akagisha kukua i makasia ku nsoko a ng'wega ukuagilya. nai ihumbee i kidaudau aka alondoola, wazegenda migulya a mazi, hangi ai uloilwe kuakila.
MAR 6:49 Kuiti nai akamihenga ukugenda migulya a mazi, akingiilwa nu mitumbo aze asigile ingi mintunga akakua ga ni ogo.
MAR 6:50 Ku nsoko ai amihengile akizuilwa nu woa, Itungo akaligita ni enso aka atambuila, “Mutule akamatiku ingi nene! Leki kutuli nu woa.
MAR 6:51 Akingila mukati a mashua, nu g'wega ukaleka ku kunka, ni enso akakuilwa lukulu.
MAR 6:52 Iti gwa shanga ikatula alingaa i ndogoelyo a iyo i mikate. Ndogoelyo i mahala ao ai akete ulingi uniino.
MAR 6:53 Ni enso kaputa kitumbi, akapika mihi a Genesareti imashua ikaika i nanga.
MAR 6:54 Nai akapuma kunzi a mashua, itungo akamulinga.
MAR 6:55 Akamanka kutanantya mu mukoa wihi hangi akandya kualeta i alwae ku ulili, kila nai igulye upembilye.
MAR 6:56 Pihi nai wingie mu ijiji, ang'wi mu isali, ang'wi mi ihi, ai a aikile i alwae kianza ni kisoko, hangi akamusinja waagombye kutenia ukunzilo nua ng'wenda nuakwe. Hangi ihi nai amutenilye ai agunilwe
MAR 7:1 Afarisayo ni ang'wi a amanyi naza atulaa apembeeye ku Yerusalemu ai ilingiie kumupilima ung'wenso.
MAR 7:2 Hangi ai ihengile kina amanyisigwa ang'wi ao akulya u mukate ku mikono mishapu; naiza shanga ikalaigwe,
MAR 7:3 (ku Afarisayo ni Ayahudi ihi shanga iliza kupikiila akalaye i mikono ao iziza; a ambiiye ulogo nula anyampala. Matungo
MAR 7:4 i Afarisayo niagomokile kupuma kianza ki isoko, shanga ilizaa kupikiila oge hanza. Hangi akoli malagiilyo maulya naza akumatyata lukulu, anga itule ingi palung'wi nu koja i ikombe, masupulia, iseme nia shaba, ga ni matuntu ni itumila itungo nila ndya,)
MAR 7:5 Afarisayo ni amanyi ai amukoiye uYesu, “Ku niki amanyisigwa ako shanga ikii kuniganiila nu logo nula anyampala, ku iti akulya umukate shanga ize akalae i mikono?”
MAR 7:6 Kuiti nuanso aka atambuila, “uIsaya ai ulotile iza kutula u nyenye adosi, ai ukilisilye, 'Antu awa akunkulya ku milomo ao, kuiti i nkolo niao ikoli kuli nu nene.
MAR 7:7 Akunintumila ikumbiko ni gila anga ndogoelyo, azemanyisa malagiilyo a ana adamu anga ulekeelya nuao,'
MAR 7:8 Malilekaa ilagiilyo nilang'wa Itunda maluambaa ku upepeele u logo nula ana adamu.”
MAR 7:9 Hangi akaligitya kitalao, “Malihitaa ilagiilyo nilang'wa Itunda ku utontu iti kina mu luike u logo nulanyu!
MAR 7:10 Ku nsoko uMusa ai uligitilye, 'mukulye u tata nuako nu ia nuako,' 'nu ng'wenso nuiligitya u ubi migulya ang'wa tata nuakwe nu nyinya nuakwe kulu kuulu ukusha,'
MAR 7:11 Kuiti mukuligitya, 'Anga ize u muntu waligitye kung'wa tata nuakwe ang'wi nyinya, 'Uaiilya wihi naza mukusingiilya kupuma kitalane ingi itulyo nila Itekeelo,” (nanso ingi kulunga kina, ipumiigwe kung'wa Itunda')
MAR 7:12 iti gwa shanga imugombilye kituma lihi ku nsoko ia tata ang'wi a nyinya akwe.
MAR 7:13 Mukulizipya ilagiilyo nilang'wa Itunda ku nakanda ku kuleta u logo nulanyu. Ni makani idu a kinya iti ni mukituma.”
MAR 7:14 Ai uitangile i anyianza hangi nu kuatambuila, “Muntegeelye u nene, unyenye mihi, hangi muninge.
MAR 7:15 Kutili kihi kupuma kunzi a muntu naiza kahumaa kumushapula u muntu ni kingiila kung'waakwe. Ila ingi iko ni kimupumaa u muntu kiko ni kimushapulaa.
MAR 7:16 (Komaniilya; u lukiili ulu. “anga ize u muntu wihi ukete i akutwi akija, u ije” umutili mu mbugulu nia kali.)
MAR 7:17 uYesu nai wakaaleka i anyianza nu kingila mi ito, amanyisigwa niakwe akamukolya kutula i mpyani nanso.
MAR 7:18 uYesu akaligitya, “Nu nyenye ga mukili ku ninga? Shanga mihengile kina kihi ni kimingiila u muntu shanga kihumile kumushapula,
MAR 7:19 ku nsoko shanga kihumile kulongola mu nkolo akwe, kuiti kikingila mu nda akwe hangi kikukila kulongola ku shoo.” ku lugano ulu uYesu ai uizipilye i ndya yihi kutula nzelu.
MAR 7:20 Ai uligitilye, “Ingi iko naiza kikumupuma u muntu kiko ni kimushapulaa.
MAR 7:21 Ku nsoko kipuma mukati a muntu, kunzi a nkolo, ipuma masigo ni mabibi, ugoolya, wii, ubulagi,
MAR 7:22 usambo, nsula ni mbibi, ubibi, ukongelani, kigoolya, wilu, ukunki, wiketi, upungu.
MAR 7:23 U ubi uwu wihi wipuma mukati, kiko iko ni kimushapula u muntu.”
MAR 7:24 Ai u ukile kupuma pang'wanso nu kuhega kulongola mu mukoa nua Tiro ni Sidoni. Ai wingie mukati hangi shanga ai uloilwe muntu wihi walinge kina ukoli papo, kuiti shanga ai ihumikile ku mupiha.
MAR 7:25 Kuiti kupumpugiilya musungu, naiza u ng'wana nuakwe muniino ai ukete hing'wi, ai wigulye i nkani niakwe, akiza, hangi akagwa mu migulu akwe.
MAR 7:26 uMusungu nuanso ai watulaa Muyunani, nua ndugu a Kifoeniki. Ai umusingilye nuanso amuzunse u hing'wi kupuma ku munaanso nuakwe.
MAR 7:27 uYesu akamuila u musungu, “Aleke i ang'yinya alisigwe hanza, kunsoko shanga izipie ku uhola u mukate nua ana nu kuigumila i mbwa”
MAR 7:28 Kuiti u musunu akamusukiilya nu kuligitya, “Iti gwa Mukulu, ga ni mbwa pihi a meza iliza i ipoli nia ndya nia ana.”
MAR 7:29 Akamuila, “Ku nsoko waligitya iti, ukoli ilyuuku kulongola. uHing'wi wamupumaa u munanso nuako.”
MAR 7:30 uMusungu ai ugomokile ki ito nilakwe hangi akahanga u munanso nuakwe ulae mu ulili, nu hing'wi ai watulaa wamupumaa.
MAR 7:31 uYesu ai upumile hangi kunzi a mukoa nua Tiro nu kukila ku Sidoni kutunga u Luzi nula Galilaya kupikiila nkika a Dikapolisi.
MAR 7:32 Akamuleta hangi muntu nai watuile gulu hangi ai watulaa shanga uhumile kuligitya iziza, ai amusingilye uYesu waike i mikono migulya akwe.
MAR 7:33 Ai umupumilye kunzi a milundo ku kinkunku, hangi akaika i ng'yanza niakwe mu akutwi akwe, hangi ze yakila kutya i mati, ai utenilye u lulimi nulakwe.
MAR 7:34 Ai ugozile migulya mi lunde, akahupa nu kumuila, Efata,” nanso ingi kuligitya, “luguka!”
MAR 7:35 Ni itungo lilo liilo akutwi akaluguka, hangi nai katulaa kimugiiye u lulimi kikabipigwa hangi akahuma kuligitya iziza.
MAR 7:36 Hangi ai ulagiiye aleke kumuila muntu wihi. Kuiti kupikiila nai ualagiiye, uu nai atanantilye i nkani nianso ku widu.
