MAR 7:37 Kulu kuulu ai akuiwe, nu kuligitya, “Witumile kila i kintu iziza. Waazipya ga nia gulu kija nia kimumi kuligitya.”
MAR 8:1 Mu mahiku nanso, ai likoli hangi iumbi ikulu, hangi ai agila ni ndya, uYesu akaitanga i amanyisigwa akwe aka atambuila,
MAR 8:2 Niliaisiiye i umbi ili, alongolekile kutula nu nene ku mahiku ataatu hangi agila indya.
MAR 8:3 Anga niasapatilye agomoke ku mato ao bila kulya ahumile kusha kisha mukanka munzila ku nzala. Hangi amg'wi ao apumile kuli nangaluu.”
MAR 8:4 Amanyisigwa akwe akamusukiilya, “Ku ulija pii i mikate a kenela kui kutya i antu awa mu nkika iyi nililekilwe?”
MAR 8:5 Aka akolya, “mukete mapuli anga na mikate?” Akaligitya, “Mupungati.”
MAR 8:6 Ai ulagiiye i umbi likie pihi. Akahola i mikate mupungati, akamulumba Itunda, nu kumibadulania. Akainkiilya i amanyisigwa akwe amiikie ntongeela ao, ni enso akamiika ntongeela i umbi.
MAR 8:7 Hangi ai akete ni nsamaki ni niino nsheenyu, ni ze yakilaa kulumba, ai ualagiiye i amanyisigwa akwe a agalanie iti hangi.
MAR 8:8 Ai alie nu ku kondaniila. Hangi ai ilingiie i mapuli nai asigile, nkapu ni nkulu mupungati.
MAR 8:9 Ai ahumbee antu magana a nzogu anne. Hangi ai ualekile alongole.
MAR 8:10 Itungo ai wingie mu mashua ni amanyisigwa akwe, hangi akalongola mu nkika nia ku Dalmanuta.
MAR 8:11 Uugwa Afarisayo ai apumile kunzi nu kandya kikunguma nu ng'wenso. Ai aloilwe wainkiilye kilingasiilyo kupuma kilunde, ku kumugema.
MAR 8:12 Akasiganiilya ku mukati mu nkolo akwe akaligitya, “Ku niki ulelwa uwu ukuduma kilingasiilyo” Kumutambuila unyenye itai, kutili kilingasiilyo ni kikapumigwa ku ulelwa uwu.”
MAR 8:13 Uugwa aka aleka, akingila mukati a mashua hangi, akahega kutunga nkika ingiiza.
MAR 8:14 Itungo nilanso amanyisigwa ai i ilwe kuhola i mikate. Shanga ai akete ni mikate kukila a ipuli ling'wi nai limoli mu mashua.
MAR 8:15 Ai uahugue nu kuligitya, “Mutule miho nu kisunja ku usasu nua Afarisayo nu usasu nuang'wa Herode.
MAR 8:16 Amanyisigwa akitambulya enso ku enso, “Ingi ku nsoko kiagila i ikate.”
MAR 8:17 uYesu ai ulilingile ili, nu kuatambuila, “Ku niki mukitambuila kutula kuhita kutula ni mikate? Mukili kulinga? Shanga mulingile? I nkolo yanyu yatulaa mpepeele?
MAR 8:18 Mukete i miho, shanga mukihenga? Mukete akutwi, shanga mukija? Shanga mukimbukiile?
MAR 8:19 Naza nimigalanilye i mikate itaano ku antu magana a nzogu ataano, ai muhoile nkapu inga nai yizue nia mapuli a mikate?” Akasukiilya, “i kumi na ibiili.”
MAR 8:20 Hangi naza nimigalanilye i mikate mupungati ku antu magana anzogu anne, ai muhoile ikapu inga?”
MAR 8:21 Akaligitya, “Mupungati.” Aka atambuila, “Mukili kulinga?”
MAR 8:22 Akapembya ku Bethsaida. Antu awo ai amuletile mupoku hangi akamusinja
MAR 8:23 uYesu amutenie. uYesu akamuamba ku mikono u mupoku uyo, nu kumutonga kunzi a kijiji. Nai wakatya i mati migulya a miho akwe nu kugoola i mikono akwe migulya akwe, ai umukoiye, “Ukihenga kihi?”
MAR 8:24 Akagoza migulya nu kuligita, “Kihenga antu akigela anga makota akugenda.”
MAR 8:25 Papo akagoola hangi i mikono akwe migulya a miho akwe, muntu uyo akapitya i miho akwe ai wihengile hangi, nu kihenga kila ikintu iziza.
MAR 8:26 uYesu ai umulekile alongole ki ito hangi akamutambuila, “Uleke kingila mu kisali.”
MAR 8:27 uYesu ai uhegile ni amanyisigwa akwe kulongola ijiji nia ku Kaiseria a ku Filipi. Waze ukoli mu nzila ai uakoiye i amanyisigwa, Antu akuligitya unene ingi nyenyu?”
MAR 8:28 Akamusukiilya akaligitya, “Yohana nu ojaa. Auya akuligitya, 'Eliya' ni auya, 'Ung'wi nua anyakidagu.”
MAR 8:29 Aka akolya, “Kuiti unyenye mukuligitya unene ni nyenyu?” uPetro akamuila, “U ewe ingi Kristo.”
MAR 8:30 uYesu aka ahugula aleke kumutambuila muntu wihi ku mutula u ng'wenso.
MAR 8:31 Hangi akandya kuamanyisa nia kina u Ng'wana wang'wa Adamu kusinja wagishe ku makani idu, hangi ukuhitwa nia lukolongo nia kuhani ni akulu, ni amanyi, ni elu a nkolo, hangi ze yakilaa a mahiku ataatu ukiuka.
MAR 8:32 Ai uligitilye aya ku kihenga. Uugwa uPetro akamuhola ku mpelo hangi akandya kumupatya
MAR 8:33 Kuiti uYesu ai upilukile nu kuagoza i amanyisigwa akwe nu kumukenela uPetro nu kuligitya, “Kila ku kituli ni kane Mulugu! Shanga ukee i makani ang'wa Itunda, kwaala makani a antu”
MAR 8:34 Uugwa akalitanga i umbi ni amanyisigwa akwe palung'wi, nu kuatambuila, “Anga ize ukoli muntu uloilwe kuntyata, nui kungume u mukola, wahole ikota nila mpaga nilakwe wantyate.
MAR 8:35 Ku nsoko wihi nuloilwe kuluguna u likalo nulakwe ukululimilya, hangi wihi nuika lulimilya u likalo nulakwe ku nsoko ane hangi ku nsoko a nkani ni nziza, ukuluguna.
MAR 8:36 Ikumuaiilya ntuni u muntu, ku ulija u unkumbigulu wihi, hangi uugwa kulija uula nua likalo nulakwe?
MAR 8:37 Muntu uhumile kupumya ntuni badala a likalo nulakwe?
MAR 8:38 Wihi nui nihumilwa i minyala ni makani ane mu ulelwa uwu nua ugoolya hangi mu ulelwa nua anya milandu, u Ng'wana wang'wa Adamu ukumuhumilwa i minyala nuikapembya mu utemi nuang'wa Tata nuakwe palung'wi ni a malaika ni elu.
MAR 9:1 Hangi ai uligitilye kitalao, “Kulu kuulu kuligitya kitalanyu, ang'wi anyu akoli antu neimikile papa shanga ikalulya i nsha ze akili kuihenga u utemi nuang'wa Itunda uze upembilye ku ngulu.”
MAR 9:2 Hangi ze yakilaa mahiku mutandaatu, uYesu ai uahoile uPetro, Yakobo nu Yohana palung'wi nu ng'wenso mu lugulu, ing'wene duu. Uugwa akandya kukailika ntongeela ao.
MAR 9:3 Ang'wenda akwe akandya kelya nangaluu, melu ikilo, melu kukila melyi wihi mihi.
MAR 9:4 Uugwa uEliya palung'wi nu Musa ai upumie ntongeela ao, hangi ai atulaa akuligitya nu Yesu.
MAR 9:5 uPetro ai usukiiye akamutambuila uYesu, “Ng'walimu, Ingi iziza usese kutula papa, ni kuzenge itala itaatu, king'wi ku nsoko ako, king'wi ku nsoko ang'wa Musa ni kiuya ku nsoko ang'wa Eliya.”
MAR 9:6 (Ku nsoko shanga ai ulingile ntuni nika kuligitya, ai itumbile nangaluu.)
MAR 9:7 Ilunde ai lipumie nu kuakunikila, Uugwa luli lukapuma mu malunde lukuligitya, “Uyu ingi ng'wana nuane mulowa. Mutegeelyi ng'wenso.”
MAR 9:8 Kupumpugiilya, nai atula akugoza, shanga ai amihengile wihi palung'wi ni enso, kwaala uYesu duu.
MAR 9:9 Nai atula akusima kupuma mulugulu, ai ua lagiiye kuleka kumutambuila muntu wihi ayo ihi nai ihengile, Kupikiila uNg'wana wang'wa Adamu nui kiukigwa kupuma mu ashi.
MAR 9:10 Uugwa ai amaikile i makani ao akola. Kuiti a itambuuye enso ku enso ingi ntuni i ndogoelyo akwe “kiukigwa kupuma ku ashi.”
MAR 9:11 Ai amukoiye uYesu, “Ku niki i amanyi iligitya kusinja uEliya waze hanza?”
MAR 9:12 Aka atambuila, “kulu kuulu uEliya ukupembya hanza kuguna i intu yihi. Ku niki ikilisigwe uNg'wana wang'wa Adamu kusinja walije ulwago lidu hangi amubipilwe?
MAR 9:13 Kuiti kuligitya kitalanyu uEliya ai wakondya kuza, hangi ai amutendile anga nai aloilwe, anga iti u ukilisigwa nuiligitya kutula nuanso.”
MAR 9:14 Hangi nai agomokile ku amanyisigwa, ai ihengile idale ikulu liapilimikiiye ni Asadukayo ai atulaa akikunguma ni enso.
MAR 9:15 Hangi itungo nai ihengile, idale lihi ai likuiwe nu kumumankiila kumulausha.
MAR 9:16 Ai uakoiye i amanyisigwa akwe, “Mukikunguma ni enso migulya antuni?”
MAR 9:17 Ung'wi nu ao mi idale ai umuusukiiye, “Ng'walimu, aza numuletile ng'wana nuane kitalako; ukete hing'wi naiza wimutendaa waleke kuhuma kuligitya,
MAR 9:18 hangi wimusasha kukagata nu kumugwisa pihi, nu kupuma ipomboluu mu mulomo nu kukilisa i mino nu kugagambalaa. Aza nialompile i amanyisigwa ako kumupumya u hing'wi, kuiti shanga ahuma.
MAR 9:19 Ai uasukiiye, “Ulelwa nishanga kihuiie, kikie nu nyenye ku itungo kii? Kihoeela nu nyenye kupikiila nali? Muleti kitalane.”
MAR 9:20 Ai amuletile u ng'wana nuakwe. U hing'wi nai umihengil uYesu, kupumpugiilya ai umuikile mu ukagati. uMuhumba ai ugwie pihi nu kupumya ipomboolu mu mulomo.
MAR 9:21 uYesu ai umukoiye u tata nuakwe, “Watulaa ni hali iyi ku itungo kii?” uTata akaligitya, “Puma ung'yinya.
MAR 9:22 Itungo lulya wigwizaa mu moto ang'wi mu azi, nu kugema kumulimilya. Anga ize uhumile kituma kihi kuaisiilye nu ku uailya.”
MAR 9:23 uYesu ai umutambuie, “Angaa ize ukoli ukondaniie? Kila i kintu kihumikile ku wihi nu uhuiie.”
MAR 9:24 Kupumpugiilya u tata nua ng'wana akalila nu kuligitya, “Nihuiie nzaiilye kuhita kuhuiila ku ng'waane”
MAR 9:25 Matungo uYesu nai wihenga idale likumankiila kitalao, ai umukenee u hing'wi nu kuligitya, “U ewe hing'wi kimumi hangi gulu, ku ulagiilya muleke, leka kingila kitalakwe hangi.
MAR 9:26 Akalila ku ngulu nu kumaja u ng'wana nu hing'wi ai umupumile. Ung'wana ai wigee anga ukule, Uugwa idu ai aligitilye, “Wakuza.”
MAR 9:27 Kuiti uYesu ai umuhoile ku mukono akamunyansula, hangi u ng'wana ai wimikile.
MAR 9:28 Matungo uYesu nai wakingila mukati, amanyisigwa akwe akamukolya ku kimpinyimpinyi, “Ku niki shanga aza kuhumile ku mupumya?”
MAR 9:29 Ai uatambuie, “ku kinya iti shanga ukupuma kwaala ku malompi.”
MAR 9:30 Akahega pang'wanso nu kukiila ku Galilaya. Shanga ai uloilwe muntu wihi walinge ku amoli,
MAR 9:31 ku nsoko ai watulaa ukuamanyisa amanyisigwa akwe. Ai uatambuie, uNg'wana wang'wa Adamu ukupikigwa mu mikono a antu, hangi akumubulaga. Nuikatulaa wakuza, ze yakilaa mahiku a taatu ukiuka hangi.”
MAR 9:32 Kuiti shanga ikalinga uganuli uwu, hangi ai itumbile kumukolya.
MAR 9:33 Uugwa ai apikile ku Karperinaumu. Matungo nai ukoli mukati i ito ai uakoiye, “Aza mukisija ntuni mu nzila?”
MAR 9:34 Kuiti akatula ihitwi. Kuiti ai atulaa akikunguma mu nzila kina nyenyu nai watulaa mukulu kukila.
MAR 9:35 Ai wikie pihi akaitanga ikumi na abiili palung'wi, hangi ai uligitilye ni enso, “Anga ize wihi uloilwe kutula wang'wandyo, ingi kusinja watule wang'wisho hangi munyamulimo nua ihi.”
MAR 9:36 Akamuhola mung'yinya muniino akamuika pakati ao. Akamuhola mu mikono akwe, akaligitya.
MAR 9:37 “Wihi nuimusingiilya u mung'yinya anga uyu ku lina nilane, unsingiiye ga nu nene, hangi anga itule muntu shanga unsingiiye unene du, kuiti ga nuyu nai undagiiye.”
MAR 9:38 uYohana ai umutambuie, “Ng'walimu aza kumihengile muntu ukupumya hing'wi ku lina nilako hangi kamugilya, ku nsoko shanga ukutyatile.
MAR 9:39 Kuiti uYesu akaligitya, “Leki kumugilyi, ku nsoko kutili nuikituma u mulimo nu ukulu ku lina nilane hangi uugwa panyambele waligitye lukani nu lubi lihi migulya ane
MAR 9:40 Wihi nui kutilye nsuta nu sese ukoli nkika itu.
MAR 9:41 Wihi nuika kinkiilya i kikombe nika mazi a kung'wa ku nsoko ukoli nu Kristo, tai kumuila, shanga ukulimilya i kinyamulimo kikakwe.
MAR 9:42 Wihi nuika asasha awa ni aniino nianihuiie unene, aza izeetula iziza kitalakwe kutungiiligwa ulwala mu nkingo nu kugumilwa mu luzi.
MAR 9:43 Anga u mukono nuako ukusashe uteme. Ingi ibahu kingila mu upanga bila mukono kukila kingila mu ulamulwa uze ukete mikono ihi. Mu moto ni “shanga wimimaa.
MAR 9:44 '(Komaniilya; U lukiili ulu, Nkika naiza i ngunyi shanga ikuza nu moto shanga wilimaa.” umutili mu mbugulu nia kali).
MAR 9:45 Anga u mugulu ukusashe, udumule. Ingi iziza kigila mu upanga wize wimulema, kukila kugung'wa mu ulamulwa ni migulu ibiili.
MAR 9:46 (Komaniilya; Ulukiili ulu, “Kianza naiza i ngunyi shanga ikuzaa nu moto nishanga wilimaa” Umutili mu mbugulu nia kali).
MAR 9:47 Anga ize i liho likusashe lipe. Ingi iziza kitalako kingila mu Utemi nuang'wa Itunda uze ukete liho ling'wi, kukila kutula ni miho abiili hangi ugung'we ku ulungu.
MAR 9:48 Kianza niimoli i ngunyi ni shanga ikuza, nu moto ni shanga wilimaa.
MAR 9:49 Ku nsoko kila ung'wi uku aswa nu moto.
MAR 9:50 uMunyu ingi uziza, anga u munyu ulimilye i kinagunagu kakwe, uku utenda uli utule niki nagunagu kakwe hangi? Mutule nu munyu mukati anyu akola, hangi mutule nu ulyuuku ku kila ung'wi.”
MAR 10:1 uYesu ai uhegile i kianza nikanso nu kulongola mu mukoa nua Ayahudi ni kianza nika ntongeela a mongo nua Yordani, hangi anyianza akamutyata hangi. Ai uamanyisilye hangi, anga nai yatulaa ntendo akwe kituma.
MAR 10:2 Hangi i Afarisayo akapembya kumugema hangi akamukolya, “Ingi taine ku mugoha kutemanuka nu musungu nuakwe?”
MAR 10:3 uYesu aka asukiilya “uMusa ai umulagiiye ntuni?”
MAR 10:4 Akaligitya, “uMusa ai ulekee kukilisa ibada nila kutemanuka hangi kumuzunsa u musungu.”
MAR 10:5 “Ingi ku nsoko a ukaku nua nkolo nianyu yiyo ndogoelyo ai umukilisiiye ilagiilo ili.” uYesu ai uatambuie.
MAR 10:6 “Kuiti kupuma u ng'wandyo nua u umbwa, 'Itunda ai ua umbile mugoha nu musungu.'
MAR 10:7 Ku nsoko iyi u mitunja ukumuleka u tata nuakwe nu nyinya nuakwe ukuambinkana nu mukima nuakwe,
MAR 10:8 hangi awo nia biili akutula muili ung'wi; ku nsoko shanga a biili hangi, ila muili ung'wi.
MAR 10:9 Ku lulo nuika kiambinkania Itunda, u ng'wana adamu waleke kukitemanula.”
MAR 10:10 Nai akatula mukati ito, amanyisigwa akwe akamukolya hangi kutula ili.
MAR 10:11 Aka atambuila, “Wihi nuimulekaa umusungu nuakwe nu kutina musungu mungiiza, wituaa ugoolya ku ng'wakwe.
MAR 10:12 Umusungu nu ng'wenso aga wamuleke u mugoha nuakwe nu kutinwa nu mugoha mungiiza, ukituma ugoolya.”
MAR 10:13 Ni enso ai amuletee ang'yinya niao nia niino iti waatenie, kuiti amanyisigwa aka apatya.
MAR 10:14 Kuiti uYesu nai ulilingile nilanso, Shanga akaloeligwa ni lyenso lukulu aka aila, “Alekeli i ang'yinya nia niino aze kitalane, hangi leki kuagilyi, ku nsoko niili anga awa u utemi nuang'wa Itunda ingi wao.
MAR 10:15 I tai kumutambuila, wihi nishanga uku usingiilya u utemi nuang'wa Itunda anga mung'yinya nu muniino kulu kuulu shanga uhumile kingila mu utemi nuang'wa Itunda.
MAR 10:16 Uugwa aka ahola i ang'yinya mu mikono akwe nu kuakendepa waze aikiilya mikono akwe migulya ao.
MAR 10:17 Hangi nai wakandya muhinzo nuakwe muntu ung'wi ai umu mankiie hangi akatugama ntongeela akwe, aka mukolya, “Ng'walimu Mukende, nitume ntuni iti nihume kusala u upanga nua kali na kali?”
MAR 10:18 Nu Yesu akaligitya, “Ku niki ukunintanga mukende? Kutili niiza mukende, kwaala Itunda wing'wene duu.
MAR 10:19 U malingile i malagiilyo; Leka kubulaga, Leka kugoolya, Leka kia, Leka ku kuiila u uteele, Leka kukongela, Mukulye u tata nu ia nuako.”
MAR 10:20 U muntu nuanso akaligitya, “Ng'walimu, aya ihi namakuiye puma nai nkoli ni muhumba.”
MAR 10:21 uYesu ai umugozee nu kumulowa. Akamutambuila, “Ukepewe kintu king'wi. Utakiwe kugulya yihi nuatuile ni nyenso nu kuinkiilya i aula, hangi ukutula ni itulyo kilunde. Uugwa upembye untyate.”
MAR 10:22 Kuiti aka hung'wa ukata kunsoko a uganulwa uwu; ai uhegile aze uhukilye, ku nsoko ai ukete nsao idu.
MAR 10:23 uYesu akihenga nkika yihi nu kua tambuila i amanyisigwa akwe, “Ingi kinya uli niyili ikaku ku mugoli kingila mu utemi nuang'wa Itunda!
MAR 10:24 Amanyisigwa ai akuiwe ku makani aya. Kuiti uYesu aka atambuila hangi, “Ang'yinya, ingi kinya uli ni yili ikaku kingia mu utemi nuang'wa Itunda!
MAR 10:25 Ingi itontu ku ngamia kingila mu nzuunki a lusinge, kukila muntu nu mugoli kingila mu utemi nuang'wa Itunda.”
MAR 10:26 Ai akuiwe nangaluu hangi akitambullya, “Iti gwa nyenyu ukugunika”
MAR 10:27 uYesu aka agoza nu kuligitya, “Kung'wa bina adamu shanga ihumikile, kuiti shanga kung'wa Itunda. Ku nsoko mung'wa Itunda ihi ahumikile.”
MAR 10:28 uPetro akandya kuligitya nu ng'wenso, “Goza kulekile yihi hangi kakutyata.”
MAR 10:29 uYesu akaligitya, “I tai kumuila unyenye, kutili nualekilee ito ang'wi heu, ang'wi muluna musungu, ang'wi nyinya, ang'wi tata, ang'wi ana, ang'wi mugunda, ku nsoko ane, ni kunsoko a nkani ni nziza,
MAR 10:30 naize shanga ukusingiilya nkua igana ikilo a itungili papa mi ihi; Ito, heu, muluna musungu, nyinya, ana, nu mugunda, ku lwago, nu unkumbigulu nu upembilye, upanga mua kali na kali.
MAR 10:31 Kuiti idu niaile ang'wandyo akutula a ng'wisho hang ni aile a ng'wisho akutula a ng'wandyo.”
MAR 10:32 Nai atula munzila, kulongola ku Yerusalemu, uYesu ai watulaa utongee ntogeela ao. Amanyisigwa ai akuiwe, hangi awo nai atulaa atyatile ku nyuma ai itumbile. Uugwa uYesu akaapumya ku mpelo hangi awo ni ikumi na abiili nu kandya kuatambuila naiza kikumupumila iti pakupi;
MAR 10:33 Goza, kulongoe kupikiila ku Yerusalemu, nu Ng'wana nuang'wa Adamu ukupikigwa ku akuhani ni akulu ni amanyi. Akumulamula washe hangi akumupumya ku anyaigu.
MAR 10:34 Akumukuna, akumutyila i mate, akumukua milanga, hangi akumubulaga. Kuiti ze yakilaa mahiku ataatu ukiuka.”
MAR 10:35 uYakobo nu Yohana, ana ang'wa Zebedayo, ai azile kitalakwe nu kumutambuila, “Ng'walimu, kuloilwe ukutendeele kihi ni ku ukulompa.”
MAR 10:36 Ai uatambuie, “Muloilwe numutendeele ntuni?”
MAR 10:37 Akaligitya, “Ukugombye kikie nu ewe mi ikulyo nilako, ung'wi mu mukono nuako nua kigoha nu muya mukono nuako nua ki kima.”
MAR 10:38 Kuiti uYesu ai uasukiiye, “Shanga mulingile ni muku kilompa. Muhumilene kuking'wela i kikombe naiza kuking'wela ang'wi kugimya u wogigwa naza nikogigwa?”
MAR 10:39 Akamutambuila, “Kuhumile” uYesu aka atambuila, “ i kikombe ni nika king'wela, mu kuking'wela. Nu wogigwa naza kitalao nogigwe, muku ugimya.
MAR 10:40 Kuiti nuikikie mukono nuane nua kigoha ang'wi nua kikima shanga nene nina kupumya, kuiti ingi ku awo naza kitalao yakondile kuzipiiligwa.”
MAR 10:41 Awo i amanyisigwa auya ikumi nai akija aya, akandya ku atakiila uYakobo nu Yohana.
MAR 10:42 uYesu akaitanga kitalakwe ku kuligitya, “Mulingile kina awo niasigile kina ahumi nia anyaingu i ahumaa, ni antu ao ni ahugu ia lagiila u uhumi migulya ao
MAR 10:43 Kuiti shanga itakiwe kutula iti mukati anyu. Wihi nuloilwe kutula mukulu kati anyu kusinja nua muaiilye,
MAR 10:44 hangi wihi nuloilwe kutula wang'wandyo mu kati anyu ingi kusinja watule mutuung'wa nua ihi.
MAR 10:45 Ku nsoko uNg'wana nuang'wa Adamu shanga aza uzile kuailigwa ila kuailya, nu kulupumya u likalo nulakwe kutula usukiilya ku idu.”
MAR 10:46 Akapembya ku Yeriko. Nai wakatula ukuhega ku Yeriko ni amanyisigwa akwe hangi idale ikulu, ng'wana nuang'wa Timayo, Batimayo, mupoku nuilompaa, ai wikie mpelo ipamda.
MAR 10:47 Nai wakija kina ingi Yesu Munazareti, ai wandilye kuzogolya nu kuligitya, “Yesu, Ng'wana nuang'wa Daudi, mbaisiilye!”
MAR 10:48 Idu ai amupatilye u mupoku uyo, aze mutambuila wakilage. Kuiti ai uliile ku luli ikilo, “Ng'wana nuang'wa Daudi, mbaisiilye!”
MAR 10:49 uYesu ai wimikile nu kulagiilya witangwe. Ai amitangle u mupoku uyo, azeligitya, Kina mukomoli! nyansuka! Yesu ukuitanga.”
MAR 10:50 Akauguma ku mpelo u mujulungu nuakwe. akamanka ikilo, nu kupembya kung'wa Yesu.
MAR 10:51 uYesu akamusukiilya nu kuligitya, “Uloilwe nukutendele ntuni?” U mugoha uyo nu mupoku akasukiilya, “Ng'walimu, ndoilwe kihenga.”
MAR 10:52 uYesu akamuila, “Longola, u uhuiili nuako wakuguna.” Papo paapo i miho akwe akihenga; hangi akamutyata uYesu mi ipanda.
MAR 11:1 Itungo nilanso nai akapembya ku Yerusalemu, Nai akahumbeela ku Besthfage ni Bethania, mu Lugulu nula Mizeituni, uYesu ai ualagiiye abiili mukati a amanyisigwa niakwe
MAR 11:2 hangi ai uatambuie, “Longoli mu kijiji kigozenkanile nu sese. Itungo ni mikingila mung'wanso, mikamuhanga ng'wa andogwe naiza wakili nankilwa. Mutunguili hangi mu mulete kitalane.
MAR 11:3 Hangi anga wihi wamutambuila, “Ku niki mukituma iti?” mutakiwe kuligitya, ' Mukulu umutakile hangi itungo ukumususha papa.”
MAR 11:4 Akalongola nu kumuhanga u ng'waa ndogwe utungilwe kunzi a mumpita mu kisali niking'walyi, ni enso ai amutunguie.
MAR 11:5 Hangi ang'wi a antu nai akoli imikile pa ng'wanso hangi aka atambuila, “Mukituma ntuni, kumutungula u ng'waa ndogwe nuanso?”
MAR 11:6 Ai a atambuie anga uYesu nai ua tambuie, hangi i antu aka aleka alongole.
MAR 11:7 Amanyisigwa a biili ai amuletile u ng'waa ndogwe kung'wa Yesu hangi ai aie ang'wenda ao migulya akwe iti uYesu wahume kumunankila.
MAR 11:8 Antu idu akaila i ang'wenda ao mu balabala, ni auya ai aie ntaambi nai aitemile kupuma mu migunda.
MAR 11:9 Awo nai alongoe ntongeela akwe hangi nawo nai amutyatiie ai azogooye, “Hosiana, Ukendepilwe nupembilye ku ilna nila Mukulu.
MAR 11:10 Ukendepwe u utemi nu upembilye nuang'wa tata itu u Daudi! Hosiana kung'wa nu koli migulya”
MAR 11:11 Uugwa uYesu akingila ku Yerusalemu hangi ai ulongoe mi itekeelo hangi akagoza kila i kintu. Itungili, itungo ai latulaa lalongola, ai ulongoe ku Bethania palung'wi nawo ni ikumi na abiili.
MAR 11:12 Luhiku nai lutyatile, itungo nai atula agomokile kupuma ku Bethania, ai watulaa ni nzala.
MAR 11:13 Hangi akihenga u mutini nai ukete matutu ku kahelu, ai ulongoe kugoza anga ize ai uhumile kulija kihi migulya akwe. Hangi itungo nai watula ulongoe ku nuanso, shanga akalija kihi kwaala matutu, ku nsoko shanga ai matungo a mutini.
MAR 11:14 Ai u utambuie, “Kutili wihi nuikalya i nkali kupuma kitaalako hangi.” Hangi i amanyisigwa akwe akija.
MAR 11:15 Ai azile ku Yerusalemu, nu ng'wenso ai wingie mi itekeelo hangi akandya kuapumya kunzi i agulya ni aguli mukati i itekeelo. Ai uipiue i meza nia akaila mpia ni matuntu a awo nai atulaa akugulya i nkunda.
MAR 11:16 Shanga ai umulekee wihi kukenka kihi mi itekeelo nai kihumile kuguligwa.
MAR 11:17 Ai uamanyisilye hangi akaligitya, “Iti shanga ai ikilisigwe ne, 'ito nilane likitangwa ito nila ikumbiko ku anyaingu ihi?' kuiti malitenda ikulungu nila asapuilang'yi.”
MAR 11:18 Akuhani niakulu ni amanyi ai igulye nai watulaa wiligitya, ni enso ai adumile nzila a ku mubulaga. Ga ni iti ai amogopile ku nsoko i umbi ai likuiwe nu umanyisigwa nuakwe.
MAR 11:19 Hangi kila itungo i mpindi nai ipikile, ai ahegile mu kisali.
MAR 11:20 Nai atula akugenda kidau dau, ai ui hengile u mutini wumile kupikiila mu mili akwe.
MAR 11:21 uPetro ai ukimbukile nu kuligitya, “Rabi! Goza, ikota nila mutini nai u uzumile wumaa.”
MAR 11:22 uYesu ai uasukiiye, “Mutule nu uhuiili mung'wa Itunda.
MAR 11:23 Huiili kumuila kina kila nu iluilaa u lugulu ulu, ' Hega, hangi wigumile u mukola mu luzi, 'hangi anga ize mugila i nkankani mu nkolo akwe kuiti uhuiie kina nukiligitilye kikupumila, iti uu Itunda nuikituma.
MAR 11:24 Ku lulo kumuila; kila i kintu ni mulompile nu kukolya ku nsoko akwe, huiili kina mukusingiilya, ni yenso yukutula yanyu.
MAR 11:25 Matungo ni mukimika nu kulompa, mutakiwe kulekela kihi ni mukikete ku wihi, iti kina uTata nuanyu nukoli kilunde amulekele ga nu nyenye u utumuli nuanyu.
MAR 11:26 (Komaniilya; Ulukiili ulu, “Kuiti angamuhite kulekela, ang'wi uTata nuanyu nukoli kilunde shanga ukulekela i milandu anyu” umutili mu mbugulu nia kali).
MAR 11:27 Nai atulaa ku Yerusalemu hangi. Nu Yesu nai watulaa ukugenda mi itekeelo, akuhani ni akulu, amanyi ni anyampala ai azile kitalakwe.
MAR 11:28 Ai amutambuie, “Ku uhumi kii ukituma i makani aya?” Hangi ingi nyenyu numinkiiye u uhumi nua kituma aya?”
MAR 11:29 uYesu ai uatambuie, “Nikamukolya ikolyo ling'wi. Ntambuili nu nene nikamutambuila ku uhumi kii kituma i makani aya.
MAR 11:30 Itii, u wogigwa nuang'wa Yohana ai upumile kilundene ang'wi ai upumile ku ana adamu? Nsukiilyi.”
MAR 11:31 Ai itambuuye mukati ao nu kikilya nu kuligitya, “Anga kuligitye, 'Kupuma kilunde,' ukuligitya, 'Ku niki gwa shanga ai ku muhuiie?
MAR 11:32 Kuiti anga kuligitye, ' Kupuma ku ana adamu,'...” Ai aogopile i antu, ku nsoko ihi ai a ambiie kina uYohana ai watulaa munyakidagu.
MAR 11:33 Uugwa ai amusukiiye uYesu nu kuligitya, “Shanga kulingile. Uugwa uYesu aka atambuila, “Uugwa nu nene shanga kumutambuila ingi ku uhumi kii kituma i makani aya.
MAR 12:1 Uugwa uYesu ai wandilye kuamanyisa ku mpyani. Akaligitya, “Muntu ai utemee mugunda nua mizabibu, akaukitiila ikito, hangi akahimba ikombo nila kugundikila u muvinyo. Akazenga i kilingasiilyo hangi uugwa aka wiliha u mugunda nua mizabibu ku alimi nia mizabibu. Uugwa ai utungile muhinzo nua kuli.
MAR 12:2 Itungo nai lipikile, ai umulagiiye munyamulimo ku alimi nia mizabibu kusingiilya kihi kupuma kitalao ing'wi nia nkali nia mugunda nua mizabibu.
MAR 12:3 Kuiti ai amuambile, akamukua, hangi akamuzunsa bila kintu.
MAR 12:4 Akalagiilya kitalao munya mulimo mungiiza, akamuaalya kitwe nu kumutendeela makani a minyala.
MAR 12:5 Ikili ai umulagiiye mungiiza, nuyu nu ng'wi akamubulaga. Ai a atendee ni auya idu makani anga yayo yaayo, aze akua ni auya kuabulaga.
MAR 12:6 Ai wakili ukete muntu ung'wi ikilo nua kumulagiilya, ng'wana mulowa. Nu ng'wenso ai watulaa wang'wisho nai ulagiigwe kitalao. Akaligitya, “Akumukulya u ng'wana nuane.”
MAR 12:7 Kuiti i ilihwa akitambulya enso ku enso, “Uyu ng'wenso musali. Pembyi, si ni kumubulage, nu usali ukutula witu
MAR 12:8 Ai amugilinkiiye, akamubulaga nu kumuguma kunzi a mugunda nua mizabibu.
MAR 12:9 Ku lulo, Itii! Ukituma ntuni u mukola hiu nua mugunda nua mizabibu? Ukupembya nu kualimilya i alimi nia mizabibu nu kuwinkiilya u mugunda nua mizabibu ku angiiza.
MAR 12:10 Mukili kulija kusoma u ukilisigwa uwu? “ Igwe naiza ia zengi ai alihitile, latulaa igwe nila kumpelo.
MAR 12:11 Ili ai lipumile ku Mukulu, hangi ingi nila ukuilwa mu miho itu”
MAR 12:12 Ai adumile kumuamba uYesu, Kuiti ai aogopile i anyianza, Kuiti ai alingile kina ai watulaa utambue i mpyani nanso ki italao. Iti gwa ai amulekile akalongola yao.
MAR 12:13 Uugwa aka alagiilya ang'wi a afarisayo ni a herode kitalakwe iti ku mugema ku nkani.
MAR 12:14 Nai akapika, akamuila, “Ng'walimu, kulingile kina shanga ukee i masigo a wihi hangi shanga ulagiie ukuiili kati a antu. Ukumanyisa i nzila ang'wa Itunda mu tai. Itii! ingi tai ane kupumya i kodi kung'wa Kaisari ang'wi ishi? Itii! Kuhumile kupumya ang'wi ishi?
MAR 12:15 Kuiti uYesu ai ulingile u udosi nuao nu kuatambuila, “Kuniki mukungema? Ninkiilyi i dinari nihume kumigoza.”
MAR 12:16 Akaleta ing'wi kung'wa Yesu, Aka atambuila, Itii! ingi ikelu lang'wa nyenyu nu ukilisigwa nu ukoli apa ingi wang'wa nyenyu? Akaligitya, “Wang'wa Kaisari.”
MAR 12:17 uYesu aka atambuila, Minkiilyi u Kaisari i intu niang'wa Kaisari nu Itunda i intu niang'wa Itunda.” Akamukuilwa.
MAR 12:18 Uugwa iAsadukayo, ni iligitya kutili u wiuki, ai akamutyata. Akamukolya, azeligitya.
MAR 12:19 Ng'walimu, uMusa ai ukukilisiiye kina, 'Anga itule u muluna washe nu kumuleka u mukima ku nyuma akwe, Kuiti shanga ulekile ung'wana, muntu ukumuhola u mukima nua muluna nuakwe, nu kiligilya u ng'wana ku nsoko a muluna nuakwe.'
MAR 12:20 Ai akoli ni aluna mupungati, nu ang'wandyo ai uhoile u mukima ni hangi akasha, shanga ai ulekile u ng'wana.
MAR 12:21 Uugwa nua kabiili ai umuhoile nung'wenso akasha, shanga ai ulekile u ng'wana. hangi nua kataatu ga ni iti.
MAR 12:22 Hangi nua mupungati shanga akaleka u ng'wana. Mpelo akwe ga nu musungu akasha.
MAR 12:23 Itungo nila wiukigwa, ni ikiukigwa hangi, Itii! Ukutula mukima wang'wa nyenyu? Kuiti awo i aluna ihi mupungati ai atulaa agoha akwe.”
MAR 12:24 uYesu ai uatambuie, “Itii! Ili shanga nsoko kutula malimiligwaa, ku nsoko shanga mulingile u ukilisigwa ang'wi ngulu niang'wa Itunda?”
MAR 12:25 Itungo nila kiukigwa puma ku ashi, shanga akutina ang'wi kingila mu utinwa, ila akutula anga i amalaika nia kilunde
MAR 12:26 Kuiti, kutula ashi naiza akiukigwa, Itii! Shanga ai musomile kupuma mu mbugulu ang'wa Musa, mu nkani ni yi tunku, iti Itunda nai uligitilye nu kumuila, 'Unene ingi Itunda nuang'wa Abrahamu, hangi Itunda wang'wa Isaka, hangi Itunda wang'wa Yakobo?'
MAR 12:27 Nuanso shanga Itunda nua ashi, ila nua ni akoli apanga. Ingi i kihenga malimilaa.”
MAR 12:28 Ung'wi nua amanyi akapembya nu kija i ntambu ao; ai wihengile kina uYesu ai uasukiiye iziza. Ai umukoiye, Itii! ingi ilagiilyo ni liuli nilikete u usanigwa ikilo mu ihi?”
MAR 12:29 uYesu ai umusukiiye, “Nila kusanigwa ingi sili, “Ije, Israeli, Mukulu Itunda nuitu, Mukulu ingi ung'wi.
MAR 12:30 Kusinja u mulowe uMukulu Itunda nuako, ku nkolo ako ihi, ku Ngwau ng'welu nuako wihi, ku mahala ako ihi, nu ku ngulu niako yihi.'
MAR 12:31 Ilagiilyo nila ka biili ingi sili, 'Kusinja umulowe u munyakisali nuako anga nuiloilwe u mukola.' Kutili ilagiilyo ingiiza ni ikulu kukila aya.”
MAR 12:32 uMumanyi akaligitya, “Iziza Ng'walimu! Uligitilye tai kina Itunda ini ung'wi, ni kina kutili nu mungiiza kukila nuanso.
MAR 12:33 Kumulowa nuanso ku nkolo ihi, nu ku ulingi wihi nu ku ngulu yihi, nu kumulowa u munyakisali anga u mukola, ingi kusanigwa nangaluu kukila i masongelyo ang'wi ipolya nila kulimiligwa.”
MAR 12:34 Itungo uYesu nai wakihenga kina wapumya isosho nila upolo, akamutambuila, “Uewe shanga ukoli kuli nu utemi nuang'wa Itunda.” Ze yakilaa pang'wanso kutili ga nung'wi nai ugemile kumukolya uYesu makolyo ihi.
MAR 12:35 Hangi uYesu ai usukiiye, itungo nai watula ukumanyisa mu itekeelo, akaligitya, “Itii! amanyi iligitya kina uKristo ingi ng'wana wang'wa Daudi?
MAR 12:36 uDaudi mukola mu Ng'wau Ng'welu, ai uligitilye, 'uMukulu ai uligitilye ku Mukulu nuane, ikie mu mukono nuane nua kugoha, kupikiila niazipye i alugu niako kutula pihi a migulu ako.'
MAR 12:37 uDaudi mukola wimitangaa uKristo, 'Mukulu' Itii! ingi ng'wana wang'wa Daudi kinya uli?” Hangi milundo ukulu ai umutegeeye ku ulowa.
MAR 12:38 Mu umanyisigwa nuakwe uYesu ai uligitilye, “Ikendegeeli nia manyi, niakete i nsula akugenda nia mujulungu nialipu nu kulamukigwa mu masoko
MAR 12:39 nu kikie mu matuntu a akulu mu matekeelo nu mu siku kuu ku nkika nia akulu.
MAR 12:40 Akulya ga ni mato a ahimbi hangi akulompa malompi malipu iti kina i antu aihenge. Antu awa akusingiilya u ulamula nu ukulu.”
MAR 12:41 Uugwa uYesu ai wikie pihi pakupi ni isandiko nila masongelyo mukati a nkika itekeelo; Ai watula ukugoza antu nai atulaa akuikila i mpia niao mukati i sandiko. Antu idu i agoli ai aikie ngele nkulu a ampia.
MAR 12:42 Uugwa musungu muhimbi muula ai uzile nu kuikila ipande ibiili, nsailo a senti.
MAR 12:43 Uugwa akaitanga i amanyisigwa akwe nu kuatambuila, Huiili kumutambuila, u musungu uyu nu muhimbi uikie ngele nkulu ikilo a ihi naza akondya pumya mu isandiko nila masongelyo.
MAR 12:44 Kuiti ihi apumilye kupumiila nu widu nua upuli nuao. Kuiti u musungu uyu nu muhimbi, kupuma mu uula nuakwe, uikie i mpia yihi naza ai utakiwe kuitumila ku likalo nu lakwe.
MAR 13:1 uYesu nai wakatula ukugenda kupuma mi itekeelo, ung'wi nua amanysigwa akwe akamukolya, “Ng'walimu, goza i magwe aya ni aku kuilwa ni mazumba!”
MAR 13:2 Akamutambuila, Ukihenga i mazumba aya ni makulu? Kutili ga nigwe ni ling'wi nilika sagiila migulya a lingiiza ni shanga aza likugwa pihi.”
MAR 13:3 Nu ng'wenso nai wakatula wikie migulya a lugulu nula mizeituni kituli ki itekeelo, uPetro, Yakobo, Yohana nu Andrea akamukolya ku kinkunku.
MAR 13:4 “Kuile, i makani aya akutula nali? Ingi ntuni i kilingasiilyo nika makani aya kupumila?”
MAR 13:5 uYsu ai wandilye kuatambuila, “Tuli miakendegeeli kina mntu wihi waleke kumulimilya.
MAR 13:6 Idu ikapembya ku lina nilane azeligitya 'Unene ng'wenso,' hangi akualimilya idu.
MAR 13:7 Ni mikija ulugu nu pwepwe nua uligu, leki kitumbi; makani aya atakiwe kupumila, kuiti i mpelo ikili.
MAR 13:8 Ihi likunyansuka kikua ni ihi lingiiza, nu utemi nsuta nu utemi. Yikatula ni matetemeko nkika nia kuli ni kuli, hangi nzala. Uwu ingi ng'wandyo nua uwai.
MAR 13:9 Tuli miho. Akumutwala kupikiila mu maanza, hagi mukukuwa mu matekeelo. Mukimikigwa ntongeela a ahumi ni atemi ku nsoko ane, anga ukuiili kitalao.
MAR 13:10 Kuiti i nkani ninza kusinja hanza itanantigwe ku anyaingu ihi.
MAR 13:11 Ni ikatula amuamba nu kuinkiilya, leki kitumbi kutula iko nimukaligitya. Mukati itungo nilanso, mukinkiiligwa ntuni nika kuligitya; shanga mikatula nyenye ni mikaligitya, ila Ng'wau Ng'welu.
MAR 13:12 Munyandugu ukumusemela u muluna kubulagwa, u tata nu ng'wana nuakwe. iAna akimika nsuta a atata ao hangi kuasasha kubulagwa.
MAR 13:13 Mukutakiilwa ni kila u muntu ku nsoko a lina nilane. Kuiti nuikagimya kupikiila i mpelo, muntu nuanso ukugunika.
MAR 13:14 Ni mikihenga utaki nua ubipigwa wimikile pang'wanso ni shanga utakiwe kimika (nukusoma nua linge), papo niamoli mu Yuda amankiile mu malugulu,
MAR 13:15 nu ng'wenso nukoli migulya i ito nualeke kusima pihi ito, ang'wi kuhola kihi nikikoli kunzi,
MAR 13:16 hangi nukoli mu mugunda waleke kusuka kuhola u ng'wenda nuakwe.
MAR 13:17 Kuiti ukia awo i asungu niakete inda nawa niakonsha mu mahiku nanso!
MAR 13:18 Lompi kina ileke kupumila itungo nila ulyuuku.
MAR 13:19 Kuiti yikatula nu lwago lukulu, naiza lukilikaya kupumila, puma Itunda nai u umbile u unkumbigulu, kupikiila itungili, ishi, ang'wi shanga ikapumila hangi.
MAR 13:20 Kupikiila u Mukulu nuikakepya i mahiku. Kutili u muili nuikagunika, kuiti ku nsoko a asagulwa, nuika asagula, wikakepya i namba nia mahiku.
MAR 13:21 Matungo nanso anga ize muntu wihi wika mutambuila, 'Goza, uKristo ukoli apa!' ang'wi 'Goza, ukoli apo!' leki kuhuiili.
MAR 13:22 Kuiti iAkristo nia uteele ni anyakidagu nia uteele akupumila hangi akupumya ilingasiilyo nu ukuilwa, iti kina, amukongele, nsigile ga ni asagulwa.
MAR 13:23 Tuli miho! Nakondyaa mutambuila aya ze akili i matungo.
MAR 13:24 Kuiyi ze yakilaa u lwago nula mahiku nanso, i lyoa likuikilwa kiti, u ng'weli shanga ukupumya u welu nuakwe,
MAR 13:25 i nzota yukugwa kupuma kilunde, ni ingulu ni ikoli kilunde yukuhingiika.
MAR 13:26 Papo ni ikamihenga u Ng'wana wang'wa Adamu upembilye mu malunde ku ngulu nkulu ni ikulyo.
MAR 13:27 Papo ukulagiilya i amalaika akwe hagi ukuilingiila palung'wi i asagulwa akwe kupuma nkika inne ni yihi, kupuma i mpelo nui ihi kupikiila i mpelo ilunde.
MAR 13:28 Ku mutini imanyisi. Anga itambi nili humile kupumya nu kuika u ukende mu matutu akwe, papo mukulinga kina i kipasu kikoli pakupi.
MAR 13:29 Uu gwa yili, nimikihenga i makani aya anga apumile, lingi kina ukoli pakupi, ni mimpita.
MAR 13:30 Tai, kumuili, uwu u ulelwa shanga ukukila kuli ze akili imakani aya kupumila.
MAR 13:31 Ilunde ni ihi yukukila, kuiti imakani ane shanga akukila lukulu. Kuiti kutula luhiku nulanso ang'wi saa,
MAR 13:32 kutili nulingile, ga nia malaika nia kilunde, ang'wi Ng'wana, ila Tata.
MAR 13:33 Tuli miho, Gozi, ku nsoko shanga mulingile ingi itungo kii akupumila. (Komaniilya; U lukiili ulu, “Mutule miakendegeeli, Gozeeli hangi lompi ku nsoko .....” umutili mu mbugulu nia kali).
MAR 13:34 Ingi anga umuntu nulongoe muhinzo; wakaleka ito nilakwe, nu kumuika u mutuung'wa nuakwe kutula muhumi nu ito, kila ung'wi nu mulimo nuakwe. Nu kumulagiilya u musunja kikie miho.
MAR 13:35 Ku lulo tuli miho! Kuiti shanga mulingile ingi nali u mukulu nu ito nuikagomoka ki ito, ihumikile ingi mpindi, utiku nuigingu, itungo nila nsambaligugu ni ikakunkula, ang'wi kidau dau.
MAR 13:36 Anga waze kupumpugiilya, waleke kuhanga ulae.
MAR 13:37 Iko ni kukiligitya ku kila u muntu; Huguki!”
MAR 14:1 Ai yatulaa mahiku abiili duu ze yakilaa i siku kuu a pasaka nulu nula mikate Ni shanga I ikiwe i igai. Akuhani niakulu ni amanyi ai atulaa akuduma nzila akumuamba uYesu ku uhugu nu kumubulaga.
MAR 14:2 Ku nsoko ai aligitya, “Shanga itungo lili nila siku kuu, antu aleke kuza kituma u minyomo.”
MAR 14:3 Matungo uYesu nai ukoli ku Bethania mi ito kung'wa Simioni munyambili, hangi nai wakatula utungile mu meza, musungu ung'wi ai uzile kitalakwe waze ukete i nsupa a manyunkiilo a nardo nziza ikete nsailo nkulu nangaluu, ai umibunangile i nsupa nu kumadubunsha migulya itwe nilakwe.
MAR 14:4 Kuiti ai akoli ang'wi ao nai atakile. Ai itambuie enso ku enso azeligitya, “Ingi ntuni insoko a ulimilyi uwu?
MAR 14:5 Manyunkiilo aya aza azeeguligwa ku dinari magana ataatu ni ikilo, hangi apegwe i aula.” Ni enso ai amupatilye.
MAR 14:6 Kuiti uYesu ai uligitilye, “Muleki wing'wene duu. Ku niki mukumunyoma? Witumile ikani iza kitalane.
MAR 14:7 Mahiku ihi i aula muakete, hangi itungo lihi ni mukuhung'wa i nsula muhumile kituma ni maza kitalao, kuiti shanga mukutula nu nene itungo lihi.
MAR 14:8 Witumile iko nukihumile, u upuguhie u muili nuane i makuta ku nsoko a uikwi.
MAR 14:9 Tai kuimuili, kila i kianza i nkani ninza niuku tanantigwa mu unkumbigulu wihi, iko nukitumile u musugu uyu kikutambulwa ku ukimbukiilyi nuakwe.
MAR 14:10 Uugwa uYuda Iskariote, ung'wi nua awo ikumi na abiili, ai ulongoe ku akulu a akuhani iti kina walije kuminkiilya kitalao.
MAR 14:11 Matungo i akulu a Akuhani nai igulye ili, ai iloile hangi akalaga kuminkiilya mpia. Ai wandilye kuduma ilyoma nila kuminkiilya kitalao.
MAR 14:12 Mu luhiku nula ng'wandyo nula mkate nishanga uikiwe i igai, itungo nai apumilye u ng'waa nkolo nua pasaka, amanyisigwa niakwe ai amutambuie, “Uloilwe kulongole pii kuzipiilye iti ulije kulya u ludya nula pasaka?”
MAR 14:13 Ai ua lagiiye amanyisigwa akwe abiili nu kuatambuila, “Longoli mu kisali, nu mitunja naiza ukenkile i ntunda ukiona nu nyenye. Mutyati.
MAR 14:14 Ito nuikingila, mutyati hangi mutambuili u mukola ito nilanso, ' Ung'walimu uligitilye, Kikoli pii i shumba nika aziila kianza ni nikalila i pasaka ni amanyisigwa ane?”
MAR 14:15 Ukumulagiila i shumba nika migulya kikulu ni kikete i iseme niize kikoli kikondile. Itumi u uzipiilya ku nsoko itu pang'wanso.”
MAR 14:16 Amanyisigwa ai ahegile akalongola mu kisali; ai ahangile kila ikintu anga nai watulaa uatambuie, hangi akazipiilya u ludya nula pasaka.
MAR 14:17 Matungo nai yatula mpindi, ai upembilye ni awo ikumi na abili.
MAR 14:18 Hangi nai akatula akumihumbeela i meza nu kulya, uYesu ai uligitilye, Tai kumutambuila, umg'wi kati anyu nukulya palung'wi nu nene ukungumaniilya.”
MAR 14:19 Ihi akasiga ikulu, hangi ung'wi ze yakilaa u muya ai amutambuie, “Kulu kuulu shanga u nene?”
MAR 14:20 uYesu ai usukiiye nu kuatambuila, “Ingi ung'wi nua ikumi na abiili kati anyu, ung'wi naiza itungili ukuliilya ipuli mi bakuli palung'wi nu nene.
MAR 14:21 Ku soko uNg'ana wang'wa Adamu ukulongola anga uu u ukilisigwa nu uligitilye migulya akwe. Kuiti ukia nuakwe u muntu uyo naiza kukiila nuanso u Ng'wana wang'wa Adamu ukugumaniilgwa! Aza izeetula iziza kunkilinkiila ku ng'wakwe anga ize u muntu nuanso ai uzeeleka kutugwa
MAR 14:22 Hangi nai atula akulya, uYesu ai uhoile u mukate, akaukendepa, nu ku uega. Akainkiilya wazeligitya, “Holi. Uwu ingi muili nuane.”
MAR 14:23 Ai uhoile i kikombe, akalumbiilya, hangi akainkiilya, hangi ihi akaking'wela.
MAR 14:24 Ai uatambuie, “Iyi ingi sakami ane na wigombya, sakami ni hunuka ku nsoko a idu.
MAR 14:25 Tai kumutambuila, shanga kung'wa hangi mu nkali iyi na muzabibu kupikiila u luhiku ulo ni nikang'wa nu upya mu utemi nuang'wa Itunda.”
MAR 14:26 Nai akondya kimba u wimbo, ai alongoe kunzi mulugulu nula mizeituni.
MAR 14:27 uYesu ai uatambuie, “Unyenye mihi mukibagula kuli ku nsoko ane, ku nsoko ikilisigwe, 'Nikamukua u mudimi ni nkolo yukusapatila.'
MAR 14:28 “Kuiti ze yakila ku iuka kitalane, nikamutongeela ntongeela anyu ku Galilaya.”
MAR 14:29 uPetro ai umutambuie, “Anga itye ihi ga akuuleka, unene shanga kuuleka.”
MAR 14:30 uYesu ai umutambuie, “Tai nakutambuila, u utiku uwu, ze ikili i nsambaligugu ku kunkula nkua ibiili, wikatula wanihita nkua itaatu.”
MAR 14:31 Kuiti uPetro ai uligitilye, “Anga insinje ga nu kusha palung'wi nu ewe, shanga ku uhita.”Ihi ai apumilye ilago lilo liilo.
MAR 14:32 Ai apembilye mu nkika nai itangwaa Gethsemane, nu Yesu ai uatambuie i amanyisigwa akwe, “Ikii papa itungo ni kikumbika.”
MAR 14:33 Ai uahoile u Petro, Yakobo nu Yohana palung'wi nu ng'wenso, akandya kuhung'wa kinya uwai nu kaga nangaluu.
MAR 14:34 Ai uatambuie ung'yenyi nuane ukete kinya uwai nangaluu, ga insha. Sagi papa nu kelya.”
MAR 14:35 uYesu ai ulongoe ntongeela iniino, akagwa pihi, akalompa, anga ize ihumikile, kina isaa iyi aza ize muhuga.
MAR 14:36 Ai uligitilye, “Aba, Tata, Makani ihi kitalako ahumikile. Nihegelye i kikombe iki. Kuiti shanga ku ulowa nuane, ila ulowa nuako.”
MAR 14:37 Ai ugomokile nu kua hanga alala, hangi aka mutambuila uPetro, “Simioni, itii walalane? Shanga wahuma kelya ga i saa ing'wi?
MAR 14:38 Huguki hangi mulompe muleke kingila mu mageng'wa. Kulu kuulu i nkolo ikoli iziza, kuiti u muili ingi unementaalu.”
MAR 14:39 Ai ulongoe hangi nu kulompa, hangi ai utumie makani yayo yaayo.
MAR 14:40 Ai upembilye hangi waka ahanga alala, kunsoko miho ao ai atulaa malito hangi shanga ai alingile ntuni nika kumutambuila.
MAR 14:41 Ai uzile nkua aka taatu nu kuatambuila, Mukili mulae nu kusupyaa? Yakonda! isaa apikaa. Goza! uNg'wana wang'wa Adamu ukugumaniiligwa mu mikono a anya milandu.
MAR 14:42 Uki, kwini. Goza, uyo nuendaa ngumaniilya ukoli pakupi.”
MAR 14:43 Itungo udu nai watula wakili ukuligitya, uYuda, ung'wi nua awo ni ikumi na abiili, ai upikile, ni idale ikulu kupuma kuakulu a akuhani, amanyi ni anyampala akete i mpanga ni idunkuli.
MAR 14:44 Itungo nilanso u mugumaniilyi nuakwe ai watulaa uinkiiye kilingasiilyo, wazeligitya. Uyo ni nikamulungila, ng'wenso. Muambi nu kumutwala pihi a usunji.”
MAR 14:45 Itungo u Yuda nai upikile, kang'wi duu ai ulongoe kung'wa Yesu nu kuligitya, “Ng'walimu!” Hangi akamulungila.
MAR 14:46 Uugwa akamuika pihi a usunji nu kumuamba.
MAR 14:47 Kuiti ung'wi kati ao nai wimikile pakupi nu ng'wenso ai uhopoe i mpanga akwe akamukua u munyamilimo wang'wa kuhani nu mukulu nu kumutema u kutwi.
MAR 14:48 uYesu ai uatambuie, “Mupembilye kumamba ku mapanga ni idunkuli anga muhegelanyi?
MAR 14:49 Matungo kila luhiku ai nkoli nu nyenye hangi nizemanyisa mi itekeelo, shanga ai mumambile. Kuiti ili litumikile iti ukilisigwa ukondaniile.
MAR 14:50 Hangi awo ihi nai akoli nu Yesu ai amulekile nu kumanka.
MAR 14:51 Muhumba ung'wi ai umutyatile, hangi ai watulaa utugae u mugolole udu ai watulaa wikumbile kitaligiilya; ai amuambile kuiti
MAR 14:52 ai uatigie akauleka u mugolole papo akamanka kipwi.
MAR 14:53 Nai akamutongeela uYesu kung'wa kuhani nu mukulu. Pang'wanso ai ilundiie palung'wi nu ng'wenso i akuhani ni akulu ihi, anyampala, ni amanyi.
MAR 14:54 uPeto nu ng'wenso ai umutyatile uYesu ku kuli, kutunga mi itando nilang'wa kuhani nu mukulu. Ai wikie palung'wi ni asunja, nai atulaa pakupi nu moto akaze ota iti kulija upyu.
MAR 14:55 Matungo nanso akuhani niakulu ihi ni ianza lihi ai atulaa akuduma ukuiili kung'wa Yesu iti alije kumubulaga. Kuiti shanga ikaulija.
MAR 14:56 Ku nsoko antu idu ai aletile ukuiili nua uteele ku ngwaakwe, kuiti ga nu ukuiili nuao shanga ukimpyana
MAR 14:57 Ang'wi ao ai imikile nu kuleta ukuiili nua uteele ku ng'waakwe; azeligitya,
MAR 14:58 “Aza kigulye ukuligitya, 'Nikalibipya itekeelo ili nai lizipigwe ku mikono, nu mukati a mahiku a taatu nikikalizenga ingiiza ni shanga lizipigwe ku mikono.”
MAR 14:59 Kuiti ga nu ukuiili nuao shanga ukimpyana.
MAR 14:60 Kuhani nu mukulu ai wimikile pakati ao nu kumukolya uYesu, “Itii umugila isosho? Antu awa akukuiila ntuni kitalako?”
MAR 14:61 Kuiti ai wikie ihi twii hangi shanga ai usukiiye kihi. Itungo u kuhani nu mukulu ai umukoiye hangi, “Itii u ewe ingi wi Kristo, ng'wana wang'wa Mukendepwa?”
MAR 14:62 uYesu ai uligitilye, “Unene ng'wenso. Hangi wikumihenga uNg'wana wang'wa Adamu wikie mukono nua kigoha nua ngulu upembilye ni malunde a kilunde.”
MAR 14:63 uKuhani nu mukulu ai utamue i ang'wenda akwe nu kuligitya, “Itii, kukili kuloilwe akuiili?
MAR 14:64 Migulye i kimeli. Ulamuli nuanyu nu uli?” Hangi ihi ai amulamue anga ung'wi nai utakiwe insha.
MAR 14:65 Ang'wi akandya kumutyila i mati nu kumukunikila u usu nu kumukua nu kumutambuila, “Lota!” A ofisa ai amuhoile nu kumukua.
MAR 14:66 Hangi uPetro nai wakatula wakili ukoli pihi mitando, munyamulimo ung'wi nua kisungu nuang'wa kuhani nu mukulu akapembya kitalakwe.
MAR 14:67 Ai umihengile uPetro nai wimikile ukota u moto, hangi ai umugozile ku kumuhumbeela. Uugwa ai uligitilye, “Nu ewe ga aza ukoli nu Munazareti, uYesu.”
MAR 14:68 Kuiti ai uhitile, wazeligitya, “Shanga ningile hangi shanga manyile kutula iko nukuligitya!” Uugwa ai upumile akalongola kunzi itando. (Komaniilya; U lukiili ulu, “Hangi i nsambaligugu ikakunkula” umutili mu mbugulu nia akali).
MAR 14:69 Kuiti munyamulimo nua kisungu pang'wanso, ai umihengile nu kandya kuatambuila hangi awo naza akoli imikile pang'wanso, “uMuntu uyu ingi ung'wi ao!”
MAR 14:70 Kuiti ai uhitile hangi. Panyambele iniino awo nai atulaa imikile pang'wanso ai atulaa akumumbuila uPetro, “Kulu kuulu u ewe ingi wi ung'wi ao, ku ndogoelyo ga nu ewe ingi wi Mugalilaya.”
MAR 14:71 Kuiti ai wandilye ki ika u mukola pihi a kizumo nu kulapa, “Shanga numulingile u muntu uyu ni muku mutambula.”
MAR 14:72 Uugwa i nsambaligugu ikakunkula kabiili. Uugwa uPetro ai ukimbukiiye i makani naiza uYesu ai watulaa umutambuie; “Ze ikili i nsambaligugu ku kunkula nkua ibiili, ukunihita nkua itaatu.” Hangi ai ugwie pihi nu kulila.
MAR 15:1 Kidau dau maniambwa akulu a akuhani ai atankanila palung'wi ni anyampala ni amanyi ni ianza lihi nila anyampala. Uugwa akamutunga uYesu akamutwala kung'wa Pilato. uPilato akamukolya, “U ewe ingi wi mutemi nua Ayahudi?”
MAR 15:2 Akasukiilya, “U ewe ukuligitya nianso.”
MAR 15:3 Akulu a akuhani akaganula u usemelwa widu migulya ang'wa Yesu.
MAR 15:4 uPilato akamukolya hangi, “Shanga ukusukiilya kihi? Shanga wihengile iti niaku usemela ku makani idu?
MAR 15:5 Kuiti uYesu shanga ai umusukiiye uPilato, hangi nianso ai imukuie.
MAR 15:6 Ku u udu itungo nila siku kuu wimutunguila mutugwa ung'wi, mutungwa niize amulompile.
MAR 15:7 Ai amoli atumuli mu kadulumu, mukati ao i abulagi mu kati a nai apilukile ni akutumikila u utumuli nuao. Ai ukoli muntu ung'wi nuitangwa Baraba.
MAR 15:8 Iumbi ai lipembilye kung'wa Pilato, nu kumulompa witume anga nai witumile uko kunyuma.
MAR 15:9 uPilatto aka asukiilya nu kuligitya, “Muloilwe numutunguilye u mutemi nua Ayahudi?”
MAR 15:10 Ku nsoko ai ulingile ingi ku nsoko a wilu akulu a akuhani ai amuambile uYesu nu kumuleta kitalakwe.
MAR 15:11 Kuiti akulu a akuhani ai akinyiie i umbi ku kua i yogo ku luli kina watunguilwe u Baraba badala akwe
MAR 15:12 uPilato aka asukiilya hangi nu kuligitya, “Numutende ntuni u mutemi nua Ayahudi?
MAR 15:13 Akakua iyogo hangi, “Maje!”
MAR 15:14 uPilato akaligitya, “Witumile ikani kii ni bibi?” Kuiti akakilinkiilya kukua iyogo ikilo ni ikilo “Maje.'
MAR 15:15 uPilato waze uloilwe kuliloeelyai umbi, aka atunguilya uBaraba. Akamukua uYesu i mikoha uugwa akamupumya iti wagigwe.
MAR 15:16 Ia Asikali ai amutongile uYesu kupikiila mukati itando (ilo nilikoli mukati a nkambi) hangi ai ilingiile palung'wi idale nila asikali.
MAR 15:17 Akamutugala uYesu mujulungu nua ung'ole nua zambalau, hangi akapotya i ngala amija akamutugala.
MAR 15:18 Akandya kumukunka nu kuligitya, 'Milamu, Mutemi nua Ayahudi!”
MAR 15:19 Akamukua mi itwe ku mulanga nu kumutyila i mati. Akatugama ntongeela akwe ku kumukulya.
MAR 15:20 Nai akondya ga nu kumukunka, akamutugula u mujulungu nua ung'ole nua zambarau nu kumutugala i ang'wenda akwe, hangi akamupumya kunzi kulongola ku maja.
MAR 15:21 Akamusinja mukila nzila kumuaiilya, nai watulaa ukingila mu kisali kupuma ku mugunda. Nuitangwaa Simioni Mukirene ( tata nuakwe u Iskanda nu Rufo); Akamusinja kukenka ikota nila mpaga nilang'wa Yesu
MAR 15:22 Ia Askali akamutwala uYesu kianza ni kitangwaa Golgotha (ndogoelyo a mpyani iyi ingi Ing'ang'a litwe).
MAR 15:23 Akaminkiilya magai na ahalinkanigwe ni manemane, kuiti shanga ai ung'wee.
MAR 15:24 Akamaja hangi akagalana i ang'wenda akwe, akamakuila i kula kulamula i kipande nuikalija kila u asikali.
MAR 15:25 Ipikiie saa tatu kidau dau nai amagilye.
MAR 15:26 Akaika migulya akwe ibada nilikilisigwe u usemelwa. “Mutemi ua Ayahudi.”
MAR 15:27 Akamaja palung'wi ni a himbi abiili, ung'wi ipande nilakwe nila kigoha nu muya ki kima ku ng'waakwe.
MAR 15:28 (Komaniilya; Ulukiili ulu. “Nu ukilisigwa ukakondaniila nai uligitigwe “ umutili mu mbugulu nia kali).
MAR 15:29 Nawo nai atulaa akukila ai amutukie, aze hingisa i matwe ao nukuligitya, “Aha! u ewe nuikalibunanga i itekeelo nu kulizenga ku mahiku ataatu,
MAR 15:30 Igune mukola hangi usime pihi puma mikota nila mpaga!”
MAR 15:31 Ku ndogoelyo yiyo yiiyo akulu a akuhani ai amusensile azitambulya, palung'wi ni amanyi nu kuligitya, “Ai uagunile i auya, kuiti shanga uhumile kiguna u mukola.
MAR 15:32 Kristo Mutemi nua Israeli, sima pihi puma mikota nila mpaga, iti kuhume kihenga nu kuhuiila.” Hangi awo nai agigwe palung'wi nu ng'wenso ga ai amusensile.
MAR 15:33 Nai ipikile i saa mutandatu, kiti kikapembya migulya ihi ihi kupikiila i saa kenda.
MAR 15:34 Itungo nila saa kenda, uYesu akazogolya ku luli lukulu, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” ize ituile ni ndogoelyo, “Itunda nuane, ku niki nuandeka?”
MAR 15:35 Ang'wi a awo nai imikile nai akija akaligitya, “Goza, ukumitanga Eliya.”
MAR 15:36 Muntu ung'wi akamanka, akizulya i siki misali nu kumiikila migulya amulanga, akaminkiilya iti wang'we. Muntu ung'wi akaligitya, “Lindiila kihenge anga ize u Eliya ukupembya kumusimya pihi.”
MAR 15:37 Uugwa uYesu akalila ku luli lukulu nu kusha.
MAR 15:38 Ipazia ni li tekeelo likagalanuka ipande ibiili puma migulya kupikiila pihi.
MAR 15:39 uOfisa ung'wi nai watulaa wimikile waze umutungile uYesu, nai wakihenga wakuza ku kinya iti, akaligitya, “Tai u muntu uyu ai watulaa Ng'wana wang'wa Itunda.”
MAR 15:40 Ai akoli ga niasungu nai atulaa akugoza ku kuli. Mukati ao ai ukoli uMariamu Magdalena, Mariamu (nyinya nuakwe u Yakobo muniino wang'wa Yose), nu Salome.
MAR 15:41 Matungo nai akoli ku Galilaya ai amutyatile nu kumuaiilya. Ga ni asungu angiiza idu ai ityatinkanilye kupikiila ku Yerusalemu.
MAR 15:42 Nai yatula mpindi, hangi kunsoko ai ituile luhiku nula wihambi, luhiku ze ikili u luhiku nula kusupya.
MAR 15:43 uYusufu nua ku Arimathaya ai uzile pang'wanso. Ai watulaa munyianza nai ukuigwe muntu nu ulindiie u utemi nuang'wa Itunda. Ku ukamatiku akalongola kung'wa Pilato, nu kumulompa u muili nuang'wa Yesu.
MAR 15:44 uPilato akakuilwa kina uYesu yakondaa wakuza; akamitanga u afisa uyo akamukolya anga ize uYesu wakuza.
MAR 15:45 Nai wakalija i kulu kuulu kung'wa Afia kina wakuza, ai umugombilye uYusufu ku uhola u muili.
MAR 15:46 uYusufu ai watulaa wagula i sanda. Akamusimya puma mikota nila mpaga, akamutunga ku sanda, nu kumuika mukati a kibiila nai kihimbilwe mi italagwe. Uugwa akalipingiltya igwe mu mulango nua kibiila.
MAR 15:47 uMariamu Magdalena nu Mariamu nyinya wang'wa Yose ai ihengile i kipango nai uikilwe uYesu
MAR 16:1 Matungo u luhiku nula kusupya nai laula, uMariamu Magdalena nu Mariamu nyinya nuakwe u Yakobo, nu Salome, ai aguile manyunkiilo maziza, iti ahume kupembya nu ku upuguhila i makuta u muili wang'wa Yesu ku nsoko a uikwi.
MAR 16:2 Kidau dau mania mbwa luhiku nula ng'wandyo nula wiki, ai alongoe mu kibiila itungo i lyoa nai litolokile.
MAR 16:3 Azitambulya enso ku enso, “Nyenyu ukulipingilitya igwe ku nsoko itu iti kingile mu kibiila?”
MAR 16:4 Itungo nai agozile, ai amihengile muntu wakondya kulipingilitya igwe, naiza lituile ikulu nangalu.
MAR 16:5 Akingila mu kibiila nu kumihenga muhumba utugae mujulungu ng'welu, wikie ipande nila kigoha, hangi akakuilwa.
MAR 16:6 Aka atambuila, “Leki kitumbi. Mukumuduma Yesu, nua ku Nazareti, naza wagigwe. Wiuka! Wimutili apa. Goza i nkika apo naza atulaa amuikile.
MAR 16:7 Longoli, muatambuile i amanyisigwa akwe nu Petro nia kina wamutongeela kutunga ku Galilaya. Kung'wanso mukumihenga, anga nai watulaa umutambuie.”
MAR 16:8 Akahega nu kumanka kupuma mu kibiila; ai akagatile nuku kuilwa. Shanga ai aligitilye kihi ku muntu wihi nsoko ai itumbile nangaluu.
MAR 16:9 (Komaniilya; Mbugulu nia kali ngila u Marko 16: 9-20) Dau ni nkulu mu luhiku nula ng'wandyo nula wiki, ze yakilaa kiuka, ai umupumie hanza uMariamu Magdalena, naiza kupuma kitalakwe ai umupumiiye a hing'wi mupungati.
MAR 16:10 Ai uhegile nu kuatambuila awo naza atulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso, itungo nai atulaa akusiga ikulu nu kupumya u liholi.
MAR 16:11 Ai igulye kina ingi mupanga hangi wigeelekile nu ng'wenso, kuiti shanga ai amuhuiie.
MAR 16:12 (Komaniilya; Mbugulu nia kali ngila i Marko 16: 9-20) Ze yakilaa nanso, akipumilya ku mpyani isa ku antu angiiza abiili, itungo nai atulaa akugenda kupuma mi ihi.
MAR 16:13 Ai alongoe nu kuatambuila i amanyisigwa ni angiiza nai asagile, kuiti shanga ai a ahuiie.
MAR 16:14 (Komaniilya; Mbugulu nia kali ngila u Marko 16: 9-20) uYesu panyambele akipumilya ku awo ni ikumi na ung'wi nai atulaa ipantamiiye mu meza, hangi aka akenela ku kuhita kuhiiila kitalao nu ukaku nua nkolo, ku nsoko shanga ai ahuiie awo nai amihengile ze yakilaa kiuka kupuma mu ashi.
MAR 16:15 Aka atambuila, “Longoli mu unkumbigulu wihi, nu kutanantya inkani ninza ku intu yihi.
MAR 16:16 Wihi nu uhuiie nu kogigwa ukugunwa, nu uyo ni shanga u huiie ukulamulwa.
MAR 16:17 (Komaniilya; Mbugulu nia kali ngila Marko 16: 9-20) “Ilingasiilyo izi ikityata ni ihi niahuiie. Ku lina nilane akupumya i ahing'wi. Akuligita ku ntambu ngeni.
MAR 16:18 Akuamba i nzoka ku mikono ao, hangi ga nu kung'wa kintu kihi nika kubulaga shanga kikualemaalya. Akuika i mikono ku alwae, nienso akutula apanga.”
MAR 16:19 Ze yakilaa u Mukulu kuligita nienso, akaholwa migulya milunde hangi wikie mukono nua kigoha nuang'wa Itunda.
MAR 16:20 Amanyisigwa akahega nu kutanantya kila kianza, itungo uMukulu ukituma u mulimo nienso nu ku lukaminkiilya u lukani ku miukuilwa ni ilingasiilyo ize yityatinkanilye ni enso
LUK 1:1 Idu naakagupile kuika uza imahumo ayo naakondigwe kung'witu,
LUK 1:2 anga naakupee usese kupuma ung'wandyo naaihengile kumiho nitumi alukani.
LUK 1:3 Kululo unene nanakomanilya ung'wandyo wa nkani izi yihi kupuma ung'wandyo naona uza kitalane hangi kuandikila unoneligwa wakwe mkuligwa wakwe Theofilo.
LUK 1:4 Kina uhume kumanya itai ankani naumanyisigwe.
LUK 1:5 Mumahiku ang'wa Herode, mtemi wa Yuda, aukole umdimi naiwitangwa Zakaria, nuaukoo wang'wa Abia musungu akwe akapuma kuwa nanso ang'wa Haruni, nilina lakwe aiwitangwa Elizabethi.
LUK 1:6 Ihi akete itai pantongeela ang'wi Tunda, aakugenda aziagili anga ubi mumalagilyo ihi na mukulu.
LUK 1:7 Aagila anga ng'wana kunsoko u Elizabeti aimugumba, aya ihi abili aina anyampala.
LUK 1:8 Ikatula na ukituma imilimo akidimi akaziunonelya kuntongeela ang'wi Tunda.
LUK 1:9 Kutyata uigobi naizaigombilye kumupata umudimi nua kenda kunyuunkilya uvumba kunyumba ang'wi Tunda.
LUK 1:10 Ilundo lili nilaantu ailikoli kunzi likazilompa imatungo nuvumba nukutunkiilya.
LUK 1:11 Malaika wa mukulu aupumie akimika mukono wa kigoha wa kikumbikilo la kunyunkilya.
LUK 1:12 U Zakaria wikatinuka nuika muona; uoa wika mugwila.
LUK 1:13 Ingigwa umalaika akamuila, “Leka kogopa Zakaria, kunsoko imalompi ako igigwa u musungu u Elizabethi ukuutugila ung'wana ilina lakwe ukumitanga Yohana.
LUK 1:14 Ukula nuulowa na idu niakuulowa kutu gwa kung'wakwe.
LUK 1:15 Kunsoko ukutula mukulu mumiho amukulu. Sanga ukung'wa idivai anwi ikigalyo nikilulu, ukutula uiizuligwa ng'wa ung'welu kupuma munda ang'wa nyinya.
LUK 1:16 Niantu idu nia Israeli akupiulwa kung'witunda wao.
LUK 1:17 Winzu pantongeela amukulu kunkolo ang'wa aung'welu ningulu yang'wa Eliya. Ukituma iti kunsoko akususha ikolo yaana ingigwa awa nishaigomba ilongola kuwa hugu niatai. Ukituma iti kuaika antu ihambe kumukulu kinoneelya kunsoko akwe.
LUK 1:18 U Zakaria akamuila umalaika, kuhuma uli kuhuma ili? Kunsoko unene nimunyampala numusungu wane imyaka akwila.
LUK 1:19 Umalaika akasusha akamwila unene ni Gabrieli, numika pantongeela ang'wi Tunda. Ntumilwe kuila, ulukani nuluza.
LUK 1:20 Hangi goza, shukuligitya, ukukilaja, shukuhuma kuligitya sunga uluhiku ulo inkani izi ni ziza kupumila iyi kunsoko aulemilwe kuhuili nkani yane niziza yakondaniligwa kumatungo ane.
LUK 1:21 Iantu aamulindie u Zakaria. Ikakuilwa nautinilye mitekeelo.
LUK 1:22 Naiwapuma kunzi singa akahuma kuligitya nung'wenso. Ikalinga kina awa apa akakunukuilwa naukole mitekeelo. Akalongoleka kulagiila iilinga silyo hangi aka kilaja twi.
LUK 1:23 Imahiku amilimo naahila akasuka kitalakwe.
LUK 1:24 Matungo u Zakaria naiwakondya kituma imilimo akwe mitekeelo, umusungu akaamba ulito nuanso singa akapuma mitalakwe nimatungo amyeli itaano, akalunga.
LUK 1:25 Ulu lulu naiwitumile umukulu kitalane kwa uuza kuheja iminyala kuntongeela aantu.”
LUK 1:26 Elizabethi naiwapisha inda amyeli mutandatu, Itunda akamuila umalaika Gabrieli longola kukisali nikitangwa Galilaya ni Nazareti,
LUK 1:27 munanso nauligigwe numuhumba ilina lakwe naiwitangwa Yusufu nuanso amuluna wang'wa Daudi, umunanso nuanso aiwitangwa Mariamu.
LUK 1:28 Akaza kitalakwe akalunga 'Nusigilye uhumi Nukulu Nitunda uloeeigwe.”
LUK 1:29 Kululo inkani u malaika auhalinkanilye akahita kulinga kuniki umalaika atambule imakuilwa akwe.
LUK 1:30 Umalaika akamwila, “Leka kogopa, Mariamu, kunsoko uupatile uhumi kupuma kung'witunda.
LUK 1:31 Goza gwa, ukukenka inda ukutuga ungwana. Ukumitanga Yesu.'
LUK 1:32 Ukutula ngwana nua Mkulu migulya Itunda ukumupa ituntu lanywa Daudi utata akwe.
LUK 1:33 Ukutula mutemi numukulu mukoo wang'wa Yakobo mpaka impelo utemi wakwe ugilangampelo.
LUK 1:34 Mariamu akamwila ikutuika uli, iza nkili kihugeela numitunja wihi?
LUK 1:35 Malaika akamwila akalunga, “Ng'wang'welu ukuuhanga migulya ningulu yako uyu nukutugwa ukitangwa ng'wang'wi Tunda.
LUK 1:36 Goza, umuluna wang'wa Elizabethi ukete nda ang'wana nunyampala wakwe ukete mieli mtandatu, naiwilwa mugumba.
LUK 1:37 Kunsoko kutili nilihumile kung'wiTunda.”
LUK 1:38 Mariamu akalunga, “Goza, une nimukulu numusungu wang'wi Tunda. Leka itule uu kitalane iza nulukani lako.” Umalaika akamleka.
LUK 1:39 Kululo imahiku yayo u Mariamu akahega akenda mihe na malugulu, mihe na mukisali nitangwa Yudea.
LUK 1:40 Akalongola munyumba ang'wa Zakaria akamulamusha u Elizabethi.
LUK 1:41 Itungili aipumie kuiti u Elizabethi naiwigule imilamu ang'wa Mariamu ung'wana munda akwe akaputa nu Elizabethi akizula ingulu yang'wawelu.
LUK 1:42 Akitunta kululi nulukulu akalunga akaligitilya akitunta kululi nulukulu akalunga ue kukiila muasungu nu ng'wana nukoli muda ako ukembetilwe.
LUK 1:43 Ingi gwa atuile uli kitalane uiya wang'wa tata ane aze kitalane?
LUK 1:44 Kunsoko goza naiwigule muakutue ako ululi imilamu ako ung'wana munda ane auputile kilumbi.
LUK 1:45 Nu ng'wenso ukia nai uhuiie; kundogoelyo akukondeeligwa nai utambuiwe nu Mukulu.
LUK 1:46 U Mariamu akaligitya, nkolo ane ikumulumbiilya u Mukulu,
LUK 1:47 nu ng'wau nuane imiloeeye Itunda, Muguni nuane.
LUK 1:48 Kunsoko uugozile u unyeku nua mutugwa nuakwe. Kundogoelyo, goza, pumiila itungili ulelwa wihi akunintanga mukendepwa.
LUK 1:49 Kunsoko munyangulu wantendeela makulu, ni lina nilakwe inge inyelu.
LUK 1:50 Nu ukende nuakwe wikiee ulelwa ga nu ulelwa ku awo ni umukulyaa.
LUK 1:51 Uzipilye ngulu ku mukono nuakwe; uasapatiiye niakete ulugoha mu masigo a nkolo ni ao.
LUK 1:52 Uagwisilye i akulu mu matuntu ao na ukulu ni anyeku uanankiiye.
LUK 1:53 Anya nzala uikutilye ukende, ni anya nsao uahegilye mikono mitili.
LUK 1:54 Umiiaiiye u Israeli munyamulimo nuakwe, iti wikimbukiilye u ukende nuakwe
LUK 1:55 (anga nai uatambuie i atata itu) u Abrahamu nu ulelwa nuakwa ga ikali na kali.”
LUK 1:56 Mariamu akikie nu Elizabeti mieli itaatu uu gwa ikatulika akasuka kito.
LUK 1:57 Matungo nai apika u Elizabeti akitunguila ng'wana mgoha.
LUK 1:58 Ianya kisali akwe nialuna akwe naigule umukulu uza.
LUK 1:59 Naiapikile mahiku munana aiazila kumtala kukidamu umung'enya akamitanga lina lakwe Zakaria kushatilya ilina lang'wi he.
LUK 1:60 Ingigwa unyinya akwe akasusha akalunga aa ukitangwa Yohana.
LUK 1:61 Kamuila kutile hata nung'wi kua luna ako nuitangwa ilina nilanso.
LUK 1:62 Akatula kilinga silyo ihe itangwe nyinyu.
LUK 1:63 Ihe akalowa ahole ikibao andike “Ilina lakwe Yohana.” Ihi ika ambwa ikuilywa kua ili.
LUK 1:64 Itungo umulomo wakwe ukaluguka nulimi lakwe likaligitya nukumukulya Itunda.
LUK 1:65 Uoa ukaizila wihi naiakolipakupi nung'wenso. Makani ikasambaila mihi ihi mulugulu mung'wa Yudea ayo.
LUK 1:66 Ihi ayo naigule ikamaika munkolo yao akalunga ung'wana uyu wiuli? Kunsoko umukano wang'wa tata ukoli palung'wi nung'wenso.
LUK 1:67 Ihe akwe u Zakaria ung'wang'welu munya kidagu akalunga,
LUK 1:68 “Akuligwe Itunda mukulu wa Israeli, kunsoko auiye kuleta uguniki kuantu akwe.
LUK 1:69 Wakimikiye lupembe nu uhuili wa nyumba nai mitumi akwe u Daudi,
LUK 1:70 Anga na ulungile mulomo wakinya kidagu naiakoli matungo ao na kale.
LUK 1:71 Ukakuguna muabi itu kupuma mumikono akwe nia kubipiwe.
LUK 1:72 Ukende uu kulagilya uza wang'wa tata itu, kilingasilyo lakwe ni za,
LUK 1:73 ilago nautambue kung'wa Abrahamu tata witu.
LUK 1:74 Uine kigeleka uhumile kutuma bila woa, kekahuma kugunwa kupuma muabi itu.
LUK 1:75 Kuite uza nitai kuntongela itu imahiku ihi.
LUK 1:76 Uu nu ewe munya kidagu nukole migulya kunsoko ukulongoleka kunsoko amukulu kumunonelya inzila kuwanonelya iantu kunsoko aupembelyo wakwe.
LUK 1:77 Kualingasa iantu akwe kugunwa imilandu ao.
LUK 1:78 Ulu lutuile kinyauwai wang'wi Itunda witu kunsoko ilyoa lukupuma hange.
LUK 1:79 Kelya kuantu nikie mkiti nao niikie mumulule wa nsha ukituma iti kumitongeela imigulu itu munzila aupolo.
LUK 1:80 Ung'wana uyo akatula ningulu mkolo nukikie mumbuga sunga mihaea akingila kitalakwe kung'wa Israeli
LUK 2:1 Matungo na mahiku nanso ukaisari Agusto au pumilye Ilago akaila holi ua ligwa waantu Ihi ni Ikie mihiyi.
LUK 2:2 Ili aialyo lagwandiyo alitumilye matungo krenio amukulu wang'wa siria.
LUK 2:3 Kila muntu akalongola kukisali kao. Kenda kuhola ialo.
LUK 2:4 Nung'wenso uyusufu akahega mukisali ka Nazareti ku Galilay nu kulongola ku Yudea mukisali ka Bethlehemu. nu manyikile anga kisali kang'wa Daudi. kunsoko au pumie muileli wang'wa Daudi.
LUK 2:5 Au ulongae kung'wanso kenda kuhola ialo palung'wi nu Mariamu amuligilye nukumulindilya ung'wana.
LUK 2:6 Naiakole kung'wanso imatungo nanso aialindie ung'wana alelywe.
LUK 2:7 Akaleta ng'wana mugoha. Uleli wakwe wang'wandyo akamuimba inguo muili wihi kugilya impepo ung'wana. Akamuika muntua nakuliselya imitugo kunsoko aikutile ilyoma munyumba ya kila nzila.
LUK 2:8 Ihi ni anso aiakole iadimi naikie mumbuga akazelindila ikolo yao utiku.
LUK 2:9 Itungo malaika wa mukulu akapumila utemi wa mukulu ukelya nukupilimilya akatula nu oa.
LUK 2:10 Kululo umalaika akaaila, ''leki kogopi numuletee lukani luza, nulukuleta ilumbi ku antu ihi.
LUK 2:11 Iie liyi, muguni uleilwe kunsoko anyu, mukisale kang'wa Daudi nuanso yuyo kristo mkulu!
LUK 2:12 Ike inge kilingasilyo mkupegwa, mukumu hanga ung'wana utungilye nguo uloe muntua akulisilya imetungo.
LUK 2:13 Itungo itumi akilunde ikaza idu ikatula palung'wi ikamusongelya Itunda, Ikalunga.
LUK 2:14 Ukulu wang'wi itunda mua migulya nu upolowa mihi nualoilye.
LUK 2:15 Kuite inge ia malaika ai atuile kulongola kenda kilunde, iadimi akitambuile enso kua enso, Inge kweni ku Bethelehemu, kende kuone iku nikigee nu mukulu ukulagie.
LUK 2:16 Akakaya kung'wanso, akamuhanga mariamu nu Yusufu, ikamuona ug'wana ulae muntua nikilyesilya imetugo.
LUK 2:17 Na iane uu akaaila iantu naiaiwe aya na ng'wana.
LUK 2:18 Ihi naigule alukani ulu ikakuilwa iko na ikitambuwe nu mudimi.
LUK 2:19 Inge u mariamu akalongoleka, kusega kunsoko ihi nae wigule, akamaika munkola akwe.
LUK 2:20 I a dime ikasuka ikamukulya nukumulumbelya Itunda kitu naeigule nukuona, anga nae itambuwe, kung'wanso.
LUK 2:21 Naelipikile ulu hiku la munana ikatula matungo, akumutala kukedamu ung'wana, ikamitanga elina lakwe Yesu, elina naupewe nu malaika Inda naikilengila munda.
LUK 2:22 Naelipikile imahiku akuzepilingwa kitalao anga nai uzepeigwe malagelyo ang'wa musa, Yusuma na Mariamu akamutala mitekelo ku yerusalemu kumuika kuntongela ing'wi Tunda.
LUK 2:23 Anga naeiandekilye mumalago ang'wi Tunda, kila mugoha nulugue Inda ukitangwa naupumigwe wakfu wang'wi Tunda.
LUK 2:24 Ne anso aiazile kupumwa isongelyo anga naelitambuwe milago la ng'wi Tunda.
LUK 2:25 Goza aukoli muntu ku yerusalemu zilina lakwe aukitangwa Simeoni. Umuntu nuanso aewatai nukumukulya Itunda. nuanso aizulindie muaili wa Israeli, nu ng'wang'welu aiukole migulya lakwe.
LUK 2:26 Aituile kuhila kukiela kung'wa ng'welu kuiti nuanso sanga auzesha iza kuli kumuona U - kristo wang'wi itunda.
LUK 2:27 Luhuki lung'wi auzile mukate mitekeelo akazutongewe nung'wang'welu, Ateli ai amuletile ung'wana, yesu, kumtendela anga ilago.
LUK 2:28 Simeoni akamsingilya mumikono akwe, kumukulya Itunda akalunga.
LUK 2:29 Mulekele umitumi wako alongote kuhuili wa mukulu, kutula nulukani lako.
LUK 2:30 Kunsoko imiho ane auona uza wako.
LUK 2:31 Nuingee kumiho aantu ihi.
LUK 2:32 Nuanso ng'welu kunsoko akukunukulya ukumbigulu nu ukulu wa antu Israeli.
LUK 2:33 Ihe nu nyinga nia ng'wana ai akuiwe Inkani nai itambuwe kunsoko akwe.
LUK 2:34 Smeoni akasongelya akalunga Mariamu, akwe ntegeelye kisa ung'wana uyu ite ukutula kunsoko kulimila kuguna iantu Idu ku Israeli inge kulingasilyo ku antu idu nia kuhita.
LUK 2:35 Ingi upanga ukusonsa ikolo ako ue, maswgo amukolo igelekee!
LUK 2:36 Munyakidagu musungu nai witangwa Ana hangi au koli mitekelo, nuanso ai munanso wang'wa Fanueli kupuma ulelwa wa ng'wa asheli, Aukite mahiku idu, nung'wenso ai ikie nu mugoha myaka mapungate nai ihoile.
LUK 2:37 Akatula muhimbe kumanyaka munana na unne Nuanso shanga aiwihega mitekelo akendelea kumukulya Itunda palung'wi nukupunga nukulopa, utiko nu mung'wi.
LUK 2:38 Matungo nanso akaza pang'wanso na iakoli akamusongelya Itunda akaligitya kunsoko ang'wa na kumuntu na mulindie ku Yerusalemu.
LUK 2:39 Naiamalile kila ekintu naealoilye kituma ilango la mukulu ikasuka ku Galilaya, kukesali, kao, Nazareti.
LUK 2:40 Ung'wana akakula akatula ukete inguru akaongeleka mulikalo, Uza wang'witunda ukatula mingulya.
LUK 2:41 Ialeli akwe kila ung'waka enda ku Yerusalemu kunsoko amilundo wa Pasaka.
LUK 2:42 Nautuele myaka ikumi na ibili akalongoka hange naeipipile miko kunsoko amilundo.
LUK 2:43 Naisigile matungo ehi kunsoko amilundo ikanza kusuka kito. Inge Umuhumba u-Yesu auasiga kunyuma mumo mu-Yerusalemu ialeli akwe shanga ikalinga ili.
LUK 2:44 Aialiye ukoi palung'wi neinso naiakugenda aiagendile luhiku. Kululo akanza kumuduma Mwanya ndugu ao.
LUK 2:45 Naialemilye kumulija akasuka ku-Yerusalemu ikatula kumuduma kuko.
LUK 2:46 Ikatula mahiku atatu ikamuhanga mutekelo akazimikie pakate pamanyisigwa akizu ategeye nuku akolya inkani.
LUK 2:47 Ihi naiamigule akakuilwa umanyi wakwe nu usukeli.
LUK 2:48 Nai amuine Ikakuilwa unyinya akamuila ng'waane, neke nukutenda nanso? Utata ako nu nene aikekuduma kuoa nuukulu.
LUK 2:49 Kunene, ''naimukunduma? sanga aimulingile kina kutula koli munyumba ang'wa tata ane?
LUK 2:50 Singa alinga azu kuligitya nkanike izi.
LUK 2:51 Sunga akalongala palung'wi ku nazareti kitalao hangi au gombile kitalao, Unyinya auikile inkani yihi munkolo akwe.
LUK 2:52 Sunga u Yesu akalongeleka kukula kimahala ni kimwili, niantu ang'wi Tunda ikamulowa.
LUK 3:1 Itungli myaka Ikumi na utano utemi wanywa kaikani Tiberia, Matungo Pontio Pilato mudimi wang'wa Uyahudi, Herode ayi mukulu wa kisali Galilaya, Filipo muluna akwe amukulu wakisali kang'wa Iturea nutrakoniti, nu Lisania amukulu wakisali kang'wa Abilene,
LUK 3:2 Matungo umudimi mukulu wa Anasi nukayafa, Lukani Langwi Itunda alumuzie Yohana wana ang'wa Zakaria mumbuga.
LUK 3:3 Aulongoe muhinzo mkisali kihii nikipilimiye umongo wa mazi nu ang'wa Yordani, akizitanatia itai naubadisigwa nanukuheja imilandu.
LUK 3:4 Anga naiandikilwe mukitabu kankani yang'wa Isaya naauotile, ululi la muntu nakulila, nyika noneeli mukondien Inzura amukulu na munonelye Inzula akwe igoloke.
LUK 3:5 Makombo ihi akizulig'wa malugulu niana malugulu ihi akunoneligwa ninzula niyikunyile ikikogoolwa ninzila Yihi nimbi yikuzipigwa.
LUK 3:6 Antu ihi akuona uguni wang'wi Itunda.
LUK 3:7 Kululo u Yohana akauila umilundo nukulunu antu au muhangile abatisigwe nugwenso uye wileli wanzoka nua uhungu nubii nyinyu na muhuguye kuumanka ubii nauzile.
LUK 3:8 Leli Indiya niyipyani nitai namuleke kulunga mkati anyu kukete u Ibarahimu ingi tata witu kunsoko nimuila kuiti Itunda ukete uhumi kumuhumbula Ibalihimu ng'wana kupuma mumagwe aya.
LUK 3:9 Ingigwa ihengo aikwa mumili a miti kululo u muti nishawitugaa Indya ninza wite ng'wa mu moto.
LUK 3:10 Sunga iantu niilundie akamukolya akalunga, i magwe aya utakile kutende ulii?
LUK 3:11 Akasusha akalunga ang'wi muntu ukite nkanzu Ibili utakiwe aheje nkanzu ing'wi amupe umuya numugila nuyu nukete indya witume uu.
LUK 3:12 Sunga iahoela mpia ikaza kubadisigwa akamuila, mumanyi kutendeuli.
LUK 3:13 Aka aila, '' leki kuhoeli impia ni Idu kukela ni mutakile kuhoela.
LUK 3:14 Anya nguru akamuila akalunga ause? kitumentuni?
LUK 3:15 Matungo, Iantu aiakite Insula akumulindila U-kristo kila muntu akasiga munkolo akwe kunsoko ng'wenso Kristo.
LUK 3:16 U yohana akaaila ihii, ''unene kumubatiza unye kumanzi ukoli nuzile nukete uhumi kukila une, nishantakiwe kutungula uludingi la ilatu yakwe. ukumubatiza unye kung'wang'welu nu kumoto.
LUK 3:17 Ipetelo lakwe likoli kumukono akwe kupyagula ni Iza ikiuga nikakupetela Ingano nukilingila Ingano misalanka lakwe ingi gwa ukuma sansa imakamilya kumoto ni shawilimaa.
LUK 3:18 Ukeneli widu autanantilye nkani ninza kuantu.
LUK 3:19 U Yohana aumpatile U - Herode mukulu wa kisali akamutina U - Herode musungu wa ng'wa muluna akwe nuku mabi nidu ni mangiza u Herode nutendile.
LUK 3:20 Matungo naitwile Herde aiwitumile uubi ukulu na ngulu, akamu tunga Yohana kukitungo.
LUK 3:21 Ingi aipumie matungo iantu ihii naiakubadilisi gwa nu Yesu nu ng'wenso aubadisigwe, Imatungo naukulompa, Ilunde likalunguka.
LUK 3:22 Ung'wa ngwelu akasima migulya akwe. anga Inyunyi, Matungo yayo yayo luli likaza kupuma milunde likalilya. Ue Ingi nu anso ng'wana wane ninumukuilye.
LUK 3:23 U-Yesu ung'wenso, naiwapisha Imyaka makumi ataatu. Akandilya kumanyisa akazimpaya nigwa anga ng'wana ang'wa Yusufu, anga Eli.
LUK 3:24 Ni ang'wi akalunga ng'wana wa ng'wa Mathati, ng'wana wang'wa Lawi, ng'wana wang'wa Melki, ng'wana wa ng'wa Yona, ng'wana wang'wa Yusufu.
LUK 3:25 Ng'ana wa Matathia, ng'wana wa ng'wa Amosi ng'wana wa ng'wa Nahumu, ng'wana wa ng'wa Esli, ng'wana wa ng'wa Nagai.
LUK 3:26 Ng'wana wang'wa Maati, ng'wana wang'wa Matathia, ng'wana wang'wa Semein, ng'wana wang'wa Yusufu, ng'wana wang'wa Yuda.
LUK 3:27 Ng'wana wang'wa Yoanani, ng'wana wang'wa Resa, ng'wana wang'wa Zerubabeli, ng'wana wang'wa Shealtieli, ng'wana wang'wa Neri,
LUK 3:28 ng'wana wang'wa Melki, ng'wana wang'wa Adi, ng'wana wang'wa Kosamu, ng'wana wang'wa Elmadamu, ng'wana wang'wa Eri,
LUK 3:29 ng'wana wang'wa Yoshua, ng'wana wang'wa Eliezeri, ng'wana wang'wa Yorimu, ng'wana wang'wa Matath, ng'wana wang'wa Lawi.
LUK 3:30 Ng'wana wang'wa Simeoni, ng'wana wang'wa Yuda, ng'wana wang'wa Yusufu, ng'wana wang'wa Yonamu, ng'wana wang'wa Eliyakimu.
LUK 3:31 Ng'wana wang'wa Melea, ng'wana wang'wa Mena, ng'wana wang'wa Matatha, ng'wana wang'wa Nathani, ng'wana wang'wa Daudi.
LUK 3:32 Ng'wana wang'wa Yese, ng'wana wang'wa Obedi, ng'wana wang'wa Boazi, ng'wana wang'wa Salmoni, ng'wana wang'wa Nashoni.
LUK 3:33 Ng'wana wang'wa Abinadabu, ng'wana wang'wa Aramu, ng'wana wang'wa Hesroni, ng'wana wang'wa Peresi, ng'wana wang'wa Yuda,
LUK 3:34 Ng'wana wang'wa Yakobo, ng'wana wang'wa Isaka, ng'wana wang'wa Ibrahimu, ng'wana wang'wa Tera, ng'wana wang'wa Nahori,
LUK 3:35 Ng'wana wang'wa Seruig, ng'wana wang'wa Ragau, ng'wana wang'wa Pelegi, ng'wana wang'wa Eberi, ng'wana wang'wa Sala,
LUK 3:36 Ng'wana wang'wa Kenani, ng'wana wang'wa Arfaksadi, ng'wana wang'wa Shemu, ng'wana wang'wa Nuhu, ng'wana wang'wa Lameki,
LUK 3:37 Ng'wana wang'wa Methusela, ng'wana wang'wa Henoko, ng'wana wang'wa Yaredi, ng'wana wang'wa Mahalalei, ng'wana wang'wa Kenani,
LUK 3:38 Ng'wana wang'wa Enashi, ng'wana wang'wa Sethi, ng'wana wang'wa Adamu, ng'wana wang'wa Tunda.
LUK 4:1 Sunga u - Yesu akaza wizue ung'wang'welu, akasuka kupuma kumongo wang'wa Jordani, hangi akatongelwa nu ng'wang'welu mumbuga.
LUK 4:2 Kwa mahiku makumi ane nukung'wanso akapata, mageng, wa nu mulungu, imatungo nanso shanga akalya anga kintu kilii, nempelo amatungo nanso.
LUK 4:3 Umulugu akalunga ang'we tai wing'wana wang'wi Itunda liilie igwe litule ludya.
LUK 4:4 U - Yesu akasukilya iandikile umuntu shanga ukikie kundya duu.
LUK 4:5 Hangi umulugu akamutongela mingulya kunsonge a lugulu, akamulagila utemi wi hii nwa munku migulu kumatungo ni makupii.
LUK 4:6 Umulugu akamuila kuupa ukulu wa utemi wihii nuu kote kituma uu kunsoko iikilwe kitalane nikete wihi nutakile kumpa.
LUK 4:7 Ang'wi ukutungama, nukunkulya imaintu aya akutula ako ihi.
LUK 4:8 Ingi u Yesu akasusha nukumuila, iandekilye, umukulye Itunda wako, nukumutumikila ung'wenso duu.
LUK 4:9 Itungo umulugu akamutongela u-Yesu mpaka kuYerusalemu, nukumuika migulya mitekelo, akamuila ang'wi wing'wana wa ng'wi tunda wigume pihi kupuma pang'wanso.
LUK 4:10 Kunsoko iandikilwe, ukualangilya i a malaika akwe nukuusunga.
LUK 4:11 Hakuhumbula miglya mumikono ao kunsoko uleke kiaalya imigulu migwe.
LUK 4:12 U-Yesu akasusha akamuila, itambuwe leka kumugema Itunda ako.
LUK 4:13 Umulugu naukondilye kumugema U-Yesu, akalongola yakwe akamuleka imatungo ni mangiza.
LUK 4:14 Ingi U-Yesu akasuka ku-galilaya kunguluu ya ng'wa ng'welu, ninkani yakwe yakendelea kusambaila muisale yihi nia pakupi.
LUK 4:15 Aumanyisilye mumatekelo ao, ihi ikamukulya.
LUK 4:16 Luhiku akalongola ku Nazaleti, mukisali nautungilwe nukukuila. Anga naiwilowa kingila mumatekelo luhiku la sabato, na aiwimikile nukusoma naiiandikile.
LUK 4:17 Akapegwa ikitabu kang'wanyakindagu U-Isaya, kululo, akalungula akaduma apo niandekile.
LUK 4:18 Ung'wang'welu ukole mitalane, kunsoko aumpakoie imakuta kutanahia ulukani luza. Untumile kutanantwa ulekelwa kuwatungwa, nishaiona kuteleona hangi kuapa ulekelwa awa neonyeigwe.
LUK 4:19 Kutanantwa ung'waka nua mukulu ukulangila uza wakwe.
LUK 4:20 Hangi akalungaila ikitabu, akamusukilya umukulu witekelo, nukikie pihe. Miho aantu ihi ikamuguzela naiakoli pang'wanso ikamugozela ung'wenso.
LUK 4:21 Akandya kulingitya neenso akalunga, ileliye ilangilyo lapika muakutwi ayu.
LUK 4:22 Ihii naihenile pang'wanso naikilingitigwe nu Yesu, na indu naiakoli pang'wanso ikakuilwa inkani Yauhugu nai yakupumakumulomo wakwe aikulunga, ''uhuyu ingi muhumba du wang'wa Yusufu, singa uu.
LUK 4:23 U-Yesu akamuila itai mukulingitwa ulu lukole kitalane, ilagute uewe kihii nikigule anga wituma Kapernaumu, Itume hangi numukisali kako.
LUK 4:24 Hangi akalunga,''tai kumuilaa unye kutile munya kidagu nugombigwe mihi akwe.
LUK 4:25 Ingi kumuila unye tai aiakole lashilwa iduku Israel kumatungo ang'wa Eliya, matungo ni lunde nailitungilwa itule kutili anga mbula myaka itaatu ni kinda, matungo naeikoli inzala ni nkulu ihi ihi.
LUK 4:26 Ingi u - Eliya shaautumilye kumuntu wihi hangi kumushilwa ung'widu naiwikie ku sarepta pakupi ni kisali ua sidoni.
LUK 4:27 Aiakoli anyambili ku Israel imatungo ang'wa Elisha umunyakidagu, ingi kutile ung'wi ao nauponigwa ingi u Naamani muntu wa ku siria.
LUK 4:28 Antu ihi munyumba mitekelo aiizue nuulowa naigule nanso ihi.
LUK 4:29 Ikimika kumuhugelya kunzi mukisali, nukumugila pakupi nu lugulu la mukisali hangi kisali kao nauzengilye migulwa akwe kumuguma pihii.
LUK 4:30 Ingi aukiile uza pakati ao akalongola yakwe.
LUK 4:31 Hangi akasimila kapernaumu mukisali kaku Galilaya sabato ung'wi aukuamanyisa iantu munyumba mitekeelo.
LUK 4:32 Akakuilwa umanyisigwa wakwe aumanyisilye kwa uhumu wakwe.
LUK 4:33 Uluhiku nulanso mukati musinagogi aukoli muntu naukite nkolo amitunga niaabii.
LUK 4:34 Ukite ntuni nue u - Yesu nazareti? waaza kumala? minne ue winyanyu! uewe wing'wang'welu ang'wi Itunda.
LUK 4:35 U-Yesu amapatilye umintunga akalunga kilaga ihitwu nuanso umintunga nuanso akamuguma muntu nuanso pihi mukatikati ao akapuma kuuntu nuanso singa akaona anga uwai.
LUK 4:36 Iantu ihi ikapata Ikuilwa, ikatula ligitya Inkani kila umuntu numuya Ikazilunga Izinnkanikee akahega ikolo nimbii kuhumi akag'wa.
LUK 4:37 Kululo intambu ang'wa Yesu ikapika kuli ninkani yikapiimilya mukisali nikanso.
LUK 4:38 Ingi u-Yesu akahega mukisali nikanso naaki ngila munyumba ang'wa simoni itungili ite mukwing'wa angwa Simoni ae mulwae ndwala ntaki naikamulompa kukiila kungwa kwe.
LUK 4:39 Ingi u-Yesu akamuhugela, akamupatya Indwala ikahega hapuu na akimika akatula mitamila Itunda
LUK 4:40 Liyoa nailukuhaila, lantu aiamuletee U-Yesu kila umuntu naikite umu lua akwe hangi kila indwala akaika imikono akwe migulya amulue na akagunika.
LUK 4:41 Iamintunga nienso ikapume iduu akazilila kulali ikazilunga ue ingi wing'wana wang'wi Itunda: U-Yesu akapatiya lamimitunga shakago mpya kuligitiu kunsoka auine nuanso Kristo.
LUK 4:42 Matungo naiweile, aiwendile kieneo naingila iantu. Umilundo wa antu akumuduma naikaza kieneo naukoti. Ikatula mugiliya alekekenda kuli nienso.
LUK 4:43 Ingi akaila, kutula tanalwya uuza mukulu ng'wa ngwa Itunda, Kuisali ningiza kunsoko aidangiigwe Pa ng'wanso.
LUK 4:44 Hangi akendelea kutanatia mukati musinagogi ku- Yahudi wihi.
LUK 5:1 Aitulikile matungo iantu akizura nakumupilimilya U-Yesu nukumutegelya ulukani Langwi Itunda, nai wimikile panipelo aluzi la Genesareti.
LUK 5:2 Auine mabine abili Imikingwe kupelo aluzi Iaibua Samaki aiapumaa aiakoja inyabu yao.
LUK 5:3 U-Yesu akingila mibini, nai lang'wa Simoni na akalompa atwale ibini muluzi kuli inino nihi ninyumu. hangi akikie kumumanyisa kupuma mibini.
LUK 5:4 Akaligitia, akamuila U-Simoni litwale ibini lako muluzi uisimie inyabu yako utule bua Insamaki.
LUK 5:5 Simoni akasusha nukulunga, tata kituma, aimilimo uliku wihi, Shakupatile anga kintu kihi hangi kulukani lako kuisimya inyabu.
LUK 5:6 Naitumile uu ikahoela Insamaki iduu na lyabu yao yika tula tinike.
LUK 5:7 Ikaitanga Iabuani ao kibini Ingiza hangi aze kua ailya. Ikaza akizulia imabini ihi ikatula kilieka mukati muluzi.
LUK 5:8 Hangi Simoni Petro nauine uu, akatugama na malu pang'wa Yesu akalunga;''Hega kitalane, kunsoko une ni muntu wamilandu tata.
LUK 5:9 Kunsoko akapata ikuilwa ihi naine kunsamaki naiatendile.
LUK 5:10 Ulu iti aliakuile uYakobo na Yohana ng'wana wang'wa Zebedayo aipulug'wi nu Simoni. Nu Yesu akamuila uSimoni kandya itungili apana kogopa kumbele ukutula bua iantu.
LUK 5:11 Naiamaletile imabini ao mihi ni nyumu, kaleka kintu kihi ikamutyata nuanso.
LUK 5:12 Niipumie naukali mukisali muntu naukete ibili kuko, matungo namuine U-Yesu augwie akakumana pihi nukulompa, akalunga,''tata ang'wi uloiwe umponie.''
LUK 5:13 Sunga U-Yesu akahumbula umukona nukumuamba, akalunga ndoilwa ukomie itungo lilo imbili iakahega.
LUK 5:14 Akamuile alekekumuila anga muntu wihi, akamula longala wionyeshe nu utemi upumie isongiliyo.
LUK 5:15 Kulula ikani yakwe ikasambaila kui, numilundo wa antu ukaza palung'wi nukumutigelya numanyisa nukuguna imalwae ao.
LUK 5:16 Ingi hapu hapuu akikie wingene akazilompa.
LUK 5:17 Aituile luhiku lungwi nema hiku ayo naukumanyisa, aiokoli Mafarisayo niamanyisa anonya nkai akikie hapo aizile kupuma muisali ningiza numukisali kang, wa Galilaya nanu Yudea, hangi nukupuma mukisali kang'wa Yerusalemu. Ingulu yang'wa tata akali palung'wi nung'wenso kuguna.
LUK 5:18 antu akehu aiazile, ainkenkile mundili umuntu nuigandi naikai ikaduma inzila akumingilya mukati amulalishe pihi kuntongela ang'wa Yesu.
LUK 5:19 Shaikapata inzila akumingilya mukati kunsoko umilundo, ukanankila migulya milialo lanyumba ikamusunta muntu nuanso pihi kukiila mibolomya migulya mundili akwe mukati wa antu kuntongela lukulu pang'wa Yesu.
LUK 5:20 Akazigoza uhuili wakwe, Yesu akalunga muhumba miane, imilandu ako wasamehelwa.
LUK 5:21 Anumwa nkani ni mafalisayo ikandya kukolya nulanso, akalunga uyu nyenyu nukuligitya kuubii? Nyenyu nuhumile kusamehela imilandu ingi Itunda du nuing'wine?
LUK 5:22 Ingi u Yesu ainualinga ntuni naiakukisiga, akasukilya, nukuaila, kuniki nimukikolya mukolo yanyu?
LUK 5:23 Nikiuli nikipepele kulugilya, Imilandu ako alekwa ang'wi kulunga uka ugende?
LUK 5:24 Ingi mulinge gwa ung'wana wang'wa Adamu ukite uhumu muukumbigulu kusamehela imilandu, kuila uewe uka uhole indili ako ulongole kitalako.
LUK 5:25 Imatungo yayo yayo akauko meleao nukuhola indili akwe naulaie. Hangi akasuka kitalakwe nukumukulya Itunda.
LUK 5:26 Ingi kila ung'wi ao akakuilwa nukumukulya Itunda. Ikizuilwa nuao, ikalunga, kuine ikani shanga nzaile liyi.
LUK 5:27 Ingi inkani nianso kupumila, u Yesu akahega kung'wanso akamuona umuhoela mpia naiwitang'wa Lawi wikie mukisali kakuhoela mpia. Akamuiila, ntwate.
LUK 5:28 Ingi u Lawi akahumbuka nukumuntwata, akaleka kila kintu kunyuma.
LUK 5:29 Ingi u Lawi akanunelya munyumbakwe isikukuu ninkulu kunsoko ang'wa Yesu. Aiakoli iahoela mpia indu kung'wanso ni antu indu naiikie pameza akizilya palung'wi nienso.
LUK 5:30 Hangi mafalisayo aiakuanung'u nikila iamanyisigwa akizilunga, kuniki nimukulya nukung'wa niahoela mpia palung'wi ni antu niangiza niakite milandu?
LUK 5:31 U Yesu akasusha, iantu niakite upanga nuuza shaatakile itabibu, ingi ao nialwaeli niaamutakile ung'wi.
LUK 5:32 Shainzile kuitanga iantu makite itai ahume kugunwa, ingi ainziitanga nia milandu ahume kugunwa.
LUK 5:33 Ikamuila, iamanyisigwa ang'wa Yohana a hapouifunga nukulompa, ni amanyisigwa ang'wa mafalisayonienso itenda uu, Ai amanyisigwa ako iliza nukung'wa.
LUK 5:34 U Yesu akaaila, ihumile muntu wihi kituma naiendile muwinga kumunyawinga, matungo numunyawinga, kilukoli palung'wi nienso?
