ACT 4:32 Ngele nkulu a awo nai ahuiie ai atulaa ni nkolo nu Ng'wau Ng'welu ung'wi; hangi kutili ga nung'wi ao nai uligitilye kina kihi nai usaile ai katulaa kakwe mukola; badala akwe ai atulaa ni intu yihi muhangu.
ACT 4:33 Ku ngulu nkulu i itumi ai atulaa akutanantya u ukuiili nuao kutula wiuki nua Mukulu uYesu, nu ukende ukulu ai watulaa migulya ao ihi.
ACT 4:34 Ai kutili anga muntu wihi mukati ao nai ukepewe i maintu, ku nsoko antu ihi nai akete i mabada a iwanja ang'wi ito, ai aguiye nu kuleta i mpia nia intu nai atulaa aguiye.
ACT 4:35 nu ki ika pihi a migulu a itumi. Nu ugalanigwa ai witumilwe ku kila muhuiili, kuniganiila ni kila ung'wi nai u uiwe.
ACT 4:36 uYusufu, mulawi, muntu kupuma ku Kipro, ai winkiigwe i lina Barnabasi ni itumi (nanso ai impyanigwe, ingi mukende nu upoeelya).
ACT 4:37 Aze ukete mugunda, ai u uguiye nu kuleta i mpia, akaiika pihi a migulu a itumi
ACT 5:1 Iti gwa, muntu ug'wi nai witangwaa Anania, nu Safira musungu akwe, ai aguiye ipatyo nila nsailo,
ACT 5:2 nu kupiha ipatyo nila mpia nai aguiye (ga nu musungu akwe ai ulilingile ili), nu kuleta ipatyo nilisigile nu kuika mu migulu a itumi.
ACT 5:3 Kuiti uPetro ai uligitilye, “Anania, ku nik u mulugu umizuiye inkolo ako kuligitya uteele ku Ng'wau Ng'welu nu kupiha ipatyo nila mugunda?
ACT 5:4 Itungo nai watulaa likili kuguligwa, shanga ai latulaa nsailo ako? Hangi zeyakilaa kuguligwa, shanga ai likoli mu ulamuli nuako? itulikile uli usige ikani ili munkolo ako? Shanga uakongee anga ana adamu, ila umukongee Itunda.”
ACT 5:5 Mu kija imakani aya, uAnania ai ugwie pihi nu kutinanga inkolo. Nu woa ukulu ai uaziie ihi nai aligulye ili.
ACT 5:6 Ahumba akapembya ku ntongeela nu kumuikila mu sanda, nu kumutwala kunzi nu kumuika.
ACT 5:7 Ze yakilaa masaa ataatu iti, u musungu nuakwe ai wingie mukati, aze shanga ulingile naza katulaa kipumie.
ACT 5:8 uPetro akamutambuila, “Ntambuile, anga aza ize muguiye u mugunda ku nsailo nanso.” Akaigitya, “Uu, ku nsailo yiyo.”
ACT 5:9 Iti gwa uPetro akamutambuila, “Ikutulika uli kina migombilye ku palung'wi ku mugema u Ng'wau Ng'welu nua Mukulu? Goza, i migulu a awo naza amu ikile u mugoha nuako ikoli pa mumpita, hangi aku ukenga nu ku utwala kunzi.”
ACT 5:10 Kupumbugiilya akagwa mu migulu ang'wa Petro, akatinanga inkolo, ni awo i ahumba akapembya mu kati akamuhanga wakondyaa kusha. Akamukenka nu kumutwala kunzi, nu kumuika pakupi nu mugoha nuakwe.
ACT 5:11 Woa ukulu ukapembya migulya a itekeelo lihi, nu migulya a ihi nai igulye i makani aya.
ACT 5:12 Ilingasiilyo idu nu ukuilwa ai yatulaa yukupumila mukati a antu ku kiila mikono a itumi. Ai atulaa palung'wi mi itando nilang'wa Sulemani.
ACT 5:13 Kuiti, kutili u muntu mungiiza nui nsuta nai watulaa nu ugimya nua kuambinkana ni enso; ga ni iti, ai inkiigwe ikulyo migulya a antu.
ACT 5:14 Ga ni ahuiili idu ai atulaa akongeeleka ku Mukulu, ingele nkulu a agoha ni asungu.
ACT 5:15 ngeli kina ga nai akenkile u ulwae mu kisali, nu kualalisha mu ulili nu mu makoshi, iti kina uPetro anga watule ukukila u mululi nuakwe uhume kusima migulya ao.
ACT 5:16 Ga ni pan'wanso, ngele nkulu a antu ai apembilye kupuma isali ni ipilimikiiye iYerusalemu, aze a aletile i alwae ni ihi nai ahalinkaniwe ni nkolo ni nshafu, ni ihi ai agunilwe.
ACT 5:17 Kuiti u kuhani nu mukulu ai unyansukile, hangi ihi nai atulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso ( naza ingi a makumbiko a asadukayo); hangi ai izuiwe nu wilu
ACT 5:18 akagoola i mikono ao kua amba i itumi nu kua ika mukati a kadulumu nila mu hangu.
ACT 5:19 Ni matungo a utiku u malaika nua Mukulu akamilugula i milango a kadulumu nu kuatongeela kunzi nu kuligitya.
ACT 5:20 Longoli, mimike mi tekeelo nu kuatambuila i antu imakani ihi na upanga uwu.”
ACT 5:21 Nai akija ili, ai ingie mi tekeelo matungo a maniambwa nu kumanyisa. Kuiti, u kuhani nu mukulu ai uzile ni ihi nai akoli nu ng'wenso, nu kitangiisa i anza lihi ku palung'wi, ni anyampala ihi nia antu a Israeli, nu kua lagiilya mu kadulumu iti kualeta i itumi.
ACT 5:22 Kuiti i anyamulimo nai akalongola, shanga ai a ahangile mu kadulumu, ai asukile nu kuaganuila.
ACT 5:23 Kuhangile i kadulumu ilugaiwe iza, ni asunja imikile pa mulango, kuiti nai katula ku ulugula, shanga kihenga u muntu mukati.”
ACT 5:24 Itungili itngo u jemedari nua itekeelo ni akuhani akulu nai akija i makani aya, ai ingiiwe nu woa ukulu ku nsoko ao, azesiga likutulika uli ikani ili.
ACT 5:25 Uugwa ung'wi akapembya nu kuatambuila, “iAntu naza muaikile mu kadulumu imikile mi itekeelo nu kumanyisa i antu.”
ACT 5:26 Iti gwa u jemedari ai ulongoe palung'wi ni anyamulimo, nu kualeta, kuiti bila a kituma u minyomo, ku nsoko ai a itumbile i antu akuhuma a akue ku magwe.
ACT 5:27 Nai akondya kualeta, ai a ikile ntongeela a ianza, uKuhani nu mukulu aka akolya, azeligitya,
ACT 5:28 “Aza kulagiiye muleke kumanyisa ku lina ili, hangi mukili mumizuiye i Yerusalemu ku umanyisa nuanyu, nu kuhung'wa nsula a kuleta isakami a muntu uyu migulya itu.
ACT 5:29 Kuiti uPetro ni itumi aka sukiilya. “Kusinja kumukulye Itunda kukila i antu.
ACT 5:30 Itunda nua atata itu ai umiukilye uYesu, nai mumubulagile, ku kumutumbika migulya i ikota.
ACT 5:31 Itunda ai umukuiye mu mukono nuakwe nua kigoha, nu kumuzipya kutula Mukulu hangi muguni, kupumya upeli ku Israeli, nu ulekelwa nua milandu.
ACT 5:32 Usese ingi akuiili nia makani aya, nu Ng'wau Ng'welu, naiza Itunda umupumilye ku awo ni imukulyaa.”
ACT 5:33 Ianyi anza nai akija iti, ai a ambilwe ni ikuo akalowa kuabulaga i itumi.
ACT 5:34 Kuiti u pharisayo nai witangwaa Gamalieli, ng'walimu nua malagiilyo, nai ukuigwe ni antu ihi, ai wimikile nu kualagiilya i itumi aholwe kunzi ku itungo ikupi.
ACT 5:35 Iti gwa aka atambuila, “Agoha nia Israeli, tuli ahugu nangaluu ni iko ni mukusigiila kua tendeela i antu awa.
ACT 5:36 Ku nsoko, ikali niaki ilee, uTheuda ai wimikile nu kitendiisa kutula muntu mukulu, ni ngele a antu, apikiie magana anne ai amutyatile. Ai ubulagilwe, ni ihi nai atulaa amukuiye ai asapatie nu kulimila.
ACT 5:37 Ze yajilaa u muntu uyu, uYuda mu Galilaya, ai uhumbukile i mahiku nanso nia kukilisigwa ualigwa, aka aluta i antu idu ku kituli kakwe. Nu ng'wenso ga ai ulimie ni ihi nai atulaa amukuiye ai asapatie.
ACT 5:38 Itungili ku mutambuila, ihuji ni antu awa hangi mualeke i akola, ku nsoko, anga i masigo aya ang'wi mulimo uwu ingi wa antu ukugung'wa.
ACT 5:39 Kuiti anga utule wang'wa Itunda, shanga mukuhuma ku ugilya; muhumile ga ukuhanga muki kilya ni Itunda.” Iti gwa, ai alutilwe ni imakani akwe.
ACT 5:40 Uugwa, ai aitangile i itumi nuku a kua nu kualagiilya aleke kuligitya ku lina nilang'wa Yesu, nu kualeka alongole yao.
ACT 5:41 Ai ahegile ntongeela a ianza aze iloile ku soko a aligwa kutula akagisha nu kuhita ku kuligwa ku nsoko a lina ni lanso.
ACT 5:42 Ku lulo, kila luhiku, mukati i tekeelo nu kupuma mi ito kupikiil ito ai alongolekile kumanyisa nu kutanantya uYesu kina Musagulwa.
ACT 6:1 Itungili mu mahiku aya, matungo i ngele a amanyisigwa nai ikatulaa i kongeeleka, u witushi nua Ayahudi nia ki Yunani ai landilye ku a Ebrania, kunsoko ahimbi ao ai atulaa akiwa mu womolang'yi nua kila luhiku nua ndya.
ACT 6:2 Itumi ikumi na abiili ai aitangile u milundo wihi nua amanyisigwa nu kuligitya, “Shanga iziza kita itu kululeka u lukani nulang'wa Itunda nu kua aiilya mu meza.
ACT 6:3 Ku lulo anyandugu, holang'yi, agoha mupungati, kupuma mukati anyu, antu akende, ni izue u Ng'wau Ng'welu nua upolo, naza kuhumile kuinkiilya u uailya uwu.
ACT 6:4 Nu sese, ku ulongoleka ikali kulompa nu mu uailya nua lukani.
ACT 6:5 Uganuli nuao ukaliloeelya ianza lihi. Iti gwa ikamuholania uStefano, muntu nuizuee uhuiili nu Ng'wau Ng'welu, nu Filipo, Prokoro, Nikanori, Timoni, Parmena, nu Nikolao, muokole kupuma ku Antiokia.
ACT 6:6 Ahuiili ai a aletile i antu awa ntongeela a itumi, nai alompile ni panyambele aka aikiilya i mikono ao.
ACT 6:7 Iti gwa, lukani nulang'wa Itunda likenela; ni ngele a amanyisigwa ai ikiile kongeeleka uko ku Yerusalemu; ni ngele nkulu a akuhani aka ukulya u uhuiili.
ACT 6:8 Nu Stefano, nai wizuee u ukende ni ngulu, ai watulaa ukituma ukuilwa ni ilingasiilyo ikulu mukati ao mu antu.
ACT 6:9 Kuiti pang'wanso akanyansuka ang'wi ao a antu atyatiili itekeelo ni litangwaa itekeelo nila Mahulu, ni la a Kirene hangi la Aesksnderia, ni ang'wi kupuma ku Kilikia ni Asia. Antu awa ai atulaa akikolenkeelya nu Stefano
ACT 6:10 Kuiti, shanga ai ahumile ki kilya nu upolo nua Ng'wau Ng'welu naiza uStefano ai watulaa ukutumila mu witambuili.
ACT 6:11 Uugwa ai uapembeseeye ang'wi a antu ku kinkunku kuligitya, “Kigulye uStefano ukuligitya makani a kimeli kung'wa Musa ni kung'wa Itunda.”
ACT 6:12 Ai a asingilye i antu, anyampala, ni amanyi, nu kumuhanga uStefano, akamuamba, nu kumuleta ntongeela i anza,
ACT 6:13 aka aleta ia kuiili nia uteele, azeligitya, “umuntu uyu shanga ukuleka kitunta i makani ni mabii ku kianza iki ni kelu ni ilagiilyo.
ACT 6:14 Ku iti kumigulye ukuligitya kina uyu uYesu nua ku Nazareti ukubipya i nkika apa nu kuikaila i ntendo nai kinkiigwe nu Musa.”
ACT 6:15 Kila ung'wi nai ukoli mi ananza, akatunja i miho akwe kumugozeela uStefano, ni enso akihenga u usu nuakwe ai watulaa anga usu wang'wa malaika.
ACT 7:1 uKuhani nu mukulu akaligitya, “makani aya ingi a tai?”
ACT 7:2 uStefano akaligitya, Anya ndugu ni a tata ane, ntegeelyi u nene; Itunda nu ikulyo ai umupumie u tata nuitu u Abrahimu matungo nai ukoli ku Mesopotamia, ze wakili kikie ku Harani,'
ACT 7:3 akamuila, 'Hega mi ihi ako ni anya ndugu ako hangi ulongole mi ihi ni nikakulagiila.'
ACT 7:4 Iti gwa akahega mihi a Ukalidayo akikie ku Harani, kupuma papo, ze yakilaa u tata nuakwe kusha, Itunda akamuleta mi ihi iyi, ni ikiie itungili.
ACT 7:5 Shanga ai uminkiiye kihi anga usali nuakwe, ai kutili ipatyo ga nila kuika u mugulu. Kuiti uAbrahamu ai upewe ilago ze ikili ga nu kulija ung'wana kina ukupegwa ihi anga isalo ni lakwe nu ulelwa nuakwe.
ACT 7:6 Itunda ai wituntile nu ng'wenso iti, nia kina ulelwa nuakwe ai uziikie mi ihi a uziila, ni kina i akola ihi nia kuko akuatenda kutula atugwa ao nu kuatenda ibibi ku itungo nila myaka magana anne.
ACT 7:7 Nu Itunda akaligitya, nikaulamula u ingu niiza ukumutenda aholwa, ni i zeyakilaa nia pang'wanso akupuma nu kumpoelya mu nkika iyi!
ACT 7:8 Hangi akaminkiilya uAbrahamu ilago nila kidamu, itigwa u Abrahamu akatula tata wang'wa Isaka akamutwala i kidamu luhiku nula mu nana; uIsaka akatula tata wang'wa Yakobo, nu Yakobo akatula tata nua isekulu itu ikumi na abiili.
ACT 7:9 iIsekulu ni itu akamuonela wilu uYusufu aka mugulya mu ihi a ku Misri, nu Itunda ai watulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso,
ACT 7:10 hangi akamuguna mu lwago nu lakwe, nu kuminkiilya kipegwa nu upolo ntongeela ang'wa Farao mutemi nua ku Misri. uFarao akamuika watule muhumi migulya a Misri nu migulya a ito ni lakwe lihi.
ACT 7:11 Uugwa ikatula ni nzala nkulu nu lwago lidu mu ihi a Misri ni Kanani, ni a tata itu shanga ai aligilye indya.
ACT 7:12 Kuiti uYakobo nai wakija ikoli idya ku Misri, ai ualagiiye i atata itu ku nkua ang'wandyo.
ACT 7:13 Mu muhinzo nua kabiili uYusufu akilagiila ku aluna akwe, anyandugu ang'wa Yusufu akakumuka kung'wa Farao.
ACT 7:14 uYusufu aka alagiilya i aluna akwe alongole kumuila uYakobo tata nuao waze ku Misri, palung'wi ni anya ndugu akwe, kuhanguila antu ihi ingi makumi mupungati na ataano.
ACT 7:15 Iti gwa uYakobo akasima ku Misri; Uugwa akasha ng'wenso palung'wi ni atata itu.
ACT 7:16 Akaholwa ga nu ku Shekemu akaikwa mu kibiila naiza uAbrahamu ai ukiguile ku ipande nia mpia kupuma ku ana ang'wa Hamori uko ku Shekemu.
ACT 7:17 Matungo a ilo ilago naiza Itunda ai umulagile uAbrahamu nai lahumbeela, antu aze atulaa ongeeleka uko ku Misri,
ACT 7:18 matungo nanso ai u ukile mutemi mungiiza migulya a Misri, mutemi ni shanga umulingile u Yusufu.
ACT 7:19 uMutemi uyu nu mungiiza waka akongela i antu itu nu kuatenda ibibi i a tata itu, nu kuaguma i ana ao ni adabu iti aleke ki kie.
ACT 7:20 Mu matungo nanso uMusa ai utugilwe; ai muziza ntongeela ang'wa Itunda, akalelwa myeli itaatu mi ito nilang'wa tata nuakwe.
ACT 7:21 Itungo nai ugumilwe, u munanso nuang'wa Farao ai umuhoile akamulela anga ng'wana nuakwe.
ACT 7:22 uMusa ai umanyisigwe umanyisigwa wihi nua ku Misri; ai munyangulu mu nkani nu mu ntendo.
ACT 7:23 Kuiti ze yakilaa kutimilya myaka makumi anne, ikamuziila mu nkolo akwe kuagendeela i anyandugu akwe, ana a Israeli.
ACT 7:24 Nai akamihenga mu Israeli ukutendeelwa ubii, uMusa ai umuguniiye nu kususha u ubii nai watula ukumuonela ku kumukua u mu Misri:
ACT 7:25 aze usigile kina i anya ndugu akwe akulinga kina Itunda ukuaguna ku mukono nuakwe, kuiti shanga ikalinga.
ACT 7:26 Luhiku nai lutyatile akalongola ku ang'wi a Aisraeli nai atulaa akilea; wakagema kuahunga; azeligitya, 'Akulu, Unyenye ingi mi ndugu; mbona mukilea nyenye ku nyenye?
ACT 7:27 Kuiti nai umuleile u munyakisali nuakwe akamugumiila kuli, nu kuligitya, 'Nyenyu nu kuikile wi muhumi hangi wi mulamula antu?
ACT 7:28 Uewe uloilwe kumbulaga, anga naza umubulagile u Mumisri igulo?”
ACT 7:29 uMusa akamanka ze yakilaa kija ayo; akatula muziila mu ihi a Midiani, naiza akatula tata nua ana abiili.
ACT 7:30 Ze yakilaa myaka makumi anne kukila, malaika akamupumila mu ibambazi nila lugulu nua Sinai, mu lulimi nula moto mukati i kundui.
ACT 7:31 Matungo uMusa nai wakihenga u moto, ai ukuiwe iko nai ukihenga, hangi nai ugemile kukihumbeela iti kukigoza, luli nila Mukulu likamuzila luzeligitya,
ACT 7:32 Nene Itunda nua atata ako, Itunda wang'wa Abrahamu, hangi wang'wa Isaka, hangi wang'wa Yakobo; uMusa ai ukagatile hangi shanga akagema kugozeela.
ACT 7:33 Mukulu akamutambuila, Tugula i ilatu niako, inkika nuimikile ingi kianza kelu.
ACT 7:34 Nihengaa u lwago nula antu ane niamoli ku Misri; Nijaa kulwala kitalao, nu nene nasimaa iti niagune; itungili pembya, nikakulagiilya uewe ku Misri.'
ACT 7:35 Uyu uMusa naiza amuhitile, itungo nai aligitilye, 'nyenyu nukuikile kutula wi muhumi hangi mulamuli nuitu?' - ai watulaa yuyo ng'wenso Itunda ai umulagiiye atule muhumi hangi muguni. Itunda ai umulagiiye ku mukono nuang'wa malaika naiza ai umupumiie uMusa mi ikundui.
ACT 7:36 uMusa ai uatongee kupuma ku Misri ze yakilaa kituma u ukuilwa ni ilingasiilyo mu Misri nu mu luzi nula shamu, nu mu ibambazi ku itungo nila myaka makumi anne.
ACT 7:37 Ingi uMusa yuyo nai uatambuie i antu a Israeli kina, 'Itunda ukumunyansuilya munyakidagu kupuma mukati a anyandugu anyu munyakidagu anga nene'
ACT 7:38 Uyu ingi muntu niiza mu i anza mi ibambazi nu malaika naiza ai utambue nu ng'wenso mu lugulu nula Sinai. Uyu yuyo muntu naiza ai watulaa ni atata itu, uyu ingi muntu naiza ai usingiiye u lukani nulukete u upanga nu kuinkiilya usese.
ACT 7:39 Uyu ingi muntu naiza i atata itu ai ahitile ku mukulya; ai amugumiie kuli, nu mu nkolo niao ai apilukie ku Misri.
ACT 7:40 Mu itungo nilanso ai amutambuie uHaruni. 'kuzipilye i itunda ni ika kutongeela. Uyu uMusa, nai watulaa uku utongeela kupuma kihi a ku Misri, shanga kulingile nai kimihangile,'
ACT 7:41 Iti gwa ai azipilye ndama ku mahiku nanso nu kupumya isongelyo kung'wa nuanso u dudu hangi akiloeelya ku nsoko a mulimo nua mikono ao.
ACT 7:42 Kuiti Itunda ai uapiue nu kuinkiilya ipoelye i nzota nia kilunde, anga nai ikilisigwe mu mbugulu a anyakidagu, 'Itii, mampumilyaa unene i masongelyo a ikali nai muisinzile mi ibambazi ku matungo a myaka makumi anne, ito ni lang'wa israeli
ACT 7:43 Makigombaa i kitala nika kutankanila ni kang'wa Moleki ni inzota niang'wa Itunda refani, nu mululi ni mu uzipilye nu kuipoelya enso; hangi kumutwala kuli ikilo ni Babeli.'
ACT 7:44 aTata anyu ai akete i kitala nika kutankanila nika ukuiili mu ibambazi, anga Itunda nai ulagiiye nai utambue nu Musa, kina ukukizipya ku mpyani a iko nai ukihengile.
ACT 7:45 Iki ingi kitala naiza a tata itu ku itungo ni lao, ai aletilwe mu ihi nu Joshua. Iki ai kipumie matungo nai ingie kusala u ingu naiza Itunda ai uazunsilye ze yakilaa u umoli nu a a tata itu. Iki ai kituile iti kupikiila luhiku u Daudi,
ACT 7:46 naiza ai uligilye u ugombigwa mu miho ang'wa Itunda; nu kulompa kuduma likalo kung'wa Itunda nuang'wa Yakobo.
ACT 7:47 Kuiti uSelemani ai umuzengee ito Itunda.
ACT 7:48 Ga ni iti Nukoli kigulya shanga wikiie mu mato nazengilwe ku mkono; iki iti anga u munyakidagu nai uligitilye.
ACT 7:49 Ilunde ingi ituntu nilane nila ukulu, ni ihi ingi nkika a kuikila migulu ane. Ito la mpyani kii Mukunzengela?, uligitilye Mukulu; ang'wi ingi pii i nkika ane na akusupilya?
ACT 7:50 Shanga mukono nuane nuitumile izi i intu yihi?'
ACT 7:51 Unye antu niakete nkingo nkaku ni shanga mutawe i kidamu mu nkolo ni akutwi, kila nkua mimukingila u Ng'wau Ng'welu,' mukituma anga i a tata anyu nai itumile.
ACT 7:52 Ingi munyakidagu kii mu anyakidagu naiza i a tata anyu shanga ai amagilye? Ai a abulagile i anyakidagu ihi nai apumie ze ikili u upembelyo nua Ung'wi munya Tai ane; ni itungili matulaa ahugi hangi abulagi akwe ga,
ACT 7:53 unye antu nai musingiiye ilagiilyo ilo nai lilagiigwe nu malaika kuiti shanga ai muliambile.”
ACT 7:54 Uugwa i anyi anza nai akija imakani aya, ai asonsilwe i nkolo niao, akamukilisilya i mino uStefano.
ACT 7:55 Kuiti nuanso, aze watulaa wizue u Ng'wau Ng'welu, ai ugozile kilunde ku ukendegeeli hangi akihenga ikulyo nilang'wa Itunda,' nu kumihenga uYesu wimikile mukono nua kigoha nuang'wa Itunda.
ACT 7:56 uStefano akaligitya, “Goza nihengaa ilunde lalugukaa, nu Ng'wana wang'wa Adamu wimikile mukono nua kigoha nuang'wa Itunda.”
ACT 7:57 Kuiti i anyi anza akazogolya ku luli nula migulya, akakiila i akutwi ao, aka mumankiila ku palung'wi,
ACT 7:58 akamuguma kunzi a kisali nu kumukua i magwe; ni akuiili akatugula i ang'wenda ao nia kunzi nu kuika pihi pakupi ni migulu a muhumba nuitangwaa Sauli.
ACT 7:59 Nai atulaa akumukua i magwe, uStefano ai ulongolekile kumitanga u Mukulu nu kuligitya, “Mukulu Yesu, singiilya i nkolo ane,”.
ACT 7:60 Akatugama nu kitanga ku luli lukulu, “Mukulu, leka kua ailya u mulandu uwu. “Nai wakaligitya aya, akatinanga inkolo.
ACT 8:1 uSauli ai watulaa ukoli mu wigombya nua nsha akwe. luhiku nulanso papo nai wandilye kuaja nsuta ni itekeelo nai likoli ku Yerusalemu; ni a huiili ihi nai asapatie mu isali nia Yudea ni Samaria, kwaala i itumi.
ACT 8:2 Antu a kinyauwai ai amuikile uStefano nu kuzipya u hongeelya ukulu migulya akwe.
ACT 8:3 Kuiti uSauli ai ulimeile nangaluu itekeelo. Ai ulongoe ito ku ito nu kuakweha kunzi asungu i agoha, nu kuagumila mu kadulumu.
ACT 8:4 Ahuiili naza atulaa asapatie ai akili akulutanantya u lukani.
ACT 8:5 uFilipo akasima mu kisali nika Samaria nu kumutanantya uKristo Yesu
ACT 8:6 Ze yakilaa i anyianza kija nu kihenga i ilingasiilyo nai witumile u Filipo; akaika ukendegeeli migulya a iko nai uligitilye.
ACT 8:7 Kupuma papo i antu idu nai igulye, ahing'wi ai a apumile i antu kunu akulila ku luli lukulu, hangi idu nai akule igandi ni akitele ai agunilwe.
ACT 8:8 Hangi ai ukoli ulowa ukulu mu kisali.
ACT 8:9 Kuiti ai ukoli muntu ung'wi mu kisali nikanso i lina nilakwe Simioni, naiza watulaa ukituma ulogi; naza ai u utumie kua kuila i antu a ingu nua Samaria, itungo wazeligitya kina nuanso ingi muntu nua kusanigwa.
ACT 8:10 ia Samaria ihi puma nu muniino ga nu mukulu, akamutegeelya; akaligitya; “umuntu uyu igi iyo i ngulu ang'wa Itunda naiza ingi mukulu.”
ACT 8:11 Akamutegeelya, ku ndogoelyo wa akuie ku itungo ilipu ku ulogi nuakwe.
ACT 8:12 Kuiti itungo nai ahuiie kina uFilipo ai utanantilye migulya a utemi nuang'wa Itunda nu migulya a lina nilang'wa Yesu Kristo, ai ogigwe, agoha ku asungu.
ACT 8:13 Nu Simioni mukola ai uhuiie: ze yakilaa kogigwa, akalongoleka kutula nu Filipo; nai wakihenga i ilingaasiilyo nu ukuilwa nai watula ikitung'wa, ai ukuiwe.
ACT 8:14 Matungo i Itumi niaku Yerusalemu nai akija kina ku Samaria asingiilya u lukani nulang'wa Itunda, aka alagiilya uPetro nu Yohana.
ACT 8:15 Matungo nai atulaa akusima aka alompeela; kina amusingiilye u Ng'wau Ng'welu.
ACT 8:16 Kupikiila itungo nilanso, u Ng'wau Ng'welu ai watulaa wakili kuasimiila ga nung'wi ao; ai atulaa ogigwa udu ku lina nila Mukulu uYesu.
ACT 8:17 Uugwa uPetro nu Yohana aka aikiilya i mikono, ni enso akasingiilya u Ng'wau Ngwelu.
ACT 8:18 Matungo uSimioni nai wakihenga kina u Ng'wau Ng'welu wapumigwa kukiila kuikigwa i mikono ni itumi; akalowa kuinkiilya mpia,
ACT 8:19 Akaligitya, “Ninkiilyi ingulu iyi, iti kila ni nikamuikiilya u mukono wasingiilye u Ng'wau Ng'welu.”
ACT 8:20 Kuiti uPetro akamutambula, i mpia niako palung'wi nu ewe ilimililee kuli, ku nsoko usigile kina i ipegwa ni ang'wa Itunda iligigwa ku mpia.
ACT 8:21 Umugila ipatyo mu ikani ili, ku nsoko inkolo ako shanga ngoloku ntongeela ang'wa Itunda.
ACT 8:22 Iti gwa ile itunu u ubii nuako nu kumulompa Itunda kwaala ukulekelwa i masigo na munkolo ako.
ACT 8:23 Ku ndogoelyo kihenga ukoli mu uhungu nua uwai ni kitungo nika mulandu.”
ACT 8:24 uSimioni akasukiilya nu kuligitya, “Mulompi uMukulu ku nsoko ane, ku nsoko i makani ihi ni mumaligitilye ahumile kumpumila.
ACT 8:25 Matungo uPetro nu Yohana nai atula akuiila nu kutanantya u lukani nula Mukulu, ai asukile ku Yerusalemu ku nzila yiyo; ai atanantilye i nkani ninza mu ijiji idu nia a Samaria.
ACT 8:26 Uugwa u malaika nua Mukulu akitambulya nu Filipo akaligitya, “Elye hangi ulongole takama mu nzila ni longoe pihi a Yerusalemu kutunga ku Gaza.” (Nzila iyi ikoli mu ibambazi).
ACT 8:27 Akelya nu kulongola. Goza, ai ukoli muntu nua ku Ethiopia, Towashi ukete uhumi ukulu pihi a kandase; malkia nua Ethiopia. Nai uikilwe migulya a itulyo nilakwe lihi; nu ng'wenso ai watulaa walongolaa ku Yerusalemu ki kumbika.
ACT 8:28 Ai watulaa ukusuka wikie mu mutuka nuakwe ukusoma mbugulu a munyakidagu uIsaya.
ACT 8:29 Ng'wau Ng'welu akaligitya nu Filipo, “Humbeela pakupi nu mutuka uwu uambinkane nu wenso.
ACT 8:30 Iti gwa uFilipo akalongola i ntambo, akamija ukusoma mu mbugulu ang'wa Isaya; akaligitya, Itii, ulingile nu kukisoma?”
ACT 8:31 uMuethiopia akaligitya, “nikahuma uli muntu anga wahite kuntongeela?” Akamusinja uFilipo wanankile mu mutuka nu kikie palung'wi nu ng'wenso.
ACT 8:32 Itungili ilundo nila ukilisigwa nai utuile ukulisoma uMuethiopia ingi ili, ai utongeewe anga ng'waa nkolo kulongola ku usinzilwo kusinzwa ai ukilagile ihi twii, shanga ai ukunukua ilangu nilakwe;
ACT 8:33 ku kinya uwai kakwe ulamuli nua kwe ai uhegigwe; Nyenyu ukuganuila u ulelwa nuakwe? u likalo nulakwe lahegigwe mihi.”
ACT 8:34 Uugwa u towashi akamukolya uFilipo, nu kuligitya, “nukulompile, ingi munyakidagu kii naiza utambuwe inkani niakwe, ingi kutula ng'wenso, ang'wi nia muntu mungiiza?”
ACT 8:35 uFilipo ai wandilye kuligitya, ai wandilye ku ukilisigwa uwu nuang'wa Isaya kumutanantilya nkani yang'wa Yesu
ACT 8:36 Aze akoli munzila, akapika pa mazi, utowashi akaligitya, “Goza, akoli i mazi apa ntuni ni kikingie ndeke kogigwa”,
ACT 8:37 (imakani aya, ' Iti gwa uMuethiopia akasukiilya, “nihuiie kina uYesu Kristo ingi ng'wana wang'wa Itunda.” amutili mu mbugulu nia kali). Papo uMuethiopia akalagiilya u mutuka wimike.
ACT 8:38 Ai alongoe mukati a mazi, palung'wi uFilipo nu towashi, uFilipo akamoja.
ACT 8:39 Matungo nai akapuma mu mazi, Ng'wau Ng'welu nua Mukulu akamutwala uFilipo kahelu; utowashi shanga akamihenga, akalongola i nzila akwe waze ulumbiiye.
ACT 8:40 Kuiti uFilipo akapumila ku Azolo, ai ukiile mu mukoa uwo nu kutanantya nkani ninza mu isali yihi kupikiila nai wakapika ku Kaisaria.
ACT 9:1 Kuiti, uSauli, ai ulongolekile kuligitya u utumbani ga nuwu nua nsha ku amanyisigwa a Mukulu, akalongola kung'wa kuhani nu mukulu
ACT 9:2 nu kulompa ibada kunsoko a matekeelo uko ku Dameski, iti kina anga wamulije muntu nukoli mu nzila iyo, atule mugoha ang'wi musungu, wa atunge nu ku aleta ku Yerusalemu.
ACT 9:3 Ga nai watula ulongoe muhinzo, ai ipumie kina nai wahumbeela ku Dameski, kupumpugiilya ika melya pihi pihii welu kupuma kilunde,'
ACT 9:4 nung'wenso wakagwa pihi hangi akija luli lukumutambuila, “Sauli, Sauli, mbona ukunaja unene?”
ACT 9:5 uSauli akasukiilya, Wi nyenyu u ewe Mukulu? uMukulu akaligitya, “Unene ng'wenso Yesu nuku ntasha;
ACT 9:6 Kuiti nyansuka, ingile mu kisali, nu ewe ukutambuilwa nu takiwe kituma.
ACT 9:7 iAntu awo nai akugenda palung'wi nu Sauli akakilaga ihi twii, aze ategeeye u luli, shanga ikihenga u muntu.
ACT 9:8 uSauli akanyansuka mu ihi nai kunukue i miho akwe, shanga akahuma kihenga i kintu, akamuamba u mukono akamuleta kupikiila ku Dameski.
ACT 9:9 Ku mahiku ataatu shanga ukihenga, shanga ukulya, ang'wi kung'wa.
ACT 9:10 Uugwa ai ukoli u mumanyisigwa ku Dameski i lina nilakwe Anania, uMukulu ai uligitilye nu ng'wenso mu muloto, 'Anania.” Nu kuligitya, “ Goza, nkoli apa, Mukulu.
ACT 9:11 “uMukulu akamutambuila, “Nyansuka ulongole mu kisali nikitangwaa Nyofu, nu mu ito nilang'wa Yuda ukolye muntu kupuma ku Tarso, nuitangwaa Sauli; ndogoelyo umoli ukulompa;
ACT 9:12 hangi aza umihengile mu muloto u muntu i lina nilakwe Anania ukingila nu kumuikiilya i mikono migulya akwe iti kina walije kihenga.
ACT 9:13 Kuiti u Anania akasukiilya, “Mukulu, nijaa inkani nia muntu uyu ku antu idu, ku ngele kii nukuatendeela ubi i elu nia uko ku Yerusalemu;
ACT 9:14 Apa ukete u uhumi kupuma kung'wa kuhani nu mukulu kumuamba kila ung'wi nuenda litanga i lina nilako.
ACT 9:15 Kuiti uMukulu akamutambuila, “Longola, ku ndogoelyo nuanso ingi kiseme kihoilwe kitolane, walihole ilina nilane ntongeela a anyaingu ni a temi ni ana a Israeli.
ACT 9:16 Ndogoelyo nikamulagiila nili idu nakumutulika kagigwa ku nsoko a lina nilane.”
ACT 9:17 uAnania akalongola, akingila umo mito; Akamu ikiilya i mikono akaligitya, Munya ndugu Sauli, uMukulu uYesu, naza ukupumie mu nzila naza watulaa upembilye, undagiiye ulije kihenga hangi wizuligwe u Ng'wau Ng'welu.
ACT 9:18 Kupumpugiilya ikagwa kupuma mu miho akwe intu anga makulugamba, akalija kihenga, akimika, akogigwa; akalya indya nu kulija ingulu.
ACT 9:19 Akikie palung'wi ni amanyisigwa uko ku Dameski ku mahiku idu.
ACT 9:20 Matungo yayo yaayo akamutanantya uYesu mu matekeelo, azeligitya kina u ng'wenso ingi ng'wana wang'wa Itunda.
ACT 9:21 Hangi ihi nai igulye ai akuiwe nu kuligitya, “Shanga yuyu nai uabipilye ihi nai itangile i lina ili uko ku Yerusalemu? Hangi apa aza uzile ku isigo nila kuatunga nu kuatwala ku akuhani.”
ACT 9:22 Kuiti uSauli ai uaiigwe kutanantya nu kuatenda i Ayahudi nai ikiie ku Dameski ahalinkanilwe nu ku kaminkiilya nia kina uyu yuyo Kristo.
ACT 9:23 Ze yakilaa mahiku idu, Ayahudi akaika ulamuli palung'wi iti amubulage.
ACT 9:24 Kuiti isigo lao likakumuka kung'wa Sauli. Akamutugila pa mumpita mung'wi nu utiku alije kumubulaga.
ACT 9:25 Kuiti amanyisigwa akwe akamuhola utiku akamusimya kukiila mi ikiligo, akamusimya pihi mu nkapu.
ACT 9:26 Nu Sauli nai wapika ku Yerusalemu, ai ugemile kihanguila ni amanyisigwa; kuiti ai atulaa akumogopa, shanga akahuiila kina ung'wenso ingi mumanyisigwa.
ACT 9:27 Kuiti uBarnaba akamuhola nu kumutwala ku itumi, Nu kuaganuila kinyauli uSauli ai umuine u Mukulu mu nzila nu Mukulu nai uligitilye nu ng'wenso, ni kinyauli uSauli nai utanantilye ku ukamatiku ku lina nilang'wa Yesu uko ku Dameski.
ACT 9:28 Ai utankanile ni enso nai akingila nu kupuma ku Yerusalemu. Akitunta ku ukamatiku ku lina nila Mukulu uYesu,
ACT 9:29 azikolenkeelya ni Ayahudi nia Kiyunani, kuiti azegema nkua ku nkua kumubulaga.
ACT 9:30 Matungo ia luna nai alinga ikani nilanso, akamuhola kupika ku Kaisaria, nu kumutwala alongole ku Tarso.
ACT 9:31 Uugwa itekeelo lihi mu Uyahudi, Galilaya ni Samaria, ai latula nu ulyuuku, hangi likazengwa, nu kugenda mu woa nua Mukulu ni ipoelya nila Ng'wau Ng'welu, itekeelo likakula ku kongeeleka ingele.
ACT 9:32 Uugwa ai upumie uPetro nai ukoli ukupilima pilima nkika yihi nia mukoa, aka asimiila ahuiili ni ikie mu kisali nika Lida.
ACT 9:33 Akamihenga kuko muntu ung'wi i lina nilakwe Ainea, muntu uyu watuilee mu ulili myaka munana; ndogoelyo ai watulaa kitele.
ACT 9:34 uPetro akamuila, “ Ainea, uYesu Kristo akugune; Uka hangi witandikilye u ulili nuako,” Nkua yiyo akauka.
ACT 9:35 Ni atu ihi nai ikiie ku Lida ni Sharoni nai amihengile u muntu uyo, ai amupilukie u Mukulu.
ACT 9:36 Ai akoli nu mumanyisigwa Yafa nuitangwaaTabitha, niiza limpyanigwe anga “Dorcas.” Uyu musungu ai wizue mulimo ukende ni ntendo nia ukendepwa nai witumaa ku a ula.
ACT 9:37 Ai ipumie mu mahiku nanso ai ulwae nu kusha; nai amukalalya, ai amunankiiye shumba nika migulya nu kumulalisha.
ACT 9:38 Ku iti i Linda ai atulaa pakupi ni Yafa, ni amanyisigwa ai igulye kina uPetro ai ukoli kuko, ai a alagiiye antu abiili kitalakwe, aze musinja, “Pembya kitaitu bila kutinia.”
ACT 9:39 uPetro akauka nu kuhega palung'wi ni enso. Nai wakapika, ai amuletile mu shumba nika migulya. Ni ahimbi ihi ai imikile pakupi nu ng'wenso azelila, azemulagiila ia mujulungu ni ang'wenda naza uDorcas ai uahilitiiye itungo nai ukoli palung'wi ni enso.
ACT 9:40 uPetro aka apumya ihi kunzi a shumba, akatugama akalompa, uugwa akaupilukila u muili, akaligitya, “Tabitha, uka.” Akalugula i miho akwe hangi nai wakamihenga uPetro akikie pihi.
ACT 9:41 Uugwa uPetro akaminkiilya u mukono nuakwe akamunyansula, hangi nai wakaitanga i ahuiili ni ahimbi, akainkiilya kitalao aze mupanga.
ACT 9:42 Ikani ili likakumuka i Yafa ihi, ni antu idu akamuhuiila uMukulu.
ACT 9:43 Ai ipumie uPetro akikie mahiku idu ku Yafa palung'wi ni muntu nuitangwaa Simioni, muzipya ndili.
ACT 10:1 Ai ukoli nu muntu nua kitungaa mu kisali nika ku Kaisaria, lina nilakwe ai witangwaa Kornelio, ai mukulu wi idale nila Kiitalia.
ACT 10:2 Ai watulaa mukulya Itunda hangi ai umukuiye Itunda ni ito nilakwe lihi; ai upumilye mpia idu ku Ayahudi hangi ai ulompile kung'wa Itunda mahiku ihi.
ACT 10:3 Matungo a saa kenda nia mung'wi, akihenga muloto Malaika nuang'wa Itunda upembilye kitalakwe. uMalaika akamutambuila, “Kornelio!
ACT 10:4 uKornelio akamugoza u malaika hangi ai ukete u woa ukulu nangaluu akaligitya “Iki ki ntuni mukulu?” uMalaika akamutambuila “Malompi ako ni masongelyo ako ku aula yanakilaa migulya anga ukimbukiilyi mu umoli nuang'wa Itunda.”
ACT 10:5 Itungili lagiilya i antu alongole ikisali nika Yafa kumuleta muntu ung'wi nuitangwaa Simioni naiza witangwa ga ni Petro.
ACT 10:6 Wikiie hangi munonia ndili nuitangwaa Simioni naiza ito nilakwe likoli mpelo a luzi.”
ACT 10:7 Ze yakilaa uMalaika nai watula ukuligitya nu ng'wenso kuhega, uKornelio akaitanga i anyamulimo ni a mito nilakwe abiili, nu a asikali nai watulaa ukumukulya Itunda pa kati a asikali nai atulaa akumuaiilya.
ACT 10:8 uKornelio ai uatambuie ihi nai apumie nu kualagiilya ku Yafa.
ACT 10:9 Luhiku nai lutyatile itungo nila saa mutandatu aze amoli mu nzila hangi ahumbeela mu kisali, uPetro akanankila migulya mu kitala kulompa.
ACT 10:10 Ga ni hangi akatula ni nzala nu kusiga i kintu ka kulya, kuiti itungo i antu akuluga indya, akalagiilwa muloto,
ACT 10:11 akihenga ilunde laluguka ni kiseme kikusima ni kintu kituunga anga ng'wenda mukulu ukusima pihi mu mahalu mu nkigo niakwe yihi inne.
ACT 10:12 Mukati akwe ai ikoli mpyani yihi nia ikali ni ikete migulu inne nizi ni yagulaa migulya a mahalu, ni nyunyi nia milunde.
ACT 10:13 Hangi luli lukaligitya kitalakwe, “Uka, Petro sinza nu nkulya.”
ACT 10:14 Kuiti uPetro akaligitya “Shanga iti, Mukulu ku nsoko nkili nkaye kulya kintu kihi ni kizumi hangi kishapu.
ACT 10:15 Kuiti u luli lukapembya kitalakwe hangi ku nkua akabiili “Nukeilye Itunda leka kukitanga kizumi ang'wi ki shapu.”
ACT 10:16 Iki ai kipumie nkua itaatu, ni kiseme iko kikatula kaholwaa hangi milunde.
ACT 10:17 Ni matungo uPetro aze ukoli mu uhalinkanilwa migulya a muloto nuanso ndogoelyo akwe ntuni, Goza, antu nai atulaa alagiigwe nu Kornelio akimika ntongeela a mumpita, azekolya i nzila a kulongola mu ito.
ACT 10:18 Hangi akitanga nu ku kolya anga ize uSimioni nuitangwaa ga ni Petro anga ize ai watulaa wkiie pang'wanso.
ACT 10:19 Itungo nilanso uPetro nai watulaa ukusiga migulya a uwo u muloto, Ng'wau Ng'welu akaligitya nu ng'wenso,
ACT 10:20 “Uka hangi usime pihi nu kulongola ni enso. Leka kitumba kulongola ni enso, ku nsoko nialagiiye.”
ACT 10:21 uPetro akasima pihi kitalao nu kuligitya, “Unene yuyo ni mukumuduma. Ku niki mupembilye?”
ACT 10:22 Akaligitya, “Akida ung'wi i lina nilakwe Kornelio, muntu nua tai ane hangi wilowaa kumukulya Itunda, ni antu imutambulaa ikende mu ingu wihi nua Ayahudi, utambuiwe nu malaika nuang'wa Itunda ku ulagiilya iti ulongole mi ito nilakwe, iti wije u lukani kupuma kitalako.”
ACT 10:23 uPetro aka asingiilya kingila mukati nu kikie palung'wi nu ng'wenso. Kidau dau nai kityatile akauka akalongola palung'wi ni enso, ni anya ndugu asheenyu kupuma ku Yafa akityata nu ng'wenso.
ACT 10:24 Luhiku nai lutyatile ai azile ku Kaisaria. Nu Kornelio ai ukoli ualindiie; hangi ai watulaa waitanga palung'wi anya ndugu akwe ni ahumba uya akwe nia pakupi.
ACT 10:25 Matungo uPetro nai ukingila mukati, uKornelio akamusingiilya nu kutuna kupika pihi mu migulu akwe ku ikulyo.
ACT 10:26 Kuiti uPetro akamunyansula nu kuligitya “Imike; ga nu nene mukola ingi ni bina adamu.”
ACT 10:27 Matungo uPetro aze ukoli ukitambuila nu ng'wenso, ai ulongoe mu ito akahanga i antu ilundiila palung'wi.
ACT 10:28 Aka aila, Unyenye akola mulingile kina shanga ilagiilyo nila Ayahudi kihanguila ang'wi kugendeelwa nu muntu niiza shanga nua ingu uwu. Kuiti Itunda undagiie unene kina shanga ntakiwe kumitanga muntu wihi ingi muzung'waa ang'wi mushapu.
ACT 10:29 Hangi yiyo ndogoelyo mpembilye bila kikungumya, nai ndagiigwe ku nsoko a iko. Kululo numukolye ku niki mulagiigwe ku nsoko ane.”
ACT 10:30 uKornelio akaligitya, “Mahiku anne nakiile, itungo anga lili aza nkoli kulompa itungo nila saa kenda mung'wi mukati ito nilane; Nihenga ntogeela ane muntu wimikile ukete ni ang'wenda elu.
ACT 10:31 Akantambuila. “Kornelio malompi ako igigwa nu Itunda, ni masongelyo ako ku aula yatulaa ukimbukiilyi ntongeela ang'wa Itunda.
ACT 10:32 Kululo lagiilya muntu ku Yafa nu kumitanga muntu ung'wi nuitangwaa Simioni waze kitalako, naiza hangi witangwaa Petro. naizaa wikiie ku muzipya ndili ung'wi nuitangwaa Simioni naiza ito nilakwe likoli mu mpelo a luzi.
ACT 10:33 (Komaniilya; U lukiili ulu, Nu ng'wenso nuikapemya ukuligitya nu nyenye,” umutule mu ukilisigwa nua kali.)
ACT 10:34 Uugwa uPetro akalugula u mulomo nuakwe nuku ligitya “Tai, nahuiila kina Itunda shanga uhumile kutula nu ukuili.
ACT 10:35 Badala akwe, kila ingu u muntu wihi nuimukulyaa nu kituma i ntendo nia tai ane ugombekile kitalakwe.
ACT 10:36 Ulingile u lukani nai u upimilye ku antu a Isreli, nai watulaa ukutanantya lukani nu lukende nula ulyuuku kukiila Yesu Kristo naiza Mukulu nua ihi -
ACT 10:37 nu nyenye akola mulingile i kintu nai kipumie, naiza kipumie ku Yudea ihi hangi ai landiiye ku Galilaya, ze yzkilaa u wogigwa naza uYohana ai utanantilye.
ACT 10:38 i kintu nai katulaa kimutule uYesu Kristo iti Itunda nai umuikie i makuta ku Ng'wau Ng'welu nu ku ngulu. Ai ulongoe nukituma u ukende nu kuaguna ihi naiagigwe nu mulugu, ku nsoko Itunda ai watulaa palung'wi nu ng'wenso.
ACT 10:39 Usese ingi akuiili a makani ihi nai witumile mi ihi nia Uyahudi nu mu Yerusalemu- uyu ingi Yesu nai amubulagile nu kumutumbika mikota.
ACT 10:40 Uyu muntu wang'wa Itunda nai umiukilye luhiku nula kataatu nu kuminkiilya kukumuka, shanga ku antu ihi, kuiti ku akuiili nai aholanigwe ze ikili ni Itunda.
ACT 10:41 -usese akola, nai kalyaa nu ng'wenso nu kung'waa nu ng'wenso ze yakilaa kiuka kupuma ku ashi.
ACT 10:42 Ukulagiiye kutanantya ku antu nu ku kuiila kina uyu yuyo naiza Itunda ai umuholanilye kutula mulamuli nua nia panga nawa niakule.
ACT 10:43 Mu ng'wenso anyakidagu ihi akuiile, iti kina kila nukuhuiila mu ng'wenso ukusingiilya ulekelwa nua mulandu kukiila i lina nilakwe.”
ACT 10:44 Matungo uPetro ulongolekile kuligitya aya, Ng'wau Ng'welu akaizulya ihi nai atulaa akutegeelya u lukani nulakwe.
ACT 10:45 Antu awo niatulikile ni idale nila ahuiili nai atawe ikidamu- awo ihi nai azile nu Petro- ai akuiwe, ku nsoko a kipegwa nika Ng'wau Ng'welu nai uhunuwe ga nuku anyaingu.
ACT 10:46 Ku nsoko ai igule awa anyaingu akutambula ku ntambu ingiiza nu kumukulya Itunda. uPetro akasukiilya.
ACT 10:47 “Ukoli muntu wihi uhumile kugilya i mazi iti i antu aleke kogigwa, Antu awa amusingiilya uNg'wau Ng'welu anga usese?”
ACT 10:48 Uugwa akalagiilya ogigwe ku lina nilang'wa Yesu Kristo. Panya mbele akamulompa wikiie nienso ku mahiku kituunga.
ACT 11:1 Itumi ni anya ndugu awo nai akoli uko ku Yudea nai igulye kina anyaingu alusingiilya u lukani nulang'wa Itunda.
ACT 11:2 uPetro nai wakiza uko kuYerusalemu, idale ilo nila antu nai atalwa ikidamu akandya ku musosha, Azeligitya,
ACT 11:3 “Wa ambinkana nia antu nishanga atawe ikidamu nu kulya nienso!”
ACT 11:4 Kuiti uPetro ai wandilye kuganula i kintu mu kati; azeligitya,
ACT 11:5 “Aza nkoli kulompa mu kisali nika Yafa, nihenga muloto nua kiseme kikusima pihi anga ng'wenda mukulu ukusima kupuma mi ilunde ku nkigo niakwe inne. kikasima kitalane.
ACT 11:6 Nikakigoza nu kusiga migulya akwe. Nikihenga ikali nia migulu inne niyikiie mi ihi, ni ikali nia mihaka ni ikali ni yagulaa ni nyunyi nia kilunde.
ACT 11:7 Uugwa nikija luli lukuligitya nu nene, “Uka, Petro, sinza hangi ulye!”
ACT 11:8 Nikaligitya, “Shanga uu, Mukulu, mu mulomo nuane shanga yakaiyee kingila kintu kihi ni shanga keigwe ang'wi kishapu”
ACT 11:9 Kuiti u luli lukansukiilya hangi kupuma kilunde, iko Itunda nukitanantilye kutula ingi kelu, leka kukitanga ingi kizung'wa,
ACT 11:10 Iki ai kipumie nkua itaatu, ni kila kintu kikaholwa kilunde hangi.
ACT 11:11 Goza, itungo nilanso antu a taatu ai atulaa imikile ntongeela ito ilo nai kumoli; alagiigwe kupuma ku Kaisaria kupembya kitalane.
ACT 11:12 Ng'wau Ng'welu akantambuila kulongola nienso, hangi ndeke kuhutana nienso. Awa agoha ni mu tandatu akalongola palung'wi nu nene hangi ai kulongoe mi ito nila muntu ung'wi.
ACT 11:13 Ai ukutambuie iti nai umihengile u malaika wimikile mukati ito nilakwe azeligitya, “Ndagiilye ku Yafa numulete uSimioni niiza ilina nilakwe i lulya ingi Petro.
ACT 11:14 Ukuligitya u lukani kitalako mu uwu ukugunika uewe ni ito nilako lihi.”
ACT 11:15 Nai nandilye kuligitya nienso, Ng'wau Ng'welu wakiza migulya ao anga kitaitu u ng'wandyo.
ACT 11:16 Nkimbukile i makani a Mukulu, nai uligitile, “uYohana ai wogilye ku mazi, kuiti mukoja ku Ng'wau Ng'welu.”
ACT 11:17 Hangi anga Itunda upumilye isongelyo anga nai ukinkiiye usese nai kumukuiye u Mukulu uYesu Kristo, unene ingi nyenyu, kina nihume kumukingila Itunda?
ACT 11:18 Nai akija imakani aya, shanga ikasusha, ila akamulumbiilya Itunda nu kuligitya, Itunda upumilye ila itunu kunsoko ni awa anyaingu ga.”
ACT 11:19 Uugwa ahuiili naza u lwago ai landiiye mu nsha ang'wa Stephano ai asapatie kupuma ku Yerusalemu- ahuiili awa akalongola kaheelu, kupikiila ku Foinike, Kipro ni Antiokia. Ai a atambuie kutula lukani lang'wa Yesu wing'wene ku Ayahudi nu sese ku muya nuili wihi.
ACT 11:20 Kuiti ang'wi ao ingi antu kupuma ku Kipro ni Krene, ai azile ku Antiokia nu kuligitya ni Ayunani nu kumutanantya uMukulu uYesu.
ACT 11:21 Nu mukono nua Mukulu ai watulaa palung'wi ni enso, ni antu idu akahuiila nu kumupilukila uMukulu.
ACT 11:22 Makani ao akapika mu akutwi ni i tekeelo nila ku Yerusalemu; hangi akamulagiilya uBarnaba walongole kupikiila ku Antiokia.
ACT 11:23 Nai wakapembya nu kihenga i ipegwa niang'wa Itunda ai wiloile; nu kua kinyila ihi kusaga nu Mukulu mu nkolo niao.
ACT 11:24 Ku nsoko ai watulaa muntu mukende hangi wizuiwe nu Ng'wau Ng'welu nu u huiili ni antu idu akongeeleka mu Mukulu.
ACT 11:25 Panyambele, uBarnaba ai ulongoe ku Tarso kumihenga uSauli.
ACT 11:26 Nai wakamulija, akamuleta ku Antiokia. Ikatula ku ng'waka wihi akilundiila palung'wi ni itekeelo nu kuamanyisa antu idu. Ni amanyisigwa akitangwa akristo ku nkua a ng'wandyo uko ku Antiokia.
ACT 11:27 Nu mu mahiku aya anyakidagu akasima kupuma ku Yerusalemu kupikiila ku Antiokia.
ACT 11:28 Ung'wi ao ingi Agapo uu lina lakwe, akimika aze ulagiiwe nu Ng'wa Ngwelu kina nzala ntaki ikupumila mu unkumbigulu wihi. Iki ai kipumie itungo nula mahiku ang'wa Klaudio.
ACT 11:29 Ku lulo, amanyisigwa, kila ung'wi nai ukendepilwe. ai alamue kutwala u aiilya ku anyandugu niakoli ku Uyahudi.
ACT 11:30 Ai itumile iti; Ai atumile i mpia ku mukono wan'gwa Barnaba nu Sauli.
ACT 12:1 Itungo nilanso mutemi uHerode wakagoola u mukono nuakwe ku ang'wi a awo niapumile mu milundo iti kuaja.
ACT 12:2 Akamubulaga uYakobo muluna wang'wa Yohana ku mpanga.
ACT 12:3 Ze yakilaa kihenga kina ia loile i Ayahudi, akamuamba nu Petro hangi. Iki ai katulaa itungo nila mikate nishanga i gahiigwe.
ACT 12:4 Nai wamuamba, akamuika mu kadulumu nu kuika madale anne a asikali iti kumusunja, ai usigiie kumutwala ku antu ze yakilaa u luhiku nula kusupya.
ACT 12:5 uPetro wakaikwa mu kadulumu, kuiti i malompi akitung'wa ku ngulu ni ilundo ku nsoko akwe kung'wa Itunda.
ACT 12:6 Utiku ze ikili uHerode wakili kulongola kumupumya, Utiku nuanso uPetro ai watulaa ulae pakati a asikali abiili, waze utungilwe ni minyororo i biili, ni asunja ntongeela a mumpita ai atulaa akusunja i kadulumu.
ACT 12:7 Goza, u malaika nua Mukulu kupumpugiilya wakamupumila nu welu ukelya mukati. Akamukua uPetro mu lubalu nu kumuusha wazeligitya, “Kaya uka.” uugwa i minyororo nai watulaa utungilwe ikatunguka kupuma mu mikono akwe.
ACT 12:8 uMalaika akamuila, “Tugala i ang'wenda ako hangi tugala i ilatu niako.” uPetro akituma uu. uMalaika akamutambuila, Tugala u ng'wenda nuako hangi untyate.”
ACT 12:9 Iti gwa uPetro akamutyata uMalaika nu kupuma kunzi. Shanga ai uhuiie nai kitumilwe nu Malaika anga ize ka tai. Ai usigile ukihenga muloto.
ACT 12:10 Ze yakilaa kukila i sunjo nila ng'wandyo nili nila kabiili, akapika mu mumpita nua shuma nua kingiilila kulongola mu kisali, ukaluguka u wenso ku nsoko ao. Akapuma kunzi akasima mu isali, nkua uMalaika akamuleka.
ACT 12:11 uPetro nai wakilinga, akaligitya, “Itungili nahuiila kina uMukulu aza umulagiiye umalaika nuakwe iti kumpumya mu mikono ang'wa Herode; nu ku masigo a antu idu ni a Ayahudi.”
ACT 12:12 Ze yakilaa kulinga aya, wakiza mu ito nilang'wa Mariamu nyinya nuakwe uYohana niiza Marko; Akristo idu ai ilundiie akulompa.
ACT 12:13 Nai wakapindula pa mumpia nua kukingila, munyamulimo ung'wi munaanso nuitangwaa Roda wakapembya kulugula.
ACT 12:14 Nai wakalinga ingi luli lang'wa Petro, ku ulowa akaleng'wa ku ulugula u mumpita; badala akwe akamanka mukati a shumba; nu kuapikilya kina uPetro wimikile ntongeela a mumpita.
ACT 12:15 Iti gwa, Akaligitya kitalakwe, “Uewe wi muhali” kuiti ai ukomangiie kina itai ingi ng'wenso. Akaligitya “Uyu ingi malaika nuakwe.”
ACT 12:16 Kuiti uPetro ai ulongolekile kupindula, hangi nai alugue u mulango, akamihenga nu kukuilwa nanguluu. uPetro aka akilaja ku mukono ihi twii nu kuatambuila kinya uli uMukulu naza umupumilye kupuma mukadulumu. wakaligitya.
ACT 12:17 Apikilyi i makani aya uYakobo ni aluna akwe.” Uugwa akahega akalongola nkika ingiiza.
ACT 12:18 Nai ikatula mung'wi, ikatula nu ukia ukulu kati a asikali, kutulikana ni naikipumie kung'wa Petro.
ACT 12:19 Ze yakilaa u Herode kumuduma hangi shanga wakamihenga wakaakolya i asunja nu kulagiilya abulagwe. Akalongola kupuma ku Uyahudi nu kupikiila ku Kaisaria nu kikie kuko.
ACT 12:20 uHerode ai watulaa ni ikuo migulya a antu a Tiro ni Sidoni. Akalongola ku palung'wi kitalakwe. Akatula ni kihumbashuya nu Blasto mu ailyaa nua mutemi, iti wa a aiilye. Uugwa akalompa u ulyuuku, ku nsoko ihi ao ai isingiiye indya kupuma mi ihi a mutemi.
ACT 12:21 Luhiku nai lusigiiwe uHerode ai utugae ang'wenda a kitemi nu kikie mi ituntu ni lakwe nila kitemi, nu kuatanantilya.
ACT 12:22 Antu akakua iyogo, “Ulu ingi luli lang'wa Itunda iti shanga luli lang'wa bina adamu!”
ACT 12:23 Itungo kupumpugiilya umalaika akamukua, ku nsoko ai watulaa shanga uminkiiye Itunda ikulyo; akaligwa ni makindi nu kusha.
ACT 12:24 Kuiti lukani lang'wa Itunda likakula nu kusapatila.
ACT 12:25 Ze yakilaa u Barnaba nu Sauli kukondeelya u uailya nuao akapuma pang'wanso akasuka ku Yerusalemu, akamuhola nu Yohana naiza i lina nila kulelwa ingi Marko.
ACT 13:1 Itungili mi itekeelo nila ku Antiokia, ai akoli ang'wi a anyakidagu ni a ng'walimu. Ai atulaa Barnaba, Simioni (nai witang'waa Nigeri), Lukio nua ku Krene, Manaeni (muluna ni shanga nua sakami nuang'wa Herode mutongeeli nua mukoa), nu Sauli.
ACT 13:2 Nai atulaa akumukulya uMukulu nu kudila kulya, uNg'wau Ng'welu ai uligitilye, “Nkomatuilyi kumpelo uBarnaba nu Sauli, itume u mulimo naza ni itangie”
ACT 13:3 Ze yakilaa i itekeelo kudila kulya, kulompa, nu kuika i mikono ao migulya a antu awa, aka aleka alongole.
ACT 13:4 Ku lulo uBarnaba nu Sauli ai amukuiye u Ng'wau Ng'welu nu kusima kutunga ku Seleukia; Kupuma kung'wanso ai atungile u muhinzo mu luzi kutunga i kizonzo nika Kipro.
ACT 13:5 Nai akatula mu kisali nika Salami, Ai alutanantilye u lukani nulang'wa Itunda mu matekeelo a Ayahudi. Ai atulaa palung'wi ga nu Yohana Marko anga muailya nuao.
ACT 13:6 Nai akalongola mu kizonzo kihi kupikiila ku Pafo, ai ahangile muntu nua kituunga mulogi, Muyahudi munyakidagu nua uteele, naiza i lina nilakwe ai latulaa Bar Yesu.
ACT 13:7 uMulogi uyu ai wihanguie nu Lawi Sergio Paulus, nai watulaa muntu munyamahala. Muntu uyu ai uanile uBarnaba nu Sauli, ku nsoko ai uloilwe kija u lukani nulang'wa Itunda.
ACT 13:8 Kuiti Elima “uyo u mulogi” (iti uu i lina nilkwe nai limpyanigwe) ai ua kingie, ai ugemile kumupiula uyo u liwali wapume mu uhuiili.
ACT 13:9 Kuiti uSauli nai witangwa Paulo, ai watulaa wizuigwe u Ng'wau Ng'welu, akamukunkuila i miho
ACT 13:10 nu kuligitya “Uewe ng'wana nua mulugu, wizuigwe ni mpyani yihi nia uteele nu unyeku. U ewe ingi wi mulugu nua kia mpyani nia tai ane. Shanga ukuleka kuipiula i nzila nia Mukulu, ni igolokile, itii ukuhuma?
ACT 13:11 “Itungili goza, u mukono nua Mukulu ukoli migulya ako, hangi ukutula wi mupoku. Shanga ukihenga ilyoa ku itungo” nkua ing'wi ikunguguu ni kiti ai igwie migulya a Elimas; akandya kupilima papo wazelompa antu amutongeele kumuamba u mukono.
ACT 13:12 Ze yakilaa u liwali kihenga nai kipumie, ai uhuiie, ku nsoko ai ukuiwe ku umanyisigwa kutula Mukulu.
ACT 13:13 Itungili uPaulo ni ahumbauya akwe ai alongoe muhinzo mu mazi kupuma ku Pafo hangi akapika ku Perge mu Pamfilia. Kuiti uYohana ai ua lekile nu kusuka ku Yerusalemu.
ACT 13:14 uPaulo ni ahumbauya akwe ai atungile u muhinzo kupuma ku Perge nu kupika ku Antiokia a ku Pisidia. Uko ai alongoe mi itekeelo luhiku nula kusupya nu kikie pihi.
ACT 13:15 Ze yakilaa kusoma i ilagiilyo nu unyakidagu, atongeeli ni itekeelo ai ualagiiye utung'waa wazeligitya, “Anya ndugu, anga ize mukete u utuung'wa nua kuhumya insula antu apa, muligitye.”
ACT 13:16 Ku lulo uPaulo ai wimikile nu kuanyansuila u mukono; ai uligitilye, “Itunja a ku Israeli nu nyenye ni mimukulya Itunda, tegeelyi.
ACT 13:17 Itunda nua awa i antu nia Israeli ai uaholanilye i a tata itu nu kuazipya antu idu nai ikie mi ihi a Misri, nu ku mukono nuakwe kunyansulwa ai uatongee kunzi akwe.
ACT 13:18 Ku myaka makumi anne ai uagigimiiye mi ibambazi.
ACT 13:19 Ze yakilaa kumabipya i maingu mutandatu mi ihi a Kanaani, ai uinkiiye i antu itu ihi ao ku usali.
ACT 13:20 Maintu aya ihi ai apumie ikilo i myaka magana anne ni makumi a taano. Ze yakilaa i intu izi yihi, Itunda ai uinkiiye alamuli kupikiila uSamweli munyakidagu.
ACT 13:21 Ze yakilaa aya, antu ai alompile u mutemi, iti Itunda ai uinkiiye uSauli ng'wana wang'wa Kushi, muntu nua ndugu ang'wa Benjameni, kutula mutemi ku myaka makumi anne,
ACT 13:22 Uugwa ze yakilaa Itunda akamuheja mu utemi akamunyansula uDaudi kutula mutemi nuao. Ai ituile ingi kutula uDaudi kina Itunda ai uligitilye, 'Namulijaa uDaudi ng'wana nuang'wa Yese kutula muntu nuiloeigwe ni nkolo ane; naiza ukituma kila ikintu nikindoile,'
ACT 13:23 Kupuma mu ndugu a muntu uyu Itunda umiletee i Israeli muguni, uYesu, anga nai ulagile kituma.
ACT 13:24 Ili landiiye kupumila, ze ikili uYesu kupembya, uYohana ng'wandyo ai utanantilye wogigwa nua kila itunu ku antu ihi nia Israeli.
ACT 13:25 Nu ng'wenso uYohana nai wakatula ukumailya mulimo nuakwe, ai uligitilye, 'Musigile unene ni nyenyu? unene shanga ingi uyo. Kuiti tegeelyi, nupembilye kituli kane, nimugila u uhumi nua kutolya i ilatu nia migulu akwe,'
ACT 13:26 Anyandugu, Ana andugu ang'wa Abrahamu, ni awo naza mu kati anyu mi mipoelya Itunda, ingi ku nsoko itu kina ikani nila ugunwa lilagiigwe.
ACT 13:27 Ku awo ni ikie ku Yersalemu, ni atemi ao, shanga ai amulingile ku kulu kuulu, ni ang'wi shanga ai alulingile u lukani nula anyakidagu naza lisong'wa kila luhiku nula kusupya; ku lulo ai apikiiye u lukani nula anyakidagu ku kumulamula insha uYesu.
ACT 13:28 Anga itule shanga ai aligilye i nsoko ni nziza ku nsha mukati akwe, ai amulompile uPilato wamubulage.
ACT 13:29 Nai akamala imakani ihi nai akilisigwe kutula nuanso, ai amusimilye kupuma mikota nu kumulalya mu kibiila.
ACT 13:30 Kuiti Itunda akamiusha kupuma mu ashi,
ACT 13:31 Ai wigeelekile ku mahiku idu ku awo nai alongoe palung'wi nu ng'wenso kupuma ku Galilaya kulongola ku Yerusalemu, Antu awa itungili ingi akuiili nia antu.
ACT 13:32 Iti gwa ku umuletela nkani ni nkende kutula ilago nai inkiigwe i isekulu itu.
ACT 13:33 Itunda ai uikile imalago aya kitaitu, ana ao, mu nilanso ai umiukilye uYesu nu kumususha hangi mu upanga. Ili ga likilisigwe mu malumbiilyo a kabiili; 'Uewe ingi ng'wana nuane, lelo natulaa ni Tata nuako,'
ACT 13:34 Ga ni kutula i tai ingi kina ai umiukilye kupuma kuashi iti kina muili nuakwe uleke kubipa, uligitilye iti; 'Nikakinkiilya u welu nu ukende kulu kuulu nuang'wa Daudi.'
ACT 13:35 Iyi yiyo nsoko waligitya ga mu malumbiilyo ni ma ngiiza, 'Shanga ukulekela u ng'welu nuako kihenga i kiolu.'
ACT 13:36 Ku nsoko ze yakilaa u Daudi ku uaiilya u ulowa nuang'wa Itunda mu ulelwa nuakwe, ai ulae, akalalikigwa palung'wi ni a tata akwe, hangi ai uihengile u ubipigwa.
ACT 13:37 Kuiti nai wiukigwe nu Itunda shanga ai uihengile u ubipigwa.
ACT 13:38 Iti gwa ni ilingike kitalanyu, anya ndugu, ku kiila muntu uyu, ulekelwa nua milandu watanantigwa.
ACT 13:39 Ku nuanso kila nu uhuiie wia iligwaa tai ane ni makani ihi niiza ilagiilyo nilang'wa Musa shanga ai lizee inkiilya i tai ane.
ACT 13:40 Iti gwa ila tuli miakendegeeli kina i kintu nai akiganue i anyakidagu kileke kupumila kitalanyu;
ACT 13:41 Goza, unye adi ni mimelaa, hangi mende mukuilwe hangi mende mulimiligwe; ku iti kituma u mulimo mu mahiku anyu, Mulimo niiza shanga muhumile ku uhuiila, anga ga nu muntu wikumuganuila.”
ACT 13:42 Matungo uPaulo nu Barnaba nai akahega, antu aka alompa aligitye i makani aya luhiku nula kusupya nu luzile.
ACT 13:43 Matungo ianza nili tekeelo nai likaula, Ayahudi idu ni aokole akomu ai a atyatile uPaulo nu Barnaba, naza aligitilye ni enso hangi ai a asamiiye alongole mu ukende nu ang'wa Itunda.
ACT 13:44 Luhiku nula kusupya nai lutyatile, pakupi kisali kihi ai kilingiie kija u lukani lang'wa Itunda.
ACT 13:45 Ayahudi nai akihenga iumbi, ai izuiwe nu wilu nu kuligitya makani nai akingie i intu nai itambuwe nu Paulo hangi ai amutukie.
ACT 13:46 Kuiti uPaulo nu Barnaba ai atambue ku ukamatiku nu kuligitya, “Ai yatulaa ingulu kina lukani nu lang'wa Itunda luganulwe hanza kitalanyu. Kunsoko mukulu suntiilya kuli kupuma kitalanyu nu kiona kina shanga muhiiye kutula nu upanga nua kali na kali, kendegeeli kuapilukila i anyaingu.
ACT 13:47 Anga niiza uMukulu ukulagiiye, azeligitya, 'Numuikile unyenye anga welu ku antu a ingu, kina mulete u ugunwa ku nkika yihi ni yihi.”
ACT 13:48 Anya ingu na akija ili, ai iloile nu kulu lumbiilya u lukani nula Mukulu. Idu nai aholanigwe ku upanga nua kali na kali ai ahuiie.
ACT 13:49 Lukani nula Mukulu ai lenee ihi ihi
ACT 13:50 Kuiti Ayahudi ai a asingilye nai ipumilye ni asungu ni angulu, ga ni atongeeli a kisali. Aya ai akinyie u lwago kung'wa Paulo nu Barnaba hangi ai a agumile kunzi a mimbi nia kisali.
ACT 13:51 Kuiti uPaulo nu Barnaba ai akununtile u lunkundi nula migulu ao. Uugwa akalongola mu kisali nika Ikonia.
ACT 13:52 Ni amanyisigwa ai izuiwe nu ulowa palung'wi nu Ng'wau Ng'welu.
ACT 14:1 Ikapumila mukati a Ikonia kina uPaulo nu Barnaba ai ingie palung'wi mukati i tekeelo nila Ayahudi nu kutambula kinya iti idale ikulu nila antu a Ayahudi ni Ayunani nai ahuiie.
ACT 14:2 Kuiti Ayahudi nishanga ai akuiye ai a akinyiie i mahala i anyaingu nu kuatenda kutula abii kua anya ndugu.
ACT 14:3 Ku lulo ai ikiie kuko ku itungo ilipu, azeligitya ku ukamatiku ku gulu nia Mukulu, kunu wazepumya u kaminkiilyi kutula lukani nula ukende nuakwe. Ai witumile iti ku kupumya ilingasiiyo nu ukuilwa yitung'we ku mikono a Paulo nu Barnaba.
ACT 14:4 Kuiti kianza kikulu nika kisali kikagalanuka; ang'wi a antu akatula palung'wi ni Ayahudi, ni ang'wi palung'wi ni itumi.
ACT 14:5 Matungo anyaingu ni Ayahudi nai agemile kuapema i atongeeli ao kuatendeela ubi nu kuatulanga i magwe uPaulo nu Barnaba,
ACT 14:6 Akalilinga nilanso nu kumankiila mu isali nia Likaonia, Listra ni Derbe ni nkika ni ipilimikiiye pang'wanso,
ACT 14:7 nu kung'wanso ai atanantilye i nkani niza.
ACT 14:8 Nu kung'wanso ku Listra ai ukoli nu muntu ung'wi nai wikiie, ai mugila ingulu mu migulu akwe, mulema kupuma munda ang'wa nyinya nuakwe, wakili wakaye kugenda.
ACT 14:9 uMuntu uyu ai umigulye uPaulo ukuligitya. uPaulo akamukunkuila imiho nu kumihenga kina ai watulaa nu uhuiili nua kugunwa.
ACT 14:10 Iti gwa ai ulugitilye kitalakwe ku luli nula migulya, “Imike ku migulu ako” Nu muntu uyo ai uputile migulya nu kandya kugenda.
ACT 14:11 Iumbi nai lihengile nai ukitumile uPaulo, ai anyansue i nduli niao, azeligitya mu luli nula Kilikaonia, “alungu akusimiila ku mpyani a ki ana adamu.”
ACT 14:12 Ai amitangile u Barnaba “Zeu,” nu Paulo “Herme” ku nsoko ai watulaa mutambuli nu mukulu.
ACT 14:13 uKuhani nua Zeu, naiza itekeelo nilakwe ai latulaa kunzi a kisali, ai uletile muzagamba nua ng'ombe nu muntungi nua ulua kupikiila mu mumpita nua kisali, uNg'wenso ni iumbi ai aloilwe kupumya isongelyo.
ACT 14:14 Kuiti i itumi, uBarnaba nu Paulo, nai akalija ili, akatamulania i ang'wenda ao nu ku ukau akalongola kunzi mi iumbi, azelila
ACT 14:15 nu kuligitya, “U nyenye antu, ku niki mukituma imakani aya? Nu sese ga ki ana adamu ni akete i kiwai anga ni kanyu Ku umuletela nkani ni nkende, kina mupiluke kupuma mu intu izi ni shanga izepile nu kumutunga Itunda nuili mupanga, nai u umbile ilunde, ihi nu luzi ni kila intu ni imoli.
ACT 14:16 Mu matungo nakiile, ai ualekee i anyaingu kugenda mu nzila niao akola.
ACT 14:17 Kuiti ikili, shanga ai uhengile bila mukuili, mu nilanso ai witumile iziza hangi akainkiilya i mbula kupuma kilunde ni matungo a maogola, wazeizulya i nkolo nianyu ku ndya nu ulowa,”
ACT 14:18 Ga nu ku makani aya, uPaulo nu Barnaba ku lwago ai aligiiye iumbi ku apumilya isongelyo.
ACT 14:19 Kuiti ang'wi a Ayahudi kupuma ku Antiokia nu ku Ikonia ai azile kulipema i umbi. Akamukua magwe uPaulo nu kumukweha kupika kunzi a kisali, aze asigile aiwatulaa wakuza.
ACT 14:20 Ga ni iti amanyisigwa ai atulaa imikile pakupi nu ng'wenso, ai u ukile, akingila mu kisali. Luhiku nula ka biili, akalongola ku Derbe nu Barnaba.
ACT 14:21 Ze yakilaa kumanyisa nkani ninza mu kisali ni kanso nu kuazipya amanyisigwa idu, akasuka ku Listra, kupikiila ku Ikoniamu, ni kupikiila ku Antiokia.
ACT 14:22 Ai alongolekile kukaminkiilya u umi nua amanyisigwa nu kuakinyila kulongoleka mu uhuiili, akaligitya, “Kusinja kingile mu utemi nuang'wa Itunda ku kiila lwago lidu.”
ACT 14:23 Nai atula a ahola ku nsoko ao anyampala a kila milundo nila ahuiili, hangi aze atulaa alompaa nu kudila kulya, ai ainkiiye ku Mukulu, naiza i enso amuhuiie.
ACT 14:24 Uugwa ai akiile mu Pisidia, ai apikile mu Pamfilia.
ACT 14:25 Matungo nai atambue i makani mu Perga, ai asimile kulongola ku Atalia.
ACT 14:26 Kupuma kuko ai anankie meli kupikiila ku Antiokia nize atulaa ipumya ku ukende nuang'wa Itunda ku nsoko a mulimo niize itungili ai atulaa aukondeelya.
ACT 14:27 Nai akapika uko ku Antiokia, nu ki kilingiila u milundo nua palung'wi, akapumya i mpola nia makani naiza Itunda witumile kitalao, ni kinya nai ualuguie u mumpita nua uhuiili ku antu ni anyaingu.
ACT 14:28 Ai ikie ku itungo ilipu ni amanyisigwa.
ACT 15:1 Antu a ki tuunga ai asimile kupuma ku Uyahudi nu kuamanyisa i aluna, azeligitya, “angamuhite kutalwa i kidamu anga ntendo ni ang'wa Musa, shanga muhumile kugunwa.”
ACT 15:2 Matungo uPaulo nu Barnaba nai atulaa nu wikungumi nu witambulyi palung'wi ni enso, anyandugu ai alamue kina uPaulo, Barnaba ni auya kituunga alongole ku Yerusalemu ku itumi ni anyampala ku nsoko a ikolyo ili.
ACT 15:3 Kululo, kulagiiligwa kitalao ni itekeelo, ai akiie ku Foenike ni Samaria azetanantya kupiulwa insula ku anyaingu. Ai aletile ulowa ukulu ku anya ndugu ihi.
ACT 15:4 Nai akapembya ku Yerusalemu, ai asingiiigwe ni itekeelo ni itumi ni anyampala, hangi ai apikilye i mpola nia makani ihi naiza Itunda witumile palung'wi ni enso.
ACT 15:5 Kuiti i antu akituunga nai ahuiie, nai akoli mi idale nila Afarisayo, ai imikile nu kuligitya, “ingi ingulu kuatwala ikidamu nu kualagiilya aliambe ilagiilyo ni lang'wa Musa.”
ACT 15:6 Iti gwa i itumi ni anyampala ai imikile palung'wi kulisiga ikolyo ili.
ACT 15:7 Ze yakilaa u witambulyi ulipu, uPetro ai wimikile nu kuligitya kitalao, “Anya ndugu mulingile kina itungo iziza nilakilaa Itunda ai witumile uholania mukati anyu, kina ku mulomo nuane Anyaingu igiilye u lukani nula nkani ninza, nu kuhuiila.
ACT 15:8 Itunda, nuilingile i nkolo, ukuiie kitalao, ukuinkiilya uNg'wau Ng'welu, anga nai witumile kitalanyu;
ACT 15:9 hangi shanga ai uzipilye utemanuli kati itu ni enso, waze yituma i nkolo niao nziza ku uhuili.
ACT 15:10 Ku lulo ku niki mukumugema Itunda kina muikile kinyuli migulya a nkingo nia amanyisigwa naiza ga i atata itu ang'wi u sese shanga ai kuhumile ku gigimiilya?
ACT 15:11 Kuiti ku huiie kina ku ugunwa ku ukende nua Mukulu uYesu, anga nai atulaa.”
ACT 15:12 uMilundo wihi ai ukilagilye nai atulaa akumutegeelya uBarnaba nu Paulo nai atulaa akupumya i mpola nia ilingasiilyo nu ukuilwa naiza Itunda ai witumile palung'wi ni enso kati a antu a anyaingu.
ACT 15:13 Nai akaleka kuligitya, uYakobo ai usukiiye wazeligitya, “Anyandugu ntegeelyi.
ACT 15:14 uSimioni waganula iti hanza Itunda ku ukende ai ua aiye i anyaingu iti kina wiligilye kupuma kitalao antu kunsoko a lina nilakwe.
ACT 15:15 iMakani a anyakidagu igombilye ni ili anga nilikilisigwe.
ACT 15:16 Ze yakilaa i makani aya nikasuka kukizenga hangi ikitala nikang'wa Daudi, naikagwizaa pihi; nikanyansula nu ku sukiilya ubipigwa nuakwe,
ACT 15:17 iti kina antu nai asagiie amudume uMukulu, palung'wi ni antu a ingu nai itangilwe kulina nilane.'
ACT 15:18 Iti uu nuiligityaa u Mukulu nai witumile i makani aya nakumukile puma ikali nia kali.
ACT 15:19 Iti gwa, u usiji nuane ingi, kina kuleke kuinkiilya ulwago i antu i anya ingu niakumupilukila Itunda.
ACT 15:20 Kuiti kukilise kitalao kina ihuje nu ubipigwa nua adudu, nsula nia usambo, hangi ni igogilwe, ni sakami.
ACT 15:21 Kupuma u utugwaa nua anyampala akoli antu mu kila isali ni itanantya nu kumusoma u Musa mu matekeelo kila luhiku nula kusupya.”
ACT 15:22 Ku lulo yikigeeleka kutula ia loeeye i itumi ni anyampala, palung'wi ni itekeelo lihi kumuholania uYuda nai witangwaa Barnaba, nu Silas nai atulaa atongeeli i tekeelo, nu kualagiilya ku Antiokia palung'wi nu Paulo nu Barnaba.
ACT 15:23 Ai akilisilye iti, “Itumi, anyampala ni anya ndugu, ku anya ndugu a anyaingu niakoli ku Antiokia, Shamu ni Kilikia, Milamu.
ACT 15:24 Ai kijaa kina antu a kituunga naza shanga ai kuinkiiye ilagiilyo nilanso, ai apumaa kitalanyu hangi akumajaa ku umanyisigwa nuiletaa u lwago mu umi nuanyu.
ACT 15:25 Ku lulo yigeeleka ikende kitaitu kihi kuholania antu nu kualagiilya kitalanyu palung'wi ni alowa itu Barnaba nu Paulo,
ACT 15:26 antu nai agilye u likalo nulao ku nsoko a lina nila Mukulu uYesu Kristo
ACT 15:27 Ku lulo kamulagiilya uYuda nu Sila, akumutambuila makani yao yaayo.
ACT 15:28 Ku nsoko ai yigeeleka ikende ku Ng'wau Ng'welu nu kitaitu, Kuleka kuika migulya anyu muligo ukulu kukila imakani aya naiza a kusinja;
ACT 15:29 Kina mupiluke kupuma mu intu ni ipumigwa ku adudu, sakami intu nia kugogwa, nu usambo. Anga miki ika kuli ni izi, ikutula ikende kitalanyu. Mu lamu.”
ACT 15:30 Iti gwa nai asapatiligwa, ai asimiie ku Atiokia; ze yakilaa kilingiila u milundo palung'wi, ai ainkiiye ibada.
ACT 15:31 Nai akatula asomaa, ai iloile kunsoko a kukinyilwa inkolo.
ACT 15:32 uYuda nu Sila, ni anyakidagu, ai a akinyie inkolo i aluna ku nkani idu nu kuakinyila ingulu.
ACT 15:33 Ze yakilaa kikie itungo nila kituunga kuko, ai asapatiigwe ku ulyuuku kupuma ku anya ndugu ku awo nai a alagiiye.
ACT 15:34 (Kuiti ai yigeelekile ikende uSila kusaga kuko)
ACT 15:35 Kuiti uPaulo ni auya ai ikie ku Antiokia palung'wi ni auya idu, naize akumanyisa nu kutanantya lukani nula Mukulu.
ACT 15:36 Ze yakilaa mahiku kituunga uPaulo ai uligitilye kung'wa Barnaba, “Ni kusuke itungili nu kuagendeela i aluna mu kila kisali naikatanantya u lukani nula Mukulu, nukuihenga ni ili.
ACT 15:37 uBarnaba ai utakile ga nu kumuhola palungwi nienso uYohana nai witangwaa Marko.
ACT 15:38 Kuiti uPaulo ai usigile shanga iza kumuhola uMarko, nai ualekile uko ku Pamfilia hangi shanga ai ulongolekile ni enso mu mulimo.
ACT 15:39 Uugwa pang'wanso ikapumila wikungumi ukulu ku lulo ai atemanukile. nu Barnaba akamuhola uMarko nu kulongola muhinzo ku meli kupikiila ku Kipro.
ACT 15:40 Kuiti uPaulo ai umuhole uSila nu kuhega, ze yakilaa kinkiiligwa ni anya ndugu mu ukende nua Mukulu.
ACT 15:41 Hangi ai ulongoe kukiila ku Shamu nu ku Kilikia, waze makomisa i matekeelo.
ACT 16:1 uPaulo nai wakapembya ga nu ku Derbe nu ku Listra; hangi goza, pang'wanso ai ukoli nu mumanyisigwa nuitangwa Timotheo, ingi muhumba nai utugilwe nu nyinya nua kiyahudi naiza ingi mu huiili nu tata nuakwe ingi Mugriki.
ACT 16:2 Antu aku Listra ni Ikonia ai amukuiie iziza.
ACT 16:3 uPaulo ai umuloilwe akuile iti muhinzo nu ng'wenso, uugwa akamuhola ku mutwala i kidamu ku nsoko a Ayahudi nai akoli uko kuiti ihi ai amulingile kina u tata nuakwe ingi Mugriki
ACT 16:4 Nai akatula alongoe ai akiile mu isali nu kupumya i malago ku matekeelo iti kina i malago nanso ai akilisigwe ni itumi ni anyampala uko ku Yerusalemu.
ACT 16:5 Iti gwa i matekeelo aka komisigwa ku u huiili nao nai ahuiie akongeeleka ku ngele kila luhuku.
ACT 16:6 uPaulo ni auya akalongola ku Filigia ni Galilaya, kuiti u Ng'wau Ng'welu nuang'wa Itunda ai uagiiye kutanantya u lukani uko kijimbo nila Asia.
ACT 16:7 Nai akahumbeela ku Misia, ai agemile kulongola ku Bithinia, kuiti u Ng'wau Ng'welu nuang'wa Yesu aka agilya.
ACT 16:8 Ku lulo akakila i Misia akapembya kupikiila kisali nika Troa.
ACT 16:9 Muloto ai umupumie uPaulo utiku, ai ukoli muntu nua ku Makedonia wimikile, ukimitanga nu kuligitya “Pembyi mukuaiilye kunu ku Makedonia.”
ACT 16:10 uPaulo nai wakihenga u muloto, itungo ki kizepiilya kulongola ku Makedonia, aze ulingile kina Itunda ai ukitangile kulongola ku atanantilya inkani ninza.
ACT 16:11 Iti gwa kikahega kupuma ku Troa, kikalongola kukilinkania ku Samothrake, nu luhiku nai lutyatiie kikapika kisali nika Neapoli.
ACT 16:12 Kupuma papo kikalongola ku Filipi naza ingi king'wi a kisali nika Makedonia, kisali nikangulu mu wilaya nu uhumi nua Kirumi hangi ki kikie mahiku kituunga.
ACT 16:13 Luhiku nula kusupya, aikulongoe kunzi a mumpita ku nzila a mongo, nkinka naiza kusigiie yikatula ni kianza nika kitumila i malompi. Ki kikie pihi nu kuligitya ni ana kisungu nai apembilye palung'wi.
ACT 16:14 Musungu ung'wi nuitangwaa Lidia, mugulya nzambarau, kupuma mu kisali nika Tiatira, munya kumikumbikila Itunda, ai ukutegeeye, Mukulu ai umulugue i nkolo akwe nu kuikila ukendegeeli i makani nai atambuwe nu Paulo.
ACT 16:15 Ze yakilaa kogigwa, ng'wenso ni ito nilakwe lihi, ai ukusingilye wazeligitya “anga ize manihenga kina unene ingi ni muhuiili mu Mukulu, uugwa kumusinja mingile nu kikie kitalane.” Akakusinja nangulu.
ACT 16:16 Ikatula kina, nai katula kulongoe kianza nika kulompa, munanso ung'wi nai watulaa nu hing'wi nua ulingi akatankana nu sese. ai wimuletela u mukulu nuakwe nsailo idu na kulota.
ACT 16:17 Umusungu uyu ai umutyatile uPaulo palung'wi nu sese, akakua iyogo nu kuligitya, “Awa i agoha ingi anyamilimo ang'wa Itunda niiza Mukulu, niakumutanantilya unyenye i nkani nia ugunwa.”
ACT 16:18 Ai witumile iti ku mahiku idu, kuiti uPaulo waze watakigwa ni ntendo nanso, ai upilukile kinyuma nu kumutambuila u hung'wi, “Ku ulagiilya ku lina nilang'a Yesu umupume mukati akwe.” Nu ng'wenso nkua ing'wi wakapuma nu kumuleka.
ACT 16:19 Akulu akwe nai akihenga nia kina isigo nila nsailo niao lahega, ai a ambile uPaulo nu Sila nu kuakweha misoko ntongeela a anya uhumi.
ACT 16:20 Nai aka apisha ku a lamuli, ai aligitilye, “Awa agoha ingi Ayahudi hangi akusasha minyomo ukulu mu kisali kitu.
ACT 16:21 Akumanyisa makani naiza shanga ilagiilyo usese kumasingiilya ang'wi kumatyata anga Arumi.
ACT 16:22 Iumbi lika anyansukila nsuta uPaulo nu Sila nu kuatugula nu kulagiilya anyukwe iboko.
ACT 16:23 Ze ya kilaa kunyukwa iboko idu, mu kadulumu nu kumulagiilya u asikali nua kadulumu kuansunja ikende.
ACT 16:24 Ze yakilaa kusingiilya ilagiilyo nilanso, uasikali nua kadulumu ai uagumie mu shumba nika mukati a kadulumu nu kuatunga i migulu ao mu nkika nai uaikile.
ACT 16:25 Itungo nila utiku wigingu, uPaulo nu Sila akatula akulompa nu kimba mimbo akumukulya Itunda, kunu ia tungwa auya aze a ategeeye,
ACT 16:26 Kupumpugiilya, ikapumila itetemeko ikulu nu musingi nua kadulumu ukahingisigwa, i milango a kadulumu ikaluguka, ni minyororo a atungwa ihi ikatoligwa.
ACT 16:27 uMusunja nua kadulumu ai u ukile kupuma mu tulo nu kihenga i milango a kadulumu iluguwe; itigwa wakahola i mpanga nuakwe ndogoelyo ai walowa kibulaga ku nsoko ai usigile i atungwa ihi akondya kutigana.
ACT 16:28 Kuiti, uPaulo wakazogolya ku luli lukulu, wazeligitya, “leka kilemaalya ku nsoko kihi kukoli i kianza apa.”
ACT 16:29 uMusunja nua kadulumu ai ulompile i ntala iletwe hangi wakingila mukati a kadulumu ku ukau, wazekagata nu kitumba, waka agwila uPaulo nu Sila,
ACT 16:30 nu kuapumya kunzi a kadulumu nu kuligitya, “Akulu, nitume ntuni ndije ku gunika?”
ACT 16:31 Ni enso akamutambuila, “Mu huiile uMukulu uYesu nu ewe ukugunika palung'wi ni ito nilako.”
ACT 16:32 Ai ituntile u lukani nula Mukulu kitalakwe, palung'wi ni antu ihi nia mi ito nilakwe.
ACT 16:33 uMusunja nua kadulumu ai uahoile utiku wuwo nu kuoja nkika nai alemaae, nuanso palung'wi ni antu nia mi ito nilakwe itungo akogigwa.
ACT 16:34 Waka aleta uPaulo nu Sila mi ito nilakwe nu kuatengela indya. Nu ng'wenso akatula nu ulowa ukulu palung'wi ni antu a mi ito nilakwe ku nsoko ai amuhuiila Itunda.
ACT 16:35 Nai ikatula mung'wi, alamuli ai alagiiye lukani ku uyo u musunja nua kadulumu azeligitya, “Wa alekele i antu awo alongole.”
ACT 16:36 uMusunja nua kadulumu akamupindula uPaulo migulya nkani nianso nia kina, “iAlamuli ai alagiiye lukani ndekele muhege; iti gwa pumi kunzi hangi mulongole ku u lyuuku.”
ACT 16:37 Kuiti uPaulo waka aila, “Ai akukuile pi galagalo, antu naza ingi Arumi shanga aku ulamula hangi ai alamue ku ugumila mu kadulumu; halafu itungili aloilwe ku upumya ku kinkunku? Ishi, shanga ikuhumika, Enso akola aze ku upumya nkika apa.”
ACT 16:38 iAsunja aka apindula i alamuli migulya a makani nanso, i alamuli akitumba nangaluu pang'wanso nai akalinga kina uPaulo nu Sila ingi Arumi.
ACT 16:39 iAlamuli akapembya nu kuasinja apume, hangi nai aka apumya kunzi a kadulumu, ai a alompile uPaulo nu Sila apume kunzi a kisali ni kao.
ACT 16:40 Ku lulo uPaulo nu Sila akapuma kunzi a kadulumu akapembya mi ito nilang'wa Lidia. uPaulo nu Sila nai akaihenga i anya ndugu, ai akinyie inkolo hangi uugwa kuhega mu kisali ni kanso.
ACT 17:1 Hangi nai akakila mu isali nia Amfipoli ni Apolonia, ai azile kupikiila kisali nika Thesalonike naza likoli i tekeelo nila Ayahudi.
ACT 17:2 Anga ni yili ntendo ang'wa Paulo, wakalongola kitalao, nu ku itungo nila mahiku ataatu nia luhiku nula kusupya ai witambuuye nienso migilya a ukilisigwa.
ACT 17:3 Ai watulaa uku akunukuilya u ukilisigwa nu kuaganuila kina, ai imutakile uKristo wagishe ni uugwa kiuka hangi kupuma ku ashi. Ai uatambuie, “Uyu uYesu nikumutambuila i nkani niakwe yuyo Kristo.”
ACT 17:4 Ang'wi nia Ayahudi ai apemekile nu kihanguila nu Paulo nu Sila, palung'wi ni Agiriki akulya Itunda, asungu idu aokole ni idale ikulu nila antu.
ACT 17:5 Kuiti ang'wi a Ayahudi ni shanga ahuiie, nai izuiwe nu wilu, ai alongoe ki isoko nu kuahola ang'wi a antu ni abibi, akalundiila iumbi nila antu palung'wi, nu kusasha minyomo mu kisali, uugwa akaligilinkiilya ito nilang'wa Jason, aze aloilwe kua amba uPaulo nu Sila iti kualeta ntongeela ya antu.
ACT 17:6 Kuiti nai aka aulya, ai amuambile u Yasoni ni ang'wi a anyandugu auya nu kuatwala ntogeela a aofisa nia kisali, azekua iyogo, “Awa i agoha naza aupiue u unkumbigulu apika kupikiila kunu ga.
ACT 17:7 Agoha awa naza asingiigwe nu Yasoni akulitumuila ilagiilyo lang'wa Kaisari, akuligitya ukoli mutemi mungiiza nuitangwaa Yesu.”
ACT 17:8 Iumbi ni a ofisa nia kisali nai akija i makani nanso, ai ingiiwe nu mitumbo.
ACT 17:9 Ze yakilaa kutula akondya kuhola i mpia nia nsailo a usunja kupuma kung'wa Yason ni auya, ai a alekee alongole.
ACT 17:10 Utiku nuanso anya ndugu ai amulagiiye uPaulo nu Sila ku Beroya. Hangi nai akapika kung'wanso akalongola mi itekeelo nila Ayahudi.
ACT 17:11 Antu awo ai atula akete u ulingi ukulu kukila i antu awo nia ku Thesalonike, ku nsoko ai akete nu ukondaniili nua kusingiilya u lukani ku mahala ao, nu kupukania u ukilisigwa kila mahiku iti kihenga anga ize imakani nai aganuwe uu nili.
ACT 17:12 Ku lulo idu ao ai ahuiie, aze amoli asungu niakete u upemi ukulu nua Kigiriki ni agoha idu.
ACT 17:13 Kuiti Ayahudi nia ku Thesalonike nai akalinga kina uPaulo ukutanantya lukani lang'wa Itunda uko ku Beroya, ai alongoe kuko nu kukinyiila ni uugwa nu kandiilya minyomo ku antu.
ACT 17:14 Ku ukau, i aluna akamutwala uPaulo ku nzila a luzi, kuiti uSila nu Timotheo akasaga pang'wanso.
ACT 17:15 Awo i anya ndugu nai amutwae uPaulo ai alongoe nu ng'wenso kupikiila ku Athene, nai akamuleka uPaulo kuko, ai asingiiye i malagiilyo kupuma kitalakwe kina, uSila nu Timotheo apembye kitalakwe ku ukau ni ihumikile.
ACT 17:16 Ni itungo nai ualindiie uko ku Athene, nkolo akwe ikatakigwa mukati akwe ku iti nai wihengile i kisali nai kizue i adudu idu.
ACT 17:17 Itigwa akitambulya mu itekeelo ni Ayahudi awo nai amukiye Itunda nu ku awo ihi nai utankanile ni enso kila luhiku mi soko.
ACT 17:18 Kuiti ang'wi a alingi nia a Aepikureo ni Astoiko akamukungiilya. Ni auya akaligitya, “Ingi ki ntuni ukukiligitya uyu u muligitya nu mudabu? iAuya akaligitya, “Yigeelekile ukutanantya nkani niang'wa Itunda muziila.” ku nsoko ukutanantya nkani yang'wa Yesu nu wiukigwa.
ACT 17:19 Akamohola uPaulo nu kumuleta ku Areopago, azeligitya, “Kuhumile kulinga uwu umanyisigwa uziila nuku uligitya?
ACT 17:20 Ku nsoko ukuleta makani maziila mu akutwi itu. Ku iti kuloilwe kulinga makani aya akete ndogoelyo kii?”
ACT 17:21 (Ni antu ihi nia ku Athene palung'wi ni aziila ni amoli kitalao, itumila itungo nilao ang'wi mu uligitya nu kutegeelya migulya a ikani ni iziila.)
ACT 17:22 Ku lulo uPaulo akimika pakati a antu nia ku Areopago nu kuligitya, Unyenye antu aku Athene, kihenga kina ingi antu a ikumbiko ku kila mpyani,
ACT 17:23 Kuiti mu ukili nua ki talane nu kugoza i intu nianyu nia kipoelya, nihengile makani nakilisigwe mu ling'wi ikumbikilo lanyu, likuligitya “KUNG'WA ITUNDA NI SHANGA UKUMUKILE.” Itigwa, nuanso ni mukumipolya ize shanga mulingile, yuyo niku mupikilya unyenye.
ACT 17:24 Itunda nai u umbile ihi ni kila i kintu ni kikoli mukati, kunsoko ingi Mukulu nua ilunde ni ihi, shanga uhumile kikie mu matekeelo nazipigwe ni mikono.
ACT 17:25 Hangi shanga wi ailigwa ga ni mikono a ana adamu anga kina uloilwe kintu kitalao, kuiti u ng'wenso mukola wi inkiilya antu upanga ni mihupo ni intu ingiiza yihi.
ACT 17:26 Ku kiila muntu ung'wi, ai uzipilye u ingu wihi ni antu ni ikiie migulya a usu nui ihi, hangi waka aikilya matungo ni mimbi mu nkika ni ikiie.
ACT 17:27 Ku iti, atakiwe kumuduma Itunda, ni tai amupikiile nu kumulija, hangi ku kulu kuulu wikutili kuli ni kila ung'wi nu itu.
ACT 17:28 Ki talakwe kikie, kigendaa nu kutula nu upanga nuitu, anga iti mutungi nuanyu ung'wi nua ilumbiilyo nai uligitilye 'ki atuugwa akwe.'
ACT 17:29 Ku lulo anga itule usese ingi atuugwa ang'wa Itunda, shanga kutakiwe kusiga kina u itunda ingi anga zahabu, ang'wi shaba, ang'wi magwe, adudu nu sesilwe ku ulingi ni masigo a antu.
ACT 17:30 Ku lulo, Itunda ai ukilagiiye i matungo ayo na upungu, kuiti itungili ulagiiye antu ihi kila kianza ile itunu.
ACT 17:31 Iki ingi ku nsoko uikile luhiku nuika milamula ihi ku tai ane ku muntu naiza ai umuholanilye. Itunda ai upumilye i kulu kuulu na mumtu uyu ku kila muntu pang'wanso nai umiukilye kupuma kuashi.
ACT 17:32 Ni antu a Athene nai akija inkani nia kiukigwa ku ashi, ang'wi ao akamukuna uPaulo, ila i auya akaligitya, “Ku ukutegeelya hangi ku nkani nia ikani ili.”
ACT 17:33 Ze yakilaa pang'wanso, uPaulo aka aleka.
ACT 17:34 Kuiti ang'wi a antu ai ihanguie nu ng'wenso akahuiila, waze umoli uDionisio Mwareopago, nu musungu nuitangwaa Damari ni auya palungwi ni enso.
ACT 18:1 Ze yakilaa imakani nanso, uPaulo ai uhegile ku Athene kulongola ku Korintho.
ACT 18:2 Uko akamulija Muyahudi nuitangwaa Akwila muntu nua kabila nila Ponto, ung'wenso nu musungu nuakwe nuitangwaa Prisila ai apembilye kupuma uko ku Italia, ku nsoko uKlaudia ai ulagiiye i Ayahudi ihi ahege ku Roma; uPaulo akapembya kitalao;
ACT 18:3 uPaulo akikie nu kituma i milimo ni enso kunsoko nuanso witumaa mulimo nuipyani niyi nao. Enso ai iza azepya mahema.
ACT 18:4 uPaulo akitambulya ni enso mi itekeelo kila luhiku nula kusupya. Ai uapemile i Ayahudi palung'wi ni Agiriki.
ACT 18:5 Kuiti uSila nu Timotheo nai akapembya kupuma ku Makedonia, uPaulo ai usuntilwe nu Ng'wau Ngwelu kua kuiila i Ayahudi kina uYesu yuyo Kristo.
ACT 18:6 Matungo i Ayahudi nai amukua nu kumukuna, iti uPaulo wikapununta u ng'wenda nuakwe ntongeela ao, nu kuatambuila, “Sakami anyu ni itule migulya a matwe anyu akola; Unene nimugila ikinkwaatya. kupuma itungili nu kulongoleka, kuahanga i anyaingu.”
ACT 18:7 Iti gwa akahega kupuma pang'wanso akalongola mi ito nilang'wa Tito Yusto, Muntu nai wimukulya Itunda. Ito nilakwe ai likoli pakupi ni itekeelo.
ACT 18:8 uKrispo, mutongeeli nu itekeelo palung'wi ni antu a mi ito nilakwe akamuhuiila uMukulu. Antu idu nia ku Korintho nai amigulye uPaulo ukuligitya ai ahuiie nu kogigwa.
ACT 18:9 uMukulu akamutambuila uPaulo utiku kukiila ku nzila a muloto, “Leka kogopa, kuiti ligitya hangi leka kukilaga.
ACT 18:10 Ku iti unene nkoli palung'wi nu ewe, hangi kutili nuikagema kuumela, ndogoelyo nkete antu idu mu kisali iki.”
ACT 18:11 uPaulo akikie kuko ku itungo la ng'waka ung'wi ni myeli mutandatu wazemanyisa lukani nulang'wa Itunda mukati ao.
ACT 18:12 Kuiti uGalio nai wakatendwa muhumi nua ku Akaya, Ayahudi ai imikile palung'wi nsuta nu Paulo nu kumutwala ntongeela a ituntu nila ulamuli,
ACT 18:13 aze ligitya, “uMuntu uyu wiapemaa i antu kumukulya Itunda nsuta ni malagiilyo.”
ACT 18:14 Matungo uPaulo nai wakatula uloilwe kuligitya, uGalio aka atambuila i Ayahudi, “Unyenye Ayahudi, anga aza itule utumuli ang'wi ubipya, aza izeetula tai kuitumila u mulimo.
ACT 18:15 Kuiti ku nsoko ingi makolyo, natulikile imakani ni mina, ni malagiilyo anyu, uugwa lamuli nyenye akola. Unene nimugila insula kutula mulamuli ku nkani nia makani nanso.”
ACT 18:16 uGalio akalagiilya ahege ntongeela ituntu nila ulamuli.
ACT 18:17 Iti gwa, akamuamba uSosthene, mutongeeli nu itekeelo, akamukua ntongeela ituntu nila ulamuli. Kuiti uGalio shanga ai ukee nai akitumile.
ACT 18:18 uPaulo, ze yakilaa kikie pang'wanso ku itungo ilipu, ai ualekile anya ndugu nu kulongola na meli ku Siria palung'wi nu Prisila nu Akwila. Ze ikili nu kuhega pa bandari, ai uzue insingi niakwe ku nsoko ai watula walapaa kutula munazili.
ACT 18:19 Nai akapika ku Efeso, uPaulo ai umulekile uPrisila nu Akwila pang'wanso, kuiti ung'wenso mukola akingila mi itekeelo nu kitambulya ni Ayahudi.
ACT 18:20 Nai amutambuie uPaulo wikie ni enso ku itungo ilipu, nuanso ai uhitile.
ACT 18:21 Kuiti wakahega kitalao, aka atambuila, “Nikasuka hangi kitalanyu, agaitule ingi ulowa wang'wa Itunda.” Ze yakilaa pang'wanso, wakahega ku meli kupuma ku Efeso.
ACT 18:22 uPaulo nai wakasima ku Kaisaria, ai unankie kulongola kulilamusha itekeelo nila ku Yerusalemu, uugwa akasima pihi ku itekeelo nila ku Antiokoa.
ACT 18:23 Ze yakilaa kikie ku itungo ilipu pang'wanso, uPaulo ai uhegile kukiila nkika nia ku Galatia ni Frigia nu kuakinyila inkolo i amanyisigwa ihi.
ACT 18:24 Muyahudi ung'wi nuitangwaa Apolo, nai utugiwe uko ku Alexandria, ai upembilye ku Efeso. Ai ukete nu ulingi mu kuligitya hangi muhugu mu ukilisigwa.
ACT 18:25 uApollo ai watulaa ulagiiwe mu umanyisigwa nua Mukulu. Ku kinya uli nai ukete nu ukamatiku mu nkolo, ai wiligityaa nu kumanyisa ku uziza imakani namutuile uYesu, ila ai ulingile udu u wogigwa nuang'wa Yohana.
ACT 18:26 uApolo akandya kitamulya ku ukamatiku mi itekeelo. Kuiti uPrisila nu Akwila nai akamija, ai azipilye kihumbashuya nu ng'wenso hangi akamuganuila migulya a nzila niang'wa Itunda ku uziza,
ACT 18:27 Nai wakahung'wa insula kuhega kulongola ku Akaya, anyandugu ai amukinyie inkolo nu kuakilisilya ibada i amanyisigwa niakoli ku Akaya iti ahume kumusingiilya. Nuikapikiila, ku ukende ai ua aiiye nangaluu awo nai ahuiie.
ACT 18:28 Ku ngulu niakwe ni mahala, uApolo ai uakiile i Ayahudi mu kihenga wazelagiila kukiila ukilisigwa niya kina uYesu yuyo Kristo.
ACT 19:1 Ikatula kina uApolo nai wakatula ku Korintho, uPaulo akakila matumbi a migulya nu kupika kisali nika Efeso, hangi wakahanga amanyisigwa kituunga kung'wanso.
ACT 19:2 uPaulo aka atambuila, “Itii, ai mumusingiiye uNg'wau Ng'welu nai muhuiie?” Aka mutambuila, “Aa, shanga ai kuhumile ga nukija kutula uNg'wau Ng'welu.”
ACT 19:3 uPaulo akaligitya, “Itungili unyenye ai mogigwe uli?” Akaligitya, “Mu wogigwa nuang'wa Yohana.”
ACT 19:4 Uugwa uPaulo akasukiilya, “uYohana ai wogilye ku wogigwa nua kila itunu. Aka aila i antu awo kina atakiwe kumuhuiila uyo naiza uzeepembya zeyakilaa nuanso, kuiti, uYesu.
ACT 19:5 Antu nai akija u lukani ulu, akogigwa ku lina nila Mukulu uYesu.
ACT 19:6 Hangi ikatula uPaulo nai wakaikila i mikono akwe migulya ao, uNg'wau Ng'welu wakiza migulya ao nu kandya kitunta ku ntambu nu kulota.
ACT 19:7 Jumla ao ai akoli agoha apikiie ikumi na abiili.
ACT 19:8 uPaulo ai ulongoe mi itekeelo akaligitya ku ukamatiku ku matungo a myeli itaatu. ai utuile utongee u witambuliyi nu kualuta i antu kutula imakani natulikile nu utemi nua ang'wa Itunda.
ACT 19:9 Kuiti i Ayahudi auya ai atulaa ilugoha hangi ni shanga ijaa, ai andilye kutambula ubii kutula i nzila ang'wa Kristo ntongeela iumbi. Uugwa u Paulo ai ulekenukile ni enso hangi aka abagula i ahuiili kahelu ni enso. Nu ng'wenso ai wandilye kuligitya kila luhiku mu kianda nika Tirano.
ACT 19:10 Iki ai kilongolekile ku myaka ibiili, ku lulo ihi nai atulaa ikii mu Asia ai igule u lukani nila Mukulu, ihi i Ayahudi ni Ayunani.
ACT 19:11 Itunda ai watulaa ukituma makani makulu ku mikono ang'wa Paulo,
ACT 19:12 kina ga ni alwae ai akomigwe, ni ahing'wi ai a apumile, itungo nai ahoile u mukako nu ng'wenda nai ipumile mu muili nuang'wa Paulo.
ACT 19:13 Kuiti ai amoli Ayahudi akuhiilya a hing'wi ai alongoe muhinzo kukiila i kipango ni kanso, ai alitumie i lina nilang'wa Yesu ku nsoko a utumili nuao akola. Aze atambuila awo nai akete i ahing'wi; Azeligitya, “Kumulagiilya mupume mu lina nilang'wa Yesu naiza uPaulo ukimutanantya.”
ACT 19:14 Nai itumile aya ai atulaa ana mupungati ang'wa kuhani nu Mukulu nua Ayahudi, uSkewa.
ACT 19:15 Ahing'wi aka asukiilya, “uYesu kumulingile, nu Paulo kumulingile; Kuiti unyenye ingi a anyenyu?”
ACT 19:16 Uyo u hing'wi mukati a muntu waka aputila i akuhiilya a hing'wi nu kuakilya i ngulu nu kua kua. Uugwa akamanka kupuma ito ilo aze ikipwi nu kuaaligwa.
ACT 19:17 Ikani ili likakumuka ku ihi. Ayahudi ni Ayunani, naza ikiee uko ku Efeso. Akatula nu woa nangaluu, ni lina nila Mukulu likakila ku kuligwa.
ACT 19:18 Hangi, idu a ahuiili ai azile hangi akihanguila hangi azepumilya intendo nimbi nai itumile.
ACT 19:19 Idu ai atulaa akituma ukiliki akilingiila i mbugulu niao, akaisonsa ntongeela a kila muntu. Itungo nianso nai aka allya insailo nia intu nianso ai yatulaa ipande magana a nzogu makumi a taano niya mpia.
